user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Urs Schlegel","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWAJuAB1pZegz4uxhUMYWiMS8n2nsKNeSa9nOYtcjviMSY9lk-J=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Island Beach Bar and Restaurant at Latchi Beach in Polis offers a perfect combination of a relaxed atmosphere, stunning beachfront location, and delicious Mediterranean cuisine. The fresh seafood dishes and the variety of options are particularly impressive in terms of quality and taste. The service is attentive and friendly, and the prices are reasonable for the quality provided. It's ideal for a casual lunch or a romantic dinner at sunset. A must-visit for anyone in the area!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOgfoeX40qY1u1CbKCgVOVMxx2Ut4Hiz91ibUhK"],"When":"2024-8-15"},{"Name":"Brandy and Kola","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV9ru3-ytSlGw26Fxc494P0gdEoZiNFwI5urGNI7fmPwj68qFQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I come here often with friends for coffee, brunch, Prosecco etc... we like to sit and play backgammon in the peace. Always greeted by beautiful smiles doesn't matter who is working on shift at the time. Tasos Petra, ipodamia, Andre and the rest of the team, everyone is friendly and customer service is top notch.
Even in the summer months during the warm weather they are always running but always with a smile on their face. So professional all the time, and really go above and beyond to ensure customer satisfaction. We had the back gammon board one day and some other people arrived and also wanted to play, ipodamia went out to the shops and got a new one to ensure they could play too. The guys know exactly what I drink and at what time Petra is amazing for this. Thank you guys for always being awesome wishing you a bigger and better season for 2025.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO6aMpTwg4ssrED1gDUM5KAw5bQDBzkWFyl3BDW"],"When":"2024-10-9"},{"Name":"Lesley Smith","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWPbNTFyXp66zsA9-Y6zpXrvAmBZ4TexC8GZtJ9h_JVZ5AXc-kJYg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great location and lovely views. Minimal vegan choices but the veggie fajitas were delicious and the waitress confirmed with the chef that the guacamole was vegan too.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNJyMZyr3OvXUxKmNMrTh1KWv_4VUd0vkQq0hun"],"When":"2024-5-5"},{"Name":"Andy Harper","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUpFfvV7QkZbFwTTZ93o9B8S1VvX6O58zDgNi56vAh5dXcs_4YG=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Came for dinner early evening, its a nice place with good views of the beach and ocean.
The staff were super friendly and helpful, we came back later and its a great night spot with a great atmosphere and music.
But not recommended for food to be honest.
We had the sea food platter and pitta with dips to share, the pitta and dips were good.
The whole of the seafood platter had just been deep fried and I mean everything, even muscles in shells. It was all just greasy and tasteless","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNC7_CyqGBwHHOWbW8slelutPSKkI-E1OhX0dOE"],"When":"2024-3-23"},{"Name":"Duncan Strathie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVo_gO0uHpetiUwu1XyuMq69P3104cLWTvyl1OhcU_kL4N7odo=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great situation right on the beach. Good range of food and drink on offer with friendly service.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMW1Ljo3ONFnO0RHfG-E_8KIeo8QbigpSHOGT0"],"When":"2024-9-23"},{"Name":"Rudi Rüssel","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUgXyX2nDGBI2Q64Nu8tVri76JaiDAoxDaKDvJr4bkbQPenvkBc=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Everything was great. After having some bad and overpriced cocktails elsewhere we went here and got some fine ones. We had some starters as well and those were great, too. Over the evening we had a great variety of cocktails and most of them have been absolutely fantastic. And then there was this amazing sunset.....","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMnljf-wj-y9J8pP8tFO0_VNfevowWX2peyB4E"],"When":"2023-6-23"},{"Name":"manny bap","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIX5SLXxXLziIt0vX_RWNSoaNlrk8Tqoun7OT1gX-aSe7sEOw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Stopped here for a quick drink. Lovely bar with beautiful view of sea","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN-FoXKwe0971QcEfHPoYwSjeb3ycge2jXmcxjP"],"When":"2024-9-24"},{"Name":"Piotr Mroczek","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLK-BeKKK0rgnUF4Y8yNf0l9wACMrGf8V7FCRQ5VjkWUhkfMg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We only had a few drinks, they were quite good, my son had margarita pizza which was probably frozen but still quite nice. Lovely views, great location.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM0MnsBgoLK42KkcZoQcoUAaJw-K3ZO7wMmpA5w"],"When":"2024-1-9"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Faidra Antoniadou","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWOy1uEs0xarzSQBFIu1LDiYwoS9InR96WuprIAdx_EtBbKlA9S4g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Our recent visit to Porto Latchi was a mixed experience. While the restaurant boasts a beautiful location with stunning views of the sea, especially if you manage to snag a table on the waterfront, the quality of the food and overall dining experience left much to be desired.

Starting with the positives, the Greek salad was fresh and enjoyable, providing a decent start to the meal. Unfortunately, it was downhill from there. Our main courses consisted of carbonara and truffle ravioli, both of which were underwhelming. The carbonara was passable, but nothing to write home about. The real disappointment, however, was the truffle ravioli. Not only was the portion size shockingly small, but the ravioli itself was bland, and the accompanying sauce was far too heavy and stodgy, detracting from what should have been a more refined dish.

Additional issues included the bread, which tasted old and stale, and the precut limes served with our meal were dried out and still had sand on them. This lack of attention to detail was disappointing. Considering all these shortcomings, the meal was also highly overpriced. We ended up paying €41 for just these dishes and a bottle of water, which did not seem justified given the quality and portion sizes.

In summary, while Porto Latchi might offer a pleasant view, the food quality, portion sizes, and pricing leave much to be desired. It's not a place we would recommend based on my experience, especially if you're looking for value for your money and a satisfying meal.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOtcd3D-PqfQjxGTshIwFE_8H4Eg8nsQsH7Au1N"],"When":"2024-9-3"},{"Name":"Fobby","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKzGcHq55PwqCR6ckTH2kG2vKn5hRjLM6KtoryYYNwMVC6kOQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The restaurant is on both sides of the street, on one side you have a more formal setting and the other side nearest the beach is for more relaxed dinning. Overall food was good, but service was pretty standard and we didn’t see a waitress smile. We tried to communicate a bit in Greek (as we learnt some for our trip) but appeared waitress were Russian or Eastern European and didn’t understand it!   We stayed local and noted the owner kept parking his car in the middle of the pavement which was an annoying.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP8NKFBpTsWphiU2phiDdvfY_NnQNTGT2lZ4gLa"],"When":"2024-5-30"},{"Name":"Zoltan Kun","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU-_86UMH_1i6ooqDj2hC8jF08jBL4XgCuiCgggiHxYn6H2Hq7Pqg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Try to avoid if you can. Apart from the location which is admittedly nice, the food is horrific. The staff seem to be unhappy and they do the bare minimum. I ordered a lamb shank, it was dry and had no seasoning. The grilled vegetables were also unseasoned. My 10 years old nephew can make a better meal. Gordon, i have some ideas for the next season of kitchen nightmares…
The coffee was probably made from instant coffee..
I will definitely not come here again…","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPD1Bkbipc2bhmWgIJwAalEdZQLWg7IyGXdWign"],"When":"2024-10-2"},{"Name":"M C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV_Uy92-J__-MAwll1WwYZ3uEysiJbjgirSBqXbjLZV7G8XkkPeZQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"We came here as we had read some good reviews. I honestly felt a bother to the staff. When we ordered the Cyprus starter for 2, no tzakziki or taramasalata as described, I kept some salad  and dips for my main, the waitress frowned when I asked to keep this to go with my main. She wasn't friendly and we didn't feel welcome at all. Shame as it's a lovely location.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNmnKtIzDYUx39OFQUWGXs-xKmLWUI8TtofoDf6"],"When":"2024-10-2"},{"Name":"Philippa James","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX0d5ls15bOPCR7zKfOLulPwRHxAOJmI2JQqeewRw1LMpLPOGh9=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Some really delicious seafood including the Cyprus Prawns, Crab and Fried Calamari. The sea bass was excellent and the white taramasalata was also divine. The local wine was very palatable and reasonably priced. Sadly, the lamb was incredibly disappointing and chewy which you wouldn’t expect from an area famed for great meats.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMAyAgUE6q9aJyLKlZkxlbc9ChtKu1T2Lu5QakO"],"When":"2024-6-24"},{"Name":"Natasa Nyikon","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU3xWk4AMEctTY9bCQQozHQzE5rYNAXEunS74qza8e6yHYiLVk=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I got the fisherman's platter. It was a huge portion, absolute worth the money.
Lovely people, nice- not too loud- music, close to the beach. Definitely recommended.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMLzuYw7WuQ5lmcLTD5KkDXIbav70qCN7eCPbGU"],"When":"2024-5-18"},{"Name":"Malamati Kourti","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKjeYc5ooE9bzsSLhxZ_k3HZYAlo6RBpR6Fd2GUuNGkjDl_aw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"After reading the moderate recent comments we were a little hesitant to go to this restaurant. However we decided to give it a try. We had the fish meze and it was very good. The service was fast even though it was rush hour and the food was tasty. We would come back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOXPxRgwCqSwoeEGiYVKYB0UhLoHK8z4mGFnhFo"],"When":"2024-8-19"},{"Name":"Daria Dubinina","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU-PMMCNJfl_tLBVdcvvpjXFPKXedbm73FgbWybA7rTIYGEYJgF=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Good food especially grilled octopus and fish meze. Beautiful view of the sunset","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM0uEBAnZhliRwY8Y3skgEUoHjNV7HlYa1T6XPk"],"When":"2024-10-8"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Elliot May","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV1_gDMKEj4g537IKR1xXxmVwZ4D5ithu_xcw7WdpzDjW5QlxRR=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Best place in Cyprus!
We came to Noma last year when on holiday here, and couldn’t wait to come back - sooo delighted and relieved that, if possible, Noma is even better than before!
The service is excellent - the staff are friendly, and attentive; and the owner, George, is kind and very generous.
There’s always a good atmosphere here - the background music at a good level, the venue itself decorated beautifully, and the harbour side view is stunning.
The food really is incredible - the truffle Croque Madame, in particular, was delicious (as was the steak sandwich and the chicken curry) and the portion sizes were incredibly generous. They were also kind enough to tweak some dishes to accommodate a vegetarian diet (despite already offering some good vegan and vegetarian alternatives); and made a real effort for my mums birthday.
There’s parking at the front of Noma via the gravel track (though it’s a little hard to find); and it’s suitable for disabled access.
I hope Noma stays this good forever but just in case it doesn’t, get down there whilst you still can!
Thanks George and the Noma team","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOMOAo01UTNTSBVD85fKsd3fiWH0W6zvqamnsNs"],"When":"2024-10-7"},{"Name":"Thomas Loebert","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWdtDdDyVIIYE3vHyDn_HePDR5bf12R_ZTvIdfJ1gGPr8KnQwwv=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very nice ambience with pleasant, chilled background music - sometimes by a live DJ - at Latchi harbor with excellent, friendly service and a menu that is unparalleled in Latchi and the surrounding area. Whether breakfast, lunch or dinner, from vegan to traditional dishes - 10/10! The breakfast highlight for me are the Eggs Benedict! The cocktail menu also leaves nothing to be desired. The place to be in Latchi!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNhqkUdQDDaysueDnHwCbBdpimhoPN1wZ6atK5u"],"When":"2023-11-2"},{"Name":"Alexia Berta Demetriou","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVpxRf39phKZYQ6Z7jVjlJasyYhTQnwUf58GxBpv93ynM58OoaJRA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I was pleasantly surprised by this place. From the beautiful and cosy decor, to the many inspiring vegetarian and vegan options (rare in Cyprus) to the delicious meal and truly, without exaggeration the friendliest service I have possibly ever come across in a restaurant.

And the crowning was the complimentary desert.  I missed that warm touch of cypriot hospitality that used to be the norm in the past, it was such a lovely surprise and delicious too.

Prices are reasonable for what you receive. A memorable experience.  I shall return.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP3_-pFyVve5-ogA7vOk9sbT7zo-ckP27YBlXkX"],"When":"2024-10-3"},{"Name":"Christo Christodoulides","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVahhYLUti0fzNckGyJbb_k4_YuP9aqf2srLoCgH707tgBQWjow=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We really hardly ever do online reviews even if we do not like the place, however, we feel truly blessed to come across this hidden gem at Latchi Marina, one of the most picturesque places in Cyprus. The whole family and all friends are absolutely fascinated with the food quality, their menu diversity, and also the service everytime.

Definitely recommend Noma Latchi, our favorite place to go to when in the vicinity.

Well done!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOKXW7fF1Ksw9CgXQqBrnHwnqoIw24ugr9ckf55"],"When":"2024-8-27"},{"Name":"Stevie-Marie Gamblen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKLJ76sGZrV8sitatIrcA7gfEzqgqpoh12FCoQGKRM3vIV-3Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Myself and my partner came here after reading the amazing reviews and we were not disappointed. As soon as you enter from the harbour the Asthetics of the restaurant is beautiful and you are at peace. The food itself is stunning and the service here is perfection. I would highly recommend visiting Nona Latchi.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipML7UQazeECIppEKKUr9srSRTuwLkzx9aLfUnB7"],"When":"2024-9-9"},{"Name":"Martyn Jennings (MJ)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV6gFnc2KWv0K7_WiDIV0BiSLX9LlYYGWMaESdg06stEujG5Sqhgg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Food is great and very tasty with good portion sizes. Staff didn’t seem happy on our visit but may have been a bad day.

Great open air seating, and fans are welcome. With drinks averaged at 30 euros each","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNCXjpODQeuSSrS7IFrDUllcIhKRr3flHuP4Abd"],"When":"2024-7-30"},{"Name":"Daren King","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXxeEsMmkKWbi0hyPFwOXq1gLOo7N7pViQSp326wlKCCqyKKHPZ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Lovely place for a coffee and brunch. (Haven’t had dinner there yet).  Had an amazing latte and club sandwich.   They also have a dynamic instagram follower ticker.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP4IsYXkjZyQCihtwUEyzwZmjDtLFWueQSaw0oA"],"When":"2024-7-12"},{"Name":"Maja","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWpoKuzbXAtNBw_oJZGqhYt0o820t5HSuCnsEHMkACIJztd_YuuGA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We loved that place a lot!!
Me and my friends went there on breakfast today, the food was perfect and the staff was incredibly friendly and nice, the place is extremely beautiful and we really enjoyed our time here, thank you so so much!! 🩷🫶 I reccomed this to everyone, especially for brunch, we had avocado with sourdough bread shakshuka and pancakes with salted caramel and it was simply incredible. Thank you 🩷","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMn4f8KKwXH7Op5RTWj9Uug6stjGxH_DSd7tDCV"],"When":"2024-5-27"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Andras A.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXFI_E_fvhobICCKTGagSBHpccSXSxcW8GboB2UIPCDdybvqWjj=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The owner is a very friendly person and knows the famous Hungarian footballer: Puskas. He has kind words for every guests and every time we visited the restaurant received welcome gifts (dips and toast) and sweets for free. Service is always fantastic even when place is full. There are several tables both inside and outside as well. Parking lot is free and nearby.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOm5Rmgcr-vcqozDVwEhqxKJNRE4LF34YQ1V2jy"],"When":"2024-8-26"},{"Name":"Ella Tuominen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ0P72DSdh_Ej28fRjm6DKPk4lVAwRbpyF4ndtoXHY4tDfhtg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Food was incredibly tasty, fantastic value, generous portions (we were all very full and had quite a bit of food left to takeaway) and service was really friendly! The waitress was lovely and even gave us a small dessert and a digestif on the house. We were a part of one of the organised trips and chose to come here instead of the restaurant suggested by the tour guide. We’re so happy we did: this was the best food we had in Cyprus! We had the sharing mezzes, moussaka and vegetarian platter, all were great!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMYcGVvUFSkRJfsWKk43fCY-0UiniuIrno1F_hZ"],"When":"2024-9-1"},{"Name":"Meri Todorova","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLymi_4865274hOrGXyin7h_i3BuKaKG715YiZoVepWgw4iig=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The best tavern! Super delicious fresh food. Big portion and the best prices. Great service from the waitress Sandy. Very kind and smily girl. It was pleasure to be served by her. We received also compliment from the restaurant - very delicious pita dessert and small shot of local alcohol. The cook Jazz was also the best on the grill.
Highly recommend!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNZMg2_kUiq4NRh73iRK6sv-HbKoyM3QW7iRSRx"],"When":"2024-9-22"},{"Name":"Melina Moretti","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUrNmEXer8NnPixbST8d01uSR6VUpHp5Ruue1yf4tkV2Yh61aotIw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Best tavern in Cyprus by far! Food is excellent, owner is very friendly and kind. He sent a bunch of extra food on our table on the house. Very good people and service was also excellent. Thank you","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPsFJcaaLnb5Ny2mc2GeNjTI7kunusRthItCNZU"],"When":"2024-8-21"},{"Name":"Wojtek K","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI_BbdYsvhpZv8JZT8_DLbyOV9_aVoELq1KGMJEcc3DRijwnQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Tasty food, big portions and the most important very very charming restaurant owner!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO-oppvATP3EwiG96WIAP2bINE_pxMO3plkSz1f"],"When":"2024-9-27"},{"Name":"Anže Korenjak","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUaX8ww6srqtKvplXyHI8kvagiAw4Bw_9lFLXuZZJJ4xO1H30R-=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Excellent Greek food tavern, delicious food, friendly staff and just perfect! Highly recommended!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPFVIjpuzSZNQEhxqXGv5b0XOUipNTccLYQKXJa"],"When":"2024-8-30"},{"Name":"Elena Manziuc","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX_rCQbWDa3HSnDAgIAdD8HYttZZegrF5KOLTrItz9vwNNvMWsu=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Good place to enjoy local food.
The vegetarian plate was delicious. But they do not serve fish.
The setvice is very pleasing - we've had even a dessert as a gift.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOZqCwMU0_-0_smqDlzSRPCkll_HCJdSjppcGzi"],"When":"2024-3-30"},{"Name":"Ekaterina Dolgova","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWj4XlKdzScwcZlXbwzeABQmGtggmZK458nj_CBVkRJsqTM0rA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great dinner, service is fast and efficient,  all dishes are tasty and authentic! Lived the experience","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNSH3OKVy7uw1udKzDbzdvXRL-rGu6HMpPEInIq"],"When":"2024-6-21"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Laura F.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVqp1T2prp24hf_73gU7v6HmDdG8ZrsyvLLPTE_9MzoQUgXh_fH=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We were a bit reluctant to go to this place as I dread tourist traps. Yet, even we were given a different menu ( for the tour guests) food was super yummy, well presented and reasonably priced.
Wine was very pleasant as well.
The restaurant is quite nicely decorated and you can sit outside by the shade or inside.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM42tu1Q96XCd-qbJCWG9JhyXtL45uzfdleY9ap"],"When":"2024-9-18"},{"Name":"chris jenkins","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK1XrjrrtLbx-qY2NLmzEI5S8XyTuiuItVvh2ASaJb3YEfDkQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A really nice place to enjoy your evening.  Food was exceptional, catering for all of our group, with plenty of choices. Service was also great and you really were made to feel welcome. Highly recommended. Will return on our next visit to Cyprus. Thanks for a lovely evening","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN5Lk1p6WCdE6anzcm6cXn_4VkiKSm9qSP60D1a"],"When":"2024-9-28"},{"Name":"Iddo Ben Ami","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJcZz4LEyK3VR6xScq0cuwjxzDmXJXAtTTBkUXvDSm0Mw-VSg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing local food, many different dishes, great quality for good price.
The family who runs the restaurant is super friendly, and the service is excellent.
Definitely recommended!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMEptAio5pIyMtaei4KicHHlbWdQmJgbeGZfAc0"],"When":"2024-9-4"},{"Name":"Ana","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK7J0BQQBn-IJAl7RNbWtir-F38xBw8s5h3QYWkZVzQCOsUbQ8=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had a great lunch in this restaurant after the swimming in Blue Lagoon. The place has a big terrace in the shade and such a nice atmosphere. The food was amazing, portion was big and they had vegan/vegetarian options which is an additional plus. I don’t know if I should even mention the service that was so welcoming and fast! They really cared that you have a good experience and that everything is alright. Would recommend this place if you’re ever passing by!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipObipZv-w4OR6TlD_JGTXiUgZ9LkPZZWGZsIolE"],"When":"2024-4-18"},{"Name":"Albert Tannous","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXGl8dDBxFL9qYSP2EdoFxIkDeZ-2CXMxOZrRAsBViboT7P1lou=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My experience at "Moustakallis" in Paphos was absolutely outstanding! From the moment we walked in, we were greeted with warm and friendly service that set the tone for the entire evening. The staff were attentive, professional, and made sure every detail of our dining experience was perfect.

The food was simply phenomenal. Every dish we ordered was fresh, flavorful, and beautifully presented. The grilled meats were perfectly cooked, and the seafood was incredibly fresh. The mezze selection was diverse and gave us a true taste of traditional Cypriot cuisine, with each dish tasting better than the last.

The atmosphere at Moustakallis is charming and authentic, with a lively yet relaxed vibe. It’s the kind of place that makes you feel at home while enjoying top-quality food.

Overall, I highly recommend Moustakallis to anyone visiting Paphos. The combination of excellent service, delicious food, and welcoming atmosphere makes it a must-visit restaurant. I can't wait to return!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOcU95w_RA7kL0faknNIM6b9537oxMYtITlGrIv"],"When":"2024-9-19"},{"Name":"Georgia Christodoulou","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ-Y9UT7iXXEmkel6Vd5n2YYK7BJ2L1TddPym_kUR1P98_35g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I am kindly writing at the moment however couldn't find something positive and especially about the food that was bad. We ordered kleftiko, ok that is not kleftiko just an oven baked lamp, served with rice (definetly the worst I ever had at a restaurant, proofs can be found at the photos) fried potatoes and ready made sause like bisto or something and frozen veggies. It was edible but that doesn't mean I could eat it. We also order the mixed grill, same side options. I am not even sure If food was cooked on charcoal and not in the oven, pan, and then at something else just to take the brown lines on the meat. Also our glasses were extremely dirty all four of them from waiters dirty hands and one of them had food stains too. I have to mention that the three women at the next table ate nothing of their food and they asked for the bill several times. The service was ok not perfect. Tourists this is not a place to try traditional dishes. Not recommended at all.
I am happy to see your answer below!
I have to mention that I come from a family of professional cooks and also my husband is a chef. Yes the taste is subjective and I have my personal opinion however the quality and some cooking rules are objective.
P.s. You owe a business and as a professional the ironic comments on customer reviews are not the way to treat your customers and neither part of a proper customer retention policy. Thank you!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNwhBPXQtxZYD0mXtRH8_i5usA25tSjhJp4oZjm"],"When":"2024-8-20"},{"Name":"Fobby","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKzGcHq55PwqCR6ckTH2kG2vKn5hRjLM6KtoryYYNwMVC6kOQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Our favourite restaurant on this side of Cyprus.  Family run, and everyone was extremely welcoming and friendly. Also go to see the famous moustache 🥸. Food was amazing, the service was top class and and atmosphere was authentic, it was great to feel like you were in a traditional Cypriot tavern.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPOdinXkuJB3wkU6VP2aoDrAyp1X4FqDNi4q3h2"],"When":"2024-5-30"},{"Name":"D Sutherland","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVJQbs0cQSrScVlmJgcOMUWbeT5ErFmeU-GtAgAJqYwCowK7Pgj=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Popped in to ask for change for the car park. Was made to feel so welcome that we went back for lunch. A lovely, family run place which is huge. Service was fast and friendly and the food was good and plentiful. Thoroughly enjoyed the chicken souvlaki.
Highly recommend.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNmR4oxvLb-PZQN-A21VdbZFH48JiVVTUaV9dN1"],"When":"2024-4-12"}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Di Windsor-Smith","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVDdwZmyWE1GaSdd2LzUgDngdvq5PtoxeQUgtNcw89rAMp9lsg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We visited twice during our stay, food was lovely and fresh and staff really friendly and welcoming. Will definitely be back next year 😊","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNnGz4GecKp9OLuj4cGtI4Q7x_teoQ_ij7rqXn3"],"When":"2024-9-27"},{"Name":"Karen Shakespeare","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUGl284u0kFnKLqvkQJdK3ZjB5dmykGpc6zyZYZFzR1KlTQzXQC9g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The breakfast here cannot be beaten. The vegetarian breakfast is particularly impressive. If you're a meat-eater then the traditional breakfast is a better option than the English breakfast. The service is fantastic; Tracey and Bea are so friendly and attentive.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPe9EFTmWHWR9xZQPGeJZ8Mo04PM2zdXDJJZL5z"],"When":"2024-5-20"},{"Name":"freedom queen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKFIhTnOD0zhKHKPtwtBj7EMaUA6X8DKwZx2bpS97Lv2C-Zqw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"So cute place, got no problem to change the vegetarian menu to vegan option without extra charge, the food was tasty and the prices were very good 😊👍","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOgTNZHnX33HsV54fy99vdoFFjNhBRMGJyx10Ue"],"When":"2024-8-18"},{"Name":"Chris Sanderson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ44-_WMSLOawoueDngFryAkU-IvET2TcgLveLMsbYHlqI-KA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Excellent breakfast and reasonably priced. Would definitely recommend a visit if you like your English breakfasts....","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOSDMXL97UlX2xnW2IFkUBlvvB6m-kGrBut6nj2"],"When":"2019-1-13"},{"Name":"Tony Tomlinson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW44RZeJJWcM6l2TojvSZzAo3UwhU2SH1LmXPX33CCNbNr1XHo=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Wish we saw this place sooner, randomly walked passed it on our last day of holiday, lovely full English breakfast","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Tom Hayden","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUc1CkV8PvAYHh1PqXBY27iBXvSmOo3Jkgqg4rbGa0Pk49jODTS=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"What a find, real English breakfast, great prices and super tasty.\nWent here after a blue lagoon tour and it was so worth it","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPZHMVEQHRMM4UYtZlGXk-uS3OKwz3HR_6_evMz"],"When":"2023-11-3"},{"Name":"jeevendra singh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVP56KMUkApio4Sp6tP6iEdx3xb4jgyrJCS-MdWR_iCa5A_m9Dz=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Lovely breakfast place in latsi . Family run feel, interiors had lyrics and poems on walls which gave very trendy feel and food was delicious. We ordered salad and veggie breakfast with some changes and they were happy to give what we asked for. Salad was very fresh and veggie brkfast was just yummy. Don't miss !!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNlK2IEgaIJg7mgmvSlH50yDuI5sQOZVljU98Zx"],"When":"2019-6-3"},{"Name":"Pit Nguyen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWWmP6nKntqTzqHy2l-0uM57jOoDB4asS6-KyWofKkS_mMBzIAo=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Lovely place next to the harbor.  Affordable price, tasty break and friendly service.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPMKvhh1kuryJ20W1SQcjAIWOYhOAT_ZTTBNiUi"],"When":"2022-6-22"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Perry Satchwell-Cox","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWOn7eS3xGK-Xa3RrUfYSo5pOduyyxt9-yvvt4_SFCP8THmc0Yg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Lovely place, great Asian / Asian fusion.   As others have said, careful with some of the drinks and you're fine.    Had 3 starters, 2 mains and a portion of egg fried rice, couple of alcoholic drinks each and a pudding to share for just over €70 which is decent.    Will be going back.   Totally forgot to take pictures of the food which was all really good but did take some of the menu as I noticed I couldn't see a full menu online.

Will take some pictures of the food when we return later in the week.

Great service from all the staff also, and I even had a dish removed from the order as they said the portions were quite big so might be too much for the two of us, so really appreciated that also","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOQmXnkkO9mS-GZvFgkePtwtfrgH7vNe5XvX-1K"],"When":"2024-4-16"},{"Name":"Di Windsor-Smith","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVDdwZmyWE1GaSdd2LzUgDngdvq5PtoxeQUgtNcw89rAMp9lsg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We visited twice during our holiday, food was lovely, staff really friendly and welcoming, great views while your eating. Highly recommend visiting 👌","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMAXVs5khbolfAVrTEayq7kk-JVJudjypARqG1w"],"When":"2024-9-27"},{"Name":"Neil Fisher","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXYXSgSOVHI_xSSIYccxz9IAoeb4du3b9tmTrnGW8shpuAV-zSm=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very nice food, and friendly service.  Clean environment 👍
As normal ordered two much 😂. If two of you I would go with one side, noddles or rice as you get plenty in the mains","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOkBdVPFS6PCC7VoyUp2wKPsd12iiHYliQxNDrg"],"When":"2024-6-16"},{"Name":"Teri Allerton","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVVLqxxQXTNhCbueQ67N4zDqOIodTkVFQpLdcV3qFMGOe6xpzVc=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great to have a new type of cuisine in the area and Wok & Walk did not disappoint. Recently opened and still fine tuning but the service, ambience, attention to detail, beautiful crockery and table settings complemented the interesting and very tasty Asian fusion menu. Set by Latsi harbour it was a fabulous experience and I cannot wait to go back and work my way through the menu!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP4RNEfmKZH1uvF1pi5wFmurbDgQNYVzWBWXbsc"],"When":"2023-10-26"},{"Name":"Jessica W","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIJP_MG1pac4uijzwVuydq2LHcPAOR2xGDyN1l4WPuNbSPYTg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We ate here twice over our three night stay in Latchi. It was by far the best Asian food we have had after living in Cyprus for a year. The dumplings and salt and pepper squid were delicious for starters. We had sushi which was so fresh and the Thai red prawn curry was amazing. One portion of rice between two was plenty which our waitress advised us on. They don't have a kids menu but our three year old loved the chicken noodles and they are really reasonably priced (cheaper than kids menu dishes and better than in other restaurants)! Would definitely recommend.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Mary","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIzOy1VUrTKJqmwviPBmJ5LSB1q9_fmcE2SYs1cJdL5azlFCbY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Average taste in food. We called for dim sum: chicken as well as pork and prawn. Only chicken was nice. We also ordered 2 sushi choices and they were average. In addition to the taste, we found a little plastic in the sushi. The team replaced the sushi without a 2nd thought but didn't really apologize or provide any free dish or discount. In general though the service was good and everyone was polite.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Pippa Downing","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL8eYQ4eJpVrt4R6Rn0JO8VKtT5G7wRSR7ZsmvX9ck3rXXLtQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is a fantastic little restaurant on Latchi harbour front. The food was delicious! We had dumplings and the best ribs and crispy beef we've ever tasted! The service was really friendly and the wine recommendations perfect. And it was really good value! We'll definitely be back and can't recommend it highly enough!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Veronika Shiryaeva","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIIG_skQtotXUxT9KadEaDs_AHCrgY_fUCyfSdhVyf8Iv5HqA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great food and amazing service, the prices are very good and the portions are quite big.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO5wSY7IJJQAwpDWXGV960Ye1a1PBBPm12uReIn"],"When":"2024-7-2"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Anton Bravo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWSL4TWLHCY9OgR_ABxqV1fjQizyTQhVqL2SC0L8ZLVBIQ3y5g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Good place to have a lunch with the harbor view. Food just good, we ordered most common positions and satisfied. The best was the administrator - such a nice guy, who helped with the right table next to the aircon, fast service, kind behavior. I don’t know his name but definitely ask next time. The place overall I would recommend. Thanks ✌🏼","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO6mej2BdTkQGlvsGkCCp-R8CVgSn9JLpfPW8p8"],"When":"2024-8-25"},{"Name":"Maxine Plimbley","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI3iZ2YpmVk1-raSXwNyEQjpo39dSyss9z8fvvxrn9xlSfGhg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We had dinner and drinks, reasonably priced. Portions were on the large side, both of us had Stifado which was very good. The beef just pulled apart so easily, very tender.

Desert choice was a little disappointing choice wise, mine was apple pie with ice cream with hubby having a chocolate sundae.

Staff attentive but not overbearing  - all in all an enjoyable evening.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMPWUzxdl0ilzH2hXQz0RqQ95-Jyr6_h54fH2h6"],"When":"2024-9-26"},{"Name":"Lisa Skone","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLEv_OUYxbA9Bbj1TAZ5Yycahc2npzvj4HzFqcXpzij9TR9iw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"If I could give 6 stars I would! I had the mussels in a white wine sauce, they tasted amazing and were so filling. Best food I've eaten since coming to Cyprus and in a beautiful place right by the sea. Mussels and iced tea came to under €20, so great value for money too!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOTLDllPvL8YW1N5Owz1oZsB6fR_xQNpHZV0Cn0"],"When":"2024-8-24"},{"Name":"Muhsin Khan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWDrxi9wCEEb-Di8IeYK9RiZFanaftfCJSpmWaAMgFQH8Nr8iMo=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It is one of the best restaurants in Cyprus. I have been in a lot of restaurants, but this one gonna be my all-time favourite restaurant. Delicious food, amazing atmosphere, amazing view, and good manners of staff RECOMMENDATIONS 100%","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipONvpqxYu1QgHXKgkbfeMQhFAHIESalQLe9lzda"],"When":"2024-4-29"},{"Name":"NzKat09","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKjCDTzzHXpawnJbcuFIGNb9dred6lbONEhqNQ3BPeULyIe8w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Today we have been to this "restaurant". My mother and I ordered a mixed fish plate. We were realy excited as the fish was displayed. After we received the plate we were devastated. The three different fish species were fried, some still had their guts in it... The chips were made from scratch which seems nice, yet the oil must have had a low temp.. They were cold in the middle, soggy and had no flavor at all - despite the rancid oil... The side salad had no dressing or any sort of liquid/spice on at all. After the sad meal we wanted to complain, the "nice" waiter was kind enough to explain that we were the fault, not the kitchen. There couldn't be any problems since he never received a complain in his three years Career. Good to know!

The whole experience was hideous!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOPq8u1K2AjwQV8baY_nWMC52x7GI_SU1kTPBll"],"When":"2024-3-16"},{"Name":"Mikey Harrison","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI6fLQT3zTTP7N6YaixfdSLJtZCMBzFF61EilLg8OlFB47l0A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing service. Quick and amazing food! Very reasonable price. If in latchi come here ! Mr. Bishal was very welcoming and looked after us, he was amazing.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPLWG1ucXqv0n3c4ZQXbcUCVYZyQ88gmgy_61gQ"],"When":"2024-6-1"},{"Name":"Jasmine Lakey","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXy8RlCN0-Q3M2rRSlo7pOk20VaHYXufObZBd7N6S3YUV8obwZKcw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing restaurant, really good quality of food and great variety for everyone's tastes. Staff are so friendly and really make the atmosphere lovely for the whole meal. Absolutely beautiful views of the harbour and the mountains behind, especially at sunset. Really wish we found it earlier in our holiday. Will definitely come back when we return to Cyprus ☺️","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO7qCTho-7k_XCmyugsk9OOOVaZ5k0aJOkRh_Od"],"When":"2022-6-10"},{"Name":"Tim Kitak","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX6mCFPyM58MkwEc-mVErEIQtPryqItHp3bt0WAw0ElJRo8TJK7=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Food is just great and fairly cheap! Staff there is very friendly and positive. 5/5","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPnfnijaKOuqMayxb7oD-2ityiMdCAEM1sdq7qs"],"When":"2024-5-25"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Klaudia Rymek","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVLllOjh5kcru88SprA_z0pbwbAgQPLIHeNVJFpwLbEbc47WIM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Delicious starters and main courses, very interesting.

Even though we ate after sunset and the sea was no longer visible, you could still feel it! The restaurant is very close to the sea and that is wonderful! At the end we got a free delicious dessert.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOBh4wYPFmBVc6gjj9vkYNOokRsXAM8b1PCRfl7"],"When":"2024-10-8"},{"Name":"Handyman","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLuAm0PjOT0A58G4X5lUnTSYpgkup-ICKBpsG8MVwzgNAzy8A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Fabulous restaurant on the most beautiful setting on the beach.
The food served was outstanding alongside the customer service.
The owner and staff were always friendly and kind.
We visited every night for 10 days it was that good.
We would give more than 5 stars if we could","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNaoRpj_hXpXgS6xsKAAYbcpyUZ8z8jR60fF4--"],"When":"2024-9-11"},{"Name":"Kev Sutton","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXf9mPcgaQ8kqU6a_FQK4Xqz1xIozsuuQajCbl5UtC4X_ISqaxwaw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Went for lunch while we were driving around the other side of the Island. Great location, right on the beach and looked like a lovely place to have a late evening meal!

Food was good and plenty of it, service was fairly quick. The only let down was the staff failed to manage a single smile between any of them, it felt a bit like we were an inconvenience to be honest. Shame because it could have been a great experience otherwise.

Toilet block on site and parking, not the biggest car park though!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPqcNpLODR9EMjKk1NVyxUSwr-dggLuLpmE4Axs"],"When":"2024-7-10"},{"Name":"Neil Fisher","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXYXSgSOVHI_xSSIYccxz9IAoeb4du3b9tmTrnGW8shpuAV-zSm=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A must place to visit if you in the location
Excellent meal, and a friendly atmosphere with an amazing view.
Lamb kebab was easy on the eye, and went down really well perfectly cooked.
Friendly staff, and a clean environment","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOoz376mAkTtrSZuiGMZyU0ZQjbG9q_4CGyRR0e"],"When":"2024-6-18"},{"Name":"Alex C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ-36mNA9c8DCEZ8nBH0AFleZJD24NnUztsNmU3xnMM30SF=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A girl at George’s boat rental recommended this one. Nice place, especially in the evening when the it’s not that hot and you can sit at the table 5 m from the sea. Prices are reasonable and food was good. There’s a playground for kids as well","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNmqH2CXcQdTh0_DORp7vGgAViSM4AJqc18ksE"],"When":"2024-6-9"},{"Name":"Alexandru Negru","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXzahMV1lr0XVGbTHERU_eWvhhYsLxPucjB_K7Jk9vsM6NKHfeY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great Food! The meat is very suculent and well cooked, meat mix for 2 is too much for one serving! We enjoyed it takeaway!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP2GYzNBj1VICTm_r767WBSVvG-w8G-QCQ9-jNK"],"When":"2024-9-27"},{"Name":"Teri Allerton","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVVLqxxQXTNhCbueQ67N4zDqOIodTkVFQpLdcV3qFMGOe6xpzVc=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Fabulous beach taverna! Excellent menu choice, great food and service with Shirley Valentine tables on the beach which are stunning to eat whilst watching the sun go down.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPDztLnGGQ6qG1lKI9Yp6l5alIdMIktSFzjibcW"],"When":"2024-9-18"},{"Name":"Alison Manels","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJy3TWxWbeUJ0RXXSplgNUx-Of5PMCcvBSMTm6TPvybGdZRAw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Lovely out look. Sun setting over the sea. Their Moussaka was absolutely delicious .","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOMDTNNqelyWbN1MRGqvZItEV82wdHqcSZxLp75"],"When":"2024-9-12"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Andras A.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXFI_E_fvhobICCKTGagSBHpccSXSxcW8GboB2UIPCDdybvqWjj=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Typical beach restaurant with a nice view, bar and nice atmosphere. Mixed feelings about staff as there was a lady who always smiled and asked about how we felt about the food and a man who kept distance and spoke in single words very silent way. Recommended dishes: baklava with ice cream, halloumi in bacon, grilled chicken with chips, calamari","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMp2rwvAb_x7GiGb7MZmHjajHPwHjvIQ3sFeKpW"],"When":"2024-8-22"},{"Name":"Eugene Barkley","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUxUj8VLnqhP4YNoGu_kgl2isbc6pJ-H61-_Q-TfF3Wz57Zv_lxFA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Lovely place to stop and have lunch. Staff very friendly and helpful. The food is good and the food advice from the staff is great.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMAhazpEJoLngap6iGn95HPV5FyUN1OJSvaomgT"],"When":"2024-10-4"},{"Name":"M C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV_Uy92-J__-MAwll1WwYZ3uEysiJbjgirSBqXbjLZV7G8XkkPeZQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We're really liked our recent visit here. Nice and laid back, felt welcomed, absolutely loved the pork! Service was good and friendly I would recommend. Thank you","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMCmovgByvn6Xq8SjYXRpVwA40qpIK5eGCV_Fp0"],"When":"2024-10-2"},{"Name":"paul rush","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJsPZIc4W8TVss2ZcXHgJinfxU5OWdZ9MKT1sk2SC9mGV1GAg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Best place I've dined so far in polis.
Been looking to try lion fish for a long time and the chance happened at la plage.
A beautiful flavoured fish and cooked to perfection.
recommended the house white to accompany.very friendly staff. Well worth a visit.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNoCRUqVhiz576G2zhPw02ps2MeH3-D5qgG-AA4"],"When":"2024-9-14"},{"Name":"Mike Edwards","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIJOpSUYPO4t2WoWm-HMSKpVMnzBhZjOxwLZQN_SOhOHK0Vcw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We had a quick Cyprus coffee and fresh orange juice here whilst visiting the beach. The service was brilliant and the views were incredible. We didn’t manage to eat here as we were a little early due to food not being served until 11am.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMVv4P5-GAUPCkEKt0Gcd3-8j5pNvm1DydpGAjk"],"When":"2024-8-11"},{"Name":"Amanda French","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKFSlOnMclInhLPYpx2eYgDyjtxyXi8vWit6F73nuqvBQGaGg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Felt very comfortable as a solo female dining at La Plage. The staff are helpful and friendly, it has a beautiful beachfront location and large terraces for dining. The food was delicious and I enjoyed the house red wine. 😋","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPzz7cQ6ykTzSMPfC92XpxqE4-sMl7Vgm9KmZUL"],"When":"2024-4-20"},{"Name":"James Hammond","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWbt35yaLaVI7tbUPS9kj2f3h9wQg03D3L6d_GOmM50b4eh1XzB=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Really enjoyed eating here as a family of four, felt more local in terms of food. As it was Sunday two of us had the BBQ pork/chicken with potatoes. Should have ordered a salad to go with it but still thoroughly enjoyed it.
Kids had fried crispy chicken and empty plates said it was good.
Thoroughly recommended.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Mait Järvik","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVFMznz8xzPUUlRf2jIO08CBDy-e44yH8_ztS_NC2eHSGDlvzUxRw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Lovely place close to the sea. Good and tasty food, quick service.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMMlwvvpMuJOYzMSh_UR_JjSIOn86b8OuDRT2m9"],"When":"2024-3-27"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Eric Berberich","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWF8hKJUr7Xjti44PYZFQgNqCiE1gn-eMoN2WO5C7a-Y50OuEgnxA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The reviews in Google said it's not such a good place. But I think they deserve a better grade. At least on those two August 2024 days we visited them. Both days the restaurant was only 25% full - maybe that makes the service better. But foodwise it was very good - one evening took two salads, a catch of the day and the octopus and we were happy. The next day we took the Fish Meze - which comes with lots of small dishe - and a big fish at the end - that we didn't expect.

Also recommended by many locals in the marina area.

The chairs could be a bit more comfortable.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNs6fmii1rHa8zPrc3OFIlWIauW4QHqV0yw6Lwe"],"When":"2024-8-11"},{"Name":"Anita G","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ5deDSn2jc85t5LtUdNO_TJe5haCzgu5X0UveesVewV06QFQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Ideal location. Right at the harbour.
We ordered the Cyprus salad for 2 and the fish platter.
The salad was fresh and dressed with olive oil and a huge wedge of lemon. Served with village bread that is toasted.
Then our fish platter arrived. This was possibly the best fish I have eaten. All perfectly cooked and seasoned. The host removed the bones from our fish swiftly and expertly. We shared the platter between 2 and it was plenty. It came with chips but we didn’t eat these. The salad was so good we ordered another bowl to have with the fish.
All the food we had was fresh and not frozen. There is a display showing the fresh fish of the day.
We didn’t feel rushed. The atmosphere was relaxed.
It was so good we went back again as soon as we had chance.
Cost indicated below included 2 drinks each.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN7g6nNbXbo2zjET1moL5W253uNDfUjXyDTRsw3"],"When":"2024-5-27"},{"Name":"Zhang Bo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX0dLPW2GYeltxAwY3jdPMO1QV2fYPYkbe4foMHZtHpnwUhFuAK=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I had lunch at this restaurant which boasts a beautiful location, adding to the overall dining experience.
The food quality was good, offering a solid dining experience without being particularly exceptional.
The prices are fair, especially considering the fish meze, which is reasonably priced at €24 per person and reflects the quality and portion size well.
It's an excellent spot for those who appreciate a lovely atmosphere as much as the food itself.
The service and atmosphere were both very pleasing.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPly9KFl0AWPZkCaMmQDFLl8QnyqcX781D8Nh15"],"When":"2023-11-12"},{"Name":"Howard","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJkp-nxDwVC7YV9Iw6ADVSIkGHWQjUPIioeamgTxTM6mmn3Jw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Ate here following a morning boat trip to the Blue Lagoon. Service was excellent and attentive, food great (lots of choice, nicely cooked and reasonably priced) and atmosphere as you would expect from a harbour-side restaurant - lots going on in the harbour to watch.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOKzj57NKgKe3hXfBB7MsTBjQol1QrRNg2L3Lzt"],"When":"2024-9-15"},{"Name":"Constantinos Toumasis","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLazEM4h1pvqAhwJFge7ImF6GtLwX7xFykT9LlIpk2zr_sXPQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My wife was born in a fisherman's family. If she says the fish was fresh and well cooked there's no doubt. Totally deserved it. Staff very friendly.Mr Paraskeuas and Mr Nikos TOP men. As for the bill, it was lower than expected. Honest and authentic people over there.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Kin W","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJYumqdDlxscW_tz5Eim7xkbrMiM1zkmcuboJTaD6TH-3Tg9Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"A great find in Latchi. It's a popular spot amongst Cypriots. The service was absolutely amazing. The man was super helpful and made changes to the dish I wanted.

The portions were HUGE. We really struggled to eat everything.

My veggie platter had such a variety of things, and I liked that there was an avocadot. However, the veg didn't seem that fresh. I could tell that it was freshly grilled, but perhaps it was cut before, and it's been sitting on the counter/fridge for a while.

You get a lovely view from the restaurant with people passing by.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOpy_ccIjpmFPGXa9haBbTbadtMb6q3Ek7Jn-eW"],"When":"2023-8-23"},{"Name":"Nikki Cooper","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLzkZ5VyjtBS4pFOaFNes0mpg55NWbGVkjj0DQQLWWmDi-nhw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I went here after a boat trip and the food was great. The people who work there are lovely and friendly and my friend and I had the best meals so far this holiday. I had the swordfish, which was delicious and my friend ordered the shrimp pasta, equally as gorgeous. The only thing for me that I would have liked more would have been if the servers had come to see us a bit more at our table as I would have liked more of their delicious drinks, hence 4-stars for service. Other than that, an awesome meal :)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP1EqnVYMVVYJl1D3Xg7a6BcwLYTP4WJT2HUhmt"],"When":"2023-8-5"},{"Name":"Phanos Demetriou","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWunljfYR4Ul813f5HCa8Z37mN1o5fZTLxhUxPM1U42FcqlVYmT=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Slow service, took 2 minutes to bring entrees and drinks, about 1 hour and something for the main dishes.    Other tables had similar issues and complaining to waiters who took it well. Price wise you are paying a significant amount to be at the port of Latchi, and the price does not reflect what you get. Better off driving somewhere else not too touristy","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Petros R.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJAlkTebhuwvv9hBDS7V-3urk5VkeS5nfQWXZkKigdyvvmXJ9s=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Good seafood!

Their octopus and fried calamari were good! Anchovies appetizer was also very good!

Taramosalata definitely needs work!

All the food came 5 minutes after ordering, which didn’t give us enough time to finish our appetizers","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOXmGOSOeQJaPfAoRK3C3IIFndv_GItWbSIVv-k"],"When":"2024-7-6"},{"Name":"arisyi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXenekbtjgliJgAWP4MC_KfYemX9gS8nD8W_IeN4cUhdisKmqSQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Less than a kilometre from the port, an amazing fish tavern with excellent food, top quality fish and fully friendly","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNBjhThoomBevJYCIREbQLzyGjS0rJovX-1jBx3"],"When":"2024-7-4"},{"Name":"Katerina Kyriakou","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLci48WgzDy8RIytvKO4E8Lo4-lD1M0Ym-HDQxl6b1LaR0qOw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Despite the restaurant being crowded and quite warm outside, the staff was impeccable—very friendly and attentive. The food arrived quickly, was absolutely delicious with generous portions, and the prices were excellent. Even the complimentary watermelon they served us at the end was perfect! We'll definitely be coming back!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Gary McEvoy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUw2XXAC3KnFen6A467mI96RGRyCv-sKET9zU_iRGOnDuaQiGcs_Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Over the years we've been here, the service and consistency hasn't faltered.

Fisherman's platter for 2 with an extra octopus salad and Taramas, a couple of soft drinks, and a bottle of water for just over €50.
Fantastic service, quality of food and value for money.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Georgia Argyropoulos","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjULWJ2OP3TVX-n12qtUkSROpReZIbUZLYtCqM4OdCOfBYQqT1hhdg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"An excellent restaurant that i will certainly visit again. The beachfront vibe is ideal if you want a wonderful meal, a breeze, a pebble beach and the sea right in front of you. I loved it so much. The food was super fresh and even the most discerning of us had a wonderful experience. The family run business has a warmth and offers genuine Cypriot hospitality, which is lovely to still. Attentive, attention to detail, and very well priced, Periyiali means something along the lines of "the sea is as shiny as a mirror" and attracts a popular crowd of diners at night, especially. We had a Sunday lunch, transfixed by the view. Would definitely recommend.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMjYeFmvVfidqdaBPu-92ddntCFlNEAe-ZUV6l1"],"When":"2024-9-10"},{"Name":"Tanja K","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIgXH2v8_YfxIbZxa4-yaF9ghUvmb9DbGcqZqTJWo29EWS7SAE=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I recently have lunch at Periyiali Restaurant in Latchi and had an enjoyable experience. The restaurant boasts stunning sea views that added a delightful backdrop to our meal. The food was quite good, and there were a few standout dishes that truly impressed us.

To start, we had a feta cheese and halloumi, which were both delicious and a great way to begin our meal. The highlight of our dining experience was undoubtedly the shrimps in an amazing sauce. The flavors were exceptional and this dish truly left a lasting impression.

For our main course, we ordered the sea bass. While not overly extravagant, it was cooked perfectly and showcased the freshness of the seafood. The ambiance of Periyiali Restaurant is relaxed, fitting in perfectly with its beach bar setting. This is not a place for luxury, but rather a spot where you can enjoy good food in a casual atmosphere.

One of the most appealing aspects of this restaurant is its fair prices. The prices were reasonable and in line with what one would expect from a beach bar.

All in all, I would rate Periyiali Restaurant four stars. While it may not be a luxurious destination, it certainly delivers on its promise of serving good food in a picturesque location.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOM9wG3-3L2uc6oWLBi4O1AfTXMS5-i2Q491ZU8"],"When":"2023-8-21"},{"Name":"Theodora Lazarides","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJRO4ZGev77W_ujqqDfDAl4PsOqFNSGIeSRe7LUCgZbzYJy1g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Food: the calamari portion was ridiculously small compared to all the other dishes even though it was very similar price. It was very disappointing. The rest of the dishes were better even though the seafood platters had only fried pieces instead of grilled.

Service: the servers were kind of rude.

Atmosphere: nice view by the beach","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO87BibM2kKjkUTUoPHCeAkznIY-YrZC3po6_yU"],"When":"2023-8-5"},{"Name":"Dr. Nantia Iakovidou","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWJOUCdgg-wbZgwgjcVhjDfFP2SG2JBGf__NnLL2946cyh3soMj=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"The location and the service were nice. Salads, fried potatoes and tzatziki were also nice, but we didn’t like the main dishes. They were cold when they arrived at our table and not tasted great. Apart from that, in one of the plates that had rice there were also pieces of macaroni in it…
I do not recommend it.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNpBnLdS6cYVRjfT1kCFBoSHl1sJS8IPJHWtAHJ"],"When":"2021-7-24"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Thomas Loebert","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWdtDdDyVIIYE3vHyDn_HePDR5bf12R_ZTvIdfJ1gGPr8KnQwwv=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Small, family-run restaurant with a beautiful terrace right on the beach. The menu is very appealing and differs significantly from the surrounding restaurants. Guests can expect freshly prepared, exquisite dishes and a very good selection of wines. The service is friendly, attentive and professional. All in all a nice place for a sunset dinner.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOaLhPdOsWL_mGhs9mq_yzI88DvWCBAHVyI1RcX"],"When":"2023-6-11"},{"Name":"Tiaan van Tonder","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKxuyZf_VyUEws7nbNQhdFL0wekI8rOpWInmB6X76NMGqs7IQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Restaurant No. 9 in Latchi boasts a fantastic seaside setting, offering breathtaking views right by the beach.

We tried the seafood platter and the Prawn & Scallop Risotto—both were decent, but nothing exceptional.

Nonetheless, the beautiful scenery elevates the dining experience, making it a lovely spot to enjoy a meal with a view.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMcLkxQEX9bLrj86LTorl2xFwrpj79Bx7vX1yX7"],"When":"2024-9-22"},{"Name":"DJ DAVE FLACK","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWfzYcj6vXYpR307aR4N2NkYP83226epAjzLPttUILF-I5yRWuH=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing place the food is absolutely delicious
Great service just a 5 min walk from the other restaurants on the main marina! As they are in your face trying to get you to take a seat ! So forget about the rest come to NO 9 LOUNGE","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMH6jNXrZbd5jGz5Hyzy4ZreY7GOiZTEGk-rdDU"],"When":"2024-7-18"},{"Name":"Gabriella Demetriou","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUzAwK2p5IGFM3Gt6bQfSWJZrApn0xdqkk8UgWmfHPFiipjDMU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We really enjoyed the dinner we just had here: lamb shank for my other half and mushroom risotto for me, plus a chocolate lava cake to share - all served in good time, and with warm and friendly, courteous service! Would recommend","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPPTOw4Ov6IRci8NYcCEqU8nhPG4vZYR7UIhcZ3"],"When":"2024-9-15"},{"Name":"Sarah A.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXNGW7rcVR7FiVbbCHWWguIjGOjCGf02bbOQlQlCAcQmKPcaOM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great location directly at the beautiful Latchi beach, great discrete but attentive service and tasty food. Come at sunset time!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMP2uWBP9P7hh7-uXTFG6SrYC2MHWQPiViORCsU"],"When":"2024-8-7"},{"Name":"David Welsh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUMrwKweBdLv0vAEv2ydzPEvrpf9ZdSHV5zRxYX3bCDG-A_BvM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Fresh seafood cooked to perfection. There are some very good restaurants in the Polis/Latchi area, and this one is definitely in the top 5.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPjMRlm6UgLrhrGhT0cfz9gse7znZYnmPD4cF5h"],"When":"2024-10-6"},{"Name":"Lafelle Chu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL0d3qAzD36Nng9aoRVD0koMUnI2k4Cxvevd70EFlJ3A-SBhg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A wonderful hidden gem! Just tiny bit further away from the main restaurant cluster, I found that it has a higher rating than others on google map so I gave it a try.

It’s quieter here, has an unobstructed view of the sea, and kind service that’s not just shouting in your face to get you to sit down (as opposed to the restaurants on the main street/ just off the boat trip boarding point)

Food was really delicious too! The seafood starter is exceptional for me. Except the fish and chips which is a bit more average but it’s an item on the kids menu so I wasn’t expecting the authentic British taste anyway.

The entrance is quite humble and low key but totally worth giving this place a try! :)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNw8hTHphyNskNqdHAWbMfnQdfAt2uapI3Z3O-d"],"When":"2024-4-28"},{"Name":"David Fogarty","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL9_ZgRm4KCFAW7Y6oEdlNADjlXLDSBoYgPbGqMWca7OiHe=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Me and my wife both agree this was the best restaurant we visited in Cyprus. The food, service, view and general ambience was beautiful. I really feel that you would miss out on a great meal if you don't eat in this restaurant at any chance you can. I've been here twice in two days and plan on being back again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOlakC1LrROQNDZL6oRF6Jie_cKGREEMN6U4tY"],"When":"2024-7-31"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Valeriya Tsvetnova","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLhaWwNYTihsliBdpRDseBVmYBiHJ4Pyhi33G7KUT_DJztjtQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Perfect for a casual lunch on the terrasse with a sea view. One of the most generous, and at the same time great quality
fish mezzes. Do not expect fancy bathrooms, stylish furniture etc though, the interior is very simple, but the food and the view are outstanding!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOlA3LxbZ1sStuNOJz_pb1N_DBBhrSC3k9Lz1z1"],"When":"2024-9-20"},{"Name":"Alexandra Pera","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX15mYhE-OXM4nJ0dVCAPzLty_SmSA2S1lxPmSfMv5yDhavtz4C=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The restaurant was recommended by locals. It wasn’t amazing but decent. It’s a basic, casual place… the vibe is nice on the terrace under the trees and they have cute cats visiting. We got some basic appetizers which were good, and a huge fried seafood platter. In that platter, the octopus was very good and very well done. The mussels were not edible, overcooked and super tough to chew… other seafood was decent but you can tell it’s frozen or maybe not the best quality seafood I’ve tried. Perhaps it was all over cooked a bit. The staff was also not really the friendliest. I’ve had better seafood meze in other places, so this is not one of my top choices, but ok for a casual night.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMSXDkkaYqPsGAbRRHHoSyO4azh_a4vLxspp9pl"],"When":"2024-2-25"},{"Name":"Emma Woodcock","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWZyBsjEmAsVUr8EXl1NWl-XnwBnvzAF9pIcpBMFM-ajRhR3yEl=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We stopped here for lunch en route to Aphrodite Waterfall.  It was a great place friendly service and good value food, could see the fish before ordering, it's set beside the sea and lovely views across the beach.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP0l0gVCGF0OIFfSj04RAMUGSqggcQXw5CosKbu"],"When":"2024-3-28"},{"Name":"Jako Leidorp","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIdjcVoFO47lURWGLOq_zJIvrNdUTrcXh-T5xRoNH4Oig8Mrw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I ordered a seafood salad and it was really bad, frozen shrimp and pickled octopus, plus packaged squid sticks covered in salad dressing. We were hoping to enjoy a decent seafood meal, but we were disappointed in the quality of the food.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOCydBQzUFapVJ7FeM-pvLanRfloP2ya6Rdq792"],"When":"2024-4-21"},{"Name":"Michał Lubczyński","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUgmlqs2q8oIIkXNpiRZ9aJ43teAywndm5soQ-Z1ba5869uan6j=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Nice place with great view. Dishes including fish taste very good but kebab is not so delicious maybe my own mind. Helpful and multilanguage service.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMvtEsMfMoMHYava8NLN1H_bN4rS_NenbpMqnTe"],"When":"2020-8-25"},{"Name":"Andor Királyházi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLA_kypdx0BnlNeivqEffpldjjxmDed9XjIZHTaC-Yn-krrpc4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Went here because of good reviews. Pretty disappointed lately. It's a family run restaurant, waiters are friendly, service speed is ok(ish mostly) and has a great view to the harbor. And the cons: although there are several fish presented at the bar on ice, these are the only ingredients that are (said to be) fresh. Ordered a mixed seafood plate and only the fish seemed to be fresh. All the other stuff was made from mirelite and the waiter said that they are of course frozen as they are on the whole island. (Really??) It was shocking me a bit, but later it was more shocking, that all these seafood has the same grease taste. Not any own taste, only this greasy, disgusting-same-taste as it would be made in the same dish in very used grease.
During our meal we were constantly fighting with bees and flies coming around and into the plate.
After this (don't know why...) but still asked for a coffee and ice cream. It was so much time to get it. Ice cream was forgotten first time, after we had to go to the bar to choose them as it was easier for the waiter to go with him as to remember that 5-6 ice cream names that they were serving overall.
At least they accept cards payment.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMIU31C1sBKKnDA0XnF8dP7NdDueRRf9WKlXEbw"],"When":"2019-9-7"},{"Name":"Amanda French","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKFSlOnMclInhLPYpx2eYgDyjtxyXi8vWit6F73nuqvBQGaGg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Lovely dining terraces and some facilities for children (bouncy castle/boat) I am a solo female traveller and although when I said I wanted a table for one the disappointment was a little obvious I will forgive them for this as both the food and service were exemplary from then on. I had the octopus saganaki which was cooked to perfection and was a very large portion for one. The house white complimented it well. A super restaurant, great for families in a beautiful location.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Koshiari Louiza","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUUQH3Wkflj2kTFkXthQ965ZRKpWedSdm8OdXAvcgmM4p-ELEEkaA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A great fish tavern.  We tried  calamari  and swordfish.  They were tasteful. The staff is very friendly and make you feel comfortable.  The service is excellent. We will visit it again for sure.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOvsKMVMTcj9wAkyMRRhrg3Oay0654WHghvaLVv"],"When":"2019-6-24"}]
