user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Elle Chris","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWjmyvmfqECQS3fbHPjfGHQ9BxBHNofIZEgdUjT5nHw5xDfnz8JTA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is a must-visit restaurant in Latchi. If you're looking for a modern dining experience, this is the place for you. Located next to the marina, it offers stunning views and has an incredible atmosphere with a chic, modern design. I absolutely loved the ceiling lights, bar chairs, and tables—they were all so elegant.

The service was extremely friendly, attentive, and always there to check if we needed anything. The staff were very polite. And the food—simply outstanding! Everything was well-cooked and bursting with flavor. We started with all the dips and bread, along with the salmon roll and calamari. For the main course, we had the seafood linguine nero and the pork chop. We also enjoyed several cocktails.

Our dinner here was absolutely amazing, and we will definitely be coming back. Highly recommend this place to everyone!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOzjUKcs9qxldNcApICL6WmCuY1_XpXkJNf9srr"],"When":"2024-9-9"},{"Name":"Dino Charalambous","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLq7qHYQsQRcy0wdVPiU-dmSXBF8ur4sjVj0uCqHoZqVcYPIA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Food is always good here. We had the pork chop and the chicken Caesar salad, which was delicious with good portion sizes. Overlooking the harbour. Would recommend!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOHwlP04aEjKCTSi_pupFmfxf4p_H8TUqvmSEjL"],"When":"2024-9-26"},{"Name":"M P","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUyW2X0Xh_rJbneWaF5NeaKjZtQ_su1EJrZY9Wkro8Yi8tMkhxUOA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Very nice food. We tried the friend calamari and it was delicious, good portion. We also tried the fried halloymi  and it was very nice. The service was excellent, and the atmosphere very nice. I will definetely come back","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNi1c3f2TRq-Cb-HUYXWrKVJUP2mj91n6FyI0r4"],"When":"2024-8-31"},{"Name":"Kerry Sims","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKBd8Naa30MwcuxLZ5uaaHjynmEw5NKDpU30QBG4030QFw98Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I come to this restaurant a lot as I live in Cyprus and it’s by far my favourite in Latchi. The food, wine and service is just perfect. This is the first time I tried the octopus as normally I have mussels, and it was just delicious… will definitely be having it again - thank you as always.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMOOT1MLVRk57KQGEiDIGA9BBtikltSiD5XMliR"],"When":"2024-8-5"},{"Name":"Andy Harper","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUpFfvV7QkZbFwTTZ93o9B8S1VvX6O58zDgNi56vAh5dXcs_4YG=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is an absolutely beautiful restaurant, with exceptional food.

We stayed in Latchi for two weeks and ate out every night, so tried lots of restaurants, by the end of the holiday we had decided nothing else came close, so we ate here the last three nights. The menu is so big and varied that you can have completely different meals every night.

The staff are very friendly and helpful.

The meals are all beautifully put together with varied tastes and textures.

A must visit in Latchi","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOnO5hlQm3KF8TTP6wTP4NEz5MyfZ8hG_pZcuGq"],"When":"2024-3-23"},{"Name":"Cristiana Borselli","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJzjbYYd6SVX8qBPsi1jrOFZUmKdo-1EnKuREdx-iTwW7ORVfA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I was pleasantly surprised by the exceptional quality of the dishes served. The octopus, in particular, was unmatched in freshness and cooked to perfection, a true triumph of seafood flavors. The mussels also deserve a special mention: very fresh and succulent, each bite was an invitation to continue the gastronomic journey.
Every dish we tasted was prepared with care and attention to detail, highlighting the chef’s skill and the quality of the ingredients. The service was impeccable, with attentive and friendly staff that made our meal even more enjoyable.
I highly recommend Restomare to anyone in Cyprus looking to enjoy fresh and well-prepared seafood dishes.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN8G_TAHHrOnZcJlxSOfOKOisKAIlgdZ7LcoVWF"],"When":"2024-5-25"},{"Name":"Ekaterina rRub","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJxRT15xU24od5u46Neb6PzyfOUlUi8toLtMlhJz3Ihv7r8Mg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"A very bright and interesting place, cozy, this is not the first time we have come here, but unfortunately the service is very long and not attentive, they brought us several dishes that we did not order.  The food used to taste better.  A little disappointed and probably won't come back!!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOA0ydKLDIQpe32xbvWGAuE3erWzDZgGv2fpWyW"],"When":"2024-3-24"},{"Name":"Kyriacos Costa","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUjkRs-dJAdfGgUsDMoY9xeijayYBFte1_PPF-ql3yZGWsTHviI=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Really good restaurant at Latchi Harbour. Very modern place compared to most restaurants in the area. Food is always tasty and very friendly service. Totally recommended.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNPKqkKC7HU79P_XPFLhQ6ipscTsRaWpzHY-0R2"],"When":"2024-5-6"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Teri Allerton","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVVLqxxQXTNhCbueQ67N4zDqOIodTkVFQpLdcV3qFMGOe6xpzVc=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A fabulous evening with good friends complemented by the harbour side table in the moonlight! The comprehensive menu was tempting and offered a wide choice of tasty interesting food choices which were delicious leaving us all wanting to return to try other dishes!
The wine menu was excellent and the service and welcome genuinely warm and inviting, we felt relaxed and loved every minute of our visit. 10/10 for us!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNzYYi-7by5ywhVCKO-XV15pZle9-GGnSV5zbVv"],"When":"2024-7-26"},{"Name":"Sandy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ8ZR3dWHCPQV1LFooUH08Gd7Xgo510-mb6QIu8q111Vr0e_A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Milo’s Restaurant is situated in 29RV+9MW, E713, Poli Crysochous 8820, Cyprus. This view was amazing from our table overlooking the Marina. We ate chicken wraps, chicken in Pita and grilled chicken. The portions were large and the dessert - apple pie and ice cream was delectable.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOOKwH1KvPeX_Ou_4Ee_7HF8Jphq5tQu7p77_hH"],"When":"2024-4-11"},{"Name":"Garry Mortimer-Cook","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX_vqBfgaV33rjGnjf30WJt6R7jr04CwSCSmgOzhM2v6fD_SRmzhA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great lunch for three, Caesar Salad, Calamari, Home made burger and Moussaka. It offers good value compared to some others around it.
Excellent food and service.
Also visited for a dinner, excellent Swordfish on roasted Med Veg 😋
Recommended 👍","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPOilCItzo9tVTNuR7TuhY7p7FNBX31o_f55tRy"],"When":"2024-6-4"},{"Name":"Geoffrey Wood","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXmKRqaA5E2KJwmwdAftA3yYJUa1uG0l093cgksYtXHX_s1VKY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Always a great place to east, good food , friendly staff and reasonably priced with a good view.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNnqzxnjP9oF0X7gfnKWDPH1wpdAPu3KfyLPT_F"],"When":"2024-9-19"},{"Name":"Marija Nikolić","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWhGduMuyjtvYILxY9rTAlTjKUqQ7GANonDueDY7FOgvu3_OyFp=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We've jumped right out of the Atlantis boat to this restaurant, since they've had a table right underneath the fan. Typical cypriot restaurant serving mostly seafood dishes that we wanted to try, but it was so damn hot that we've ended up with a mix of starters. Everything on the table was tasty, but average, nothing really special. Squid was probably frozen and fried and halloumi had some strange carrot/cabbage company that really wasn't meant to be there. Sausage is awesome! The waiter was polite, smiling and very caring, big plus is having cyprus coffe on the meny which is the only coffee we like to have.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM_2YKAbRQg8XeybAKTt62vVYKXBryoqdpx-eE"],"When":"2023-8-29"},{"Name":"Danis Morankić","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL3BunJYm9nTn2jiD7dHLqT0fo7sxKq4k3xkx7G84N-spwnKQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Loved the ac and the position of this restaurant. Didn't order food but the owner and waiters were very nice. Relatively cheap for the location and comfortable chairs and tables.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"The WWII Professor","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXpCrw7RhEVOJN2AD2aE7r2XILNpVY_aMpTSH8yA-Z7NSeMU3st=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"The fried prawns were the worst I ever ate circumnavigating the globe for 35 years. Smelled dirty too...IMO. The prawns were battered and thrown in a fryer. After de-veining the crap trap, removing the head, shell, etc., you have a small mountain of waste and an even smallert portion of prawns....fitting the palm of your hand. In my opinion, an over-priced tourist restaurant.  However, service was excellent and atmosphere great.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Aaron Vellam","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWb8vNooxIuHVcObfC3_wf5ftfWyqUF59SFYQ6deFA7GhkXz4s=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"An amazing setting by the harbour in Latchi where you can sit and relax and watch the various boats coming and going. We were seated very quickly close to the main walkway and issued with menus. We then had a fairly lengthy wait, maybe 10-15 minutes, before anyone came to take our orders for drinks, by which time we were able to order food at the same time. Meanwhile, a table closer to the water became available and they were happy for us to move. When our drinks arrived 1 of the 4 was missing and this was quickly rectified. When the food arrived it was delicious - Chicken Baguette, Fish and chips, Kids chicken nuggets. The final meal - the kids Margarita pizza wasn’t to our child’s liking as it came with actual slices of tomato on it 🤦🏻‍♂️🤦🏻‍♂️.  When they came to collect plates once we were finished they checked everything was ok and we explained that only 1 slice of pizza was eaten but that it wasn’t any fault of the restaurant and we asked for the bill. When the bill came the waiter explained that they had removed the pizza from the bill as it hadn’t been to our taste which I thought was more than they needed to do and was very generous. The only reason for not giving a full house of 5 stars was because of the wait when we first arrived to order drinks.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN_7n5ODkcJkDugRfOnxJ28PmsqPp8KixqL2WU"],"When":"2023-8-28"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Aimee Purdum","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKTRNQpo--uFImuuRypzxjjHsa7viI2iyBX-QGo1LIosqiPLQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Excellent food best and sweetest shrimp we’ve ever had !

Fresh greens
Excellent service husband and wife owned so hospitable

Prices fair for the area.

Get seafood combo you won’t be disappointed","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipONEZ0VrJERdko1ufRBLbpTd7Nmshc8exARR4NO"],"When":"2024-9-7"},{"Name":"D Buzz","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWxVkNZYhCsxBTIYwaYJNfUc9jQ8ojd9c8IxAGkCZqs3tEiInJe=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"It's like Fawlty Towers. The waiter is pissed, food going to wrong tables, we had to get our own menus, mains arrived before starters cleared.

The cabaret is good though - the other owners are having a domestic in the restaurant. Quite amusing really 😁","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPO_tgcdCcrnPH4uh1MJHSN60xuNNdqCui_cvN6"],"When":"2024-8-5"},{"Name":"Rodrigo Emidio","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLF2vToFrUzrcx83Y-v7a2UUjssEW3Pn1_hXcZJkru_-eUfBg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We went here for lunch. Had the seafood platter, followed by the Nutella crepes. Both were delicious! It all came super quick as well. The waiters were really nice, especially the manager. We had such a good experience that we came back a couple of days later!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPbWSKHGnS7tYhw6Uka43rtt7UQcnxQ3lQyPOeJ"],"When":"2023-9-30"},{"Name":"Philipp Rosjat","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXlViH9YeWsHK5U433brGagoSlXh-4DoxkcyAF0-PsanBYgDcPf=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Nice restaurant specializing in fish.  We ordered a fish platter for 2 and pita bread with various dips as a starter.  Except for the sesame dip, we found everything very tasty.  The portions are more than adequate and the fish was fresh and tasted good.  The staff was also very friendly and funny.  It's always a bit louder on the street, but you should definitely stop by.  👍🏻","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMbK4HtsAmsL_t5PJIYWmysHBee2SWhdZV_D0S_"],"When":"2023-5-28"},{"Name":"George Papazoglou","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVsxI6x1Zw3NgzRczghDAuhNvy3UDw748T14PrCJKV4ExupsqJl=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Lovely food and beautiful place. Had my lamb today and I loved it. Staff seemed not that enthusiastic or welcoming as other places would, but overall I had a positive experience.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNxYFjtmt5gkeczw9GJ_QoVuEj_MYybdA7f8uk4"],"When":"2023-4-16"},{"Name":"Tommy Gordon","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWEH7N-x_kM3WZqedFDPdA_L-dTfBcl0m1HdRrvxh9rsw2Km9we4g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very friendly and food omg plenty to choose from and delicious be going bck throughout my stay here for 2 weeks 🤗","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNzrdbhUAjwMFBDyqzCMhlQGtcfV-bcUhkzc1WY"],"When":"2024-4-4"},{"Name":"imran farooq","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJmJysKw6ZKmBJ_TV_cvWltJEyD5POs1rP8Xb0GL4DVqR5-lg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Probably best meal of the holiday and it was our last night there and we only ate here because another restaurant Balkanika was closed. Great food, friendly staff. Got a free small cup of veg soup which was a nice touch. Both got the half duck, unbelievable, great portion size, I struggled at the end to finish it but did so(wasn’t gonna waste it). Highly recommend going there.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Pat Gaw","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIEE8o9T5nqwsS51Gu9EG9Y0KjGiV2yLz9vTuIPX2bh2SOxPw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A wonderful place with super friendly staff and delicious, satisfying food. During our entire stay in Cyprus, we kept returning to this restaurant with a smile on our faces. The menu also includes allergen information, which is a nice added touch.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Carly Rolph","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUcKsy7-00UBoHedkbsIQHeS0zR3vvwXYWZtaTmbUoXvq3-QDCT=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Stunning. Absolutely delicious food. Book ahead. We were lucky to get squeezed in but had to rush to get them the table back. Would’ve liked to have been able to slowly enjoy. It is a set meze menu where food is just constantly brought out to you. All of it is absolutely stunning.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOG4RRKd5fXTdSPVfYqpKep1SwegXAIWdmOOooB"],"When":"2024-9-12"},{"Name":"James Low","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVQ4qscqH_44FzNwjLQ6k-ImWR6D2aGSFQiwCgbPII7AhWeTOuj3A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We went here at lunchtime and there’s no menu for during the day. They simply do meze, either meat or vegetarian. We’re vegan so I asked if they could modify the veg meze - no problem. The food was delicious and great value at €26 for two. Throw in some very cute kittens playing under the watchful eye of their mum and you’ve got a great lunch in my book.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPsmS5-5LteGcLlCwlRDH5ItlFVDHtf4OM3z5KA"],"When":"2024-9-23"},{"Name":"Anna Hostelgeeks","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVDNsHw4tyg4NbuxHjJqyjKLoucR4LALtxW97xfpFyPNd-fxyA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Best vegetarian mezze in Paphos city. The place is also very charming - located in an old family house and nice decorated. The restaurant has views over the city so better to go as early as possible to get the sunset colors.

At night they only serve the traditional Cypriot food: meze. The meze is 28 euro. (It does not matter if it is meat meze or vegetarian meze

You’ll get the salad with dips and some little plates very quickly. I was impressed with all of the starters especially with the salad, the beetroot cous cous and the chick bean dip. The halloumi was good too but I think the portion they brought for 3 people was a bit small.

For the meat mese they served pork souvla, sausage,  pork souvlakia, and  chicken giro,

For the vegetarian mezze you’ll get veggie mousaka and red peppers with spicy cheese.

The service and the atmosphere were amazing.

I do recommend to book a table as it is a place that many tourists and locals love to go.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMHStBv2b783J1xA4HgXtt6mGMrbvKmllchjK9r"],"When":"2024-10-2"},{"Name":"Leon Štraus","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVen3txMOnzaGAbka0YnvZmFiFBLhvplTniy2sj5ZjvaLh8Y5dL=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great experience. Smells nice as soon as you step on the terrace. Lovely ambient sitting under grape tree. We went as a couple and 2x small meze was plenty of food as shown in the pictures(salad, meat meze). Lovely staff. Recommended.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMvZVZTeqGW9Rc6rMswUpm7fHPs7kusZtvzuFwD"],"When":"2024-9-20"},{"Name":"Joel Wood","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUGNCOUHyqNsmHfZGLZ3hibRxqSYINuWZD8hzwjImEXEGiBu_v2=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"With widerful views of the sea, this family-run restaurant delivers beautiful meze dishes according to what can be sourced locally. For those with big appetites.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMWCBvIXv23sAMShkJ0SPr7UT6l4j7yOMw41Nnr"],"When":"2024-10-10"},{"Name":"Miłosz Górski","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLBPEKm8NfQxtPxVfwVPradx_fjxu8WOadqkbmMgK4Q8GecgA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We went right after opening at 6 PM and we were one of the first, however, soon after it was getting crowded. We ordered classic Meze, which was tasty but to be honest we expect something more, something 'special' after reading all the comments here. Nevertheless, I can recommend this restaurant for its beautiful view and great atmosphere.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNspzNclxEYzpYaz1PgHLK6u7X-sAvVOzRvsxT_"],"When":"2024-5-18"},{"Name":"Evita","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW2M1Yzo4N8zzKYqo0RDIokPgm9xMDCcJkTpcmn39Sb_wStMTyd=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"So I will give you my honest review.

The atmosphere and the location is amazing. At night it's only meze you have no other options. The meze was 28 euro. (They don't have a menu so you couldn't see anywhere written that is 28 euros, also they don't inform you when you call to book a table that it's only meze and they mention nothing about the price. )

So I had high expectations. Salad with some little plates came out very quickly. I was impressed with all of the starters especially with the salad and the chick bean dip. But after that I was a bit disappointed.

They said it was a meat meze but they just served pork souvla (the cheapest meat you can get in the market) overcooked and dry. And pork souvlakia (again pork...) overcooked also.  Chicken giro, was just ok. So basically the meat meze was just pork. That doesn't excuse the 28 euro per person. I was expecting something different. Also all the meat was high on salt. Also another disappointment is that they offer you nothing at the end, like fruit or something sweet. It's the first time in my life that I went to a meze restaurant and they didn't offer something at the end.

Positives:  The great service the atmosphere and the starters. I asked if they changed the menu from time to time. And they said no. So there is no reason to visit this place again if you have nothing else to offer.

Service 9/10
Atmosfere 10/10
Starters 9/10
Salad 10/10
Wine: 8/10
Meat meze 5/10

Hopefully my honest review will help you with something.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPT8DRe7UPkL8nh9MIjb9PqSYUdsn7OVjIQLhrz"],"When":"2024-9-1"},{"Name":"Bartosz Glowacki","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLu65ox7c2jmCEYEH8CfTaMGnKel2jAxTiJiUHKQH8A92-EUQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I really loved this place and the authentic food. the atmosphere is eclectic mix of styles, mix of new and old interiors.  The views from the terrace is beautiful.

Me and my Friend ordered large meze each. I had the vegetarian option and my friend had the meat option.

The food was super delicious, it was freshly made, well balanced and seasoned. not over complicated real genuine good food.

we both finished our food. Which was quite a lot of food, they said usually people don't finish their meals. I would say if you used to eating big portions, go for the large portion.

Our Waitress was super lovely, funny, attentive. she is genuine and you can tell she loved what she does. it's shame we didn't get her name.

overall, it's a must if your in Paphos, make sure you do reservation for the evenings as it's gets fully booked.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN5Npt9DOTr00maJFKO9ULlbCkIZ8weVZA1XDfz"],"When":"2024-5-14"}]

[{"Name":"Judit Nóra Békéssy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJTamX3aRAMu6T0ffmo8pYwQvgK00CVxmqroWh0205XY_jdEw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Best Greek restaurant we ate at during our vacation.  Amazing flavors, great atmosphere, good music.  The service is kind and direct.  We have been back several times, everything is always fresh and delicious.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNeUzG9iIlu9IqPlRrfaFUymYosBZYV8HyT3YMR"],"When":"2024-7-17"},{"Name":"Zuzana Bitterova","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX--RBwFMA9a0Yq6p36Wh62tS8rZ_MAyNHxAiz2RpMHhBkaBKBy=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing food - another level and I do not write this lightly.

Great atmosphere and service! Very friendly and classy! Going back tomorrow for more!

Well done to the owners! You got a gem right here.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP6A8vhaQuAQ3_1JDdDjLpFXzHUFDJD7uhEGeUz"],"When":"2024-7-7"},{"Name":"James Stillman","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLJzFxO1uI2mazZMpI_nRFL7ModpJQPShx9MA-QwDWrSwBa_A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very good meal, lovely wine, attentive service and a great atmosphere. It was very  hot though.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNzWs3lmZHMB9vOoTbGmWxkt69Drgz-iQ2A1IXG"],"When":"2024-8-27"},{"Name":"Dirk van Griensven","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVhX557SmTu7VhuUA9hYbxfC7OJHjvwlKNBZnGW8OLsJAH_KOHy=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Nice restaurant. Good food, nice service and food is on the tabke real Quick. No matter how many people are inside. Food is fresh and proces are sbarp.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNJCMQhf3R4qk4ioMj_aAup8RW9jyB56eVJv1Md"],"When":"2024-6-17"},{"Name":"Manuel Girisch","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXVlIb_jE6weEr5VMmE3kt-1FARvcyNI7usvH-BtV440Oph8qM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This restaurant, a little far from the center, is a secret spot for lovers of the native Cyprus kitchen. The very friendly stuff serves all the local food for reasonable prices. The have also Rezina wine. And the Orange cake is great! Also free apple-dessert. We were there more than once.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNWhlr_LUUncnj9BN3QUEYAqOteSpl4OtMtygpk"],"When":"2024-1-14"},{"Name":"Stiliyana","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVr-xf8BTpa9KhyrZXO2JQSiCsEDJQQAGJ-6i5mMDUDsmfXHK6_Rw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The place is gorgeous, really delicious food, lots of choice at good prices, relatively fast service considering it gets very, very busy, they found us a table without having to wait too long. Certainly recommending!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMVARXMQnNom_TeYg86gXlby5M7_2e3O0-GpvHf"],"When":"2023-10-28"},{"Name":"Maciej Świąder","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKqy_7oh31QrOUCZChCfCDBahrC8tGSsJnnEl7NBclKWNKIzA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The food is delicious. Especially the grilled octopus, one of the best I've tried. Meat mezze is very good, too and the portions are big. It gets quite busy around 7-8pm. The staff are very friendly and the ambience is really nice.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Francesca Button","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJe2GIMYWhP7gx2LT4SNdnANpwDKxA0-8BYUt0fZEFRjoMejMM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Was disappointed with my starter and main dish. I had hummus and pitta bread for starters, the hummus tasted like supermarket packet with olive oil drizzled on top it had a very bitter taste to it. For main we got lamb chops however still left feeling hungry, the majority of the lamb was all fat. It is expensive so felt let down by the quality and experience.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMWW_Oez1K2FhVFDUzX-gVNYMtQwzD8AI9AOog-"],"When":"2024-4-22"}]

[{"Name":"N S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIs8mPhxqO12ag9xGjuGmYFzY7eGvqv0Hr1EbJ56JS6NUZcVg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Karlina is one of the only authentic Cypriot restaurants remaining on the main street. The owner is super friendly and welcoming and the food is superb. The portions are generally quite big so it's perfect to share with friends/family. We'll be back again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNTtbYGl9e0WLsfGps1iwA2DV5JCVsnm6ND-25k"],"When":"2024-9-29"},{"Name":"Agnese Pakalna","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKrqiJSmWw5-k-3lm6YC3PrOXtdcumcFJTQhTBt1BFJF-Vy7Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great place! Very tasty and good sized portions. Warm, competent and friendly staff. I definitely recommend this restaurant!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOrWWMOBsE6zfRUoPa3vUF61U2qmbxAHhzoeUl3"],"When":"2024-9-7"},{"Name":"Emily Alarcon","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXg_60zEK3vfYHE8jnriuajVxTXZHF0cupIcYbEn0FupYGB3kiCsg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"We went to this restaurant juste because we were so hungry and it has good reviews.

But service was sooooo long. The waiter gave us free soft drinks, but we waited almost 1 hour before a plate of souvlakis  and 1 chicken wrap.

Food was decent but nothing exceptionnal. Basic food for tourists.

The good point is that it s just in front of tombs of the kings.

Also, coffee is a bit expensive there comparing to other places in town.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMWS31AKq_RljWvcG8A_6_jmUX-1M-b5fJVF3-F"],"When":"2024-9-21"},{"Name":"Olivvia","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWfyYuZqXl0o5uSTbmRyAy2h-sOpvfiOdKdoHemyDmSBU2-ASI=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Are you wondering if you want to eat there? YES YOU WANT 😁 Very good food and perfect service. The lamb was delicious, we have never eaten such a good lamb. Also very tasty liquors, and I mean every flavor 🫢 Polecam serdecznie!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNcLuKPxjuO0mVVFG8HRyf4IDwRAidpVgg9lGrM"],"When":"2024-6-2"},{"Name":"R Houghton","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJy4W6tUrrVHDPhrBEMfuUotuCukxC_QbjTOSynW-uMkfBfmOHU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A top restaurant. As always, their chips are going to be good with fine Cyprus Potatoes but their service was top notch and their food was fantastic. A minimalistic review but a well deserved one!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM9mi0VI9PAhmOQXLXCMloT9SHNn71sHfDT49Sn"],"When":"2024-5-12"},{"Name":"Jules Dl","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV-k0P5zEGM_D_UI5snn-IAmIxAgUX0GDMrVFGdA_MND4RyrLkE=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It truly looks like a tourist trap at first, but we saw online that the food is amazing so we decided to give it a go. We were not disappointed. The food is truly amazing (and very decently priced), the portions are quite big and the staff is very friendly.

One small point for improvement: they could give a bit more fries to come with the food.

I cannot recommend this place enough.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOygoXkfIelop9YBL0aC6sxleHeKxyu480Tmd19"],"When":"2023-10-22"},{"Name":"sherlynmelody graham","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVxShyH4XYsIlkN6t_Tgrv6mR9jKGWVCn4R-xpqWgmDErQHhCo=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We went spent 7 nights in Cyprus and visited Karlinas 3 of those nights.
The food was great.
We ate from the set meze menu, which was great value and very filling €18.95

My faves
Kleftiko
Moussaka
Sauvlaki

The service was very warm and welcoming - so obviously we kept going back.
They treated mum to a free meal which was very very kind 🙏🏾 (she’s 83 bless her)
The prices were very good & we got free shots at the end - even my old mum lol

Thank you to all staff you guys are a beautiful bunch - You pulled out all the stops - Michelle, Boss Man, Luigi & the rest.
God bless and hope to see you again next time.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOkpdCaM2YJ9RmR7r5VthxU4Pqv4GKA8It_KnpC"],"When":"2023-11-18"},{"Name":"Debra Shoopman","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWPcx7w3tgCpcTubBii8kBg0fEY5tMicy55GmMW0vVQe4hLubts=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"When I visited Cyprus in August 2023, I ate at Karlina multiple times.  Each time the staff was friendly,  courteous,  prompt and efficient.  Every meal I ate was excellent,  beautifully plated, reasonably priced and absolutely delicious.  In spite of being on a main route through Paphos I didn't notice the traffic while I enjoyed my meals on the terrace.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNvQsa_iZtnqqTDrzg7__815YTxo-rDG9szdLYb"],"When":"2023-9-13"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Mike Cammack","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXDDJqQW4lTM4Ecst684s7HSPYrxdqQGyqBX-OHGWeueYpobLFf=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We found this place last minute one evening and we got the last table on the front patio.

The food and service was excellent and there’s lots on the menu to choose from. This definitely seems like the highest quality restaurant in Paphos, especially in the harbour area.

Highly recommended.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM43GK6KWizspCKAK0GZaE8lf9qbBR4R8GmrwR3"],"When":"2024-10-10"},{"Name":"Mi G (MG)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWKt5lM8SOKYm4QEQnz95h9Sh7W5qPTH6Ir7Z2dLzwS4kUnPjI=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recently had the pleasure of dining at Gourmet Taverna, and it was truly an unforgettable experience! From the moment we walked in, we were greeted with warm smiles by the friendly staff, who showed us to our cozy table by the window. Our server, in particular, was exceptional - attentive, knowledgeable, and enthusiastic about the menu offerings.

And then, the food... oh, the food! We started with the grilled octopus, which was tender, flavorful, and perfectly charred. The eggplant with mozzarella was a revelation - creamy, rich, and utterly delicious. But the real showstopper was the roasted pork - slow-cooked to perfection, it simply fell apart at the touch of our forks. And the risotto with seafood? A masterpiece! Each bite was a harmonious blend of flavors and textures, with succulent shrimp, mussels, and scallops.

But what really impressed me was the attention to detail in every dish.

In short, Gourmet Taverna exceeded my expectations in every way. With its exceptional service, warm atmosphere, and truly outstanding cuisine, it's a must-visit destination for any food lover. I can't wait to come back and try more of their creations!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMPhOTr5B7GyiDyweehSjSqMbAdA4wWq3nLZkIg"],"When":"2024-5-2"},{"Name":"Andrea Yañez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWEWRTa3LscNpoDir2WgKWaL9jj5Na18be8TF-S-2oXSekkgv8A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We   dined at Gourmet Tavern and had a fantastic experience. The atmosphere is cozy and inviting. The food was delicious, with a great variety to choose from. The staff were friendly and attentive.  Highly recommend giving this place a try!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOcKl-TC329K74jQwyb64fGI_A6KyWp-9mjYN0H"],"When":"2024-7-5"},{"Name":"Mei Y","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUIEiSMSZN2ovuVqPV4-w6KieHc8QfGN6jYxzj_eSN5eULD99CX=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Shout-out to Andy for looking after us during our visit.
We were in Paphos for 4 nights and ate here on 2 as the food was simply brilliant. Their selection of traditional Cypriot dishes had us coming back - highly recommended. Andy also helped us pick wine and the commandaria he recommended really went well with our meal.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMNb7xtaHJJ47lQ9hKV3OtoLX4-Znrog1U4vEHv"],"When":"2024-7-26"},{"Name":"Jan Jaraczewski","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJmhT2iVh2EDl78_-0ZjCJMsJhjIGr9XB-g67n1ZlnXW7uJ9w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Despite the word tavern in its name, this restaurant aspires to be something more.

Service takes constant care of the customers. Dishes are well-thought-out and decor is not too formal. I would suggest booking your table in advance, especially on weekends.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM7dfW79tL2OCyzyT-Iet-2U0YQrszMOMvnzvH9"],"When":"2024-6-4"},{"Name":"Liudmyla","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLhmospSn9vS3TnFcEHheHSsO68GlkKm4FYLBuSjXvXpzMB8w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had the pleasure of dining at a restaurant that served the most delicious food I've ever tasted in Cyprus. Every dish was bursting with flavour, the ingredients were fresh, and the cooking techniques were clearly more than just a professional. From the moment I walked in, i was greeted with warm smiles and attentive service. Eva was super  knowledgeable about the menu and made excellent recommendations. Together with her colleague Andy, they gave a warm and great service. Overall, I would highly recommend this restaurant to anyone looking for a truly exceptional dining experience 🫶","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMAJDq2DeBg-GdUBYa4_Mc2bmN9GoR6gogCMclU"],"When":"2024-4-9"},{"Name":"Paul","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX6LKiQr-HLBnI5KU0YCzkt8NdvtxYz-GvCCsPEmeCJ9JQvO75b=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"The food was good, we got our first drink within a few minutes upon arrival, we didn't have to wait for another. After several reminders, we waited half an hour with empty glasses to pay.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM2pUAWliq9uqmInqSEawP9JoyCpHTJbOJ4oMz4"],"When":"2024-8-15"},{"Name":"Ewa Manicka","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKnNCnk6vUTYm_GdabUp1Igw7PJHzVddPtUHo1NMDvjR41f1g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Exceptional food. We were truly amazed. We also felt like at home. Eva and the rest treated us like a family. Atmosphere was great. The best tuna steak and tuna carpaccio we have ever had. Highly recommended!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMKAhlnSXQnKFFsHqODVfXje3vBtLkCk54aMnQu"],"When":"2024-8-9"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Maciej Azarczyk","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKagxZayoNrC3wzTIDx1zXPFp4lwFjzpCfLE2kbvr161xJ24A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Jumped in for a drink only...but children after 20 min wanted to eat something. We ordered calamaries, were served immediately.We came back to this place few more times during our stay in Pafos. Service brilliant, great food, really fresh. I do recommend this place.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPi2wQlb1575OMwC-Fce0fmLKk0OURE4Ma1ESE4"],"When":"2024-6-29"},{"Name":"Theodora","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK4V95ojNGS8SjH9sBIT4fq4SjEQhSOHVdaV1xqw_U9_z0YAw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Best pasta I've ever had! Food and drinks were delicious, and the waiters made sure to provide the best service possible. Will definitely be coming back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNR3exV2vDl3l5qPv0d4CbmKYZF7QeZ0YeOS5OW"],"When":"2024-7-14"},{"Name":"Jay Chavda","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKYLWdU0puqlEEDHxl77EfGl1jO8QCIvMoGy0LDT72eKde1zQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"This place offers good views whilst you're eating but that's easy as you're right on the water. The food was okay - nothing really that stood out on the menu in terms of a wow taste factor however it did have a wide variety in options. The service from the short man who convinced us to try the food was brilliant but the waiter was awful. The food took ages to come out. In summary, I would say if there is no other options, then you won't be disappointed but it may be an idea to try other places first. Parking is close and it was free when we were there. The castle is also a couple minutes walk.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMjxNoxUkYE8q9m_x6C_FkY3Zqkn9mV77lWr4hG"],"When":"2024-4-24"},{"Name":"Big Blue","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI_BYSS3a8NGnZtiyUZli6JCh-_fSIKrY6Gbeyk557bDUZSDw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Our second stop in Cyprus. Very good Food. This Plate Is for 2 persons we were 3 and could not finish it. Very nice local Wine. Right on The beach so you can Enjoy The view. Also good music was Playing. Classic pop rock, service was good and pleasent.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPnAOovM7fBI35LyfTSSct77IIEqjpj1YEAubCK"],"When":"2024-2-23"},{"Name":"Charan Singh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV_hhgmmfttOyVAAfI-xzEKyT-I_DjHdMsdnY2MdCmYBdtgUB2d=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A great experience here.

The location is great, food is delicious and the staff are by far the most friendly and courteous.

As a family we loved the seating and we were absolutely amazed at how fresh and tasty the food was.

The restaurant was clean, tidy and bright with view of the sea - there is plenty of seating and a variety of dishes to suit vegan and vegetarian options as well. The portions good and prices reasonably.

Definitely visiting here again 🙂","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPs9DjtmevVbpXmxknjDAVk5raKQK2vNc-I4vET"],"When":"2023-5-8"},{"Name":"Małgosia Nowak","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVld99tBfmf6wZC0te5qxWXAuvMbspNZMB_ZuftS31EveC7uEo8=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very tasty food with sea view, good service, delicious drinks and affordable prices","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNDw4lYPxuys1ADoNQhuZVEa5kvVHlKlW3_zEwF"],"When":"2024-9-9"},{"Name":"julian ryan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKHGbGu7jKiBpFc8VWcgA4ivHdt_RRG-RDfLHDiaVW0Wp_a5A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Fantastic and attentive service. Quality and presentation of food was excellent. House wine by the glass was very palatable. Been here numerous times and always consistent. Strongly recommend!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Keith Cowley","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXRrrQsQ6UDVdur19O3M0OPF8gfyuEE0ax3mQhUdD-zFkvhvSil9w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Amazing sea view, sits on the peaceful promenade near shops, nice staff, great food and always our first and last stop when in Paphos.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMpXqJuIq7njqJFTDxUbsGvwy3VmefpIdSwe1eL"],"When":"2024-6-17"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"The WWII Professor","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXpCrw7RhEVOJN2AD2aE7r2XILNpVY_aMpTSH8yA-Z7NSeMU3st=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A real taste of Cyprus with many choices. The lamb, rice, salad, meatballs and potatoes were delicious. A comfortable atmosphere with friendly people. Service was outstanding.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPAFfsool9hSpoVntc_pooIUieCnzIZL0Y9T5sO"],"When":"2024-8-23"},{"Name":"Keely Griffin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWcJqz84pYpENKf2e0Vpq8D25ksoyHxOLPtKufq4wt15h2kVtf2Tg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This long standing traditional taverna in old town Paphos is fabulous.
Whether you are going in the afternoon to sit under the trees on the alley or if you prefer to sit inside this beautiful traditional taverna in the evening, the atmosphere is like being in a family home.
This is the best traditional Cypriot food I have experienced in my 30 years of holidaying in Paphos.
The staff and owner will treat you like you are part of the family and will go above and beyond.
You must try the Gemista, it is delicious. I would highly recommend for a taste of local culture.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMRcF48to6XRm1yI6D0TtFP1lCy1AzRzpDwoJzh"],"When":"2024-9-29"},{"Name":"Chelsea Ahlgren","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXiDD5aRZdlVzHmdfbuTrkrsEsDPKvxOz5x78q2q5zMbPgwf-wp=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is the best restaurant we ate at while in Pafos! We took 5 plates and the salad and everything was just delicious. The lamb was delicious and the moussaka was the best we ever had. The house red wine was great and the menu had lots of great options! Highly recommend and a must restaurant to visit while in old town. We didn’t make any reservations and just walked past and saw it was packed, luckily a couple just left so we got a table right away.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPiRCsdkHtjkEBDnKOxgs_zGnAzdVpXTGjoqoub"],"When":"2024-4-23"},{"Name":"Savana Crosby","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVMR_pBQpTUSNSLoD2PZ3OY6V-bLcX1gZaFjfAha12JU6Dxaak=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This was our favourite meal of the holiday! We went for the Mezze options, for €22, and got 5 starters and a choice of 5 mains. All of them were delicious, and high quality. Also generous portion sizes, we were stuffed at the end.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNBlBGOTKFy1W9Zv2hVAus3hcK5PoyyH3QiU3km"],"When":"2024-5-15"},{"Name":"Daniel H","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJvCL9CYgIVskcGgTUC7g0KiiSYMl-ym_jNNf6dLTdtYAy9bA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Delicious authentic food in a restaurant with a warm and friendly atmosphere. The dishes all sounded so good it was difficult to decide what to eat but ended up eating the beef stifado and stuffed vegetables. Absolutely delicious and fantastic value I'd highly recommend eating here.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNo8SJLU8txyCnBtl9FtYRbATv_X7THQC83T4wp"],"When":"2024-3-22"},{"Name":"stuart nichols","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWp-F05-TRB5AmDuHG_9bq3SvG-WtxuuFJb30QclnxW_Rx2hS0Y=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Walking past and looked lovely so got the last table available. I had lambs livers very,very good, wife had mousaka which was ‘one of the nicest I’ve had’. Fully recommended
It was soo good we went back with the family. We made sure we booked this time which was a good job as lots of people being turned away as all seats taken. Food again was amazing. Between the six of us we tried a lot of dishes and not one could be faulted","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNwOTvFoPGFrSbXO_Nl3S00NAVsccofMjmblw49"],"When":"2024-9-10"},{"Name":"Alexia","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLKTFyY-hlHec_l7VQ1zyLCwYLTSIUkS9dIukBTK-CFJa6qbA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The most amazing food ever tasted! Pure fresh traditional food, written on the board. Amazing staff. We choose the meze which was the best decision to be able to taste most of the menu. Finally we found a real amazing place to eat and have real Greek traditional food","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMwn2fEjBaivqqFUzjE8M2DP_aLuXPRJ3jfklxe"],"When":"2024-6-21"},{"Name":"Huw Grove","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIAu3tWO09P4hh9HPqIsoACChCA0jcsNaLEyRSe3POHrcZ8swc=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We hadn’t booked but they kindly added an extra table when we walked by and liked the vibe . We had the 5 course Mezze and, while disappointed the Kleftiko was sold out, the dishes we chose were superb. All slow cooked and very tender. Have already recommended and would return next time we are in Paphos.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPGRK6t8EelipCPHKAi2BsfdO1G-VEfSENYP_Mu"],"When":"2024-6-4"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Charlene Genovese","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU3OxpuIaBXXjprtkFpMlbgCtV_o2Bqxq7A7ldYhkOoj73y3ecEtA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Saw reviews and had to try. It did not disappoint! Food is fresh, tasty and delicious to eat. Portions are abundant and service is prompt and with a smile. Highly recommend.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPIGSkR7M10Vqr6ITGYp2IkQvWd7O4qkPZgNa9q"],"When":"2024-9-14"},{"Name":"Hel","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIGYcDXJkgtsAf84VoJlUw41CfA422rMGKHeO-Z1BkxlgQedQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Lovely place
Here I found a grilled octopus exactly on my taste even it s frozen. But belive me,taste is incredible. I moved in Paphos after 5y in Larnaca and there i have only 2 restaurants with great octopus, well, Happy Island remind me about them ( during the fact I m missing my city ) my husband took seabass which was so sweet with grilled vegetables,our bulgarian server was really cute and polite. You need to try!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNzjQ3xFqmAh5WdCIrEoUieqlCWxt4tWraFKd12"],"When":"2024-9-23"},{"Name":"Mychajlo Kalicun (Mike)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVgpV5jAlRaq4UVx_dtqRZWeKPnmzBreHK4yQU8KUdWuXqeEWq7=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My wife and I came here on our first night in Paphos. Unfortunately there was nothing on the menu for a Veggie. However, they were able to rustle up a delicious Greek vegetable stir fry with a zingy tomato and chilli sauce.
Well worth a visit.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMClMWKlmRRz4n8cEsj9OOiRNn13hE8hbYwlCSW"],"When":"2024-9-1"},{"Name":"Denis Brotto","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUBRJffJiJDlQvs-PTyBSB6iJ5809EvCeY6InNOrqEvjzCFXZWk=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Nestled in the city center, this Cypriot eatery is a true culinary delight. The service is top-notch, with attentive staff ensuring a seamless dining experience. Despite the late hour, the food remained remarkably fresh, each dish bursting with authentic flavors. From the fragrant souvlaki to the succulent saganaki and fresh seafood, every bite is a taste of Cyprus. The cozy ambiance adds to the charm, making it the perfect spot for a memorable meal.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO6qTRWDrLofno5aBY8NFJ0CZS4CPuhs8YYewtL"],"When":"2024-5-3"},{"Name":"Cristina-Irina Radu-MacKay","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVma9QNMKszoURpeavG8cvATNt4qB3e5q4UAoZ-93u4jCN9M3GMAQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"5⭐ are just not enough for this restaurant, everything was more than expected. Starting with the amazing service, delicious food, more than you can eat, the prices definitely lower for what you get. Wonderful experience, so happy that we reached the "Happy Island Restaurant"  Thank you ❤️!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMbeU4uCxfyDneCE89ESkanYV7BtPCiCqrUWx2b"],"When":"2023-12-3"},{"Name":"Yonatan Sapoznik","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWIHKcqSzqwUY_Ij-HDEohleFykgxEGtB36H6oGhaqLJsWU7Bm9=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Fresh local cuisine
The atmosphere was great and very traditional
The food was tasty and satisfying
Took some Cyprus starters lamb chops and fish","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOIe_vZeJwhS0p0vCbz8Ofmt3h2xj4tY4A-dGA6"],"When":"2024-8-17"},{"Name":"Donada Bichaku","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocITdPCNRSFRb5icrepzg3gAtQAJ8JzQEtSFaUnao86z8sUuYg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Best place in cyprus, the waiters are the best, food is amazing. We tried this the last night of our trip but wish we had done so sooner. We had meze for 2 and it was more than enough deliciousness 😻legend says we are still struggling to finish the meal 😀","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Adam Hooper","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXc4RtPsmdxdzmXWBQtb6A_x8Q2_UeJJWUi_XyrdOBhNWdrmGXU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"As a part of my Sperm Donation World tour I came here I wanted  some authentic Cypriot food and got some fantastic lamb.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOkV3tNk_5lWJdN3NbXmA23cOD717LPY83wjnzl"],"When":"2024-9-4"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Abi Smith","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV70WJyKTG7ZGPyO0GImu11OJMnNiF7f5Q0Vz6DnBno_sjeCW5lRQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We came here on Tuesday night and had a lovely time. The food is beautiful, and although it is on the more “expensive” side, the portions are absolutely huge (we also eat alot usually!) We struggled to finish ours and thought it was amazing value for money. The staff are absolutely amazing, particularly Jorge (not sure if that is spelt right). On the night we went there were plenty of staff on, I believe 2 were in training who although new were all so lovely, attentive and polite.
Would definitely recommend it here, the scenery is also beautiful!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN0cPsbHu-e777mWIMz6FrIYj-Woy8BoBAqqcy0"],"When":"2024-7-19"},{"Name":"Fabio Baumgartner","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVb3IXTZfsiNbx1Y1BQiMRN5-Ja011Gtub23rvZR-Spo73ZfZdX=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great Restaurant with a great Atmosphere. The Service was very Friendly and Attentive. The Local Wine was very good as was the Food. Tip: Fillet! Thanks","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPM5HCMSaLFzqE2DWXjZ9eUtHKnkwS22kdLfsnk"],"When":"2024-8-22"},{"Name":"Nikolaj Christiansen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLY3JHyvf6JLmSTFiB-Ueoqqb8B0rV4LMJhvZkkoAdG9YoSb_o=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Starters were great, wine was good, desert was fine, but main dish was disappointing given the awesome starter. The dish as a whole was heavily under seasoned, the salmon was overcooked and the mash and veggies were simply awful. I think it was reheated perhaps from yesterday.
Service and ambiance was terrific.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPBBMkT3jyEXLDyuye5IuEc5NHuFKoaEK3gyQDK"],"When":"2024-4-2"},{"Name":"Tim Burtscher","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXEFY0E9G1Yzk-0w46yvXOBYf6WbyjASYuHrILMS6Q6HOPPGLI=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"A very beautifull restaurant but sad that they dont do there best... one waiter (man with long black hairs) did his job really good but the rest was shocking... sorry but you DONT touch the food of the custumor 🤦‍♂️ my friend wasent finished with his food and have left over bred and sauce of his meal and he wanted it to eat together, the waiter asked are you finished and he sayes NO and then the waiter touched his food and out the bread on the bair table and walked away with the plate... also was there a used ashtray and when the maindishes came the put the ashtray over my food away (my friend was still smoking in this moment and didnt know what to do with the ash) and after we finished the bill took 25 minutes to arive... sorry but we didnt have any drinks or food left and it cant take so long to bring the bill while all waiters just stand there.... and i recomment to not order the spaghetti vongole because its not cooked traditionally with whitewine and it just smells about chilli (no other taste) but i need to say that the mozerella bread with tomates in it was good.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOHXACW-ZnkIFmmQHzFQ2OVKOsnQH9UN7MPucgE"],"When":"2024-9-15"},{"Name":"Giorgia Fazio","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKP2NPuEGj-LdIoS3Y9XJloq7_FpyMNgvpRuED9R1I1nTu6Rg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Beef carpaccio and the fried halloumi were extremely good. As a main we had the fillet steak and ficardo steak, both very good but the cooking preference was mixed. My boyfriend had a red wine which was very good. We took also one panna cotta which was good, but too sweet for my taste","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMmuM7VjFkki_kdJYUUcPcnyAX7kp0Q2OnJHKzH"],"When":"2024-6-7"},{"Name":"S Y","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX74rWzvttRbSyuDMvHO48odBWon-sdDsbV3MiP9gBgsJ8JGfCgLA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"average food, waited over 15mins to get waiter attention to get the bill. Sadly unable  to do writing for dessert for a celebration. Clean toilets","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMM3GUU3_GHas2nJ1KviHpi-DEnp7p2boiJfhDf"],"When":"2024-4-7"},{"Name":"K A","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWRSqDRt-YwY59cQZ1IjCbB0KrxaS99KOtuNvqpwk_novxeOZI=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amaaazing place,,,, the ambience is really cozy and green…service in on point and the food is super (best Ravioli I ever had) 10/10 highly recommended.
The only issue is the parking as there is no designated spot.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNwoD7vpQTpCYeIsf86RHr_THU8TFwbixIRMEwx"],"When":"2024-8-30"},{"Name":"Danny Wilson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX1iRAXAze-ZUnz7F29yDw1kFzyMfOtY6V2WEc9xMZOBspQDvHZ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Best restaurant in Paphos no doubt. So good we went twice!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMqJIhopEPDqusXCkL8o9rn678HdzhZXiY6i_6O"],"When":"2024-9-3"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"E oz","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJqOa195yuV-Byh1jioeNnIEFBHcd2cVv5tMlW9LE17gwZblA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"One of the best restaurants in the area that's been around for 30+ years
Its family run business with a big history.
If you want local Cypriot food, this is the place to go
All the food is farmed and grown by them,plus making their own wine which you can't buy in shops which is amazing.
I recommend this to everyone that wants delicious Cypriot food

The owners and staff are super friendly making sure you have a great experience

I definitely will be going back here.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipORjRZjThPv3obHCKq_YkYzrE_yo7aK8-RNs4i0"],"When":"2024-9-27"},{"Name":"Lesleyann Psciuk","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJXxZOMs7nMX0MRoFnSbGJgxPzM9S0JVqud2ssfbJLdKi_d6g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"On our honeymoon from the UK.
Came here for lunch with a recommendation from locals. Authentic food and all home grown, even the house wine! Sat in the tranquil garden which gave a Mediterranean feel and sea view. .Wouldn't even know the main rd was there!
Really well priced! The owner & chef made us feel very welcome!
Had the traditional sharer salad to start. Lamb & moussaka as mains.
Was given a side of seasonrd sharer chips and chocolate brittle on the house! All very yummy!
The house white wine was so smooth and tasty!
You will not be disappointed! Food was amazing!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOC2mpcvm3YJFYobcUuhzWWXI-5p5rl-8KLUnqv"],"When":"2024-4-18"},{"Name":"Tasos Shakallis","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUP6gV8lpXio3Oq1K6vfKnzmCsQpHmGil24km1iEREwB5Odf_c=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Lovely food, heavenly atmosphere and friendly staff.
Very relaxing place to have a dinner.
This was not just  nice meal, it was an unforgettable experience.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPht_FAIow-YKfjYHkzolxB68D-WInHqxNDoZrX"],"When":"2024-10-3"},{"Name":"Mark Ebejer","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKKS_kBg9BozOfcQbgbaDhgm7o06Xvufvj1uv4kwgt9cOtl7g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Excellent food and atmosphere, very friendly staff, probably family run. Highly recommended. We had their speciality kebab mix, which was really good!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMTF0UnTGJmwX0tIwKf2ZgFuPB-omb-JPtBZAWg"],"When":"2024-6-22"},{"Name":"Katty Anu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV0YYxXt_ftV5efE253J8s2I0pfgbdEoovgc_OZmE3URzncsT0P=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Wonderful place with amazing atmosphere, delicious food and a friendly owner. I came with friends and we had the most delicious moussaka in Paphos. We also had other dishes, every single one of them were absolutely tasty and the servings were generous. The place is beautiful and owner let us taste some of the fruit that were growing there. I truly recommend this place!
Thank you so much for your hospitality!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Georgina Botros","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUm6Ri23priR2AYE3uelEYIPk8A5EZLDmUyqj2IsUPsPYFQcsQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Delicious food. Friendly and communicative staff. We enjoyed it!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMAtTliPJ9IxY52xHJdSEqvOMihyRuaXfAnEsKt"],"When":"2024-10-2"},{"Name":"Tinotenda Musiiwa","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKcvg6VAw-tdWPBvGwTBC3Rqrozv4bFa8sGF_3X9IUgXCUuDg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Kids and Adults will absolutely enjoy this place An absolute gem of a restraunt. They grow their own grapes above you inside the restraunt for a an amazing scenery..

Kids have a WHOLE room to play and enjoy while the adults enjoy the food and wine. Glass doors too so no worry of leaving them along.

The best Sea bass I've had in a long long  time and what's even better, he showed us the fresh fish they caught that morning! My Partner had the Stefado (One Pot Beef stew) and let me tell you right now not many restaurants in this island do as good as a Stifado than this one (And we tried a few)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOdWkoAj1y9p3SEHi3pcLUldLpvZCoN7P0eJ-N9"],"When":"2024-5-24"},{"Name":"A J","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUDAFgF5zcwHlsnwsgJ7TCylRz5rBihzS2zxIPfSejVutlZU6Bt=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A beautiful restaurant with amazing food for a very reasonable price. You MUST try this place if you are in the Paphos area","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM7xDFN0MMw-x89vtwd9ywtWi-FT-7SSu0SEtbb"],"When":"2024-10-5"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Nikki McClelland","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWL-oIjfpnKHW2dM2gFYeZCUAlz2xeYjl92e_zg3MKBN3zMcbI=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We went here last night and the atmosphere was calm and relaxing! The staff were extremely helpful, with a few allergies (nuts and gluten) they made sure the food was safe for everyone. The gluten free pasta was the best my dad and his partner had ever ate! All the food was absolutely fantastic! If I could give more stars I would! They do the best chocolate fudge cake, unfortunately not nut free but I definitely enjoyed it! Fantastic place, fantastic food, fantastic staff! 100% recommended!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMhSjR79jFcuJkKhJzZ5dG3w0MEkDY8ds2fUh1X"],"When":"2024-6-6"},{"Name":"F R","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLbohz7dtLmOqvsy-ttNTg7hpf-D6GlGPe9wy-vHJwT7zUFZw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Visited Duomo last night. Food was perfection. Service was fantastic, and the ambiance was exactly as it should be. Will definitely be our go to restaurant.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPbPkq78NWIS0ET9-pXnce6fvbKyB8-YvFy54iu"],"When":"2024-8-15"},{"Name":"Hamilton James","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW1K7Sf4gWp-SMjY3H623rrRLBn-HXzjVGOlq1InnhcfPzFeLU=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It is not easy to find such HIGH QUALITY food here in Paphos. Look no further than Duomo Ristorante.
The ingredients are high grade, the meal was delicious as a result! The staff are curious and professional, and the overall setting of the restaurant is outstanding!
Well priced as well!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOpduJIMH4vWFm6bdC1gWIumy6FbA_erCCvV00Y"],"When":"2024-8-12"},{"Name":"Roberto Belchior","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX1Tz7leBrIOypVvifDeiSm8NPnYUI92In8S5CY5bOyUYm05oxlzg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Excellent restaurant, some 200 meters from the Elysium hotel. Air-conditioned room, with an ellegant yet relaxing atmosphere. Extensive wine list and good cocktails. The sea food home pasta is delicious. The tiramisu was a little warmer than ideal. The service is incredibly fast. Great option after a few evenings dining at the Elysium.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNKveu-JegO9y0QZOwkIcHV1PVWr5v2bNyJyuip"],"When":"2024-9-4"},{"Name":"Rita Lukin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWKXqTcguZEpUQzT_Oh9UVRJuDlSQuaZQy_aeMijOE3lZ6NE6XxJw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"So delicious, I just couldn’t stop eating!
I want to thank you dears for making an effort preparing vegan meals for me, it was goddess food and the wine too.
I know it’s not always easy to understand Vegan lifestyle but you did it amazing♥️
Thank you for the best dinner, can’t wait to be back.
Gracie Mille
Rita","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOw3ZAnRX2njNoOQr7-7f1PPEi9TqsXczeDfnVY"],"When":"2024-4-19"},{"Name":"daryl jowett","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVqoayxpbVW2ewACnfpdiDzbXN8QNSdSWv49Ze-2sqso8U_oY6edg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"One of the nicest places to eat in Paphos. The atmosphere was lovely. The restaurant was lovely and clean. The food was incredible, the lasagne and lobster in particular. The staff were attentive and helpful. Absolutely amazing place and the prices were very reasonable for a restaurant of this caliber.

Whilst the staff are attentive and on hand to assist you with anything, they are a little too imposing. It's not necessary to ask 5 times throughout the meal if everything is good. It made me feel a little pressured and as if they were watching and waiting. Some People may like this, for me it was a bit too over the top.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOu4BkPJ1O8KI6ZLyWlIoaj3TmlY1aPaOPxZdIA"],"When":"2024-2-2"},{"Name":"Diane Craik","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVkUGUPE-DNzJbn0gRi1Yl0KMp_7CsYZ2HvuY4v0C0RHm4UDgNEqQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Absolutely amazing food. One of the best salads I've ever had. Presentation and attention to detail first class. Staff were attentive without being intrusive and extremely accommodating. Restaurant was busy both indoors and out but staff worked tirelessly to keep everyone happy. Would return here in a heartbeat. Wish we'd found it sooner ❤","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Corentin Busetti","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXkxszugGH194QsXSrmm9huxzqGP-vPvJ81R8-V1oaHH2O8r25H=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The atmosphere and the food are really nice. However, even if the staff is very friendly, they make it too much. They try to be more professional and it become uncomfortable (comes at the table 10 times in 5minutes). Nevertheless, I really do recommend and I had one of the best dinner in paphos over there","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMKTZDA46VmOavYBsNlCe-cP-YKdc7-xB6KdlxU"],"When":"2023-7-12"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Alan Andrews","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJqzhYtx7CCLVg-BG25n5-N19K262PnbJn6GvS2r5V00YNFkA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had the stifado. Came with a lovely fluffy soft mash and vegetables. Returned several times during our stay as food was absolutely lovely.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMyU9ttS2GPo6m6jAw2HRNlZ_2rxhdRlFbrzTvr"],"When":"2024-9-24"},{"Name":"Keith Llewellyn","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX-47e4f3exI68dLbM6pN6lM3wVWP6p1gIj5d34KcECvV9-pEM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Have lived in Paphos for 8 years and this is one of the best t bones I have had here, cooked beautifully and we ordered garlic mushrooms and garlic sauce with the main, all delicious, we went early so no waiting, had our choice of seating, the service was excellent and the prices very reasonable, we will definitely be back for another steak, highly recommended 👀👍🥩👍🥩","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNPc97PnhUQqWa5zRMXSQwX7VjsRNKXuC68bExO"],"When":"2024-9-2"},{"Name":"DMP","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVxZhXPqt1umvwLplMC3lThy3tq-Kog1X-iSD-I7_nN9qjYC9-91A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Ugh, last night's visit to Agapinor Restaurant wasn't what the reviews raved about. The place looked a bit dated, but clean at least. We got steak sets (T-bone and ribeye, both medium)

While we waited, we got rock-hard bread and dry halloumi. Not the best sign.

The ribeye? Not pink, not juicy. More like wrestling a tire - took forever to finish!  T-bone was okay texture-wise, but flavor was just meh.

Dessert saved some face - chocolate cake with vanilla ice cream was good, and the fresh orange juice hit the spot.

The elderly staff was friendly. However, when I mentioned the chewy steak (I mean, they asked!), our waiter (another staff, a younger man) offered excuses galore. No apology, just a lecture.  Didn't have time for that after that epic chew-fest.

Skip this one, folks. Especially if you're a steak lover. Save your money and your jaw for a better meal elsewhere.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMMy-hTKtO3nLZtpG4liJje6xpP3bkIkKBfEB_2"],"When":"2024-6-11"},{"Name":"Nea Tulonen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUGs9fW7Y_t1l6WnfKprVNGefTO6kbCDa8iY-OuUDod90PfSxM=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Food was quite good, for the most part, but it took ages to get any. Service was slow and the waitress couldn't answer the simplest questions. Nice looking place, though.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Charlene Genovese","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU3OxpuIaBXXjprtkFpMlbgCtV_o2Bqxq7A7ldYhkOoj73y3ecEtA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Stopped by chance, decided to try it out. Family run restaurant, food was good and fresh, pita bread was served warm. Ate moussaka and tasted great! Meat was deliciously grilled. Not to miss.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Anete Usklina","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXh_C_OKAKKtrXvjwvveXmZ4yaAbEa4H7RF8ES5k5Y3AFbcVRCZ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great set menu for just under 18 euros. Food was delicious and the bruschetta was amazing!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOS5Xm6eveC1LGqchLFch7aOd6KMu339ivqwOoc"],"When":"2024-7-12"},{"Name":"Nicola Lowrie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKsa5fvC95ghMLGpMs9sVuYStAXehPLVxbCe6XSwhqNVIxQ5g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Thought this was the worst meal we had in Cyprus. Served by a young girl who kept trying to take the plates away! We both had steak and chips, nothing was properly cooked, didn't even take a dessert. Nothing in this restaurant left a good taste in our mouths. Very poor. Nicola","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Rafaella Neophytou","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUgeccBUV07-GK7qsFPZbls3w1yvCQ7z2CdZYchswsmZ-dC27bk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We had such a lovely dinner at Agapinor restaurant! Personally I had the Princessa chicken which was amazing and my boyfriend had the Alfredo pasta which was also great!
The service was so nice and the atmosphere was cozy and friendly. Definitely recommended !","Images":null,"When":""}]
