user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Alex Siamantas","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWXnBxBx1653oJp4-6b21ftmRV6NWIeZr8wq_XpJ3V0xrsX5msBpw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The food is good but not great. What wins me in this place is the location and the atmosphere. Muse is located at the edge of a cliff overlooking the whole city of Pafos. The view is magnificent during the day, but even at night, the city lights are nice. The bar is really nicely decorated, and the overall feeling of the restaurant is very chill. The overall experience was really nice.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPx7k2PuUii1jSMOgJQICOS-nDAxaLYUgmcVnFf"],"When":"2024-9-28"},{"Name":"Софья Рубенчик","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXi4mKTIS0szXOWcbwSROiPDBoUFD0QpECZ2RASvQSPfHGRWj5b=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A magnificent place with a beautiful panorama of the city of Paphos and the sea, behind which the sun sets. I definitely recommend coming here for dinner to capture these sunsets. All the dishes are very tasty and the portions are decent. I also liked that despite the popularity of the place, the arrangement of the tables is very comfortable and quite private. Another plus is its own large parking lot. I highly recommend this place!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPXSy1gAxQsX4941jdaT-eHsOK-NqThgET-QV1o"],"When":"2024-9-7"},{"Name":"Ragheed Kh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXLWk6QUWdQ8mRDgoaByFJSa2KA9O5PgCvOs_iH3dwwsrKRNBsB=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Staff was very welcoming and friendly, atmosphere was great, the waiters were very attentive and took our order. Food was presented within 15 minutes. Food was great, pricing was fair.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOi2TugBxCxm64TdDWMDBPl2GemX-7jysrDvUbr"],"When":"2024-8-25"},{"Name":"Oksana Vishnevskaia","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW7L9L0RsJjetB-OqJogipUECypC1J0j3eNYnRNVXeSswhGqj0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Here’s a revised version of the review:

I had high expectations for this place since it was highly recommended, but I was somewhat disappointed. The food is edible, but nothing to rave about. On the bright side, the view is beautiful, and the service is good. There's also the convenience of a large parking area nearby. However, I wouldn’t go out of my way to come here for dinner.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOwoe5W07GxTLitj6tyOLiuktghw1pZtFYjqa7U"],"When":"2024-8-13"},{"Name":"Chanakya Ranga","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLAyeFqEuchiFmnkryiElSjK5_QqEjvc92Pbld94NLRYXvzTvMZ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing view from the terrace! Food was tasty and the service was friendly! we didn't make a reservation but got a table for 2 at 06h35. good place to catch the sunset and grab a drink at the bar and/or have dinner.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOSXn9qAH8TwsMyC14CQK1pPkTX3xqGeCgmmSTC"],"When":"2024-9-30"},{"Name":"Ivan Danishevsky","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUmV18cJpcVfY92UYbPN4DeIWDBwjbziLDDXn6OkhPyPz2nCGN2dw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Muse is a beautiful spot perched above a cliff, offering stunning views and a super convenient, spacious parking area. The ambiance is impressive, and overall, the food is good and well-presented. However, the service can be a bit strange and inattentive at times, though the restaurant is open even on weekends, which is a plus.

In the mornings, they serve delicious pancakes and a decent breakfast, somewhat similar to an English one, although the morning menu is a bit limited. It's a great place to start your day, despite the small selection.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM4O3opx5PrQXYeCmOGvRtg6-f1rXeM7cfAEJdd"],"When":"2024-8-15"},{"Name":"Nico M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXA7W6pkiTiH_JQ53p9j4IhqGELfUgYg0oKtTiGT_Ym04gsgrL0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Modern type dishes with a beautiful view on top of the hill. We came for dinner and it felt like fine dining as everyone was dressed up nicely and arrived in rather nice cars.

The food was tasty, we thought the bruschetta was outstanding as they grill it in the oven seemingly to give it a twist. The quesadilla and the pork shank were good but not wow. The menu overall had a lot to offer so you can keep coming. We paid 54€ for two.

Staff were average in my opinion; we did not feel valued or looked after during our dinner despite being the first table outside. It also felt like they were disorganized so I would work on that.

I hear brunch is good and given you’d have the view during the day; I think that may be more appealing than dinner.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPW85TYBhDzI_Z2Ir-fn6KIXNwxfzJsINUlPr3V"],"When":"2024-6-17"},{"Name":"Nabeel Alaraj","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKGqCeLFgIcpG2aBARNtF9OAlBAid8x05OgWnBufgWD0Q_O8Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Fantastic location and lovely atmosphere. The food was nice and well presented.
I was a bit disappointed with the service, the staff were not as welcoming, very slow and difficult to get hold of anyone to actually order anything .  Having said that, it is worth a visit.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPg-Jp2LHJECQOo8aui8QthucStIv2DeWbJnj3K"],"When":"2024-6-19"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Tom Dobler","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVMV9Rnmradpl7k17PIT09jy9gIq0xY8XW5HLwC9OT3s6lnrs__Ng=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"🍽️ Hidden gem alert! Tucked away in a side street, The Windmill is a culinary oasis.
The moment you step inside, you're transported to another world - the interior design is simply breathtaking.

I started with the fetta cheese baklava, a delightful twist on the classic. For the main course, the chicken picantini was an explosion of flavors. Every bite was pure perfection.

The staff, while a bit overwhelmed due to the restaurant's popularity, still managed to provide attentive service. It's clear why this place is always bustling!

While not the cheapest option around, the quality of the food and the overall experience make it worth every penny. Just be sure to book in advance - this little slice of heaven fills up fast! 🌟","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP-w13LeUxrwb4eeWMIaZ1tTgAAuuSke0vKQaJ-"],"When":"2024-9-10"},{"Name":"Mikkel deMib Svendsen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVE-HzeXrV-iKxU6AHATr8Wrl_Tc61qXB40hVAr2Q-K4ef5m3O5=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We had one of the best meals in Cyprus at the Windmill! Each dish was made with an amazing attention to details and the serving was mych more elegant than most other restaurants on the iland. Taste, look and serving was amazin. And the bread … that is just the best bread I ever had in Cyprus!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP6YWjmVJKggMWv1wbrRy5-o3vrGRLKzK3mPbmo"],"When":"2024-9-4"},{"Name":"Charlotte Moran","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXx_eqdwWBDqT1_8NXTd57thUDbTUpsqFPM2kaQIDLsxsEJZYw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"we had the vegan meze which was highly anticipated as i had seen lots of reviews of this place. it definitely lived up to expectations!! you will NOT leave hungry let me tell you that!! there was so much variety on the menu to to begin with, and our meze consisted of sooo many dishes from dip, olives, rice dishes, roasted aubergines with vegan cheese, greek salad with vegan feta and fried zucchinis. we were in fear towards the end as we were so full and plates just kept being put down lol

staff were so clued up on veganism and were happy to chat about it. amazing venue and atmosphere","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNLwlAf1kcKXlR1Py_2tTyazBLkgdKFNZTKcjWP"],"When":"2024-8-26"},{"Name":"Nico M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXA7W6pkiTiH_JQ53p9j4IhqGELfUgYg0oKtTiGT_Ym04gsgrL0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Came here because of the reviews and fell in love with this taverna which was the tastiest food we’ve had in a week in Cyprus.

They have this lentil rice dish which they give every table for free and honestly it’s a bomb of flavors; it was so good that the waiter brought me the recipe! I’d come back just for that!

The terrace setting is nice, the staff are friendly and professional.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPxL7TrgR_dKQwTN_9HYv-iWRhu2Q7QEy-579_2"],"When":"2024-6-13"},{"Name":"Tim Burtscher","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXEFY0E9G1Yzk-0w46yvXOBYf6WbyjASYuHrILMS6Q6HOPPGLI=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"The food tasted not reallly good, it was okey but delicious is something diffrent.. i ordered the shrimps with rice on a white wine sauce. The personal was completly overwhelmed, we were never asked if we want anything else, we needed to ask for order drinks, we needed to ask to order food and when we asked for the bill, they bringed it but didnt show up for 15 minutes even after we asked 2 times to pay.... the restaurant have much potential but i dont will come a second time...","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMaGFHyH7QqMDnpEvcz5besBcz0vlzD_rS9xnGS"],"When":"2024-9-11"},{"Name":"Laura Thompson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKmQP5h8xexd57bjMimOhlDZusHfNcxGayn5Bz2nPzXLWtQQQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We had 2 evening meals here during our holiday to Paphos. The vegan options are clearly labelled on the menu. We had the vegan mezze which was delicious and had a huge amount of little dishes - definitely good value for money! Then on our 2nd visit we had the pasta with vegan feta and vegan chocolate cake and vegan apple pie for dessert. All food was lovely and the service was excellent! It was also so kind to give us a free lentil dish with our bread for a starter which was delicious!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMLlvfSiBstFdALqCv0cm6WMyq1MZhnGv8sUqQw"],"When":"2024-7-21"},{"Name":"Jessica Schackermann","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLKQEAjGwV6C7s7OHSnFjWGVkSFebDAFm0LS72J3UTTVyRqug=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great dinner. I highly recommend the Cypriot Ravioli for a starter. The waiters were all very friendly and food arrived quickly. Come early, at 8pm it started to fill up quickly.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPcURmi6MzwA0MTeoSA6VkHaZhZtCiV9J81r_6D"],"When":"2024-6-29"},{"Name":"Ben Ben-Ezer","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW4IV-92pcO7LYGE4PPSX-fh57VXHBoTw6ikmV0Kn072teqsyEu=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Windmill is one of our must go-to places in Paphos. We love the food and the ambience. Nancy it a wonderful host and we enjoy seeing her and the rest of the family every time.
Last time we decided to go 'light' so we both had the Moussaka and a wonderful dessert.
I can also recommend the Meze menu, you won't leave the restaurant hungry.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMaVf4oh7TyaHlhKWSxpjy-MVRxkapTUI3fN-5H"],"When":"2024-8-27"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Eric Sin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU-5zxAK_UpvbPISywQlYwAJlELPuawQl44iLLWtJBypLFevCco=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Came here without reservation. Took a bit until we got seated, didn't expect much, but man o man, this was some nice experience.
We got greeted by the nice waiter. He said that the restaurant doesn't have a menu. They give you small plates and you tell the waiter when you have enough. All the dishes were so delicious and the dinner place has all kind of cats chilling also. Great recommendation on local Cyprus food for a reasonable price.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM6Iu5mzXyZwWwGAOAUpMczFcXzKB5SV2HJMKN0"],"When":"2024-6-15"},{"Name":"Steve Schofield","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXV_KQx5ATQWPKv0sLycYUyV1_8sIeY5b7brVoQJNValqX4OGYrtw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"An outstanding restaurant. We've been going here (when on holiday in Pathos) for the past 21 years and it is as amazing today as it was the first time we went (though I have to admit a small bias as we had our wedding reception here at 7 St. George's that first time). The food is simply stunning..","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOLd_0jNeTIOcoqtEKsRHzuDTw2pAqVXgPy9yJ0"],"When":"2024-9-20"},{"Name":"Daniel E.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL4jMJ4tHxeQwcn2B0xNXydSn47y7PVa8FghcOaAJOr7ZRyPY0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The taverna we had lunch at tonight offered an exceptional experience of authentic Cyprus cuisine. The flavors were rich and true to tradition, with each dish prepared with care and attention to detail. The mezze selection was diverse, allowing us to savor a variety of local specialties, all of which were fresh and delicious . The atmosphere was warm and welcoming, perfectly capturing the essence of Cypriot hospitality. If you're looking for an unforgettable taste of Cyprus, this taverna is a must-visit!thank you","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPhnQD8nx3F7xRJ-cnmSlGnrmt0agcJKBOaaOmd"],"When":"2024-8-22"},{"Name":"grandmasterflash213","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV_bUbDqwknrKIWXi8aPDyvdezAd8DMGnfHuq82dER8tfzr-1xO=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We had a fantastic authentic meze here, the host Ben is super cool and very welcoming, you feel completely at home with him. This was a truly authentic experience, tucked away from the tourist traps. This was a meal that we won’t forget, and we’ve eaten some pretty good things around the world. Every course is brought at a nice tempo for you to enjoy, you can tell that everything is home made (and home grown too i believe!). Im short, go here for authentic Cypriot meze! We lasted about 10 courses total, with drinks, the bill was very reasonable.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOIZIlt4y44G8hyT5Q8YbhbJXiljAMTRQxWogGp"],"When":"2024-3-31"},{"Name":"Stuart Nisbet","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX0DdUXBQ98R1WyKHJGCB43iQXsm6GvxvfCSjV4niMVpB0_iTQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Visited here whilst on holiday, staff were amazing and explained how this traditional Meze works. Had a lovely red wine with the meal and all was very reasonably priced. Highly recommend.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPPWXtn49J_rTkYTPh81c6ifPGRztiCYJCDbRI4"],"When":"2024-7-18"},{"Name":"Courtney Walters","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXTZddiFYOTfeva1MGeSrfBHtaMlxRpZFWh0xY2zZsR5bRPvHS3=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"DO NOT MISS THIS PLACE. It’s a beautiful restaurant with an unforgettable menu. There is no set menu, and small plates will be bought out until you are full. The price is excellent, 25€ for the mains and a few extra euros for desert. The wine was amazing and also 13€ for a bottle. Ben and other members of the team were incredible and the chefs too. Please go in with an open mind and just try everything. It has honestly made my trip to Pathos even more memorable. Make a reservation and head there without hesitation.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Roza Momot","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKA_IH2DExpHDlc3-0ML5dbrO-2iI6F2EaZnR1i99NpPfIT=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The most amazing meal we had in Cyprus and one of the best meals I’ve ever had!!! The food just keeps coming until you tell them you cannot possibly eat anymore - we lasted about 6 or 7 rounds. Everything was so delicious, and the vegetarian in our group felt very well accommodated as well. We didn’t think we could possibly fit in dessert but somehow managed to because it was so amazing. Final total was €32 per person, which included the mezze, wine, coffee and dessert. Absolutely worth every cent and I’d absolutely recommend this place!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMQykeVAyuRrCwGlEHQEQzN9fpq3-_3l-NvhJo"],"When":"2023-4-6"},{"Name":"Marlon Williams","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIFyu2oGHBSjFfsiUxk4b_bZ-hKMoCf21poA1wAX_Hi8Pbwpw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I visited St. George's Tavern for dinner twice on a recent trip to Paphos after finding it on Google; the high review score convinced me that it was worth a visit. And boy, this place did not disappoint! Ben the owner was remarkably friendly, warm, and welcoming. I walked in not quite knowing what to expect, but the food we had on the first night was sensational. After eating the amazing meze selection consisting of a mix of traditional dishes including pies, meats, salads, and vegetables, I was supremely confident this place could rank highly among the best eateries in town.

The outdoor atmosphere (as pictured) was so pleasant we ended up staying a little longer after closing time to drink some wine and chat to Ben. Ben explained that the restaurant is family run and had been open for 30 years. He also explained that some of their ingredients are sourced from his family’s farm. And judging by the quality and taste of the food, you could tell that it was made with care, love, and patience. I absolutely LOVE food, both cooking it and eating it, so I decided to pick his brains on the history of some of the dishes they served us, and oh boy, Ben did not disappoint. This guy knows his stuff, and I could see and hear his passion for food as he spoke.

My first visit was such an enjoyable experience, I decided to come back on my birthday 2 days later to have dinner. And you know what; it was even better the second time. Like I said, I LOVE food, especially when it's made with quality ingredients, and I can enjoy it in non-pretentious surroundings. St. George's Tavern absolutely surpassed my expectations and was my absolute favourite restaurant during my trip. I ate out a lot and although there was some very good competition, this place won by a country mile. There is no 'instagrammy' flower wall, or garish lighting, or any pretence. Instead, the restaurant has a rustic aesthetic and charm and just serves excellent food in a pleasant relaxed environment.

The place was busy both times I went but we luckily managed to get a table with ease on each visit. Out of respect for fellow diners, I chose not take pictures while the place was full. But hopefully you can see from my pictures how lovely this place truly is! If you’re in Paphos, YOU MUST EAT HERE, I confidently say that you won’t be disappointed! And TBH, I already know that I’ll be eating here a few more times when I go back to Paphos.

If you see this Ben, thanks again to you and your guys!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNJtVL_PgDIuquAuSZgMGL4hl0TIVsfR_a3jib_"],"When":"2023-11-13"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"S4IL S4IL","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLyhLrF40k6Rq7QbGX-a7sG1Du5kQGsTRpT361QjaDniFvuag=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Really lovely place to eat, great food & drinks, right by the Harbour, also have a visiting Turtle so you get a bonus Turtle watch. Harry, the waiter is great & takes some great photos & videos to really capture the experience. We can highly recommend this restaurant","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM352Xhb82Q6R_JQRx9UXPaSSBXaUU3OdvUR5dj"],"When":"2024-9-12"},{"Name":"Tanja","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWkZbyd_TJ7k4VJAgVzUWP6irt4MG8y-lzOVp-FtNw217r3Xe4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"It’s a nice restaurant and the food is nice. The place is romantic, situated on the water at the beginning of the promenade.
It’s very busy so you might have to wait a little bit but it’s something they informed us about. We ordered the fish metze, it was good but not my favorite (just personal taste, there were too many spices)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPMukDXRBkCq77D7tYQkRs_j6U_-TEHhCdaYGPf"],"When":"2024-8-25"},{"Name":"Mark Tormey","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUzyM60BOM5gSlletBSdMuJ3kV-LyglXYeWiVYA5tLOG4V1_q-A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Lovely friendly place. Food was great. I had the Stuffed Mushrooms with feta and herbs, and the Pork Gyros. The owner was a happy guy, singing and taking photos for us. Staff were friendly. Amazing location with views across the harbour. Highly recommended A+A+!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO3W3XfERjjU8yRVLpHEWu1oaYoBCMzOVI4E17i"],"When":"2024-5-24"},{"Name":"Lily R","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUlQPb6wQYhVk0v0JiypvlYeBDrTLUBW2hBT8nVvBGpnYslbe4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The staff were amazing and very friendly. The food was incredible, the portions were big too! Brilliant location and look forward to visiting again!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMvb2q_WaKoBZDhowFGRp7S6t4y87JTqq3K8F4R"],"When":"2024-7-23"},{"Name":"Charlotte Moran","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXx_eqdwWBDqT1_8NXTd57thUDbTUpsqFPM2kaQIDLsxsEJZYw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"a lovely restaurant right on the harbour. i ordered the vegan gyros and my boyfriend had the halloumi on roasted tomato vegetables. this was my favourite meal of our holiday! the portion was huge, and it came with salad, tahini sauce, chips and i think it also was a mango chutney dip that also came with it.

the staff were amazing, very chatty and attentive.

i had a really lovely margarita from here too!

we were staying at the hotel also owed by this restaurant, so we had 10% off which i think is a really lovely gesture. i think the bill came to €52 with 2 drinks and 2 large mains and a big bottle of water!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO5rT82RZN7QOIbB-yVz3Y4lCJVMEC_vxYsCgAp"],"When":"2024-8-26"},{"Name":"Michael Oduba","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVVOAdCxLfAmrX0Z0JBmftKhjAYOE7-L_x6PqTsJD3PVmeaeFpZVg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My fiance and I got engaged here tonight. I messaged ahead and discussed my proposal they literally told me they had my back. And my god did they deliver . They made our night so special and the effort they went too it's made us have the best memories to last us a life time. Such lovely people and the food was great too. Will definitely be making a return visit.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO5K4_4dlTklLtGz036qGDECS31JD86wTmyswzy"],"When":"2024-9-14"},{"Name":"James Low","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVQ4qscqH_44FzNwjLQ6k-ImWR6D2aGSFQiwCgbPII7AhWeTOuj3A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had dinner here tonight and it was great. We chose this place because of the vegan gyros on the menu and it didn’t disappoint. Loads of food and great value too.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOJVQoivCwCsTSTf6ARS9nsWRHiQBBBIU26Ml0K"],"When":"2024-9-23"},{"Name":"Angela Aldridge","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKMdEXKTmTDN0OY9EmE_RRWGh9ML8DVD-I-DjB5F02NWvur_A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Such a lovely restaurant located by the sea with great views. The service was exceptional and the staff were very personable. Food good. Would recommend, especially in the evening. Reserve a table by the sea early to see the sea turtle and fish who are regular visitors.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMpuinlREeRvoylrs6BJxAuJe0GrW7GQK1Ur23v"],"When":"2024-8-25"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Peter K","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLKl1sVEB7vuq6IdF2952Qi-PNzkFtjw1luB1mmSPYMh__w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Waiter was not pleasant. My meal was served and a few minutes later we were advised that an error was made and my wife's meal was not made and would be an additional 20 minutes unless we ordered something else. Lamb was quite good but overall experience was disappointing.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPKGAlIUHRtF-LglhFkuqUum0RqidGvQYR5t3c"],"When":"2024-10-10"},{"Name":"Ahmed Muhsin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVzHDhv4MIkPz--lzY_HO217qBbcKMM73jkkao6BXtcXmUoeEY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"It was our first local food experience in Larnaca, and it was good

It’s a great restaurant, little bit hit and not air conditioned , so think to go at night in summer!

The lamb liver dish was the best, have seen better Kleftiko dish but this one was okay

All in all was good","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOERVyssHL_-WJOLehxTphlj-E2UVpRsicYOtSh"],"When":"2024-6-20"},{"Name":"Vasil Smurf","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKW24I7nUXZu1EebjoQXox9vHJk_Xc9BNZCLDC3t9N-DAlXqw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very nice restaurant with traditional local food. There are vegetarian options. However, this place could be strongly recommended for true meat lovers.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMSORxiWiEfcf15B7u1yw_b85XCsOH0XRxXYzH7"],"When":"2024-9-24"},{"Name":"Jamie Leech","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLirEnMfZnSmWFGleQsLf_5Lkgbhj6ocpR1-kuzNe2yDIj-Aw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very traditional Greek restaurant. You won't be disappointed. Food was lovely and came out in big portions. Nice view by the sea and indoor with air con.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO3l06kVymraBnN-DxyL1vfrV1w2HEezI8eJeoK"],"When":"2024-9-3"},{"Name":"gabriel micu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUfgYIcygnxUNk-dJi4hRSno7nnBaBZB6aoB3U3F9HNlbfaZtoO=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This family run tavern is the perfect place to enjoy delicious traditional Cyprus food, sitting on the large terrace right on the sea shore. Most of the customers are locals dining with their families so it's a clue that the food and the environment are genuine.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMG3QaBw-juBr5ZAD9j6gT8lLPL45bhLvP4X8-M"],"When":"2024-6-11"},{"Name":"Maryna Biletska","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWf9giaWHwokfDRFrDU8H5R7ftOoW8vbB0_xNdni-SDwuwXx1I=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"A place with a nice view of the sea. Wait at least 20 minutes for starters, main dishes came in 40 minutes.  The portions are large, but there were more bones in the meat than meat. The ravioli were mediocre. The bread wasn’t tasty. There are plenty of waiters, but if you start calling they won't notice you.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPWK6yoWsOjsQv6l6R5FD9Hy_QDTsAwK1ppVF1l"],"When":"2024-6-9"},{"Name":"nava nava","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJsFlDVWyIp4yWGBUGkcq37RcbX6yNX5vOGkQD4N4HHU2S1Qw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"A tourist trap ! Using the nice spot near the sea, they serve disappointing food with a terrible service. I came to try the Cyprus Kleftico. I got chunks of beef with potatoes, both were thrown on a plate with no taste. The unpleasant waiter ( he is in the pic) recommended to try the Pilaf, which was a kind of pasta with some ketchup....I couldn't eat the beef and paid leaving  the food behind. The waiter didn't even care, said they sell a lot , took the money and disappeared. He also made mistakes in the bill and was really unhappy that I have noticed ... Skip this place if you are hungry!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN2HbvegFUjl5rFYwS_Mj9gPj08_lZaVqFE35b7"],"When":"2024-8-27"},{"Name":"Learn English with KT","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXXGQ6sA3DT-87egAuLB7OQuy9Kyd38Zs1F6PNTq8li7r4k4dX0=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It is a beautiful restaurant with the views of the sea. The food is delicious and the atmosphere is excellent. I highly recommend this place. We had traditions Cypriot maze and they served a lot of food. It is enough for 4 people.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOFiQP4pKNzvr6CRFNyVV6TlasKvb6V4tejRQIF"],"When":"2024-6-24"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Alexandra Vladyko","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXUH5HyFC15l41pI86tlWtkildX3Cb_MxMPRC7smT5reBeWM5Dy=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The restaurant with Cypriot cuisine left a decent impression. The food was tasty, and the prices were quite affordable, which was a nice surprise. However, the cleanliness was a bit disappointing — there was noticeable dust on the chandeliers and walls, and the tables were sticky. On the positive side, the staff was friendly and provided good service. Overall, I’d give it a 4.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP6pkfpqLnsstF0zBgmA0gUDHXNzjbEg_nt71ix"],"When":"2024-9-30"},{"Name":"Noam Buchshrieber","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWe3VnDh1Ko9WY1OfzYbuUNd8Nrh69M9SggaN_Uxrebly5kh-z6FA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing food and such a nice little hidden garden! I had the tradition stew with potatoes and it was amazing!

Many options for both gluten free and vegetarian!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPFqLpWa_owkwGud4efTlIB8wTtxXgoJn0dkWIa"],"When":"2024-10-1"},{"Name":"Tania Klymets","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU_-J-koAzyXdZsjuFy0s8uUDORhg9z_3vMFv-x6e0sxGuuQswE=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It's really very tasty here. It’s very comfortable that all ingredients are written in menu with information about possible allergens.
- Greek salad was simple, taste, like we like.
- Lamb kebab was a little bit hard to chew, but the waiter proposed next time to order lamb chops instead.
- Beef stifado with vild rice was unbelievable. It’s definitely must to try.
- Lamb tsiagariasto with bulgur - the combination of very soft and tasty mean with little bit spicy bulgur, yummy.
- pasta with octopus - is very delicious.
- Traditional Cypriot desert - it was a little bit sweet for us, but it should be like this.

The menu is like a children's book with lots of pictures of the dishes and a good description. Couldn't help noticing :)

On weekends this restaurant is full of customers, especially at lunchtime, so the waiters are very busy and may not pay much attention to you. But if you come on a weekday, they will talk to you, discuss the weather and give you another dessert as a compliment from the establishment. At least that's how it was for us :)

The restaurant is located near Finikoudes.  On weekends, there are a lot of visitors here and everyone around enjoys the food.  It smells delicious in here.  On the summer terrace, the tables are almost all in the shade, so you will not be hot.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPNQdV4iaWdXyUX01TGaYZjlL1msVn5EqENYO1A"],"When":"2024-8-24"},{"Name":"Roberto Belchior","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX1Tz7leBrIOypVvifDeiSm8NPnYUI92In8S5CY5bOyUYm05oxlzg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"We had dinner there, based on comments from a blog. Service was slow but polite. Grilled food was good but not great. The main problems were a bad smell in the interior patio and the many cats around the tables begging for food. The place was almost empty on a late August tuesday evening.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNkDQSFAfMN5ZfK1apltjTgr-Aqs23oHz0q2nFr"],"When":"2024-8-27"},{"Name":"Abdulkarim ALZarouni","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKQJgdzDE156WUg6tBdt5eysv893GqjG8rF0jr8etMZaZE5Lw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Had a pleasant meal at the restaurant recently. The menu offered a variety of tasty choices, and each dish was better than expected. The decor, resembling an old-town beachside house, created a nice and inviting atmosphere. The food was quite good, and the service was solid, contributing to an overall enjoyable meal. Recommended for those looking for tasty Greek dishes in a relaxed setting with good service.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOHiAnIGTOILVDz2QzBaB6u0EBpSNQIH_dn9Vss"],"When":"2024-1-8"},{"Name":"Steven Gore","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKzXF_6VwTPyyALZ1_0FGlBaP1iPAIUBVGs0jBK-37ZMQ1-nA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Just arrived here for a few days and this is the first restaurant I’ve encountered and there are a lot round here!

This place is so nice the food is delicious and service great. Can’t wait to
Go back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPyKxwYALYLLIVO_kUT1j5xKudLSKm4fY7MrquH"],"When":"2024-2-26"},{"Name":"Aleksa Kartezhnikova","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjULbtaRBHL4G17WXoA_POnh_ctQnmMi-YxFonbFK5Li2Wjsm3ELEQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Good tavern in Larnaca with a traditional cypriot atmosphere! I ordered the grilled squid and I liked it! My husband ordered the stifado, a traditional Cypriot beef stew, which he also enjoyed. The beef was tender and flavorful.
The portions were generous. The atmosphere in the taverna was warm and welcoming. The staff was friendly☺️
The only downside was that there was no non-alcoholic beer available 😞 There was also only one coffee option available, which was Cypriot coffee.
Overall, we had a great experience at To Arxontikon ❤️","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMziADUN6b-Z7f5JQx-lB8d5ltMOJRPr8s9bkBA"],"When":"2024-2-10"},{"Name":"Klaudia Tyc","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXAu-SIhnM9CYO2A5MyWzCZ6uqo6x95CcQFt8r6qDisLNvMIMTNNQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I hoped this place would be a good choice for an evening dinner, but I was so disappointed.

The starter was tasty, but I imagined something different. The photos of dishes in menu didn’t represent what the guest receives. The cheese balls were so small and it would be better if they will be served with some sauce.

I also ordered a grilled squid and the staff had a mistake and gave a fired squid. I didn’t want to this one, and I had to wait longer for dish. Fortunately I was an only one guest who ordered on this time something to eat.

It wasn’t the best grilled squid in my life. There was a burning taste and sometimes it was rubbery..

Visited this restaurant was so disappointed and I excepted something different after a lot of good opinions.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNRVPAi7256sqgnfT3vgj8-BRvptTYp0r_FCgjD"],"When":"2024-1-15"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Katerina D","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX9WrJsbEkxjNDWxnJqBWh0O5_zIXYhv1xKifrgIMuFDSfWI80=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We enjoyed the food, place and atmosphere there 🫶

It’s not located on the very central street. If you do not know about the place, you can miss it.
(I found it as I found some reviews in the Internet before)

The food was great. Good portions, good meat and fish 🐟 👍

The team is nice too.

When we arrived there were a lot of free tables, but quickly they were fulfilled.

There are many cars there 😸 you can share some of your food with them 😁 they will remind you about it for sure))

Everything was great! I recommend everyone to come to this place. It feels traditional and very warm, cozy place ❤️","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMPssGpNdvXSVKT2mhhhSxincECwjJFaN0zRSM"],"When":"2024-9-7"},{"Name":"Kin W","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJYumqdDlxscW_tz5Eim7xkbrMiM1zkmcuboJTaD6TH-3Tg9Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A hidden away gem. You won't see this place by simply walking past, but it's worth a visit. The tables are set in a beautiful garden, offering an intimate dinner setting. It's very quiet, and the layout offers privacy. The staff are very quick and polite. The menu is Greek food and very good. While having your food, you'll be greeted by the local cats!

The only thing I'd change is to have more dairy free and meat free options. The green salad was delicious, but I'd change the dried cherries (I think they were cherries) for something less sour, such as dates. They'd compliment the dish more.

Very good prices for a central location. The barrel where wine was good, but I would have liked it cooler than how it was served.

This was my second time here, and I would definitely come back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipND8KSInDwP6uwI4_o21QMnWk_d-2TFSDIE0JJM"],"When":"2024-7-26"},{"Name":"Red Shining","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWYFEkUhmVYYVSrvw-uESbXRy8MjPav_jqRKm0GewZok8NmxtRK=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Our visit to Ithaki Garden Restaurant was an oddly strange experience. The grounds are lovely, with a nice garden setting, but we were the only ones dining there, which seemed to lead to our main issue—cats! There were cats everywhere, circling our legs and even jumping on the chairs. At one point, while trying to enjoy our meal, we had seven cats staring us down, which made things uncomfortable.

The food was okay, though the chips weren’t the best and were clearly cooked from frozen. Due to the situation with the cats, we couldn’t fully enjoy the meal. If you find yourself dining here and the restaurant is empty, eating inside might be a safer option.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO-JPqG0e0Fto68fKFupniEXLJIHfAGf91EUQcX"],"When":"2024-10-9"},{"Name":"Nir Meir","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKzPv5VA5SfoOuZ4Y7DCEUJAVR1F0lHLjEl_fdRe6FFo2ntSQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The best thing about this place is the atmosphere, it's in central location yet the street noise is not felt. Great good, we were looking for greek dishes and they have some of the traditional dishes served. Reasonable prices and nice staff","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPssvNJgkJrduPggCZvQAv4v5gV5Tencn30wpLz"],"When":"2024-8-18"},{"Name":"Hanna","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU2htEZJNdv3_C9-QzO3gA_TkTtuuHmRmUKkKbSQRcg5hlU-mO4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The best place for dinner in Larnaka.

Sitting in a real garden with those nice lights around, eating such delicious food and listening to a nice live music was like a magic.

We tried some traditional dishes and they were so well made. The meat tasted so good and juicy. From all the places we have been to in Cyprus, here is where it tasted the best. The same goes about the french fries. I don’t know what they do with it, but it is so yummy! Baklava was also delightful.

The waiters were very attentive and kind. The prices were reasonable.

Highly recommended!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOXb9T-E_0bETg_oSRkvXP-xKuWfW3sUD5o-kdE"],"When":"2024-8-20"},{"Name":"Violeta Minkova","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXBrhGRexUg-0O7WoWF_EaINpf5p8Vsnms2MW82_JZEVRnaXfD_Hg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Delicious food, especially grilled octopus. Nice atmosphere, good service. Didn’t like ekmek kataifi, really too sweet for my taste! Overall recommend the place but definitely need a reservation.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPcoWd29gh6MhFNAg13gFyX2PM5On61Op57GpsC"],"When":"2024-8-27"},{"Name":"Hisham H.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjViDLUBu8GukAS9SMd-w7NYlU5E18PIXt15z_MVGrkECBYpTO1a3w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing food and friendly service
We were a table of 6.
Feta Cheese with honey & sesame is amazing!!

Cheese saganaki also tasty!

Octopus, chicken souvlaki, and pork souvlaki were tasty!

And grand finale with Ekmek Kataifi and Baklava.

It was raining so we couldn't sit outside in their nice outdoor seating","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPWtiDlSNEOa_i2qP_zMqte8B7cexdhqwSpWMHx"],"When":"2024-9-22"},{"Name":"Sarah Spaeth","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUsjddgVR-lI2rLdqe7Q2-DNjYNycMYC7yT5uCRQuIdqseRj40=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great food! Please try the beef Orzo - it was so good! We had fried zucchini balls as the appetiser, as well as the garden salad. We also ordered two more main dishes with beef and lamb. We ended the meal with baklava. Our waitress was very friendly","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPHDcM2ovW_j2c8S0A5tcC_W93Iyv9pj16ipjiN"],"When":"2024-3-25"}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Oren G.Golan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocINcM4YiKlY3YmJ73U6PmiEb0N8_Z_NfMY9cHu5WXbCTw2R6w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A restaurant with a stunning first-row view of the sea, offering delicious food presented beautifully. Don't miss out on the eggplant salad with cheese and the excellent hummus – it's a must-try!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPHwju-TGT7peLDnduS0AIiswvRE59Vdu_SMEyz"],"When":"2024-10-2"},{"Name":"Alice S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIC43mp1WgSm9ycg5Xu77YmYd_BQ0bCIts_R6oC13xkdQOkTA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great atmosphere, kind and skilled staff, incredible food! I've never had hummus, beef or baklava like this before in my life. Amazing coffee too.\n\nWe loved everything we got so far: beef steak (Lahma something, sorry forgot the name), hummus, the white dip- like starter, wine leaf rolls, beans, baklava.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMQ_aD_5zQbNml43nXsyNh6alK_VnCwg1QsXguD"],"When":"2024-6-6"},{"Name":"Rony Ishak","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLMqRbrapOTUBd070VF6as9ErvDClj4OlVB7AZLBVgBj3TEdA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Delicious and authentic Lebanese food! One of the best in Cyprus! The staff was great as well. Highly recommend it!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNJlx_kiyaBRQy2rfmXvJlEMxc2h1l6VTHAH7lX"],"When":"2024-9-7"},{"Name":"Tomislav Perišić","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUPn09w46oYJD7O1dvX5IB9_sH83OVWTJZZDlHd2wIU5bDhN41y=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Absolutely amazing place! If you like Lebanese/Arabic kitchen, this is a place to go! We ordered vegeterian platter for 2, you get so much of everything, couldn't finish the platter, whatever you try tastes better than previous dish. Drink selection is great too, wines, coctails, spirits and some traditional beverages such as arak or ouzo. Also, staff is very friendly and kind. Atmosphere is calm and relaxing.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPa9oy4WTNt47LXvCEMXjsR_-jOyzyXsL4_SdOt"],"When":"2024-9-4"},{"Name":"Micky Gilmore","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIqHpmgJIX5blEBnXr_bMspWPMSM7jm30FJ5DaMzoINFu9bKw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Would advise U to make a reservation it's that good, wow!! Beautiful Lebanese food  so well presented and served, absolute 5⭐ dining experience, highly recommended","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMMsmezratBRlv1SbQFH0-JAFSf32CyDZTZtd9P"],"When":"2024-8-29"},{"Name":"Teofil Farkas","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWYcRMWlZOoJ9fpr3H20U2enHfCLB3zt4CIWSZChMixU2SZMPtj=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The best Lebanese food I have ever tasted. The place is very cozy, beautiful view to the beach. And the service is very fast and amazing.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMGZaPOBzGIiMWEvM7rl4L_AHa5Iu3N419lb6Ab"],"When":"2024-8-29"},{"Name":"Devin Ambron","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX2KWj_L07kxZPU_ME-tOSML1pOK_1dywsXsQVW4QGMRzq9zcU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Maqam Al-Sultan Restaurant was a delightful culinary experience. The vegetarian mezze left me stuffed and happy, an absolute love story with Lebanese food. Every dish was dreamy, simply the best. The mocktails were refreshing and perfectly complemented the meal. The hummus was unreal, so creamy and flavorful. And the tabbouleh? Get outta here, it was so good! Highly recommend this place for an unforgettable taste of Lebanon.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMBpi8Q6ZMb5VaxIG-6R_Ef6DVkECflUnyxANc"],"When":"2024-5-29"},{"Name":"Franciele Moreira","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVWegpxxEmpU5PN65xBJhc_vVx9YMvvwqA44WoXtCY_8jwUkfH2RA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I absolutely love the food there! I super recommend the hummus with shawarma and pine nuts","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNZTnK7H-zbP6UaFBLdHtZ7mRGbXE_XiX7eG5kk"],"When":"2024-9-6"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Olga Kozlitina","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWwdgfikPfR24O6t5izBhjnU_KChVhDn20j6yRfGEYkF0HQNSNq=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"The restaurant itself looks expensive and nice, but after you sit down, the waiters are trying to advise you only the expensive dishes, that makes you fell like a fool. Very sticky tables. The waiter spill out the wine and never thought to wipe it out :(  the octopus was almost 20 euros, we thought we gonna get much more for this price. The garnish on a side is very poor, my potato was sour in taste and vegetables are just Bonduelle boiled in water, without even a salt. VERY BAD EXPERIENCE.
When I tried to give a review to waiter, he was to shut us out, that was very disappointing :(","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPkn29R5eNbyNyQA4O22d7O0HUEaxodSkf5tUDk"],"When":"2024-5-18"},{"Name":"mj soc","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJZ2f1kRwbB9x7dHO2DsyvQALt7o0OVQlu4DnwLB0IWpty83A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We went 5 people and Ordered a Refreshing Mango Salad, a tasty Fish Soup and also some Sushi from the Uni Sushi next door.
Love that we could order from both Restaurants. We also ordered Rolls that had a Fantastic presentation on a smoking bowl...
The Pork Ramen was perfect 👌 exactly how a Ramen should be, even with the easy egg.
The Grilled Seabass was Juicy and the Spaghetti Bolognese was great.
But the Star of the Night was the Beef Steak Diane...
It's the Best Steak Diane I ever tried...
The food portions were Big and definitely Value for Money...

The Staff was friendly also...

Would definitely go back soon to try some more items...","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNJvouN6Ok267Hy4yRcPC0VIbt7FgFgVKEyLIGG"],"When":"2024-8-15"},{"Name":"Jamie Ward","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUmvzMxJs3WcgtoHbfIB3qxbSHolOQ1qk6K7pcehi_q2AXGl-AD=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Booking is advised.
Found along the front it has great views.
It does get very busy.
Service was fast, and we had the nicest steak in larnaca here.
The portions are very big too.
Definitely recommended!

The cheesecake was delicious!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNLsuvRwvN4NUQp2ebZFBJYM5KodQcnEqZvypLO"],"When":"2024-3-28"},{"Name":"Hüseyin Kaleci","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUgLnxHsdst3ZoBuFsQMaIv7X5SsakWOy5JlmbGGIyYcX3zE2PB=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Good staff: They are interested with us well.
Friendly owner he is smiles and ask many time if everything is ok
Fresh tasty fishes sea bream was good fries were tasty especially potatoes was very delicious and crispy. Mezzes good enough . Only i don't like the mussels it was very inspid  maybe more spice or sauces needs. And finally after bill they gave us a shot for drink they tell this is cyprus spirit i think it was commandaria wine but im not sure in brief we are happy this was a good memories about larnaka thanks","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNQ0XC03qFnbptsXgAU5sC8mMFUHdoj-vCbp5ky"],"When":"2024-4-28"},{"Name":"Anna May","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVvkKVVPvFLFaxGyFcEnpxdOqFlkFLkWrJ9Hg44d0RvCIytly6o=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place is fantastic! We loved it so much! We usually come here to eat musaka and, to be honest, I have never tried such a delicious musaka before. The house vine is also tasty. And the prices are fine! We loved it! Definitely are coming back","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMSTEmlBZ6xyDI3GRKlEXT4xa3zXnpzoPLzyfmU"],"When":"2024-7-29"},{"Name":"Bogdan Radu Feier","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXRQ0ea-LKvHXO-WmEONM5N7cLDtnZfEZl5sGAX8u9e0oMhGK1r=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Good food! Good prices! Excelent services! The only place i vizited 3 times during my stay.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNuB3dDbYhL_EgAqMMa_gNO8dlZfiEutpLhb0WS"],"When":"2024-5-10"},{"Name":"Jadd Mustafa","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLqSyKHBk2ddc3i7FEpktzeY80wtRrlKMO5BxeMixyR5yAYqhA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Came in because the service, not only the price. Restraunt has good servers and welcoming me in, or else I would have ate next door! Shout out to young man with tattoos for making me feel like I chose the right place to eat!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNMzSMOCMd79xM6OTs9e0o09liVl1I3KVlcTNT2"],"When":"2024-4-29"},{"Name":"Mohammed Yasin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXvDeME3kkL5uC99WYnmR430ENYsWUkR_qY1XdWsjDyAeKQl1xe=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place is very nice. I loved the view. The food was amazing and reasonably priced. It was a very big proportion and very very tasty. Highly recommended.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNbC1fMIbMA0s0tUuoRNy2rTDMuLYyhduds8kih"],"When":"2024-6-7"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"J. Alberto Altamirano","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK2qj-8stLGwdsLhVVHI4KbLTmSj71s0gGQPt2R0h5-F0bVGEI=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Alasia? One word: SENSATIONAL! The mousaka, a local legend for a reason. Fresh seafood platter - like diving into the Med itself. Owners treat you like family. Perfect lunch spot with a view and in one of the most beautiful and best preserved houses in town. Halloumi ravioli - don't miss it, unique and delicious.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNtiwM2qYoOdGUrLgtRS0-nOpEdWkqkOYBeQysh"],"When":"2024-7-13"},{"Name":"Isidora M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUMHtebb6MTUiZf7btdzvM_Lp6C-tg_Rs3JiM34Q02Wif9dngpL=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing place. Food is very tasty and you get the value for the money!

Portion are big so you will not leave the restaurant hungru.

Great place overall!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPidNxGMKjHV1cgQAgrrHFzUUj9hikoDmeOfZc-"],"When":"2024-9-8"},{"Name":"Christaki","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWUxSTBcTl6R14yeuDW4TTjfMXEK9GJEEjja6oVHLvBFD8--TaN=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Came here for the koupes, pourekia and siamisi. Best koupes I’ve ever tasted! Pourekia were delicious mix of sweet and savoury 🤌","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPxqojK-ZlfIk5MM88aOeB4Iv0lncuT7NZlwb5h"],"When":"2024-10-1"},{"Name":"Mer Tl","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLkNCYViom8Gd3JU6nqUwFawdrC4999yu1bZxQMct97zuCs3Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Alasia Restaurant: Larnaca's Hidden Gem for Cypriot Cuisine and Ocean Views!

Alasia Restaurant in Larnaca isn't just a meal, it's a delightful adventure for your senses. Nestled on the beachfront, this charming establishment boasts breathtaking views and a menu that sings of Cyprus' culinary soul.

Their mousaka is a local legend, and for good reason. Each bite bursts with flavor, easily ranking it among the best I've had in Cyprus. But don't miss the handmade halloumi ravioli - a unique and delightful expression of their culinary artistry. And for seafood aficionados, the platter is a must-try. The fish is shockingly fresh, as if it leaped straight from the ocean moments before landing on your plate.

But what truly sets Alasia apart is the exceptional service. The owners, who were also hosting during my visit, take genuine pride in their establishment. Their warmth and attentiveness make you feel like a valued guest, ensuring your comfort and enjoyment throughout your meal.

If you're looking for a memorable dining experience in Larnaca, look no further than Alasia Restaurant. It's a hidden gem that combines exceptional food, a stunning setting, and impeccable service. Trust me, you won't regret following this recommendation, which I bet you'll re-do!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO0DMBp1LByaOvuQMgSnM0nsBBsopKY5xdGiUXP"],"When":"2024-7-13"},{"Name":"Elitsa Petkova","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVTQVRGFhl8pWEiHMbdDXkfIeGEKaLMC_9QnFWTt3eQmr6h0NeiEg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had a great time at Alasia. The server was very attentive and the lamb was literally melting in my mouth. Highly recommend, I'll definitely come back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMRb2SX5lffWL6UUdQS-fCNq4E_9KuATymTJLF4"],"When":"2024-8-13"},{"Name":"Jasper Krukkert","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKV-62-K_RcK8E3a1aiTrO1S0fylwnNuBCWeYQ104d5dY6J_Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great food, great service, great prices.

What else is there to say? Enjoy your dinner!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN4pHqq7rauH5xaTxS-ydQROEv8EhfGXK2uPz0g"],"When":"2024-8-22"},{"Name":"A. Rusu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVnIQqaa4em2jauuWXTfkgt-TulwonJDY-s8lFUlWBGAAvJrkw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The food was really tasty and in my opinion affordable in comparison to other restaurants around. The waiters were polite and fast with the food and drinks, even though some were complicated and took more time to prepare like the grill mix, which was delicious and fulfilling. The haloumi ravioli were also surprisingly tasty for what i expected.
We also got a dessert on the house which was a wonderful surprise ✌️","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPu74sqIa9N_7r_XE3KsnUnrHdbowgJEDbo3lg"],"When":"2024-1-2"},{"Name":"Radovan Bahna","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWe2Jwkbll6lnmbEna0pTCq5o161jTW3s1GWaAhIpGkx8rhIbdA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very tasty food, charmante Ambiente. Service polite, but a bit confused 😉","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPVH8SeuJr-epfolnDzC_CX9fDveqSJxPPBspH3"],"When":"2024-7-14"}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Szymon K","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUObrlpBFKa48GcoOqt56rrCFGWTBsnqXnG2m_m2iGsW2bBGcXs=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The best dinner of my holiday, for sure. The food was delicious! I highly recommend the Cypriot and Mexican platters, but make sure you're hungry when ordering because the portions are huge. The atmosphere is fantastic—the restaurant is right by the sea and beautifully arranged to create a great vibe. On top of that, the service was outstanding—friendly, attentive, and made the experience even more enjoyable. :)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOP5U3Ci38rYtLEhfF721BFi1uXmwOgdpgUSbAT"],"When":"2024-9-23"},{"Name":"Tomislav Perišić","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUPn09w46oYJD7O1dvX5IB9_sH83OVWTJZZDlHd2wIU5bDhN41y=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Lovely place, the food is really great! Good margaritas and cocktils. We visited twice, I had Cyprus and Mexican platter and both were absolutely amazing!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPuEcJJI8T79934qlqK3xk-bfnZgTYZtfrX8tKe"],"When":"2024-9-8"},{"Name":"•Nik a•","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKGiEUz3c3Sh4Un32xETLMtpFqjLUuNf_xcF-bLe4VSFwNsEw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"amazing, friendly and really helpful bartenders. we have been served really quickly and the atmosphere here is really amazing. the margaritas and the food are delicious. cant wait to come back soon🍸","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMFzXiRSm77nvhZndBVtikb9UbKsUjAeUTr5_5k"],"When":"2024-7-12"},{"Name":"Ewe Lka","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI12WtZH419eccydZQvBevU5mmWU6j0UhVysLl2zXQN-Wcs-A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Highly recommend this restaurant!\nVery delicious Mexican food ! I was obsessed with Beef Burrito 🌯 Chicken quesadilla also was amazing ! Service is nice! Thank you very much! Will miss this burrito 😅","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO6-KSm1TrwK0UYr10YAW6LG2ZZ8P7GavJM-sYc"],"When":"2024-10-3"},{"Name":"emila ducky","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU3wZb65go1MWWhncGPsppc5jF2Cem_b2gn-fmlXSNsQaaeFq8mnQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Best margaritas in the area!! Many flavours, fast service. Worth visit, we highly recommend, polecamy :) if you nearby Royal Ris - come for some drinks","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOVpNpZ6WdYvdvf8ybpBPlL9OPCo6Ytk8rCarWq"],"When":"2024-9-12"},{"Name":"Réka Prigyeni","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXEOOQJIlzDC0QB_ifYEuJ2ERrUsVDbBho00nb1Qwdle47ANnqE=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Paris and Kyri were very friendly and helpful, but all of the waiters were nice to us. Food was delicious. The restaurant has a really good vibe and amazing music.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOo58ImhatdKE-wX3Btg3Hwb8ylMCke5_RpZoIE"],"When":"2024-7-13"},{"Name":"Timea Juhász","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIUYVChDiy2UptYUClwpPuPafP4zWPisWgUQohgOSPZx0JicQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The food was really good, the place has an amazing vibe with good music. Waiters are very friendly, helpful and the cocktails are strong and tasty.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPgW96HaIusP7Oca7To2LHrA5qKjJmeiClDqjn7"],"When":"2024-7-13"},{"Name":"Arttu Elomaa","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJwKkM6oNe9t4H1Us0UwZqc0TVfirBUYOr-u7NoruLaK-HM2w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The best margaritas in Cyprus. You must try!! The service is fantastic. Atmosphere is out of this world","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPWO9BhwwPNdZjR-eg_vMPZuqbspizHyzfP4NM4"],"When":"2024-9-20"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Basilian","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUy7ljvlUPq38TaVvHP-0AOB3-wb5IQpb_yImOTefS6BCGJp7P6=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Lovely fish restaurant over looking the marina. The staff were excellent and the service fast. We had the baby squid, octopus both cooked on the grill and the whitebait. The squid and octopus were slightly overcooked but that’s what sometimes happens when cooking on an open flame. What I did like was the fridge by the entrance were you could see all the raw fish on display.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMAPGWdHmZqhQIDefLcL146hyTP2DyeRf81Q2WX"],"When":"2024-9-21"},{"Name":"Review It","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVBBC4cjruh8NY4Luh8wfjL5iJ1kWLEzYSuuQkhW1mErkjfE5Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The fish was absolutely fantastic! We opted for the fish meze, and the variety and quantity of dishes were incredible!
Everything was Fresh! We ate until we were completely stuffed. The only downside was the chips — they were a bit undercooked and could have had a few more minutes in the fryer. Still, they were tasty, and we ate them anyway. Haha!
Despite it being a Monday, the restaurant was bustling with people, which speaks volumes about its popularity. The service was attentive and friendly, making us feel right at home. The warm, inviting atmosphere added to the overall experience. We were thoroughly impressed and would definitely return for another delicious meal.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPf4qZST-MUqpCChciSBXA4zsqL3wrWW22YWMh0"],"When":"2024-8-20"},{"Name":"J A","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLWuWqE0CCCtkmtRC85ny54A7MAW535UukP47QUeftrlRhPPA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Excellent experience. Fresh seafood and really fast service. A lot of locals and a typical Greek Cypriot experience. Get the mezze and you’ll be bombarded with an endless supply of fresh seafood cooked to perfection. Parking space in front of the restaurant as well. Thank you so much ++","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMw8Fkdrl18fKLhzUXnNtb2qzbX1YIQj4Pk8LM3"],"When":"2024-8-14"},{"Name":"Hannah","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocImt4iW2NMcIImQXniRUnQBDhYrZ9cxmQ4QEP_drMINdByGn2k=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"This place is a tourist trap! The fish were definitely frozen, the octopus was overcooked and rubbery, and even the French fries were undercooked!! It’s a shame because it’s a fantastic location by the fishermen’s wharf. It really sucks because they can do much better with this location. Also, it’s very pricey for what they offer. Such a disappointment.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPYjqO2wyvjwrTFn3RlJ5efSvLS7o0b9NEysLpZ"],"When":"2024-5-8"},{"Name":"caren rizk","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKUVAWolBfTd3SVX_JLIOOvX9qVj-Ae7CfDSW_NGZp4uMGc7Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Excellent food and service! The fish is delicious and Thomas is an excellent staff he made sure that I am enjoying my meal. Highly recommended.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNRJFMCoy8xVNb4QD96lhaqJ68gp6nW45Fu1pIf"],"When":"2024-7-30"},{"Name":"Camelia Mocodean","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWmOCTAjissk8Zx25wbc5HxuqVBYVL6EjouxPlYNLAPILdRyJfI=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Such an amazing place!
The food was great, fresh, and we were surprised by the size of the portions.
Although we went on a packed Friday evening, the stuff was wonderful, although they were running around and extremely busy. I have never seen such polite and nice waiters in such a crowded place!
If you land in Larnaca, you must try this place!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNGXdmRyVkoPpxtv6c4Ehp7BXIG4y9PV2srsEL5"],"When":"2024-4-6"},{"Name":"Pam Craig","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU2NrKRr2VGZ5GlmF8k1RYmqCP2KRLlefgefttWoq_cLbSjdD_5=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Myself and 2 friends went there on Valentine's Day and were nervous that we wouldn't be able to get a table but they were happy to have us and it was fantastic!

We ordered the fish meze for 2 people which was so much food that the 3 of us still couldn't finish it - everything was excellent!

I really had a wonderful time and would definitely recommend","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMcLa7ICzuQL8lHyDZnQu3HzKRpHQVVVh8gCJK-"],"When":"2024-2-15"},{"Name":"Demetris Michael","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ3RgtDnMBz0kNgvf_nUR_QFQX2ucNJ45VWc0TFLV1RBl-7Dg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great food and atmosphere. A very popular place with locals and tourists.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMr07UwgvKdy10fMx6kAVkYwYCzBO_wL1VGHwck"],"When":"2024-8-11"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"anna feann","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL2TZzP2Yjn5kiG2c7S2RwyiIo2BcENe84srh4UWre9JOOg2A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great atmosphere, perfect place to get a nice meal any time of the day. Friendly staff and delicious recipes. We actually came back for more","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMpyBzoS8wJgwafTX9qAqb1tnpvboNPu8Lv1lYZ"],"When":"2024-7-22"},{"Name":"סיגל עזר","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ5_3B1_Qemopl7_YEgRZUNg7puVN-ziTdegDA2J9t1-watsw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Unfortunately we had dinner at Marzano at our last night in Larnaca, wish we had found this amazing place earlier!!!!
Everything we ate was so good!
The Hawaiian pizza and banoffee pie were delicious!
The manager is so kind, gentle and warm.
Above all, the prices are reasonable and achievable","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP65euytLlLwUj6Pto54Dd8f2Y9_vlGk8DMaxlL"],"When":"2024-9-9"},{"Name":"Marika Harris","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVZCDhpFbK9GK7ow3SsNaUGPDUNfqyIXLXXJL522IMP1c6J0J4keQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We accidentally discovered this beautiful Italian restaurant. The staff was welcoming and so attentive. The food was delicious. My partner had lasagne and it was so fresh and mouthwatering. The seafood skewers with rice and veg were so good. They had great wines there too to perfectly accompany each dish finishing the night with Limoncello. If you love Italian food, this place is a must visit in Larnaca. In terms of price, it depends what dish you choose. I think that prices are reasonable for what you choose. We will plan to visit it again for sure!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNmeRtdePtzInYfdcGUqnNKvSipX06O9428vgGk"],"When":"2024-9-8"},{"Name":"Panayiotis JT","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUhIe_Kqk4M_NtyxgA8aqoITAvixaITKdfycQ8kLg7AxqVNNs6i=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Good food, we were a group of 13 people, so we had to wait for eveyone to arrive hence the delay in ordering. The food was great. The atmosphere was good especially if you wanted to have a chat with your neighbour. Parking is a little ways off across the street in the social insurance building. Overall a good experience and most of all tasty food. Will be back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMjxhLIr0snCwKINc52wxRbNZr5LmojSV4C77BO"],"When":"2024-3-28"},{"Name":"Yevgeni Braverman","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKS8G9liUKJPdG0uHsauU4pwthpa-4h5RbVAQEnpL6-iG0VxQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great Italian restaurant with excellent service and athmosphere. Besides the food and drinks they a variety of gluten free dishes.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN9IdrgnW1AiN_B1OkTDa83NRUfvzmraRlAHApa"],"When":"2024-8-28"},{"Name":"Amr Dulaimi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXWyFHqRTkXbQRxGoOBPLEsrCJhIpy1bw5v8WD5WffR0D-yN2YQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We had dinner, the service was good and the food was good in terms of taste and quality, their cocktails are also nice","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNFNy5s4FaQHLC8_Yyp_YRc89z_t93fnLvDPRrL"],"When":"2024-7-1"},{"Name":"Saar Yogev (saarocker)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU0h5tnlJ8Rrhv-eNG86DKHKZvBoWGTyywgEVeUkJvdFmOpCAMx=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great restaurant in all aspects. Delicious and varied Italian food, very reasonable prices and even a full fasting menu, which is great for vegans.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMXR4B_u7kPIhxq-k9jMDjfC71BdJSnjXRbAHO0"],"When":"2024-6-14"},{"Name":"Alina Morozova","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVutDSU-ylxgJwwTMyhQ1T6mIQ4hkrpHxaDWApMIVEXB6hprfJN=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Gorgeous restaurant with amazingly delicious food, friendly staff and lovely atmosphere. We had our last dinner here and it was awesome. Highly recommended!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOPWoG_zrev_1h1x8RQ0zlSjpVfA5yYtrhLFflp"],"When":"2024-2-10"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"George L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWX0IhTtwWsH8aLxwl7blel3oxJfCndsqwb2ZMQB4btDzDK5HK4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The waiter was friendly, and they offer a wide variety of food with good portion sizes. The creative salad ingredients were a delightful surprise, and the octopus was soft, tender, and well marinated. Highly recommend this place!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMXi6Zw_I1KBXUL_DntRIlqI-Bj_EAaUBqL0DIn"],"When":"2024-5-31"},{"Name":"Joe Grohl","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWdP-jhteDhCUdDbPBbr2zFjOcUEW_0uEMDrmSFFiYQz-t2tAY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Just had a lovely meal here after a long day travelling to Paphos and back. I opted for the salmon pappardelle, which was delicious, my friend had a beautifully presented prawn risotto, and the limoncello spritz was so good I had to get a second. Very tasty bread too!

The restaurant itself was very nice. Bright inside, low lighting on the terrace, and spacious throughout, with chilled music on the speakers. Perfect place to relax after an exhausting day.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNbdkr75ctP8g_1-STBE6YdqxSnh5TZhd151g57"],"When":"2024-10-3"},{"Name":"Tatsi Ana","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKo4myYgmm6ojYqM2gnsQvsfihuuMCWQhNx2zCrd8rTXw3Hxg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Food ok, but nothing special. Out of 3 dishes we ordered the non-seafood one (spinach-ricotta ravioli) was the best. The other 2 (ceviche and grilled octopus) were nothing special. Nice presentation, however. Desserts are definitely a highlight. Highly recommend lemon tart.
Otherwise, beautiful and relaxing location before catching a flight from the Larnaka airport.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPX4b1bsSTKmzP87jWMrG9HujWTiFgG8yZkRQyw"],"When":"2024-5-15"},{"Name":"Nectaria Ioannou","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXoJC_6mP0gEvdP5jvJ0K3PjFXtcYnaXiAkYwfhONs5vzrzl7Lo=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We visited a few times already and every time we were satisfied with the food, taste and atmosphere. Is a bit pricey but is worth it!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO_VRiAfiS3ZfmlvAk6Oj7d75JGZTyKc5OPZ7c3"],"When":"2024-8-11"},{"Name":"Laia Vizcaino","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXmZMxoprsEkOAzCVINB79jXIt0-2DRTGkhrb6NYrhfUIyhj7Ur1g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"The place was alright, nothing extraordinary. The cuttlefish didn't impress me much. My friends really enjoyed everything. The desserts, on the other hand, were a blessing. We tried 3 of the cakes and they were amazing. The rest didn't appeal to me, but my two friends enjoyed it. They even drank up the oil. Please, if you go, save room for desserts ;) Also the ceviche was AMAZING.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN-HT9Pmzk3qgRvMZvMuhQMpOyqO1_BNOqIS69A"],"When":"2024-2-29"},{"Name":"Andrea","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXx3JKtkVDHzqjA-o11dFLcptahIWAxJTYsMPHCPm29hJQTFFLX=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"We just order deserts and Sangria. The desert was way too sweet. I never eat that tiramisu what was that sweet, the biscuite was completly dry in it. I could not even eat the whole desert. Dont recommend the Tiramisu at all.
The service is okay.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOsWwd_aJPqWZ-WuAX70r8KuDMKP5KdZv6S5LI4"],"When":"2024-7-27"},{"Name":"RJS","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWznib9H8gSPSsjv2xGn02k3epA45aSc2ykS7oLvUDP6tzpZN0GKw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"When it comes to seafood dining in Larnaca, AlMar Fish Restaurants in Mackenzie stands out as a top destination. As a seafood aficionado, it has become one of my favorite spots in the city, never failing to deliver an exceptional dining experience.

From the moment you step through the doors, you're greeted with warm hospitality and a welcoming atmosphere. The food here is nothing short of exquisite, consistently exceeding expectations with each visit. Whether you're craving the succulent grilled octopus or the freshness of their oysters, every dish is a testament to the restaurant's commitment to quality.

One cannot overlook the delightful aroma and taste of their homemade bread, which perfectly complements the seafood fare. It's evident that the team at AlMare Fish takes pride in their craft, ensuring that every aspect of the dining experience is executed flawlessly.

In addition to the delectable cuisine, the service here is impeccable, further enhancing the overall dining pleasure. It's no wonder that this restaurant has become a must-visit destination for both locals and tourists alike.

If you find yourself in Larnaca, don't miss the opportunity to savor the culinary delights offered at Al Mate Fish Restaurants.

Bravo to the entire team for consistently delivering excellence on every plate.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNfxVy5oBCBBmXN3P5pAgmOq6ptayUIzrA6tjdq"],"When":"2023-7-21"},{"Name":"Joe Harari","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKwxERKY1jpEBegSNZgwGDc3VOPxMi3vyG_rb_VcASo4Gbe7Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We had a lovely meal here. The staff were amazing and really attentive. Our meal was well presented and served at a relaxed pace. We had a small issue with our cocktails, but this was resolved quickly and professionally by our waiter. This is a high quality venue right on the beach. Highly recommend the crab and prawn parcels and the grilled sea bream was perfectly cooked with a lovely crispy skin and a gentle charcoal flavour.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMo5-w73AfpmnYIiaw8odCmUFA58LM1esnvoVCC"],"When":"2023-9-8"}]
