user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Adrian Razvan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLTcHPJOWtQZIcUqV2FbhmcFd-tO3XMSAWdzxhTN588w0mYiA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recently had the pleasure of dining at this restaurant and it was one of the most authentic culinary experiences I’ve ever had. I tried the Meze, and it was absolutely delicious, offering a true taste of traditional flavors.

The restaurant itself has an amazing atmosphere, full of life, with vibrant live music that enhances the dining experience. It’s a family-run business, and you can really feel the warmth and care in both the service and the food.

Highly recommend this spot for anyone looking for a memorable meal!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPRPYYb7Vw9Bh6-DDZokNsEs3c3UzMhMgYYOpk4"],"When":"2024-9-17"},{"Name":"Alex Collins Alonso","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXDTQ0CNK3WbAFi0TAr363s2RqMvwAJ8DbxT9XR9D4VhNqqXmeK=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"World class flavours. The dips are insanely good and the grilled flavours in the meats is truly special. As well as the vibes and good atmosphere. If you’re a tourist and seeing this review, look no further and just come you will not regret it.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMgSbvXOWJVBSEIwXiwZ_7reIuCE_543Kf2aemH"],"When":"2024-10-3"},{"Name":"Marta Slavuj","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ-i4jvo8Pnth9agcslUA8vAUSYbUgPHbPnXFEWUapoRYlTwQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It was the best meal we had in a while, everything was perfect.
We ate mezze.
It was so delicious we couldn’t take all the photos.
Waiters are so kind and nice.
We definitely come back soon!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM76oMRvSTgkr0T-EjB6rRk0L5Tkri66zM8GVAc"],"When":"2024-9-25"},{"Name":"Maria Piponides","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKAubp2WhB3EdY8OTxo-e4QjiLXBrz6C_hEYg5QzW62lTUMug=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Loved the food, service, authenticity, pretty lanterns lit up the stairs. Only restaurant in Cyprus so far that gave us baby plate/cup, which was so lovely. We managed to catch a bit of the music before taking our little one to bed.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM2uYXNA5DLssgiEtK49KXeRZKBomj3orTrWOX-"],"When":"2024-9-21"},{"Name":"Melissa Hatzi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUCkTdGsfhxm9CCqFWGTWPE_oI93MPSK1jTc7eOhBX_zQYBycQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"If you're looking for a picturesque spot that’s as lovely as a postcard, To Kazani might fit the bill! We dove into their set meze for 23 euro a head we got about 20 dishes or so. But honestly, most were average and the meat was dry (probably recooked!)

The highlight was the lamb's brains—who knew I’d be raving about that? 😅 On the flip side, my taste buds were left high and dry as we waited ages for drinks. And if you’re a baklava lover, you’re in luck, but I had to sit that one out.

Just remember, it’s a bit of a drive with nothing else around, so bring your thirst and maybe a good book for the wait! 🍽️🚗","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP4EOi7HHlRxzYnUWeHvsGteo5mVzci09pZT-9v"],"When":"2024-8-25"},{"Name":"Harry Altamont","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIXXTkUu39Kkpschs7eM6QQTPWWUe3AE3e4BX8rDRVRhJG_2g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Wow. One of the best meals we’ve ever eaten in Cyprus (coming from a British Cypriot). Kazani is an old traditional Cypriot home that has been converted into a family run restaurant-taverna in the village of Aradippou, not far from Larnakas. We were blown away by the service of our waitress (who was also the daughter of the owner) and by the quality of the fresh homemade food prepared by her brother. She gave us some brain teaser game-puzzles to complete while we were finishing our drinks and chatting — hilarious watching the table next to us try to figure them out after us. Felt very homely and chill. If you’re staying nearby this place is not worth missing out on. We noticed a good amount of locals (a universally good sign) but also many tourists which made us feel very proud that they experienced true Cypriot food and hospitality. The owner is very visible and regularly walked around the restaurant to check on his guests. He even invited us for a coffee on his veranda back at his home. 10/10 recommend. We were 4 people and ordered meat mezze for 3, we even managed to take some home with us. The fact you can look around upstairs and get a snapshot of Cyprus life in the days of old is a really nice touch. Also my KEO beer was the coldest I’ve ever had in this country - they have a special beer fridge was just sublime. Sitting outside is definitely preferable on a hot summers evening and we were told it’s busy most days, so you must call to book.. If they’re full ask to go on their cancellation list which is how we managed to get a last minute table (on a Monday night).","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMkYVGfj5dwIVXF45S8sHk0FxBmFoWx3Bp1oXs_"],"When":"2024-9-18"},{"Name":"Nadia Khalil","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXBdcCUB-A2FVSTUdmmvlzSrvFfcghY2Ok5hV8ptdZYs5ohMf4U=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I went on a Thursday night with my friends for dinner. Make sure to reserve a table, the place was packed☺️ We ordered a mezze for 6 people, the food was amazing and the portions were more than enough, the service was top and the atmosphere of the taverna is amazing. Highly recommended","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOabwV6-oIunQl23T--RU9bEhDJeg_CjEZRj-OB"],"When":"2024-6-17"},{"Name":"Michaël","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVIa4LuLH2uvJAOcUdTIlT-QlrHIxfXzb6o-w7-1uD-HV36MvxHYQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"To Kazani is a great traditional mezze restaurant close to Larnaca, with a nice and friendly staff. The food was really excellent and served in large quantities. We left, our stomachs full, and everyone happy.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN08hc_T8jwGOXJEoU7vBxi_PMxmi_mIIj_Lewf"],"When":"2024-8-5"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Julie Hair","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXMngZepVm2kaamKTZ8KONWIjpK9SVC97NkJ7hB8kAnL8NkeMBkTA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Food was amazing free hot bread salad and rice was brought out before our starters and mains the  feta cheese in breadcrumbs in honey was a taste sensation","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO48DO1Rlf4V2M3K7l0azq306GQEUwbGYAqt6vO"],"When":"2024-9-8"},{"Name":"Joe Du Preez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIGVCDLypiaDePyIAhlKNtMfn1NGik7fNgGvEXJYRnqLORS5w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"WOW!!!!!!!!!!!! what a dinner. Had their meze and it’s amazing, the food just keeps on coming and every plate is so tasty. The service is excellent and the people are so friendly. I will highly recommend eating here.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPAaRb56Cs0sZoBGlDL9pbbrstL8N-o2lFqpWIQ"],"When":"2024-2-10"},{"Name":"Tamana Berries","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXCstkscATz-4XemwUmP8SroPXHUTwzmLPmGCclI-7ZIry7I-J9=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"An authentic Cypriot tavern with delicious food, lovely staff and a buzzing atmosphere. The food is so delicious and fresh, we had chicken skewers, the pourgouri, hummus, zucchini and egg, halloumi and the village salad. Everything was fresh and tasty! A must visit when in Larnaca.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMktNvNY3_mCzu1m3aEpCXnbwseBYlnDiAPNSej"],"When":"2024-8-19"},{"Name":"Maryna Biletska","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWf9giaWHwokfDRFrDU8H5R7ftOoW8vbB0_xNdni-SDwuwXx1I=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Authentic cuisine at its best. Delicious dishes, great staff, relaxed atmosphere. High quality products and large portions. The fish was excellent. Main dishes are served with fries or bulgur. The moussaka is satisfying. I highly recommend trying the fish and the kleftiko (lamb that is slowly cooked for five hours). It's best to book a table in advance. This place is definitely worth a visit","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPuWk0wpus8pE2_RxDX9G9Ask6bd73-aNls5FEQ"],"When":"2023-9-28"},{"Name":"Andreas Michalis Loucas","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLi9zVlxj3iZpbzZJeBLEb3TULE0kl0p9WRP9SMzpIp0plCZw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Nice Cypriot traditional tavern, you get many plates that you don’t find other taverns. The food was delicious and the service was good, also the place was clean and looked properly maintained.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNrb_LS3und43RSOjMQ0285uAdz49lFYRXtyCpS"],"When":"2024-1-1"},{"Name":"noe kopaliani","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVVp0Pg28N62wv4dFpOTNN06zGqK79BHlEa4kuhRsKCfe72P9FV=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The best place to have a dinner and taste local food. Authentic atmosphere, but they don't have vegan options (it's perfect for meat lovers). Meat meze menu is more than enough for one person.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPUC-S8pqzfyGvmYEtmhPdrwE9BJlIxf8UfEk_c"],"When":"2024-8-18"},{"Name":"Jip Jonker","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWRhNuO-9Egi6tGpE4ARRATPo1xTSaqYNjSa1xwoXlKfQhREeiS=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Pleasant local restaurant. Many locals come to eat the local, traditional, dishes here, which is always a good sign. Staff is very friendly and accomodating. Nice Cypriot wines as well. We were able to get a table without a reservation, which was in the beginning of June. Advice is to make a reservation is busier times of the year.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPWBAAmTOp6WkTZGrBfBHXz48quhlS1iMdJ8pJ1"],"When":"2023-6-27"},{"Name":"Benjamin Francis","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXsybo2NbQRT0K2Alh1R3mneUi2dFEjytMp0QQ3cXk2a_tUpbtA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"OH WOW.
If you're looking for the full Mediterranean experience and food and diet and customs
Look no further.

I can't believe the price.

You'll be disappointed if you do not visit.

Staff, absolutely lovely as well.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMGkbWA6QvVh3NHb4N8R208EBmfroHGktx3Rk_b"],"When":"2023-10-3"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Marin Kostov","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKnlwJs4st881NTtX7VxwJl2nhWlXRR0csxg00jsrKZCXJM9g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I found it by accident, while walking around.
Food is really delicious! I haven't tried much of the menu, but I will come back again in the next couple of days :)
I wish though the draft beer was with proper foam, but I guess the beer taste/culture is different here :)
Anyway, you will enjoy the food and the friendly service!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMUYqGi3TNmUYq3EcpjZ8MzCIg0g9kHZq33o7r7"],"When":"2024-9-15"},{"Name":"Lewnika","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXOhvL3yWMtK3BB1k5I0CoozgZujkoFnROs60OiTta18AZG1v9i=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very nice, fells local. The food was great, we were full! Tasty. We ordered a mix plate. It was great!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipODu6CWExj4x_7CWAM9L9mVjgP5DkahPkra3JlX"],"When":"2024-9-28"},{"Name":"Aleksandra Kopacz","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIrriTu-6ruF9oYN2uLSUV4pO9D_GNBox_pkffc04X1fX6fOA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The best place if you want to try some traditional food. We ordered a traditional platter for 2 people. It was so delicious! Also, the staff was amazing! We had a really nice time :)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO8g9TIzxystkFDwINJVMd1xi4ibfjEBgfSx475"],"When":"2024-9-19"},{"Name":"Bertha Andronie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU-B9adzA7cBPDUbdup0MUTocA-5taxstI0X69BY6bqmg2QYUkcsQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Souvlaki.gr in Larnaca is a fantastic spot for a delicious meal. The food arrived in about 20 minutes, and everything was fresh and very tasty. The portions were generous, and the staff was attentive. It's not a luxury place, but it's very nice, with excellent prices. I would definitely come back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN7-qjjj-YY32SKfepSJ_52H217ApsMrmUaiv3y"],"When":"2024-7-20"},{"Name":"Adi Varga","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJtYlp567E6kf4FeuPF0lbrpyE9Jlio8IvvJuqIgExfs9p1GA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is the place where you must go hungry and tolerant to other people.
The food and the staff are great. We waited for 20 minutes for our chicken and lamb souvlaki dishes to be served and the staff provides beer as soon as possible. Probably the best skewers ever.
The people going to this place, unfortunately, are the worst. We've had a group of 10 (almost naked) who moved the tables around and at one point I had a little girl sitting right next to me. I could feel her perspiration.
Too much Democracy can ruin an experience.
It's still a 5 star review because the food was great. The fries didn't receive the salt treatment and it was a bit too much onion added for my taste. But that is subjective. The meat and the pitas are to die for.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNX83OLY5oU71-ZwEDpKDBSsW099XphLnhzIvIm"],"When":"2024-8-17"},{"Name":"Szyman","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU6BoBLSVol902RCuyycU43-tBUYQowELSXRyTnU4YO9QuKmjgq=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"During our stay we have been there 3 times, we ordered pita, dish and also platters, lamb, chicken, and chicken with bacon were amazing, French fries was made of good quality potatoes, service was kind and pleasant","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPZDbTj8C4QsxQeHcsfy3UZkYS0aPIwe0P8veTe"],"When":"2024-8-15"},{"Name":"Tal Cherniavsky","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXSAOhvqCvWbYqvYkgd6vPS-2_jOPIeSZk0qfQAfxnWFxE8lQnEdQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"AMAZING FOOD. If you are in larnaca, you have to come to Soulvaki and get the special platter. The waiter was really nice, got us a drink on the house and even a souvenir. The food was made perfectly with a huge platter, amazing kebab with creme cheese, really tasty pork skewers, and some soft flat bread. Would recommend you to come eat here!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNIqTKkWPLnrW0Ra1K7g1w76sDxTyWC43a26t5k"],"When":"2024-9-12"},{"Name":"Dani Jimenez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWMDClJkBGUR6r8K-zvV3lgaxTBVhxal59afS_Ad95Fu8PE4vKHxg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"A hidden gem in the center of Larnaca. Tasty food and a good variety of dishes. Friendly staff, fast service, and reasonable prices. One thing I would improve is the physical menu; adding pictures of the dishes would be helpful, especially for people unfamiliar with Greek cuisine. When I was there, I found it difficult to decide what to order since I didn’t know much about Greek food, and the lack of images made it harder to make a choice. But definitely I’ll come back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNFGGlXyihe5mjPAKVkaTrtpoc4DDqb9Ih5mb_N"],"When":"2024-9-10"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"lia xristodoulidou","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUuZByeLP3D816rRPULOnGVNPXFGArD8_HH88256GcKX6euQrNa=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Never have I had a more pleasant meal. Everything was amazing. Stefanos was so polite and helpful, going above and beyond to make us feel welcome. This restaurant has such a cozy and charming atmosphere! From the moment you walk in, you feel right at home. The warm lighting, rustic decor, and comfortable seating make it an ideal place for a relaxed meal.Thanks for the wonderful care given to us. Forever repeat customers.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOizlqlqKgnpOlFBQqKlbHhnhbKtQVyibxzCUX-"],"When":"2024-10-5"},{"Name":"Omer Barzilai","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXWyP55qiPQ7uUy6VrtbKaVSPkJ4xMqRnSBmnOSZpqEuhALGOUGWA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The atmosphere and service where amazing.
The food was was lemon loaded, so a bit sour.
We had the Calamari (very good) and Mushrooms (which we don't recommend).
The mourani salad is a must.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPIQ8WdTTfSSfN61r-sLdZrav6NZGLSsH20uCs3"],"When":"2024-9-8"},{"Name":"Florin Manaila","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIMWMlhSgRM9FoOSBdRqIb88dDDj-DvfBBuIJM-pFWfxtlhqQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Everything was excellent, from very tasty dishes to a very polite service, so eager to please us. The cozy atmosphere was also a big plus. Thank you for this awesome dinner!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipORXn5Px4r4D07Pd3y9aoExs3Ibi0zf2DePol7S"],"When":"2024-8-27"},{"Name":"Steffi Ivova","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV28yJfWY4PtlkCJe_xMy7_xj-Jpp5295EZ8da_iE2bl5OVoYSw5g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I was there for my birthday yesterday. I loved it, it is very cozy and has a very chill vibe. The waiter was very polite. The food was amazing. The Iberico steak and the salmon were 10 out of 10! It is pricey but totally worth it.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPVKLUgfyoZG0n20FlDx38RUGoBOPXOD-t2f2-s"],"When":"2024-8-11"},{"Name":"masha linchuk","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWY7dGWzao94LHuusvKQmqjALgAW9STNn55HzC2lWq3IVohVYXG=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"4 stars is not really fair, it’s more like 4.5, let me tell you why not 5:
- We were sitting next to a wall and it was crawling with ants. The ground too tbh. I believe if you take a seat in the middle of the yard or inside, it will be ok.
- I got the octopus and when it came to the table, fava purée was cold, so it was plated way before the actual octopus.
- Maybe the staff could be a little more attentive, more than once we were trying to catch their attention but it seemed like they were looking right through us, and it’s not like it was that busy of an evening.

The place is very much worth visiting though. The prices are quite good, the food was tasty, the atmosphere is absolutely lovely, the yard is so-so cozy. The red sauce that came with the bread was soo good, went well with the rest of the food too (idk if you are supposed to do that, but it just made everything better). I personally adored the zucchini balls, smth about the spices, it’s a little different than in other places, but I loved it. My friend allocated an honorable mention to the tonka ice cream, came back just for it another time. Generally, I feel like the menu had a good variety of options, so I see the majority of people finding smth to their taste. The staff were friendly, we had a nice time.
In conclusion, it is really worth visiting, just make sure you don’t sit next to a wall outside and don’t be in a hurry.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNAy8aMdl1Vljctvh36pqhwfWt7dkrIYmSYJ1Zm"],"When":"2024-8-13"},{"Name":"Lily Alemany","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXUoYYcL_uNsU_jZKMW82NsKTSW7xwRCtImP_JBbw28I_hg-XJD=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Beautiful place and beautiful food.
They have been ranked amongst one of the 50 best restaurants in Cyprus.

We had beef pattys and duck on a bed of parsnip for mains.
Food was absolutely delicious, presentation, depth and complexity of a Michelin star. Service was even more outstanding. The atmosphere was inviting and relaxing, with perfect subtle lighting.

If I could change anything ever so slightly,it would be to have smaller portions. The food is of optimal quality, and to be able to eat it all means to be uncomfortably full at the end of the meal. Better serve 70% of the current quantity and be pleasantly satisfied but not overly full.

I hope to come back, and I would recommend anyone that wants to set their taste buds on a journey to come here.

Thank you!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOH60usnyHas0bqGr9Jf-qWYXQaJiJjtgKqUo0l"],"When":"2024-2-17"},{"Name":"Marianna Nicodemou (Ms. M)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVC15pLswVwcUZLrf0YVf06pUrHZCKgfiHJl-AcOBQ2TXRL9s8F=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The easiest 5 star given so far!!!

I don’t even know where to start; amazing atmosphere, very nice decoration, very good service and the food is simply DELICIOUS!

Highly recommended. If you are in Larnaca looking for the ultimate taste experience, this restaurant is your best choice.

Ps I wanted to take a photo as well but the food was looking so yummy that I was carried away 😅

Update: revisited the restaurant yesterday. 💯 % in agreement with my initial review","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPdCt4ErWIByIiBZmszgnnzvLlpAQroh5P7xEcI"],"When":"2024-3-18"},{"Name":"Maria Tapia","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJqbvQj95rFhBNyNgK_RjE240flaUN_HTRDd_zgh3W6EqjBIg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I have dined at Elia several times, always enjoy their food. During my last visit, the duck breast was very good. I also had the grilled octopus which was a little too rubbery. Octopus should always be tender. The menu was different from my previous visits and the server stated that they charge the menu every 6 months.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP60qE1iLeM2iAvgL7kpzTfFiD4NjM38ai1Bdbv"],"When":"2023-9-18"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Lyn Ong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV7ymsAmUgjpvcjW5bWNyCX74xB25ZRWxl0JOq3X-nDvZLksbu5=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We only had dinner here but it was absolutely amazing... the food was so delicious we almost licked all the plates... home cooking style food... nothing fancy, nothing pretentious... just simple yummy food... the staff or maybe owner was so friendly it felt just like dinner at home... very comfortable...","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOFOJWEaoHajW0Rmue7cundvVrefYIkMiJdFnb_"],"When":"2024-4-18"},{"Name":"Katherina Fragkedaki","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJsuO-WEceeY29V8do_jESDvXBI4Jh0UnshKS6N6yfonka7ng=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Absolutely loved this place due to it'a unique decor and atmosphere. Great cocktails at very reasonable prices. A must go!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOqO1gS-Y8Rj3XyOIXwaXfTa2gVmdohnxEZAywS"],"When":"2024-9-14"},{"Name":"Adam Larsson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWfpu5SGd9CYxF5Z2crHKeOfYy3ANWWmLbsAJRKESjtjS3VTIex=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Pros:
+ Service
+ Staff

Cons:
- Decor
- Loud music

Overall: Had an ok dining experience. I would definitely go back for drinking (large selection of beer) but not sure I would come dine there again. Lovely staff but the loud music and mediocre food. Soup of the day was 7 euro which to me was a bit much given the portion size/taste. Bread was free. The main dish was also a daily special which was some sort of lamb stew, sadly the highlight of that dish was the onions and spinach. 2 potatoes some rice, lamb and then spinach and onions. Nothing extraordinary","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPCg9LYumRvYLytypNVHpCbGji9wrXx-5PLy9fQ"],"When":"2024-4-2"},{"Name":"Avyi T.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWc7s6JAosyRT3JSiSPlJ1h_q0EOwL0UF523jFCY-SREox9f0exAw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A quaint, retro restaurant with delicious traditional dishes, that make you feel like you are at grandma's house, a wide wine selection menu and an even bigger beer collection! A must visit for its quirky and retro decor and a re-visit for the amazing food!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPLmKMGVALfpkBHwvvfm-8atAIQIWJVe5q36vO8"],"When":"2024-3-4"},{"Name":"Lisa Andersson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX58KIZf8evG5-1m4z6ZfijAQEscGMF_yNoc9EEjDeswGMaLZU=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My favourite restaurant in Larnaca. Excellent food (it’s like getting the best homemade meal while enjoying a night out), excellent service, nice decorations that creates such a great ambience. Also great for solo travellers, as the owner knows how much to talk to you and when to leave you alone, which is nice. If you visit Larnaca, eat here. I have not tried the bar yet, but if I come back, it will definitely be a usual spot.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOYeNKYrSFWTb3XtSSnP9dUSv-u_YzgHYQLeQhp"],"When":"2024-5-3"},{"Name":"Shani Achtenberg","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKThij_ZeE78vawv2wuHxSempwyAzzM0JHe_6YKWG_6EZIPzA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great bar, staff were super nice and helpful.
Unique decor, and soft jazzy music. But the best part was definitely the food! We ordered the lamb special and filled vegetables (veg) and both dishes were amazing! We also tried a local soup and got a desert. They have a great beer selection, we got awesome beer recommendations to go with the food and everything was just superb. Couldn’t recommend more","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOcnb4_4E_fNVM1pc2FQVUU9zeHL9_EUVRs_EA6"],"When":"2023-6-9"},{"Name":"Majd Hammoudeh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUQjh2LPvSbwbflZnMr0ijxUIzdp2fSuXH4Rgb1iNtVQug8gtMI3w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Officially one of the most beautiful restaurants and bars I have ever been to. The bar downstairs is inspiring with the unique vibes and hundreds of beers and whiskeys. The second flood is just an amazing restaurant. The food super delicious, we tried the cooked lamb with spinach, rice and potatoes. wine is great and the atmosphere is difficult to explain with words it could only be felt. Every detail is just fantastic, I am so happy the place was open and we could enjoy the art there.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPiPBLsR3gqHCwNeKwiBrIVP-3ktqJPDDHe5icv"],"When":"2022-12-28"},{"Name":"PJK LDN","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUvZuZdNBSfpN51nvN5HL_Qn_D6ZhbTwdvI3aJLiQchQnjLwtwr=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A great find and visit.  Such a cool atmosphere with a good selection of beers and gins. The decor is something you need to see with your own eyes","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOY2U3Y56aykaBG8yL_uspioXiE9pKuUs5ZE1Cn"],"When":"2024-2-21"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Yiannos Kyriacou","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWgjl4ReU8D3J5yFXn88q2JgQI8XJkihYJoG5WMGbemXnN_YiBYZQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Place that locals will go to eat. So its a sure bet that you will be satisfied. Nice atmosphere good food.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM2v6QIZTM5lFcv1f_CaCsc7oTFpgPa26ZIRaA5"],"When":"2024-8-29"},{"Name":"Irinaios Anastasi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVZUHmFMTkHYp8NKNxa40brav5TLoUPqSqZO6VX3n_KHDawZFXB=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This Cypriot tavern is a hidden gem, set in a lovely garden where the tables are placed right under a passion fruit tree.

The meze here is exactly what you'd expect from a traditional Cypriot tavern. With 20 different dishes, it offers a real taste of the island's cuisine. You’ll find everything from fresh salads and dips to grilled meats and local specialties. The quality is excellent, and the portions are generous, so come hungry.

If you want to experience true Cypriot food in a beautiful setting, this is the place to go. The combination of great flavors, friendly service, and the garden's charm makes it a spot worth visiting.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Kalmer Kaljuste","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW5gJNHaNuZO5pzosN5GgmY6oVLi1Lti1qHp-BUusHLH9WL3zSu=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"For the price it's a very good restaurant to visit. Food was great, service very nice. I also will mention that the cutlery, dishes and kitchen in general look very clean and well kept.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNDU_vFLZe7wkfNGD3YMjakaom5LxjR74a-zgDy"],"When":"2024-4-2"},{"Name":"Katarzyna Grzybek","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIX6qabd8srfU8f5Z7uSav_SHD-A2P6W8PF8kmRSWtR-upLtw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The most delicious food in Cyprus! We went there twice. We took mezze and it was the greatest food experience we ever had. Unfortunately I didn't make photos of all dishes as they were looking so tasty that we eat them right away! You definitely should visit this place!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMept4AeznFT6GY0h4Y3E6ZxIJB0FtYlZNmDQiu"],"When":"2023-7-16"},{"Name":"Constantinos Toumasis","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLazEM4h1pvqAhwJFge7ImF6GtLwX7xFykT9LlIpk2zr_sXPQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great place and atmosphere to visit. Ordered meze for 2 .Food is clean and tasty.  Sotos is a TOP man. Will definitely visit again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPkmzNEh2hj-dS0UmtMWAXdMTOLYpBGrDq9jp1Y"],"When":"2024-8-28"},{"Name":"bev valley","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ8IUwV7Fih7QLfFZAku6ORoPc0H8Al62OAgWLSUDXdLuYYgg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Stunning home cooked food, fantastic service and traditional setting. We had the moussaka, vegan moussaka and chicken kebabs, followed by passion fruit .... all amazing. We sat outside under the limes growing on the pergolas ❤️ We will be going back.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Georgia","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVZRgSxdwgDJ8LspvzFGtYz1UAEvt1F7A3-CFOny3FmX-WRdpCe=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Really impressed with our meal, the atmosphere and the decor. The menu is somewhat limited for main dishes however makes up for it in hot and cold starters. Staff really friendly, not at all pushy and the pears in syrup provided at the end of the meal was a nice touch. Would come back here again if we had more time.

A negative review on TripAdvisor suggested that this restaurant is shoved between some concrete buildings however I did not feel this is the case and with the beautiful trellis, canopy and plants around you could be anywhere.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNjEpr1DolWWF_RblP27uojD5NtkrzuyPsxoslx"],"When":"2022-10-4"},{"Name":"Oons Piner","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIQnoHqdckQL7vWj4VY-w9YE-cW08nlJUf7Yntg0AwMwWhcUQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Thank you for a lovely evening meal. Our first visit, but this won’t be the last!
Friendly service, very tasty meal, loved the salad. Great outside area for eating… passion fruit vines 🤪 I will be scrumping when they are ready to eat.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Dmitry Leykin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWRITLbw4hmKk_4UOe1nn8PAK3awCmcVersI2sXoGB77dEPShT2=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place is a total gem! Four of us came, and we were seriously impressed by everything. The prices were super reasonable for the quality of food and service. The food? Absolutely delicious—every dish packed with real Cypriot flavor. The live music added such a fun vibe, making the whole evening even better. Whether you’re hanging with friends or family, this is the perfect spot for a great night out. We’ll definitely be back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMLqUIJV13EB4I0nuBE1M6u_9hkylQ9x7aV_Tc"],"When":"2024-9-28"},{"Name":"Oleksii Zav","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU77YzFXFrhratGCieYWn38Mlslhh8xC78qDSwblS1-sQvosO4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"3.5 stars. Overall a bit above avg. We had 4 meat dishes:
Chicken burger well spiced and most delicious, ordered 6 more to go
Chicken soulvaki skewer was juicy and yummy
Then a tier lower were the lamb chops
500 grams, of which over half of weight is bones... not a lamb shank/sliced grilled meat pieces/fillet. Tasted a bit bitter from char at times but good meat where present, the remaining bits on the bones make wonderful cat snacks...😄
Greek pita not tasty, but edible
Pork sausage bad, tasted better wieners
Stuffy outside and inside fans, no ac","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMIWOXe5R8nBSPrQ367AIqt9LDUevXQdO8GmR20"],"When":"2024-6-26"},{"Name":"Soulla Stylianou","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWWRIqGZvget2lcU5PMAVDeD9BWAgQsWMJPWTQwda7vpNhYidE0=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Tucked away down a side street this little gem serves freshly made Greek and Cypriot food. You can see the chefs cooking the food and it appeared m spotless. We had various dishes ordered by the family that had invited us to the restaurant.  I forgot to take pictures (sorry) as too busy catching up and eating. The dips were lovely. my favourite being the coriander tahini dip (looks green tastes yum). Also the sheftalia (Cypriot sausage) was my favourite. I had a home made lemonade with ginger which was delicious and refreshing given it was a hot day and we were having lunch. For desert I had mehalebi which was served with triantafilo (rose flavoured) ice cream as well as cordial.  Delicious.  Apparently they had live music on Friday night (darn it I missed that). Worth checking out. Oh and the ladies toilets were clean and quite unique. Not going to tell you why - you’re just going to have to go and have a look! We were guests so I don’t know what the bill was but prices do seem reasonable and we left there completely and utterly full.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOi6XKWvh8OCLw33AAA9BRuOZIp-75BXDhYmWVU"],"When":"2024-9-14"},{"Name":"Maria Alexandra Coman","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWggdEGXr6NZUizok5apfrT5EE_yms-ovM40nBqyoezeQNfTek=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Delicious homemade fries
Very good salads and grilled veggies
Very friendly waiters and we also received a small yoghurt desert for free.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNZPUcUfcLJVTZrLIv-pDr26L2gDEMW3kG5g9RO"],"When":"2024-9-16"},{"Name":"Eleftherios Gabriel","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLz7gtdm1fNM_ofyAO-72-wmDIwo2kmizXfuV8-yVT74YXarQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"When you call kalamaki and Souvlaki the one and the same, when you have no Greek to understand the difference and when you have the wrap (Souvlaki in Athens and pitta in other cities) only for take away and delivery and not When you sit down, ypu don't deserve more than 1 star. If I could give 0 stars I would. The photos is one called Souvlaki and the other kalamaki....","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM1eWHt2zsFMLwyzJKz2mOJrD_nl26_B_-0Lovf"],"When":"2024-7-19"},{"Name":"Maja Zalesińska","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLgJpWN4VDZ-iIAmwVXH1edsFnyEQ_10BayTR8NhQdrrd5t7A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Really nice place with interesting dishes - seems to be modern take on classics. Not many vegetarian options when it comes to main dishes, but we were able to compose a beautiful meal out of various starters. I really recommend the set of dips and the salad with figs and manouri cheese. Oh and feta baked in filo is delicious as well 🔥","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNiwcKMrTNMhEl-KDAtwLEmJ3thW6EaVEJMQSqZ"],"When":"2023-10-14"},{"Name":"E D","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXurVevai0cd6C0pHEpuOspWy-COioa_pjwJvjyJX8ub4PSYi0R-A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I went out for a meze with my coworkers, we had a great time and I really enjoyed tasting the different foods, especially the meats!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMefUa0-_DP-YaGgSA7QNa7Vl8Ym2oPKa5v4jwY"],"When":"2024-8-22"},{"Name":"Travelling Doc","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWa6anCVjIE4-SEX5fkkAxFEFEn5BjDDNcuvcayqRgqpZB0p9k1=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Set back in a square which is nice and provides shade from the sun.

Food was exceptionally good- the courgette fritas, the mushroom on skewer was excellent and the juicy pork chops with fries and salad again excellent.
The pork was succulently cooked with BBQ flavour with nice fries and a very nice salad.also
A massive portion for the pork which we shared btw two.

The local cocktail with mint was excellent.

Very relaxing meal on a Sunday.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP9WY-29sysnoH9QcLhkNG6tzynKJdaOOqUCjai"],"When":"2023-6-18"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Laura F.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVqp1T2prp24hf_73gU7v6HmDdG8ZrsyvLLPTE_9MzoQUgXh_fH=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We were a bit reluctant to go to this place as I dread tourist traps. Yet, even we were given a different menu ( for the tour guests) food was super yummy, well presented and reasonably priced.
Wine was very pleasant as well.
The restaurant is quite nicely decorated and you can sit outside by the shade or inside.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM42tu1Q96XCd-qbJCWG9JhyXtL45uzfdleY9ap"],"When":"2024-9-18"},{"Name":"chris jenkins","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK1XrjrrtLbx-qY2NLmzEI5S8XyTuiuItVvh2ASaJb3YEfDkQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A really nice place to enjoy your evening.  Food was exceptional, catering for all of our group, with plenty of choices. Service was also great and you really were made to feel welcome. Highly recommended. Will return on our next visit to Cyprus. Thanks for a lovely evening","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN5Lk1p6WCdE6anzcm6cXn_4VkiKSm9qSP60D1a"],"When":"2024-9-28"},{"Name":"Iddo Ben Ami","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJcZz4LEyK3VR6xScq0cuwjxzDmXJXAtTTBkUXvDSm0Mw-VSg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing local food, many different dishes, great quality for good price.
The family who runs the restaurant is super friendly, and the service is excellent.
Definitely recommended!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMEptAio5pIyMtaei4KicHHlbWdQmJgbeGZfAc0"],"When":"2024-9-4"},{"Name":"Ana","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK7J0BQQBn-IJAl7RNbWtir-F38xBw8s5h3QYWkZVzQCOsUbQ8=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had a great lunch in this restaurant after the swimming in Blue Lagoon. The place has a big terrace in the shade and such a nice atmosphere. The food was amazing, portion was big and they had vegan/vegetarian options which is an additional plus. I don’t know if I should even mention the service that was so welcoming and fast! They really cared that you have a good experience and that everything is alright. Would recommend this place if you’re ever passing by!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipObipZv-w4OR6TlD_JGTXiUgZ9LkPZZWGZsIolE"],"When":"2024-4-18"},{"Name":"Albert Tannous","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXGl8dDBxFL9qYSP2EdoFxIkDeZ-2CXMxOZrRAsBViboT7P1lou=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My experience at "Moustakallis" in Paphos was absolutely outstanding! From the moment we walked in, we were greeted with warm and friendly service that set the tone for the entire evening. The staff were attentive, professional, and made sure every detail of our dining experience was perfect.

The food was simply phenomenal. Every dish we ordered was fresh, flavorful, and beautifully presented. The grilled meats were perfectly cooked, and the seafood was incredibly fresh. The mezze selection was diverse and gave us a true taste of traditional Cypriot cuisine, with each dish tasting better than the last.

The atmosphere at Moustakallis is charming and authentic, with a lively yet relaxed vibe. It’s the kind of place that makes you feel at home while enjoying top-quality food.

Overall, I highly recommend Moustakallis to anyone visiting Paphos. The combination of excellent service, delicious food, and welcoming atmosphere makes it a must-visit restaurant. I can't wait to return!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOcU95w_RA7kL0faknNIM6b9537oxMYtITlGrIv"],"When":"2024-9-19"},{"Name":"Georgia Christodoulou","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ-Y9UT7iXXEmkel6Vd5n2YYK7BJ2L1TddPym_kUR1P98_35g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I am kindly writing at the moment however couldn't find something positive and especially about the food that was bad. We ordered kleftiko, ok that is not kleftiko just an oven baked lamp, served with rice (definetly the worst I ever had at a restaurant, proofs can be found at the photos) fried potatoes and ready made sause like bisto or something and frozen veggies. It was edible but that doesn't mean I could eat it. We also order the mixed grill, same side options. I am not even sure If food was cooked on charcoal and not in the oven, pan, and then at something else just to take the brown lines on the meat. Also our glasses were extremely dirty all four of them from waiters dirty hands and one of them had food stains too. I have to mention that the three women at the next table ate nothing of their food and they asked for the bill several times. The service was ok not perfect. Tourists this is not a place to try traditional dishes. Not recommended at all.
I am happy to see your answer below!
I have to mention that I come from a family of professional cooks and also my husband is a chef. Yes the taste is subjective and I have my personal opinion however the quality and some cooking rules are objective.
P.s. You owe a business and as a professional the ironic comments on customer reviews are not the way to treat your customers and neither part of a proper customer retention policy. Thank you!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNwhBPXQtxZYD0mXtRH8_i5usA25tSjhJp4oZjm"],"When":"2024-8-20"},{"Name":"Fobby","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKzGcHq55PwqCR6ckTH2kG2vKn5hRjLM6KtoryYYNwMVC6kOQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Our favourite restaurant on this side of Cyprus.  Family run, and everyone was extremely welcoming and friendly. Also go to see the famous moustache 🥸. Food was amazing, the service was top class and and atmosphere was authentic, it was great to feel like you were in a traditional Cypriot tavern.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPOdinXkuJB3wkU6VP2aoDrAyp1X4FqDNi4q3h2"],"When":"2024-5-30"},{"Name":"D Sutherland","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVJQbs0cQSrScVlmJgcOMUWbeT5ErFmeU-GtAgAJqYwCowK7Pgj=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Popped in to ask for change for the car park. Was made to feel so welcome that we went back for lunch. A lovely, family run place which is huge. Service was fast and friendly and the food was good and plentiful. Thoroughly enjoyed the chicken souvlaki.
Highly recommend.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNmR4oxvLb-PZQN-A21VdbZFH48JiVVTUaV9dN1"],"When":"2024-4-12"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Thomas Loebert","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWdtDdDyVIIYE3vHyDn_HePDR5bf12R_ZTvIdfJ1gGPr8KnQwwv=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Small, family-run restaurant with a beautiful terrace right on the beach. The menu is very appealing and differs significantly from the surrounding restaurants. Guests can expect freshly prepared, exquisite dishes and a very good selection of wines. The service is friendly, attentive and professional. All in all a nice place for a sunset dinner.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOaLhPdOsWL_mGhs9mq_yzI88DvWCBAHVyI1RcX"],"When":"2023-6-11"},{"Name":"Tiaan van Tonder","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKxuyZf_VyUEws7nbNQhdFL0wekI8rOpWInmB6X76NMGqs7IQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Restaurant No. 9 in Latchi boasts a fantastic seaside setting, offering breathtaking views right by the beach.

We tried the seafood platter and the Prawn & Scallop Risotto—both were decent, but nothing exceptional.

Nonetheless, the beautiful scenery elevates the dining experience, making it a lovely spot to enjoy a meal with a view.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMcLkxQEX9bLrj86LTorl2xFwrpj79Bx7vX1yX7"],"When":"2024-9-22"},{"Name":"DJ DAVE FLACK","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWfzYcj6vXYpR307aR4N2NkYP83226epAjzLPttUILF-I5yRWuH=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing place the food is absolutely delicious
Great service just a 5 min walk from the other restaurants on the main marina! As they are in your face trying to get you to take a seat ! So forget about the rest come to NO 9 LOUNGE","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMH6jNXrZbd5jGz5Hyzy4ZreY7GOiZTEGk-rdDU"],"When":"2024-7-18"},{"Name":"Gabriella Demetriou","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUzAwK2p5IGFM3Gt6bQfSWJZrApn0xdqkk8UgWmfHPFiipjDMU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We really enjoyed the dinner we just had here: lamb shank for my other half and mushroom risotto for me, plus a chocolate lava cake to share - all served in good time, and with warm and friendly, courteous service! Would recommend","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPPTOw4Ov6IRci8NYcCEqU8nhPG4vZYR7UIhcZ3"],"When":"2024-9-15"},{"Name":"Sarah A.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXNGW7rcVR7FiVbbCHWWguIjGOjCGf02bbOQlQlCAcQmKPcaOM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great location directly at the beautiful Latchi beach, great discrete but attentive service and tasty food. Come at sunset time!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMP2uWBP9P7hh7-uXTFG6SrYC2MHWQPiViORCsU"],"When":"2024-8-7"},{"Name":"David Welsh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUMrwKweBdLv0vAEv2ydzPEvrpf9ZdSHV5zRxYX3bCDG-A_BvM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Fresh seafood cooked to perfection. There are some very good restaurants in the Polis/Latchi area, and this one is definitely in the top 5.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPjMRlm6UgLrhrGhT0cfz9gse7znZYnmPD4cF5h"],"When":"2024-10-6"},{"Name":"Lafelle Chu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL0d3qAzD36Nng9aoRVD0koMUnI2k4Cxvevd70EFlJ3A-SBhg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A wonderful hidden gem! Just tiny bit further away from the main restaurant cluster, I found that it has a higher rating than others on google map so I gave it a try.

It’s quieter here, has an unobstructed view of the sea, and kind service that’s not just shouting in your face to get you to sit down (as opposed to the restaurants on the main street/ just off the boat trip boarding point)

Food was really delicious too! The seafood starter is exceptional for me. Except the fish and chips which is a bit more average but it’s an item on the kids menu so I wasn’t expecting the authentic British taste anyway.

The entrance is quite humble and low key but totally worth giving this place a try! :)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNw8hTHphyNskNqdHAWbMfnQdfAt2uapI3Z3O-d"],"When":"2024-4-28"},{"Name":"David Fogarty","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL9_ZgRm4KCFAW7Y6oEdlNADjlXLDSBoYgPbGqMWca7OiHe=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Me and my wife both agree this was the best restaurant we visited in Cyprus. The food, service, view and general ambience was beautiful. I really feel that you would miss out on a great meal if you don't eat in this restaurant at any chance you can. I've been here twice in two days and plan on being back again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOlakC1LrROQNDZL6oRF6Jie_cKGREEMN6U4tY"],"When":"2024-7-31"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Andras A.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXFI_E_fvhobICCKTGagSBHpccSXSxcW8GboB2UIPCDdybvqWjj=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The owner is a very friendly person and knows the famous Hungarian footballer: Puskas. He has kind words for every guests and every time we visited the restaurant received welcome gifts (dips and toast) and sweets for free. Service is always fantastic even when place is full. There are several tables both inside and outside as well. Parking lot is free and nearby.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOm5Rmgcr-vcqozDVwEhqxKJNRE4LF34YQ1V2jy"],"When":"2024-8-26"},{"Name":"Ella Tuominen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ0P72DSdh_Ej28fRjm6DKPk4lVAwRbpyF4ndtoXHY4tDfhtg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Food was incredibly tasty, fantastic value, generous portions (we were all very full and had quite a bit of food left to takeaway) and service was really friendly! The waitress was lovely and even gave us a small dessert and a digestif on the house. We were a part of one of the organised trips and chose to come here instead of the restaurant suggested by the tour guide. We’re so happy we did: this was the best food we had in Cyprus! We had the sharing mezzes, moussaka and vegetarian platter, all were great!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMYcGVvUFSkRJfsWKk43fCY-0UiniuIrno1F_hZ"],"When":"2024-9-1"},{"Name":"Meri Todorova","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLymi_4865274hOrGXyin7h_i3BuKaKG715YiZoVepWgw4iig=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The best tavern! Super delicious fresh food. Big portion and the best prices. Great service from the waitress Sandy. Very kind and smily girl. It was pleasure to be served by her. We received also compliment from the restaurant - very delicious pita dessert and small shot of local alcohol. The cook Jazz was also the best on the grill.
Highly recommend!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNZMg2_kUiq4NRh73iRK6sv-HbKoyM3QW7iRSRx"],"When":"2024-9-22"},{"Name":"Melina Moretti","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUrNmEXer8NnPixbST8d01uSR6VUpHp5Ruue1yf4tkV2Yh61aotIw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Best tavern in Cyprus by far! Food is excellent, owner is very friendly and kind. He sent a bunch of extra food on our table on the house. Very good people and service was also excellent. Thank you","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPsFJcaaLnb5Ny2mc2GeNjTI7kunusRthItCNZU"],"When":"2024-8-21"},{"Name":"Wojtek K","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI_BbdYsvhpZv8JZT8_DLbyOV9_aVoELq1KGMJEcc3DRijwnQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Tasty food, big portions and the most important very very charming restaurant owner!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO-oppvATP3EwiG96WIAP2bINE_pxMO3plkSz1f"],"When":"2024-9-27"},{"Name":"Anže Korenjak","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUaX8ww6srqtKvplXyHI8kvagiAw4Bw_9lFLXuZZJJ4xO1H30R-=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Excellent Greek food tavern, delicious food, friendly staff and just perfect! Highly recommended!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPFVIjpuzSZNQEhxqXGv5b0XOUipNTccLYQKXJa"],"When":"2024-8-30"},{"Name":"Elena Manziuc","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX_rCQbWDa3HSnDAgIAdD8HYttZZegrF5KOLTrItz9vwNNvMWsu=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Good place to enjoy local food.
The vegetarian plate was delicious. But they do not serve fish.
The setvice is very pleasing - we've had even a dessert as a gift.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOZqCwMU0_-0_smqDlzSRPCkll_HCJdSjppcGzi"],"When":"2024-3-30"},{"Name":"Ekaterina Dolgova","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWj4XlKdzScwcZlXbwzeABQmGtggmZK458nj_CBVkRJsqTM0rA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great dinner, service is fast and efficient,  all dishes are tasty and authentic! Lived the experience","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNSH3OKVy7uw1udKzDbzdvXRL-rGu6HMpPEInIq"],"When":"2024-6-21"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Fobby","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKzGcHq55PwqCR6ckTH2kG2vKn5hRjLM6KtoryYYNwMVC6kOQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We didn’t stop for food, but visited the herb garden after visiting the local museum next door. It was something a little different compared to what you normally see, and great to take in the amazing smells and appreciate the plants.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMLl2JP0L1CBTjsqNqpXtB-ZDEtSydHa3ZVupTk"],"When":"2024-5-30"},{"Name":"Oliver M. Fall","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV2AC0V1xb-AWeypT2-Qka8CbJLaUHC-Pybpin0-GfvSbckY0JS=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I spend a whole week in Polis and Herb Garden became my favorite place to have a good time, great and really kind service and not to forget about the food!

I had three different dishes and all three were amazing to more than fair prices.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNAYhmjBhBJik0WyBM43pr8lVqTJjXrXTycOHMG"],"When":"2024-7-23"},{"Name":"Leandros Mavrommatis","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX_Iq2CokF4WWKS6IGvY_OykEQnQx6p1Y4WrEc5kCPAu7tsmW0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Tasos, the owner greeted us with a warm, friendly and welcoming smile. Jazz playing in the background, we ordered our dishes and went for a walk in the beautiful herb garden of the restaurant.
Food was tasty and cooked perfectly without overkill on any ingredients.
Very happy! We will be back!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMCEmU4dyhgi3HB0gtbJ_k_aPiYdiXAPgUqrCYK"],"When":"2024-2-25"},{"Name":"Simon Ashton","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocINTph8hi5cibtnuI4_46Az8dSDl0arS4v9R7GEKR6CLk6Y4g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We had the vegetarian mezze. Such flavours. Be prepared though - there is a lot of food involved!  A definite must if in the area.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPZ8p0SqMHka411Bzr0Xn9f-kX5wq5whTInVUXX"],"When":"2024-5-30"},{"Name":"Marios Kopsidis","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVMgxgDXVCR-WI85ZRVbIEAcn9xf0HTdPdEjLX7wgzJu2Y73js-=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"unique experience in the herb garden. rich flavors and aromas.  quality  food and good portions.
I would definitely revisit","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNwLDaY2C9ZR_0zZ-tNS5Ng_g0kpK2y2G2TFr4g"],"When":"2024-8-20"},{"Name":"Farah L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLREYKOO-Avgzz8xp3xSCkeCtch7tRV6jRS2OdBQR5tzsfYPg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A beautiful restaurant with friendly staff and delicious food. Good selection for vegetarians and vegans. Portions were really good.
Cute little herb garden.
Would recommend a visit.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPdxZl6z8EoHjFZcoDhe-Lvat1sBTcZbZqaYKUW"],"When":"2024-4-19"},{"Name":"Sofia Fuentes","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXyKY-NYssh0VC8v7wyKqgzwtoHFSqlFwN64GBNT8qk-l3IRD-l=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We went for a vegetarian meze and it was amazing. A variety of delicious food and it was a lot! Best vegetarian meze I’ve ever had. Also the place is beautiful, they have a big garden full of herbs and plants.
Drinks we good too.
Definitely coming back soon🤩","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPjc19cn-CAxLbRM-DTMc0_pl10RR95X1QWTWli"],"When":"2023-11-26"},{"Name":"Harmony Oschefski","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLeQMhPyYLHkegNvYSRFYBwRMjJ3vlmrPQ1Jz82io9XhZbazU8=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We had a beautiful authentic Cyprian lunch here today. A must stop while visiting Polis! The food was fresh and delicious! The kids were welcome to play outside in the garden while we spent a couple of hours enjoying the views and our meal. The herb garden which offers a farm to table experience was impressive to say the least. The staff was very friendly and the overall experience a delight! I highly recommend.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPCeD7T8Hpl58PFIqu6_YkA9mDWdWl9FKpyMhwa"],"When":"2023-4-9"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Sarah A.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXNGW7rcVR7FiVbbCHWWguIjGOjCGf02bbOQlQlCAcQmKPcaOM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Great food, meat on the point, nicely arranged and really nice choice of tasty cocktails!
They have a large terrace with great view.
The service staff was very friendly and attentive, just at the end we had to wait too long for the bill, although the restaurant was already rather empty. All in all a recommendation!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPmoNpcbqLrmhbjwPGdflbEpUPrEM6H_jJHck6p"],"When":"2024-8-17"},{"Name":"Alexander Thompson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVhZep3cnjtmH4IM1GCtjk4nMUl6i7AwkrpURID7QHSrpJt997eoA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I took my parents for their anniversary and now I am convinced it will become their weekly “go to” restaurant.

The restaurant itself is beautifully designed, the lighting and water features create a wonderful atmosphere. The staff are all incredibly attentive from the greeting to the moment you leave the restaurant.
I would highly recommend this restaurant to anyone who finds themselves looking for beautiful evening with good cuisine, a great atmosphere, service with a smile and all the while being situated in a very understated typical Cypriot village.
Can’t wait to come back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOgsdrmKMkDLIe9r77guH72L4NkyfP4IgT58hxP"],"When":"2024-9-21"},{"Name":"Steve Metz","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXznAm3Z2GZMeaeS8NKJ6DoUNDYaawIhrDY8hHbc97mKLUYruUm1A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Can't fault this restaurant.  5 star in everything.
Staff super welcoming, professional and attentive.
The food is extremely well presented and cooked to perfection, so full of flavour.
Loved the experience, a definitely must try for every diner that likes quality.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN4w_IL18TyB0hCoNMocq9ZNWH0E0cy6Mau9Vft"],"When":"2024-6-9"},{"Name":"Bobby McLeish","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWsVBwko7C7P_rZdtHO8Y0iwAQSwdFgTg1GgBfQkmCgKFtAaMrY7w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We have been before on numerous visits and it's always been excellent.  This visit was also excellent.  You can see the quality and presentation of the food in the photos.  Dropped one star because I went in early afternoon and booked a specific table for 7pm and they said no problem.  When we arrived, they did not ask about our booking and gave us a different table.  Still a nice table, but why take bookings and requests and just ignore them.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO1I0Sq4VBiJ6dfjY8NtxZc4NuDRzaKqNl_URj-"],"When":"2023-10-9"},{"Name":"Li Ann Wright","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLu3trj5Ofoq1ZUYWUIIC-gt0dAczVDCPSa953tErlHnGunOQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The food was so good I wanted to give the chef a cuddle. If I could give this place 20 stars I would. Highly recommended.  I probably could marry the chef but I'm already taken. 🤣","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMtsfkhYXo1ZfAUAaSFWlZKIUVZk6oc0BZ7uOVF"],"When":"2024-5-11"},{"Name":"Aina Balkyte","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUZ3wZI_MGJbDaSBQpjIjPnlVxACxDeIB3gM6vS6yKHvCWmZmPr=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Our favourite restaurant!
Amazing atmosphere, cozy, stylish, clean and welcoming.
The food is delightful- from appetising colourful presentation, to the last bite. 👌
Clearly you can see that the place is taken care with attention from A to Z.
Highly recommended.🙏","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNehlezuYKS3VuEXSY7xFcUP5WXjQS_bmJ983xH"],"When":"2024-2-6"},{"Name":"Ady Salisbury","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXKTi980UUR-nJzjasuUVp6z5fQsmv8yyMGv-2KCjaT-C_MLlw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Finikas has been my favourite restaurant in Polis for years. The decor is stunning, the food is gorgeous and Yiannis, Melina & Sam always make us feel really welcome. This week we tried the tomahawk steak 🥰","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOPZNUKg6-5RFWXKcovcD0FJ4odBrVXfF5etPjv"],"When":"2024-6-5"},{"Name":"Georgia Christodoulou","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ-Y9UT7iXXEmkel6Vd5n2YYK7BJ2L1TddPym_kUR1P98_35g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Atmospheric restaurant, with nice food and friendly personnel. We are visiting this restaurant every year the last six years!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMiWMN9zD-VpfDSEExv8qMUqB0fSK9GC0Wvdy0l"],"When":"2024-8-24"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Antonis Constantinou","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJYkAUlkb4TO7XHqoxyzjrsRNhMf8byCPTz2Un11OKpQ_NK9g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I could call it a gourmet tavern. It's definitely an experience, and ideally, for couples. The best part is their starters since they are quite different from other restaurants.
They were quite late bringing all plates, but even this can not cut them a star.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNwld4VTq1bHl2SqROf52YTg02CKUFrRqMxGl6C"],"When":"2024-7-10"},{"Name":"M M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKu275dS-5QNgc4q1qHyf3SvyCJIyDK0JqyninjqCTHfDdFYufg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Old town restaurant offers an exceptional dining experience that combines exquisite cuisine with impeccable service. We sat outside in the beautiful garden. We had the Kleftikon dish, the warm halloumi, the buffalo ravioli and the tiramisu for desert. Each dish, crafted from fresh ingredients was beautifully presented. The knowledgeable and attentive staff further elevate the experience, making Old Town restaurant a standout choice for any discerning diner. Highly recommended!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOncfmd4SSgT2RaTxmgj4ZxIuheRj9aTT7rRwFm"],"When":"2024-7-14"},{"Name":"Adelina Yordanova","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU3NSL2Ie1z4c9w-w7mXBO3E-tWtL5K9J2ikV33xvbdQebCH2Zf=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"**Evening Elegance at Old Town Garden Restaurant**

As the sun set, we made our way to what would become one of our favorite dining spots in Cyprus: the Old Town Garden Restaurant. Nestled in a picturesque garden setting, the ambiance was both romantic and inviting. The restaurant's lush greenery and twinkling lights created the perfect atmosphere for a relaxing evening.

The menu was a delightful mix of traditional Cypriot flavors and contemporary cuisine. Each dish was a work of art, both in presentation and taste. The staff were attentive and knowledgeable, enhancing our dining experience with their recommendations. From the fresh, locally sourced ingredients to the expertly crafted cocktails, every aspect of our meal was impeccable. The highlight of the evening was the perfectly cooked lamb, which was tender and bursting with flavor.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"David Welsh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUMrwKweBdLv0vAEv2ydzPEvrpf9ZdSHV5zRxYX3bCDG-A_BvM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"One of the top restaurants in Cyprus. The Partidge Ravioli is exceptional.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPcYMX0guzgyEp3AQvxsKKSqHF5MpGlkv_g-Qpg"],"When":"2024-10-6"},{"Name":"Bob Spence","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJVoR2qCWLBqlP7SF2s5h5J86jh8yy4lScrZ7lwA0yHWG-CUA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great food, perfectly cooked. Recommend lamb shank and sea bass. Will be back to try other choices. Creme brulee was very good.  Restaurant has a great ambiance and staff first class.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Giulia Longato","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW_WLPtc8Ex_q27fpEP-YJR1vInm30MxktiA2muPibjzGyZ2O8=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Excellent restaurant in Polis. We went there in winter and the menu was not available fully. Despite this, the chef could meet our needs and guaranteed fresh products. We had prawn linguine and a vegetarian moussaka. As a starter, dips with pitta and a salad. Very good value and a kind waitress. Very romantic atmosphere by the fireplace. They have a nice garden and we would like to come back to dine outdoors. Thanks!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMtoZXQB9oSmMttwbiwNJ3oBXlGtz1pPNd8eeYD"],"When":"2023-1-8"},{"Name":"chris wadd","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJtszA8-Vv61EdJSwdlyGYUKugvU-2zJMxgxy-DOkV4AgUudA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Why did it take us so long to visit The Old Town ! No excuses ! What a wonderful experience ! Perfect menu serving perfect food, just remember you pay good money and receive amazing food and service .","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNjDckTC8jpk7cnR5Tyr38-HMQHW8v-1PJPgLUk"],"When":"2023-10-6"},{"Name":"Kieran Murphy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUIVBauXAGdAKoaUYmvpmwg6rZuDo8DQv7jplqX9cYWtkE6Dr5D=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A fantastic evening at the Old Town Restaurant. The atmosphere of the garden, the standard of food & service was something to be congratulated. I cannot recommend this restaurant highly enough & l would like to thank all the staff for their efforts in making our evening truly outstanding.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPe2ZH6WzNkfsHDW4nQ0HmcVUMPjajft5zosfgW"],"When":"2023-6-24"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Maxine Plimbley","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI3iZ2YpmVk1-raSXwNyEQjpo39dSyss9z8fvvxrn9xlSfGhg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Not been here for a few years. Very friendly welcome, very accommodating as we had a 2 years old with us.  Menu varied with something for everyone with prices on par with other local restaurants. Time from food order to table was reasonable with nice portion sizes. Food was flavoursome, we had an enjoyable evening","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Bobby McLeish","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWsVBwko7C7P_rZdtHO8Y0iwAQSwdFgTg1GgBfQkmCgKFtAaMrY7w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Very nice place.  Have eaten many times here on various visits to Polis.  Again our visit this week Oct 1st was excellent.  The food and service was very good and the Cyprus recommended wine was actually drinkable👌  I had the Mussels and the rest of the family went for pasta.  We also had a few side dishes.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMPHfCHyOxA3ZktJXcK4EDBgnmSK563wmG0LySX"],"When":"2023-10-7"},{"Name":"Chris Dring","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLcTkLctQ5GtgC5f9GyYLY7hoHiwg7lcFpV7_Ug5lTJBaOJfA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Visited early evening and were first customers in. Friendly attentive staff. We ate made to order wood fired pizza and really authentic biftiko with veg and chips. Although pizza prices seem a little expensive, they are really authentic and the small size is adequate. For good value ask for wine by the carafe. Enjoyed our visit and would recommend.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNwb3hfxMYOC-fs5L1cE6x6G9ORVjZbu-81Dv-j"],"When":"2023-7-29"},{"Name":"Avyi T.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWc7s6JAosyRT3JSiSPlJ1h_q0EOwL0UF523jFCY-SREox9f0exAw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I have been going to this amazing restaurant ever since I was 6 years old. The food is as delicious as ever, the quality of the food and the flavours are top notch and mr Andreas, the owner, always takes the best of care of his clients. Succulent steaks, flavourful vegetables, heavenly tasty garlic mushrooms and so much more! I love going there again and again!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOTeOfrtyTKAl0XvDVHxPn-kROZeXxlwi4LbU8e"],"When":"2023-8-14"},{"Name":"Stoked Yeti","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWfnSZoX8c1ldrDo6DvpxRfg9SbviNMBVP4mQ-LR7TVGFhrxhE=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Outside tables wit a massive white mulberry tree growing through the roof. Very friendly staff who like to chat and make you feel at home.
Lots of choices on the menu and plenty for vegetarians. Traditional food.
The T-Bone was Scrumptious. Sea bas was rhe catch of the day.
Very nice.
Excellent wine","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNogSpWRxyTDGPqOWpFxax1dZ2K8IXf_PRTYzsY"],"When":"2018-9-13"},{"Name":"Bob Haselip","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL7c-yP2IK-Ftp2YZ2QlJL8INt-mHnQ663DfZq-ERDnSAIMng=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"This has the potential to be an excellent place. Its great to sit outside with a drink and sone traditiinal Greek food. The food is ok - not outstanding but reliable. But the service, or rather lack of, really lets it down. It chaotic with all the staff covering all the tables however they don't pay enough attention so you get forgotten. Shame.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Michael Valavanis","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJFvSfCUpxtRr1oYL6xwrRow-FFH9KPg_4XxznpbqDfGq7VQY-3=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The food was very tasty! Service was great and kind! Really enjoyed my dinner at a great location!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNOg6gO7m8szRXJ4InJvK3AcuYpe4IQMYL4Dtj7"],"When":"2023-10-3"},{"Name":"M M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKu275dS-5QNgc4q1qHyf3SvyCJIyDK0JqyninjqCTHfDdFYufg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"We did wait a little longer for the waiter to take our order and for the food to arrive, but the place was packed so fair enough. The food wasn't something special but it was decent. We had the pork chop and the pasta Bolognese.  Overpriced - you can expect this in a touristic area but 15 euros for a Bolognese that's a lot.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNStGl2tge1AGwnieC-XjOeP8VVBASWxd1cxa5q"],"When":"2023-8-17"}]
