user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Faidra Antoniadou","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWOy1uEs0xarzSQBFIu1LDiYwoS9InR96WuprIAdx_EtBbKlA9S4g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Our recent visit to Porto Latchi was a mixed experience. While the restaurant boasts a beautiful location with stunning views of the sea, especially if you manage to snag a table on the waterfront, the quality of the food and overall dining experience left much to be desired.

Starting with the positives, the Greek salad was fresh and enjoyable, providing a decent start to the meal. Unfortunately, it was downhill from there. Our main courses consisted of carbonara and truffle ravioli, both of which were underwhelming. The carbonara was passable, but nothing to write home about. The real disappointment, however, was the truffle ravioli. Not only was the portion size shockingly small, but the ravioli itself was bland, and the accompanying sauce was far too heavy and stodgy, detracting from what should have been a more refined dish.

Additional issues included the bread, which tasted old and stale, and the precut limes served with our meal were dried out and still had sand on them. This lack of attention to detail was disappointing. Considering all these shortcomings, the meal was also highly overpriced. We ended up paying €41 for just these dishes and a bottle of water, which did not seem justified given the quality and portion sizes.

In summary, while Porto Latchi might offer a pleasant view, the food quality, portion sizes, and pricing leave much to be desired. It's not a place we would recommend based on my experience, especially if you're looking for value for your money and a satisfying meal.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOtcd3D-PqfQjxGTshIwFE_8H4Eg8nsQsH7Au1N"],"When":"2024-9-3"},{"Name":"Fobby","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKzGcHq55PwqCR6ckTH2kG2vKn5hRjLM6KtoryYYNwMVC6kOQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The restaurant is on both sides of the street, on one side you have a more formal setting and the other side nearest the beach is for more relaxed dinning. Overall food was good, but service was pretty standard and we didn’t see a waitress smile. We tried to communicate a bit in Greek (as we learnt some for our trip) but appeared waitress were Russian or Eastern European and didn’t understand it!   We stayed local and noted the owner kept parking his car in the middle of the pavement which was an annoying.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP8NKFBpTsWphiU2phiDdvfY_NnQNTGT2lZ4gLa"],"When":"2024-5-30"},{"Name":"Zoltan Kun","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU-_86UMH_1i6ooqDj2hC8jF08jBL4XgCuiCgggiHxYn6H2Hq7Pqg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Try to avoid if you can. Apart from the location which is admittedly nice, the food is horrific. The staff seem to be unhappy and they do the bare minimum. I ordered a lamb shank, it was dry and had no seasoning. The grilled vegetables were also unseasoned. My 10 years old nephew can make a better meal. Gordon, i have some ideas for the next season of kitchen nightmares…
The coffee was probably made from instant coffee..
I will definitely not come here again…","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPD1Bkbipc2bhmWgIJwAalEdZQLWg7IyGXdWign"],"When":"2024-10-2"},{"Name":"M C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV_Uy92-J__-MAwll1WwYZ3uEysiJbjgirSBqXbjLZV7G8XkkPeZQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"We came here as we had read some good reviews. I honestly felt a bother to the staff. When we ordered the Cyprus starter for 2, no tzakziki or taramasalata as described, I kept some salad  and dips for my main, the waitress frowned when I asked to keep this to go with my main. She wasn't friendly and we didn't feel welcome at all. Shame as it's a lovely location.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNmnKtIzDYUx39OFQUWGXs-xKmLWUI8TtofoDf6"],"When":"2024-10-2"},{"Name":"Philippa James","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX0d5ls15bOPCR7zKfOLulPwRHxAOJmI2JQqeewRw1LMpLPOGh9=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Some really delicious seafood including the Cyprus Prawns, Crab and Fried Calamari. The sea bass was excellent and the white taramasalata was also divine. The local wine was very palatable and reasonably priced. Sadly, the lamb was incredibly disappointing and chewy which you wouldn’t expect from an area famed for great meats.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMAyAgUE6q9aJyLKlZkxlbc9ChtKu1T2Lu5QakO"],"When":"2024-6-24"},{"Name":"Natasa Nyikon","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU3xWk4AMEctTY9bCQQozHQzE5rYNAXEunS74qza8e6yHYiLVk=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I got the fisherman's platter. It was a huge portion, absolute worth the money.
Lovely people, nice- not too loud- music, close to the beach. Definitely recommended.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMLzuYw7WuQ5lmcLTD5KkDXIbav70qCN7eCPbGU"],"When":"2024-5-18"},{"Name":"Malamati Kourti","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKjeYc5ooE9bzsSLhxZ_k3HZYAlo6RBpR6Fd2GUuNGkjDl_aw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"After reading the moderate recent comments we were a little hesitant to go to this restaurant. However we decided to give it a try. We had the fish meze and it was very good. The service was fast even though it was rush hour and the food was tasty. We would come back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOXPxRgwCqSwoeEGiYVKYB0UhLoHK8z4mGFnhFo"],"When":"2024-8-19"},{"Name":"Daria Dubinina","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU-PMMCNJfl_tLBVdcvvpjXFPKXedbm73FgbWybA7rTIYGEYJgF=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Good food especially grilled octopus and fish meze. Beautiful view of the sunset","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM0uEBAnZhliRwY8Y3skgEUoHjNV7HlYa1T6XPk"],"When":"2024-10-8"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Bob Spence","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJVoR2qCWLBqlP7SF2s5h5J86jh8yy4lScrZ7lwA0yHWG-CUA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Fabulous food we did the basic meat Metz which was more than brought for us. Every course was excellent, great tasting and piping hot. For us the top restaurant in Polis. Staff were polite, helpful and easy to talk to. Quality and taste first class. Prices very reasonable. Deserves 5 star rating. NOT to be missed.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPEb3W34jNHSjigqtbw-V71K6uFayV9o5JeCckj"],"When":"2024-9-8"},{"Name":"Frances Harris","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUpHRx-HeumHM14vPwNYI0S4N-n8lKjeFq2rfEhpCRwGp3izWlPgA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We walked past one evening whilst on holiday in August and decided to try the next day, we are glad we did!

We didn't make a reservation but luckily the owners could fit us in as a family of 4. They informed us there would be live music (it was a Friday night) despite not understanding Greek, the act was great and not too loud that you couldn't still hold a conversation.

We ordered the meze and the chicken kebab and chips for the kids to share. The food was amazing! More than enough food for us two and for the kids to try a bit.

We then chose to return on our final night and despite it being exceptionally busy the atmosphere was great, the service was quick and the food was once again delicious! We ordered the meze again for all 4 of us as even our 10 and 5yo old enjoyed the different dishes!  The female owner recommended a Cypriot white wine that was very good too!

The owners and the waiter were lovely and friendly on both visits.

We would highly recommend this place and if we were to return to Polis, we would definitely be back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNE7svu5LgqZFczJlNjNu90l3zXZWhUoFnjYupL"],"When":"2024-8-31"},{"Name":"Dirk Müller","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKUlkUEmHZpxIBL-g0V15asBbBd4rDdETPHCoPxgfoz6qe2Ug=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"From the menu, it is a typical Cypriote restaurant. What is not typical, is the way how the chef prepares the dishes: Delicious meat, vegetables, sides combined with an extraordinary selection of spices. Never had such a good village salad. Definitely a recommendation.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNF2UoPFwdq0EdyzyNE__4risjrxYJnyAzILKzr"],"When":"2024-3-2"},{"Name":"Raymond Ryan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVnD6hny0z_BKoYUSNENThCVGs_YtrjZUBInKR-Bjcipc-FgDwIqA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Just in from having attended this restaurant. I booked a table for 2 of us 24 hours before as having looked at reviews came upon this small restaurant and thought we would give it a try instead of the one in Latchi we had planned to visit. The result.... THE BEST METZE my wife and I have ate and possibly the best meal we have eaten over the many restaurant meals we've ate in the 8 years we've been coming to Cyprus. Very reasonably priced, delicious cooked meats, gorgeous dips and excellent salad. The pictures sadly don't do the meal justice (as I may have already pinched a few pieces off the plates!). My wife loved the large stuffed mushroom, whilst I throughly impressed by the Mossaka (which I believe had a base that had a hint of cinnamon - my favourite spice :)) Overall thoroughly impressed with this family restaurant with the husband cooking and the wife superbly serving the dishes. THIS IS A WEE CRACKER OF RESTAURANT. ITS APPEARANCE MAY BE SIMPLE, BUT THE FLAVOURS, PREPARATION AND SERVICE WERE FIRST CLASS. Thank you. Give it a go, sit down, relax and chill out.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPirZGdit6gxI2TugLXk3G4X_vVRTkZbmAYhDSH"],"When":"2023-10-2"},{"Name":"Gina Theopistou","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWEUw5nLqUA4op513RdBsWgNsx7EQviCHoAyjIPsjSORUA9gIJF=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This restaurant is amazing you should definitely try it. Meze has different flavours and many dishes. It is a modern Cypriot tavern. Also, staff were very friendly.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOM2RbXabgouqjvZd-RBnp8sXchoWjkkDpBaRb_"],"When":"2023-8-4"},{"Name":"Paul Davidson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKBklz_OEhZVJAaESJQE5NO8jTF9wzIk1okQPtsPVwtjZbUkQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Excellent attentive service. Food was superb with very large portions.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNBCRml5LzcJiVyHRhu9GlcQq8qjYBDoTp1jxdw"],"When":"2024-9-24"},{"Name":"Costa Constanti","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV6aS8nFykR8Bbzi2YsZec6e4j8Kh0JQYF6JLnE1eqdwAS937t-Bw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"A meze with a modern twist - quite tasty and good portions. It's got a more Greek themed design to the venue, versus a Cypriot theme, but it's nice. Nice tables that can accommodate a large party - good wine too.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOsHAGZJ-8JnzaOdz5ODsfsrI1K-8nuaoZWehLU"],"When":"2022-8-23"},{"Name":"Jorita Schosswald","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWT7osNAHAxbjzumDOQ5gRJZNEvkmc-AcVUVwZFmu7LjqzczC05=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Picked this restaurant because of the good reviews and were not disappointed. When we arrived on a Saturday evening at 8, it was empty. So a bit afraid if it was still a good place to dine. It is a GOOD place to have dinner. Lam rack was delicious but with only fries and no veggies. The grilled prawns  yammie. It's a pity that it is on a corner of a very busy street. So the traffic is very present due to the noise. The toilet is clean but you can’t lock the door. If we can we will go back. Deserves the 4.8 they already have.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO6-zZzmFyTT6LXMmilA9NwL1YlFr5LcL46erYh"],"When":"2022-9-23"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Elliot May","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV1_gDMKEj4g537IKR1xXxmVwZ4D5ithu_xcw7WdpzDjW5QlxRR=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Best place in Cyprus!
We came to Noma last year when on holiday here, and couldn’t wait to come back - sooo delighted and relieved that, if possible, Noma is even better than before!
The service is excellent - the staff are friendly, and attentive; and the owner, George, is kind and very generous.
There’s always a good atmosphere here - the background music at a good level, the venue itself decorated beautifully, and the harbour side view is stunning.
The food really is incredible - the truffle Croque Madame, in particular, was delicious (as was the steak sandwich and the chicken curry) and the portion sizes were incredibly generous. They were also kind enough to tweak some dishes to accommodate a vegetarian diet (despite already offering some good vegan and vegetarian alternatives); and made a real effort for my mums birthday.
There’s parking at the front of Noma via the gravel track (though it’s a little hard to find); and it’s suitable for disabled access.
I hope Noma stays this good forever but just in case it doesn’t, get down there whilst you still can!
Thanks George and the Noma team","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOMOAo01UTNTSBVD85fKsd3fiWH0W6zvqamnsNs"],"When":"2024-10-7"},{"Name":"Thomas Loebert","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWdtDdDyVIIYE3vHyDn_HePDR5bf12R_ZTvIdfJ1gGPr8KnQwwv=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very nice ambience with pleasant, chilled background music - sometimes by a live DJ - at Latchi harbor with excellent, friendly service and a menu that is unparalleled in Latchi and the surrounding area. Whether breakfast, lunch or dinner, from vegan to traditional dishes - 10/10! The breakfast highlight for me are the Eggs Benedict! The cocktail menu also leaves nothing to be desired. The place to be in Latchi!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNhqkUdQDDaysueDnHwCbBdpimhoPN1wZ6atK5u"],"When":"2023-11-2"},{"Name":"Alexia Berta Demetriou","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVpxRf39phKZYQ6Z7jVjlJasyYhTQnwUf58GxBpv93ynM58OoaJRA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I was pleasantly surprised by this place. From the beautiful and cosy decor, to the many inspiring vegetarian and vegan options (rare in Cyprus) to the delicious meal and truly, without exaggeration the friendliest service I have possibly ever come across in a restaurant.

And the crowning was the complimentary desert.  I missed that warm touch of cypriot hospitality that used to be the norm in the past, it was such a lovely surprise and delicious too.

Prices are reasonable for what you receive. A memorable experience.  I shall return.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP3_-pFyVve5-ogA7vOk9sbT7zo-ckP27YBlXkX"],"When":"2024-10-3"},{"Name":"Christo Christodoulides","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVahhYLUti0fzNckGyJbb_k4_YuP9aqf2srLoCgH707tgBQWjow=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We really hardly ever do online reviews even if we do not like the place, however, we feel truly blessed to come across this hidden gem at Latchi Marina, one of the most picturesque places in Cyprus. The whole family and all friends are absolutely fascinated with the food quality, their menu diversity, and also the service everytime.

Definitely recommend Noma Latchi, our favorite place to go to when in the vicinity.

Well done!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOKXW7fF1Ksw9CgXQqBrnHwnqoIw24ugr9ckf55"],"When":"2024-8-27"},{"Name":"Stevie-Marie Gamblen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKLJ76sGZrV8sitatIrcA7gfEzqgqpoh12FCoQGKRM3vIV-3Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Myself and my partner came here after reading the amazing reviews and we were not disappointed. As soon as you enter from the harbour the Asthetics of the restaurant is beautiful and you are at peace. The food itself is stunning and the service here is perfection. I would highly recommend visiting Nona Latchi.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipML7UQazeECIppEKKUr9srSRTuwLkzx9aLfUnB7"],"When":"2024-9-9"},{"Name":"Martyn Jennings (MJ)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV6gFnc2KWv0K7_WiDIV0BiSLX9LlYYGWMaESdg06stEujG5Sqhgg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Food is great and very tasty with good portion sizes. Staff didn’t seem happy on our visit but may have been a bad day.

Great open air seating, and fans are welcome. With drinks averaged at 30 euros each","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNCXjpODQeuSSrS7IFrDUllcIhKRr3flHuP4Abd"],"When":"2024-7-30"},{"Name":"Daren King","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXxeEsMmkKWbi0hyPFwOXq1gLOo7N7pViQSp326wlKCCqyKKHPZ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Lovely place for a coffee and brunch. (Haven’t had dinner there yet).  Had an amazing latte and club sandwich.   They also have a dynamic instagram follower ticker.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP4IsYXkjZyQCihtwUEyzwZmjDtLFWueQSaw0oA"],"When":"2024-7-12"},{"Name":"Maja","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWpoKuzbXAtNBw_oJZGqhYt0o820t5HSuCnsEHMkACIJztd_YuuGA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We loved that place a lot!!
Me and my friends went there on breakfast today, the food was perfect and the staff was incredibly friendly and nice, the place is extremely beautiful and we really enjoyed our time here, thank you so so much!! 🩷🫶 I reccomed this to everyone, especially for brunch, we had avocado with sourdough bread shakshuka and pancakes with salted caramel and it was simply incredible. Thank you 🩷","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMn4f8KKwXH7Op5RTWj9Uug6stjGxH_DSd7tDCV"],"When":"2024-5-27"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Evi Ed","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocILIbvE7h8cYPJBfFsXogNYZKbVWeQXiF7ejzAhctc4f5IKlw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Such a lovely place! Especially the octopus was probably the most delicious one I have ever tried! We dined  here two time although it took us an hour to get there :) I also very much enjoyed the wine here! The homemade Baklava was delish as well!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMNSplHBRLmfPEj8Y6pTElgcfLJA8nR8XMoErmu"],"When":"2024-9-17"},{"Name":"Adam Bachratý","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIJWJeK4fEvX-DSldztRnBo5Txk303EQYmn1TYAjIvNGb3trIwu=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"We found this restaurant on Google Maps and, after seeing the good reviews, decided to go for dinner (4 people). Right from the start, I can say that the restaurant doesn’t deserve the high rating it has on Google. After being seated, we waited at least 25 minutes for a waiter to take our order, despite the restaurant not being full. Other tourists who arrived 10 minutes after us were served before us, which was frustrating!

The food was average at best, and some dishes were disappointing. I definitely do not recommend the calamari rings—they were soggy, slimy, and simply unappetizing. The fish, octopus, and shrimp were fine. However, the fries were drenched in oil, making them incredibly greasy and ruining their taste.

For starters, we ordered tahini, fish roe spread (twice), and pita bread. This was the one thing I can’t criticize—it was all good. The pork souvlaki that my friend ordered was below average: burnt on the outside, raw on the inside, and poorly seasoned.

On the plus side, after the meal, we were given complimentary dessert—a cake that tasted very good—and a traditional strong Cypriot spirit. However, another negative was the service after the meal. We wanted to pay, asked the waiter for the bill, and had to wait another 15-20 minutes to receive it.

We left the restaurant with mixed feelings.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNNUZaC-bJwpYk4XW0xBODnC-3yKwIJ5eMv-heX"],"When":"2024-9-8"},{"Name":"Troy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLDmdn5TAaDGgfmoaGAmC8BcbSwGPGbvkdPgJX-EduyuBYmpg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Our favourite restaurant whilst visiting Cyprus!
A small, beautiful, family run, authentic restaurant down a quiet road with spot on service and amazing food. Lovely little outdoor dining area aswell as indoor tables.
We wanted to try a different restaurant every night during our stay but here we dined twice as it was so good!
Every meal we tried was perfect especially the slow cooked lamb and their chips were
to die for! Also the village red wine was delicious.
Very friendly, helpful service from the owner and his son and they also have pet cats and kittens (which instantly made this my daughters favourite from the second we walked in).
Very reasonably priced. 4 main meals plus a lot of wine and beer came to roughly €60.
Highly recommend, this would be the first place we’d head to for dinner if we were to go back to Cyprus!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPBhKR4UQPWeon-LsS3Zhb5-DZffnnRCBnxrhvQ"],"When":"2023-8-20"},{"Name":"Šarlote Katkovska","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUwvYg-VH0U19JCMZcrvAcneb4zpoqp2ht7LiOtFZRit_HvnoJy=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It is a very nice place with tasty food, great service and a lovely atmosphere.
We had meat meze - very tasty, it was a lot of food for us.
We got local liqueur and cake on the house. The cake was so good that we wanted to buy one more piece, but it was served on the house.
Thank you for this nice experience!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Pat Walkington","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVfG2PrSz5I9YIfeXu5iGUesBhbpD9zTYXvJPSoFQNWWa5w7XM=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We're just back from a fabulous meal. Gorgeous food, charming staff and a lovely atmosphere. I have been dreaming of kleftiko since we decided to come to Cyprus and these guys did not disappoint. The meat was so tender it was almost liquid! My partner's fish was delicious too and the starters and deserts were just divine. All washed down with a perfectly serviceable half liter each of wine (one red, one white) and a cheeky shot to make the bill a little easier. Less than €60! We'll be back!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Piotr Tobiasz","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWVAMLQ9v-tWlLzhsiMbqadb9i0nc6NR84rnGXH58seCfsCVJQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"One of the most beautiful restaurants I have ever been to. The food was great, drinks were superb. We were also greeted by an amazing service. A must-go place when you are visiting western Cyprus.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPsahA65-vjPK8x7USi0KlZHUYjI0Hy4bJqBR5e"],"When":"2023-9-3"},{"Name":"Dimitar Tsonev","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJsDHdQ41Ypv3btYlnWhAtbSSm4blsS0YYCBLr9RMcIp-UC8gAF=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I felt discriminated as I am solo so had to sit inside and at the corner.
One of the guy was shouting to the other staff the entire evening.
It’s giving professional and quite rude.
However the Starters were amazing, I had prawns for main and the were a bit average.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"STEVEN ROBERTSON","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVfwu0xoHVSIaevHvLLPvRcOnV4-IxNtS-ZHNi4c_jNYbnyFg0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We came here twice for dinner during our short week long stay.  The food is simply exceptional - from dips and seafood platter to prawns, saganaki, mixed grill and octopus, it was all delicious.  One of a very few restaurants in the area that sell Retsina, but also have a really nice wine list of quality local wines.  The owners are personable and make the dining experience even better.  We had such great evenings here that we didn’t think to touch our phones so we have no photos!","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Georgia Christodoulou","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ-Y9UT7iXXEmkel6Vd5n2YYK7BJ2L1TddPym_kUR1P98_35g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Had dinner while watching live football match.\nThe burgers were good except from the two types of frozen fried potatoes. I would prefer to have fresh cut fried potatoes instead. A good experience and reasonable prices.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipONv3_t1NBCOZNFySx0e6WspXFc0ws5-2XHvU_U"],"When":"2024-8-23"},{"Name":"Maijella Harris","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKHzheVEpZinfFHWFQbeiQBRirIB225g9gko0eUQZ7NzApn0g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Fantastic place. Portions are very generous and so tasty and staff are really friendly wand welcoming. Great location. Definitely recommend","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP5FF_54ne47hM-mPk64RmeLQpfdONdJJ9PZ4yb"],"When":"2024-9-22"},{"Name":"Jackie Moore","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJq4NE1wbi3ancVl4msk7Gia-tWDsYE6_d00mxmSZvWGxlnaWo=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Beautiful food, lovely friendly staff. Quiet when we were there as late evening and late season. We had a pasta and a burger. Would highly recommend it. Go there!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Andrew Rutecki","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUvas6ulaYRzPRjy2RPmM2UhKZSb0y0lQPB4T3ZwAG8VnoE-fE5=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Good burgers, they don't skimp on portions, fries were crispy, the drinks offered are great(and we got some on the house which was awesome) and this will sound weird but by FAR the best and cleanest bathrooms I've seen on the island. 5 stars","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Colin Thomson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLGNuQm_3ZMIAgcvT8zmXnlUWkd9Iq5p--yuZhnXogMlybvew=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Fabulous food. The chicken pasta dish was fresh, tasty, a generous portion and well cooked. Service was friendly and polite. Highly recommend.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM7Deh2hNlx4G9bK_Eg77h6_8JFbQhk4gz30Zo6"],"When":"2024-10-11"},{"Name":"katerina masoura","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXcHi7-GsOKX62aiCF5oQpxDOc2KbEkdsgVc9aZ6zo9Q8viTj8M=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A very pet friendly place with the best burger in town","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMdL78dch2JNnBPLlz94gkeW5uhyEevSTOTfAhC"],"When":"2024-10-1"},{"Name":"Bobby McLeish","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWsVBwko7C7P_rZdtHO8Y0iwAQSwdFgTg1GgBfQkmCgKFtAaMrY7w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Had a couple of very late night cocktails after dining elsewhere.  Cocktails were very nice and the staff are very nice and attentive.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP9g0DQwUHI7P7CuIpM1U-S02ptoj_obuoPC7Sq"],"When":"2024-10-2"},{"Name":"Constantinos Philippides","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWT16OItBB9mF5t67-hn173Ex4HjnVjmxFoWLuWi1ZAsNu0KwBu=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Lovely place to go and have cocktails and relax. The music  was awesome and they had a local band with live music and entertainment we enjoyed it so much. The staff was very happy  and helpful made  us feel very comfortable and enjoyed every moment. The prices are amazing for what you get. Will go back soon that's for sure.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOYHxmbp9x3uMiFWYKvM57-oy9ZwyDeD7dSC_3d"],"When":"2020-8-29"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Teri Allerton","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVVLqxxQXTNhCbueQ67N4zDqOIodTkVFQpLdcV3qFMGOe6xpzVc=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A fabulous evening with good friends complemented by the harbour side table in the moonlight! The comprehensive menu was tempting and offered a wide choice of tasty interesting food choices which were delicious leaving us all wanting to return to try other dishes!
The wine menu was excellent and the service and welcome genuinely warm and inviting, we felt relaxed and loved every minute of our visit. 10/10 for us!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNzYYi-7by5ywhVCKO-XV15pZle9-GGnSV5zbVv"],"When":"2024-7-26"},{"Name":"Sandy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ8ZR3dWHCPQV1LFooUH08Gd7Xgo510-mb6QIu8q111Vr0e_A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Milo’s Restaurant is situated in 29RV+9MW, E713, Poli Crysochous 8820, Cyprus. This view was amazing from our table overlooking the Marina. We ate chicken wraps, chicken in Pita and grilled chicken. The portions were large and the dessert - apple pie and ice cream was delectable.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOOKwH1KvPeX_Ou_4Ee_7HF8Jphq5tQu7p77_hH"],"When":"2024-4-11"},{"Name":"Garry Mortimer-Cook","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX_vqBfgaV33rjGnjf30WJt6R7jr04CwSCSmgOzhM2v6fD_SRmzhA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great lunch for three, Caesar Salad, Calamari, Home made burger and Moussaka. It offers good value compared to some others around it.
Excellent food and service.
Also visited for a dinner, excellent Swordfish on roasted Med Veg 😋
Recommended 👍","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPOilCItzo9tVTNuR7TuhY7p7FNBX31o_f55tRy"],"When":"2024-6-4"},{"Name":"Geoffrey Wood","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXmKRqaA5E2KJwmwdAftA3yYJUa1uG0l093cgksYtXHX_s1VKY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Always a great place to east, good food , friendly staff and reasonably priced with a good view.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNnqzxnjP9oF0X7gfnKWDPH1wpdAPu3KfyLPT_F"],"When":"2024-9-19"},{"Name":"Marija Nikolić","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWhGduMuyjtvYILxY9rTAlTjKUqQ7GANonDueDY7FOgvu3_OyFp=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We've jumped right out of the Atlantis boat to this restaurant, since they've had a table right underneath the fan. Typical cypriot restaurant serving mostly seafood dishes that we wanted to try, but it was so damn hot that we've ended up with a mix of starters. Everything on the table was tasty, but average, nothing really special. Squid was probably frozen and fried and halloumi had some strange carrot/cabbage company that really wasn't meant to be there. Sausage is awesome! The waiter was polite, smiling and very caring, big plus is having cyprus coffe on the meny which is the only coffee we like to have.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM_2YKAbRQg8XeybAKTt62vVYKXBryoqdpx-eE"],"When":"2023-8-29"},{"Name":"Danis Morankić","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL3BunJYm9nTn2jiD7dHLqT0fo7sxKq4k3xkx7G84N-spwnKQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Loved the ac and the position of this restaurant. Didn't order food but the owner and waiters were very nice. Relatively cheap for the location and comfortable chairs and tables.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"The WWII Professor","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXpCrw7RhEVOJN2AD2aE7r2XILNpVY_aMpTSH8yA-Z7NSeMU3st=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"The fried prawns were the worst I ever ate circumnavigating the globe for 35 years. Smelled dirty too...IMO. The prawns were battered and thrown in a fryer. After de-veining the crap trap, removing the head, shell, etc., you have a small mountain of waste and an even smallert portion of prawns....fitting the palm of your hand. In my opinion, an over-priced tourist restaurant.  However, service was excellent and atmosphere great.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Aaron Vellam","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWb8vNooxIuHVcObfC3_wf5ftfWyqUF59SFYQ6deFA7GhkXz4s=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"An amazing setting by the harbour in Latchi where you can sit and relax and watch the various boats coming and going. We were seated very quickly close to the main walkway and issued with menus. We then had a fairly lengthy wait, maybe 10-15 minutes, before anyone came to take our orders for drinks, by which time we were able to order food at the same time. Meanwhile, a table closer to the water became available and they were happy for us to move. When our drinks arrived 1 of the 4 was missing and this was quickly rectified. When the food arrived it was delicious - Chicken Baguette, Fish and chips, Kids chicken nuggets. The final meal - the kids Margarita pizza wasn’t to our child’s liking as it came with actual slices of tomato on it 🤦🏻‍♂️🤦🏻‍♂️.  When they came to collect plates once we were finished they checked everything was ok and we explained that only 1 slice of pizza was eaten but that it wasn’t any fault of the restaurant and we asked for the bill. When the bill came the waiter explained that they had removed the pizza from the bill as it hadn’t been to our taste which I thought was more than they needed to do and was very generous. The only reason for not giving a full house of 5 stars was because of the wait when we first arrived to order drinks.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN_7n5ODkcJkDugRfOnxJ28PmsqPp8KixqL2WU"],"When":"2023-8-28"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Klaudia Rymek","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVLllOjh5kcru88SprA_z0pbwbAgQPLIHeNVJFpwLbEbc47WIM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Delicious starters and main courses, very interesting.

Even though we ate after sunset and the sea was no longer visible, you could still feel it! The restaurant is very close to the sea and that is wonderful! At the end we got a free delicious dessert.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOBh4wYPFmBVc6gjj9vkYNOokRsXAM8b1PCRfl7"],"When":"2024-10-8"},{"Name":"Handyman","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLuAm0PjOT0A58G4X5lUnTSYpgkup-ICKBpsG8MVwzgNAzy8A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Fabulous restaurant on the most beautiful setting on the beach.
The food served was outstanding alongside the customer service.
The owner and staff were always friendly and kind.
We visited every night for 10 days it was that good.
We would give more than 5 stars if we could","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNaoRpj_hXpXgS6xsKAAYbcpyUZ8z8jR60fF4--"],"When":"2024-9-11"},{"Name":"Kev Sutton","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXf9mPcgaQ8kqU6a_FQK4Xqz1xIozsuuQajCbl5UtC4X_ISqaxwaw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Went for lunch while we were driving around the other side of the Island. Great location, right on the beach and looked like a lovely place to have a late evening meal!

Food was good and plenty of it, service was fairly quick. The only let down was the staff failed to manage a single smile between any of them, it felt a bit like we were an inconvenience to be honest. Shame because it could have been a great experience otherwise.

Toilet block on site and parking, not the biggest car park though!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPqcNpLODR9EMjKk1NVyxUSwr-dggLuLpmE4Axs"],"When":"2024-7-10"},{"Name":"Neil Fisher","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXYXSgSOVHI_xSSIYccxz9IAoeb4du3b9tmTrnGW8shpuAV-zSm=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A must place to visit if you in the location
Excellent meal, and a friendly atmosphere with an amazing view.
Lamb kebab was easy on the eye, and went down really well perfectly cooked.
Friendly staff, and a clean environment","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOoz376mAkTtrSZuiGMZyU0ZQjbG9q_4CGyRR0e"],"When":"2024-6-18"},{"Name":"Alex C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ-36mNA9c8DCEZ8nBH0AFleZJD24NnUztsNmU3xnMM30SF=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A girl at George’s boat rental recommended this one. Nice place, especially in the evening when the it’s not that hot and you can sit at the table 5 m from the sea. Prices are reasonable and food was good. There’s a playground for kids as well","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNmqH2CXcQdTh0_DORp7vGgAViSM4AJqc18ksE"],"When":"2024-6-9"},{"Name":"Teri Allerton","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVVLqxxQXTNhCbueQ67N4zDqOIodTkVFQpLdcV3qFMGOe6xpzVc=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Fabulous beach taverna! Excellent menu choice, great food and service with Shirley Valentine tables on the beach which are stunning to eat whilst watching the sun go down.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPDztLnGGQ6qG1lKI9Yp6l5alIdMIktSFzjibcW"],"When":"2024-9-18"},{"Name":"Alexandru Negru","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXzahMV1lr0XVGbTHERU_eWvhhYsLxPucjB_K7Jk9vsM6NKHfeY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great Food! The meat is very suculent and well cooked, meat mix for 2 is too much for one serving! We enjoyed it takeaway!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP2GYzNBj1VICTm_r767WBSVvG-w8G-QCQ9-jNK"],"When":"2024-9-27"},{"Name":"Alison Manels","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJy3TWxWbeUJ0RXXSplgNUx-Of5PMCcvBSMTm6TPvybGdZRAw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Lovely out look. Sun setting over the sea. Their Moussaka was absolutely delicious .","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOMDTNNqelyWbN1MRGqvZItEV82wdHqcSZxLp75"],"When":"2024-9-12"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Eleni Kyprianou","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKekvjCn-kRmdsPi_wUybv_jBUDUUkchSkzTlGKR-zgm7crmQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"One of the very good restaurants in Cyprus. Best zucchini balls and pitta in the wood oven. Tortellini is also really good. The chicken with gnocchi was perfectly good. Crispy on the outside and soft on the inside and very well seasoned. The sauce could have a little more taste. The kritharotto was also tasty and the meat melted in the mouth! Worths a visit!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMaSUbKSWzohU4eihVq2qvpOiKcYBlkerO1r6ZK"],"When":"2024-7-12"},{"Name":"Karim Mouawad","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK0i37VmiOx2fqcqCk1-UNvE5CKoV8o9SP1WpCkwYVwwrpbiQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Beautiful atmosphere and yummy food. Really enjoyed this restaurant. Make sure to book in advance because it’s generally always full! Thank you!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMIw9bFPYPYBpmLEt165tefdMK3-1CntB7uwd2O"],"When":"2024-9-11"},{"Name":"G S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVaZoMahaQYlEyfVYe0lD4igF2D47w5lBMsWZa9G-CYBmzg2vU=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great restaurant! Amazing and delicious dishes! Atmosphere is very good and the staff is very friendly and the service is excellent! All plates were tasty! We will definitely visit again! Highly recommended!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNN4NmIOEIgDTZ_53MKGxbLC6W0VHqeNeNLW7dE"],"When":"2024-5-23"},{"Name":"Constantinos Solomonides","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVHSp-Gh4FDjznAWXsmGMYF5Py4XPmU9HUds_8iL5KgWl6jJD5jhw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing place to have a business or casual lunch. Great selection of dishes, including cooked, legumes, fish and meat. Nice starter and great service. Overall quality is really high, from the atmoshere, nice outside garden, to the ingredients and staff. Will visit again for sure.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOrg2h8BcQ1Fw-07HwAesegJmOXkoT-DkjlNYnu"],"When":"2024-8-13"},{"Name":"Vladimir Novikov","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWx6Lbhk6BHG4cuRDIbY0PmfjTVf3sLt45XPe6m0UKbQxopZ4D-xw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great place! Salad with tomato’s is better then from San Marciano. I hope Italians will forgive me. All dishes were amazing. Souvlaki, eggplant at charcoal and all the pastas. Only problem you need to book the table at least two weeks in advance.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMcyweTBnv0r6tr9nXzAVNRHnNsq09gO-gGWEhD"],"When":"2024-6-21"},{"Name":"eleni likartsi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW1zwIcCIJAchlhhWjQPFk374C14evz7BYujzuIQJiE8TuQfDDOFw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The place is amazing. We visited while it was decorated for Christmas and it was so beautiful! They also have an open space with mandarin trees which they decorated with Christmas lights and it was really pretty!

The food was excellent! We were 4 people and we ordered many different plates and they all were nicely done and delicious! The osobuko was great!

The service was very good, everyone was polite and smiling and they let us come in a little before they open!

I will definitely visit it again once I am back in Nicosia!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNPBlYymVyTQ2LTdPWpx2oqyn2dS8rX2J7Xg2Kd"],"When":"2023-11-26"},{"Name":"V Y","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI-2atVJbVqyKJ1TFPHGjJncimgXwkr1le2dW-hW7-8Ve7zk9Y=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Fabulous Greek & Cypriot cuisine dishes can be had at this restaurant. The food tasted delicious, but I wouldn’t call it particularly innovative. I would definitely recommend this restaurant, but I wouldn’t visit again myself, as you could have similar dishes at restaurants elsewhere.

The ambiance is amazing, especially the indoor garden, and the service was fantastic.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPtRtBkh8MLzBP3ElwITFA6vThPyf_vodU7kiZ6"],"When":"2023-12-29"},{"Name":"Kyriacos Costa","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUjkRs-dJAdfGgUsDMoY9xeijayYBFte1_PPF-ql3yZGWsTHviI=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Beba restaurant is top quality 👌🏼 Food and service are excellent all the time. I especially loved the Shieftalia and the Kritharoto and for dessers both Karidopita and Semi Freddo are excellent. Note that you have to book way in advance if you want to find a table.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMjm0-HYrWAGp8n7crJFTow5YPZWK_M8q5_IkIn"],"When":"2024-4-7"}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Jesus Granados","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVh3hL68QSELPfqSsDTDHfHUvpNlyXgtU0Q9_68DyDTTMwX8Ubs=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The food is traditional Greek/Cypriot and is really good. Marinated Chicken was delicious. They brought different kinds of dishes to share and we couldn’t finish that amount of food. The price is also very affordable. It’s a good option. It’s popular and always full.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO4qMcCpzl0SyYzWNuEkPFcZTeGuzasQ_Ja66m3"],"When":"2024-9-8"},{"Name":"Antoni Verger","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKz5rOQwcRygGqIgNeg-WJ1w_uZxMuuWFr3DMkrzs_2p0mU1Cw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"An exceptional dining experience! The food was simply amazing, served in an elegant and beautifully designed restaurant. The staff was incredibly friendly and attentive, going above and beyond to ensure a memorable visit. To top it off, they surprised me with a complimentary dessert, which was a delightful touch. Highly recommend this place for anyone looking for greek food and outstanding service!\"","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO-n4wHG2fXqkndd61FeUJ7InsLPYKAD3BvA9kV"],"When":"2024-8-26"},{"Name":"Anna Hostelgeeks","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVDNsHw4tyg4NbuxHjJqyjKLoucR4LALtxW97xfpFyPNd-fxyA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Best option to eat while visiting Nicosia. Food is delicious, staff were also super nice. We had to wait a bit outside to get a table inside with A/C but was totally worth it. The zucchini balls with yogurt sauce were really good.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMI3F2I1Eg-oIg8ZIa3UaRU1jrzdeP1whhSL0qX"],"When":"2024-8-5"},{"Name":"Jinyu W","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJQZIJL-34DZl1osDucEHADrHfK2pNe_rB3Gl9YMvJe0x0uYg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Good food with big portions. Went there twice during my stay in Cyprus.\nCourgette coquettes were the best!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMOqbsyr2xAJBSl5Sp-SKJKit5JTMcrScCGO3af"],"When":"2024-9-30"},{"Name":"Steven Courtney","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXxUhWiSVsu5J8AhNXha4nQKVMR6yKb5jiK58y7pz6zUc9shD9fBQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is an absolutely wonderful restaurant. It was almost full when we arrived, but we managed to get a table. We thought that the huge crowds already seated would mean slow service for us, but no! Almost immediately came the drinks, and then food. The portions are massive. We ordered thinking that only ingredients mentioned on the menu would be served, and so padded it out, but no! Many items come with unmentioned bread and/or fries. The lamb chops were particularly tasty. The staff were so friendly, too. I recommend this place 100%.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPnuK1BtAfQMSgqmb96bmOrx6I7frHoX0FuaqmN"],"When":"2024-8-30"},{"Name":"Nicholas Charles","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXnKfi1ZF5cdHnDvHB2W3SDJqAdwMY1FX5T2wwwNIUfs9yngFgh=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I have visited a lot of Greek tavernas, and I must say this is certainly one of the best. The ambience is excellent, the service quick and on point and then there's the food! Simply excellent; a true flavour of traditional Greek Cypriot cuisine.\nMake sure you stay at the end for the complimentary Mahalebi!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNu1K0qJU3QQsfiKPngdswASY47iXK6FJOkVsqT"],"When":"2024-6-22"},{"Name":"B M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJc2lre2HKbLjOumI8Glr7xZ_pk67vzTvIKiqDDQT7jfOukE8c0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Best value for money restaurant we've came across in Cyprus. Portions are huge, food was delicious and we even got a salad, dessert and liquor on the house! Great experience 👌","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNBWJ02AqAdh39zRbkFYDYVILCy6z9xakBovDJ7"],"When":"2024-6-3"},{"Name":"Lucas Domingues","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKRpvHt7aeTlX7pwuxKNVARI7AJICy0D8uUOTJ8ooyTQ0lfIw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Super delicious with affordable prices!! Portion were very generous as well! They even gave us free dessert and liqueur at the end of the meal!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPJix_1xlQhpwH-sVTXJ32a7Atx8ydL11KNN8OU"],"When":"2024-5-11"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Richard Hughes","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJYJL5WidrFMky5weHdxRVxnpyPjN_nLGv8Mc3w2ZmyoVxltA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Simple local food with generous portions and cheap drink prices. Lots of locals here rather than all tourists
Good service
Cheap and cheerful
It pays to go away from the Polis main tourist strip","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM5KgQlRy2d1iO4X3WC8UDB6WJpNvqSrqUlA47Z"],"When":"2024-6-16"},{"Name":"Bobby McLeish","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWsVBwko7C7P_rZdtHO8Y0iwAQSwdFgTg1GgBfQkmCgKFtAaMrY7w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I like this place.  Clean and simple and food and drinks are reasonably priced.  Great location just to sit and have a beer and watch what's happening locally.
*Update* Visiting again in the Polis area and popped into this place for a beer and lunch, since my last update, absolutely nothing in addition to say or report. LATEST UPDATE: Sept 2024.  Out and about exploring, I did plan to stop for a cool drink, but there was a MASSIVE shouting match and argument between to staff females.  I heard it from way up the road.  They continued screaming at each other and closed the doors !!  I'm so happy I did not arrive earlier to witness this up close !!  FURTHER UPDATE: Popped in for some Tea and Toast and some cold drinks.  This time everything was acceptable, no shouting or fighting amongst staff, so I thought it only fair to leave another review and I've upgraded them to 3 stars.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipODtrHZhDmCQZ2axFE7OnSUs2-mYNgU4ITQh_2g"],"When":"2024-9-29"},{"Name":"Bartłomiej Noga","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU1GEZOF3mw9XCcFCDbX8q2KFVdOH9n0CThQ2glHch3l6J4SZEGPA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"What a great place to eat , everything fresh and super tasty! Spaghetti for kids , fried Kalmar, tasty chips , salad , cheese perfect for me !","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPc9lCDdT44Z9rf55x_g0hAio1LH3twjZO5C_x7"],"When":"2023-1-7"},{"Name":"John Cameron","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUm6z9zmrb6a3mCozrmHLYl3N_oD_8Kc0YPI4lBBsYflv_e7ROjcw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Food was alright and the service was friendly. However, there were people smoking in the restaurant and I had my baby with me. Had to pack up our plates etc and move outside. Staff were helpful enough moving things but why are we having to do this in 2019.
Do not come here if you have children or you don't like smoke whilst you eat.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMTHecaB93fXPtn5d9NpJ2HllqHDiHEv4_ASaKD"],"When":"2019-4-17"},{"Name":"Rebecca Mitchell","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU-yKq9FN5s5YB8tBF9ZT-5hXEsMZbykMDCjDEKxbLYlh_SchvkYA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Food was absolutely amazing. I had the pork souvlaki which I highly recommend!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Graham Butterfield","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIVO5DIb5nw5Bo43vvX3eVUTNMeLPB0MNpRvb1-_R0vqilezA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Really tasty food, friendly staff, generous portions. Popular with local residents which speaks volumes for the value for money.  This has been our favourite restaurant visited during our 2 centre stay in Cyprus.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Chris Dring","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLcTkLctQ5GtgC5f9GyYLY7hoHiwg7lcFpV7_Ug5lTJBaOJfA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We visited early evening and were first customers. Young waitress didn't appear to want to be there. Food came after quite a wait but was worth the wait...mixed grill and calamari with chips. Portions large and authentic food. Atmosphere I'm sure would be better later but we would recommend.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Allan McCallum","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXr1JlVb-4DGWcODeXVZ_8PtWIpGXbOc085BVkUIDHEev2XwsbeQQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Simple Cypriot fare well made and very tasty. This family run place is worth a visit.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Doc Moc","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJuva_KzUQdMtV-JMfE_YWaEcywij9ftRZ8WU1cs8HYZhQyGw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Mezze overkill here, ha, ha! No menue, only Mezze with >20 components. Delicious and very diverse. Definitely worth its money. As it is clearly just too much for a single person, they also feed the poor with whatever you cannot manage yourself. Support!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNRMC9xW9hPoZG8iczdyJ82kzODLl6jiy5MH0ya"],"When":"2024-10-3"},{"Name":"יניב דוד לוי","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWJ8V4oCF7d3WMoJcLBm6NpUmqD4WEHk5fvwdXyfi9xhggyma40=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We wanted to taste traditional food. We found this place, it's a mezze taverns. Not a classic tavern but the atmosphere was great. They proposed us to take mezze menu (to be honest, i don't think they have another option of service... hahaha). The food is good and arrived in very big quantities!! 22 different mezze! The meat arrived at the end...so wait for it. We took a Rose wine, beers, soda ext... and paid 38€ each.

Not the best food in town but definitely worth the experience and your money.

Excellent service.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN005f3ZM_XiJLd274Sxca5db7iJytb65x_2VOI"],"When":"2024-3-27"},{"Name":"Alex Siamantas","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWXnBxBx1653oJp4-6b21ftmRV6NWIeZr8wq_XpJ3V0xrsX5msBpw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Zanettos is one of the oldest traditional taverns in nicosia. They serve only mest meze, which is practically everything. The quantity of food is insane, but the taste is even better! Every time i visit this place, i can't wait to come back! 5/5 from me!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM3NgmpXoiR-p0g4WvY4qJhct7FxUZ_nxg_qeB6"],"When":"2024-1-19"},{"Name":"CAPATINA ROXANA","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXN7OxCNsuEegMiaVIi5ISA8f4m7lIbIjWzMBO2ZRf63HQVSPoBrg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"An interesting experience of Cypriot meze with a little bit of everything: salads, fresh french fries, zucchini fries, pork and chicken meat, two types of sausages, halloumi cheese, bulgur, a type of  rice with spinach, olives and a good dessert. A little bit too much for two people in my opinion.
I enjoyed the cozy atmosphere of their green garden terrace during our dinner time,  surrounded with jasmine and trees.

The food is good and fresh, and I couldn't help but notice that the terrace got crowded immediately after 7 pm, and more than half of the customers seemed to be locals, spending quality time with family on a Sunday evening, enjoying this location and the meze meals.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOnOW-641XQ2vC6v9KPfiAuq-ZTTcBmP-XUZQOJ"],"When":"2023-10-9"},{"Name":"Martha Gerolemou","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVidUa-yKqC-Kj1tYiM__2Yv8Od2pUfi1cmUkiUNOy2NQhcBjJ2Sg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Visited this place in 2016 and was pleasantly surprised how amazing the food was. Fast forward to my next visit to Cyprus and this was on the top of my list to revisit. Let me tell you, it didn't dissapoint. Food was plentiful but all very traditional with amazing flavours. Service was great. Do your taste buds a favour and visit this place, you won't be disappointed.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNyVZfVCFQqJz_jXVjxLBJ4L076U7e9-CangvRC"],"When":"2022-10-19"},{"Name":"V Y","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI-2atVJbVqyKJ1TFPHGjJncimgXwkr1le2dW-hW7-8Ve7zk9Y=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"What can I say, this place is just phenomenal!!! Starting off with the owner who has a very Mediterranean familiarity about him that is just lovely to interact with!! Made it feel very welcoming.

The food was absolutely phenomenal!! We just ordered 2 mezzes (no menu) and all of the food below came. ALL of it was fantastic! The staff was friendly and always very attentive. I think this is a hidden gem in the old city of Nicosia. Definitely visit it if you’re into authentic good food!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOnzuf8Cl5Q-Ry3WkmIDGkFQPuQuIOVDrzn6-eG"],"When":"2021-7-12"},{"Name":"Batu Azizoğlu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWY_aGXJ4Efaph9oseZi_LWmws-iqo0BPBQWqdpeIYzvogq5KJ9=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It’s a real Cypriot taverna! Mezze’s are different and good. Also meat especially seftallia taste is awesome 🚨","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN8s5YOldMshdoxZx2i67OMYRJK3XraiwBOwuw3"],"When":"2024-6-20"},{"Name":"Costa Constanti","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV6aS8nFykR8Bbzi2YsZec6e4j8Kh0JQYF6JLnE1eqdwAS937t-Bw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Unbelievably huge meze, a right belly-buster. Great value for money, top (and fun!) service, good quality staple Cypriot foods and plenty of atmospheric corners indoors in winter and outdoor yard in summer. This is a MUST visit when in Nicosia.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPwTxv3EIrbKZXAnQXFIcC88QgKdTEEC3ty8DHM"],"When":"2022-8-5"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"ZomBee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWhp8eOzuOgZy69vJ_YRnDCmwxwA60Td_2SaLE2tt0ag3-noob1=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had an extraordinary dining experience at this restaurant. The chef is truly fantastic and incredibly creative, delivering dishes that are Michelin star quality.

What stood out to me was the careful attention to detail and the dedication to incorporating historical Cypriot dishes into the menu.

Each dish was a delightful journey through the rich culinary traditions of Cyprus, reimagined with a modern twist.

The service was equally impressive. Everyone was smiling and took great care of us, making us feel very welcome. We opted for the tasting menu, which was specially prepared for us on the spot, even though the restaurant typically offers a regular menu.
The selection was amazing and showcased the chef's talent and creativity.

Two standout dishes were the cabbage-wrapped seafood, which was truly outstanding, and the hamachi in almond sauce, which we highly recommend!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOof2TxnXgqCnbwoG-rCiR6GSCze5noXV4lmsHP"],"When":"2024-5-19"},{"Name":"Vladimir Novikov","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWx6Lbhk6BHG4cuRDIbY0PmfjTVf3sLt45XPe6m0UKbQxopZ4D-xw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing place! We have anniversary of our wedding, everything was perfect. We order degustation set, all set was perfect, a lot of local product. It was like small trip out of Cyprus with Cyprus taste. The chef is brilliant, with so much love to what he did and to the Cyprus.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNj2axeKeVXDMCu7_ajRS3fg1TtvMGBTd--SDRl"],"When":"2024-4-26"},{"Name":"Orestis Savva","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUxiacMp60YLHGe5NfMEhj91hqzIzfvfrB3R-Nl3rXD7ysJHRxzTA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"One of the best restaurants I've ever been to. We sat at the Chef's table and the Head Chef took great care of us.

We opted for the "meze" experience and the food was exquisite. Full of Cypriot notes with local and sustainable ingredients.

10/10 would recommend","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO0bK3T3cQJz-ZhuEZmtCRZHv722wQBZ9mvyUFo"],"When":"2024-1-17"},{"Name":"Maria Tapia","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJqbvQj95rFhBNyNgK_RjE240flaUN_HTRDd_zgh3W6EqjBIg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I have visited rous a few times and the quality and presentation of the dishes is consistent. Some of my favorite dishes are the fish ceviche, seared scallops and the beef fillet During my last visit, I ordered the rack of lamb and they were a little too fatty (quality should be better) but good. I love the mushroom risotto but it wasn’t on the current menu. Good option for a special occasion.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMj89SiWkAC7kYV1piDb3ZvqL64GgQCgCmM0JzK"],"When":"2023-9-19"},{"Name":"ATGG","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUpYXzLsDc7VfHQcBcUfWRoN_r2F6EMhm8Hu_5PhcV4LWsVEWOl=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We had an unbelievable Valentine’s Day experience. Amazing food from the Chef and the Wine selection was superb.

We’re definitely going again!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPq8sPokseFlbTDi3v8dR6q6KMHwkpgI06iU-Uw"],"When":"2024-3-1"},{"Name":"Costas Yiannatsos","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVZUCx-gleIInGiZ0yZmef3-mz6ThFw9TKIzI-_GV79lqUTNnX4=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"If you haven't visited Rous Restaurant yet, you don't know what you're missing! Incredible atmosphere, delicious dishes, amazing people and service! Congrats to the chef and the rest of the team!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOk_Pmi8ekxnM3yF9VjhUrBkVv8VRYv1R1j7XlE"],"When":"2024-2-8"},{"Name":"Nickm","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUBGimFQNFcHryjTx6BnhgIiGAlFZurnTrApwHewiMD_BfytLQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It's a nice restaurant with an amazing ambience the details of the set up on the table have a very nice aesthetic and the service was exquisite... we were  warmly welcomed by the owner and the stuff...the waiters were extremely polite and the food was on point timewise...now the food was tasty besides a couple of things that need a bit more thought... what I'd definitely recommend is the Tarama as a welcome course with the amazing bread and the beef cheeks as a main course which were my favourite in the meal and probably some of the best beef cheeks I ve tried...there were also choices for vegetarians and a special dish of the day that was extra from the menu which was the cauliflower steak which was incredible and my girlfriend really enjoyed it and so did I... would definitely come back and recommend it to anyone that visits nicosia and want to have an enjoyable dinner or for a special occasion! Special thanks to andreas and the 3 waitresses that were so friendly and hospitable!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMWo6Y0DYPmYfS7W0y1sLzS_8UBbkoVwOBRfwyh"],"When":"2023-12-2"},{"Name":"Vianney","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVxdKgvwjkW8XSCTRpY1yGxP6tMlkzy8VyvXpEp4IEsgsKAoogf=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I have the chance to write this review both as a customer and as a former employee. This was without a doubt the best restaurant I've tried in the whole island. From my experience as a waiter there I can confidently say that the owners are trying their hardest to provide the customer with the most classic, rich, and quality experience that they can. You feel the inspiration to be big and you're proud to pass it to the customers.
When I came as a customer, my coworkers remained very professional and I could give a taste of what fine dining is supposed to be to my wife. She was extremely impressed and my anniversary was a success.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Avyi T.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWc7s6JAosyRT3JSiSPlJ1h_q0EOwL0UF523jFCY-SREox9f0exAw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I absolutely love this restaurant! A true french dining experience, with amazing dishes, french music, choice wines, delicious desserts and a great staff. A little bit of France at the heart of Nicosia.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN8WjDDAqW7twUJJ6N-DgReDFQqsvd46uHDfK3g"],"When":"2023-3-2"},{"Name":"Olga Vern","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKNKDO7UZcwnpMesQr-4jkbLw9qf8ISURc89RyHhG5pI-vFYw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"An amazing family restaurant with traditional French dishes prepared superbly and with soul. Very nice and friendly owner! Be sure to try the Foie Gras Lucullus from the menu of the day)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMPrZ-BBSUy9vn24OsYF-r4zR1MswnDmD5R14uv"],"When":"2024-2-3"},{"Name":"Petros Charalambous","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVco5VDIZaV4MGkBmOcDfOqxOfenGhpICpIC3Vu1F61LT_br9oi=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Hosting was exceptional! Food was really good. A very friendly atmosphere. We really enjoyed our visit and we'll definitely visit again soon. Those mussels... brilliant! Best I've ever had in Cyprus so far!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMB8CtTueVQ_RdQ63PbHJRSaH80v2xX-yEJWA4i"],"When":"2020-6-27"},{"Name":"Наталия Михеева","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLaltSBuOLoVhbZftOf_sbL_m7vENOJozKS3i3HQG-3XM-JVw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"C’etait delicieux! It was delicious: good choice of wine, perfect baguette, wonderful mussels and meat. Very thoughtful service. Merci beaucoup!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Marina Kollitsi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK7NQcNOTZGqBDzQgY_LVWiKMZcRBylEXxNz9-dXLBdIKT32g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I would like to share my amazing expirience with food been delivered to my house.
I always prefer going to the restaurant to enjoy an authentic and warm atmosphere of a French place rather than order delivery, but this time due to certain circumstances  I did not have a choice.
I have ordered an onion soup and bottle of Bordeaux for my dinner.
The delivery was really fast, in 30 minutes I had my meal in front of me. The soup was still hot, just like it would appear straight out of kitchen door. The soup was accompanied by croutons and authentic French cheese used specifically for this kind of soup. Gosh! What  a lovely taste it was! Rich in flavor and texture, an absolute pleasure and bliss. Closing your eyes, you take a sip of excellent French Bordeaux wine and you feel like you are no longer at home, but in a small cozy brasserie in Paris, warming up your tired bones near the fireplace, enjoying your simple dinner and simply melting in the  atmosphere of this small cozy place filled with aromas of authentic French cousin.
Amazing  food  and wine - highly recomended even for delivery.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Mr Anton","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUD9ntG-yxkQxN1QWsAGJEhN-1gpK-k_jS-V7lBIdSvcJB6fkIj=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great food and wines, but the waitress almost doesn't speak English, only French. Which makes it quite authentic, but also slightly annoying.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Kyriacos Christofides","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW6QXcUE5M9Ns9IOJiqKbDwBcLnqDnBa2e2MJbPqqEM8mBZMCyIWA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We had a variety of starters , such as French cheese platter,  mussels , oysters followed by wild boar and a sirloin steak.

Extensive list of French wines,

The service is excellent , and the head waiter knew exactly how to separate dishes based off their taste etc.

We highly recommend the creme Brulee","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMNWmXRAxKNNEC1_ayFugS5tITNX2_9iB3omGHs"],"When":"2023-3-19"},{"Name":"Oliver Bågling Vretanidis","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIR8bI5dZrBMflQLR2iJC4Wz12qKOgDvADck9jSyCj2L2iPcw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Easily the coziest restaurant in all of Cyprus, the atmosphere was amazing and it feels like you stepped into a part of Paris! The service was amazing and the food was 10/10. The mussels here were the best I’ve ever tried!","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Nectaria Ioannou","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXoJC_6mP0gEvdP5jvJ0K3PjFXtcYnaXiAkYwfhONs5vzrzl7Lo=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Such a cozy place! Nice food, nice atmosphere. . . Small plates with a twist! Absolutely loved it! We will visit again!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMvvR8uV-7XvsH0rD8d0kXq6qvXAo2omSYSvWN-"],"When":"2024-9-30"},{"Name":"Kyriacos Costa","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUjkRs-dJAdfGgUsDMoY9xeijayYBFte1_PPF-ql3yZGWsTHviI=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We had a very good dinner at Topika. We were sat inside and even though the place is rather small (reservation is a must), it felt very cozy. The menu does not have a lot of options which I really liked and everything we ordered was very tasty. Really enjoyed all the dishes but the highlights for me were the mince pie and the rabbit pastitsio. All the plates are great for sharing too. Great prices and service as well. We will be back :)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN4QENfbDhQ36dTQFzpX_stYjVObG1x_eH5ozKs"],"When":"2024-4-10"},{"Name":"Ksenia Mershina","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWXSJVEyy5wIw9re594DIvU7k6ubfYMgPkN6jWplsGZ49CR4wfD=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Food was amazing. Service was proper overall. Outside aircos were dropping on our heads. We were at the table near the entrance to the terrace.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOHXWfdhc23PrZFh9C4wyjjCv84JNg8ifKVFVf5"],"When":"2024-7-7"},{"Name":"Despina Konstantinidou","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUBXl_f_R0FezlsyEhV-3wE3wk1uYQ2Pg6wE_8CEzAr7KjIGfZJ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"An absolute gem in the heart of Nicosia. The place offers amazing cocktails and a unique meze experience. Heartwarming mediterranean dishes perfect for sharing. Each plate is of high quality ingredients that are perfectly combined together. You should definitely try the Melon panna cotta!

A reservation is a must.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMrzOpKBtPlgfoMtFXeV9GtRUxBfNYWiMZPuNvY"],"When":"2023-12-26"},{"Name":"Panayiota Neophytou","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX4D0Kf6rkbkBIEr-OW6LUvdllbfn3AdMhh3v3Rr7RXxPDuu4l6=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Love this restaurant. Perfect food everything you try is tasty. Dont like the fact that the waiter every time mentions that what we order is not enough food. Interesting cocktails and fabulous desserts. Cant wait to try their summer menu","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPtawQlSe8QLfLbEqc9XUOo8ulNUzjwwjCF0yvs"],"When":"2023-6-28"},{"Name":"w mulia","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWpqLSk4hv61u8rLtZczq9t3td0WjQrsvXVb1fcNVGEfZOpKl-lVA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place is a gem! No wonder it's always packed every single evening. Booking recommended.

Some highlights of the food:
Love the crab dumplings with the bisque sauce. I could munch on them like forever! It'd be great if they would serve the steamed or pan fried version of the dumplings. I think those will be a bomb!

Nice combination on the Seabass ceviche. I'd love a bit more citrus zing, but I personally think the sweet touch from the grapes was genius!

The lamb was also fantastic, a nice blend with the smoked aubergine and sweet potato puree. They managed to keep the balance between the ingredients. It was a great dish.

From the dessert, I love the melon sorbet and the Strawberry semifreddo. They are so refreshing and a nice way to finish the meal.

The service was spot-on. Very attentive team and super friendly. Overall, this place is definitely a must if you're looking for a perfect dinner in Nicosia. Highly recommended!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOnLYsQa1sXrl_YRsyz7gAghQd-n4Dsu4Wcexuq"],"When":"2023-6-7"},{"Name":"Pavlos Hadjipavlis","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWGuDqkehuRK5C-xmAQCV3MxodRnLy0qMhxrAygHxiGucG8jcGbCw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We were pleasantly surprised by two things: the politeness of the host and the quality of the dishes. The ingredients were apparently fresh and full of taste and the chef very creative and contemporary. The only downside is that this restaurant is located in the center of Nicosia with very limited parking availability. Also, since this place is rather popular, it is highly recommended that you make reservations well in advance.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNIQy_DC30neowD-qc3_4ZMokcGmX8Yqmsamv5q"],"When":"2022-10-2"},{"Name":"Xenis Xeni","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX4aG_WaizK7Le0SW49ZEf3709cmWFqFs6W9zWzIS9NKZ2U6w7Vaw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"An exceptional Cypriot cuisine restaurant in the center of Nicosia. A complete breath of fresh air compared to most "local cuisine" restaurants around. All starters looked and tasted great. We tried the pulled pork and the Cypriot beef fillet as mains and they were exquisite. Our armenovil dessert was great too. The service is very good and all staff was very polite. Thank you for a great night!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOrA6kMyjnbl_rkZ9hr3hLA5H0nrf3-Ufdb0jBR"],"When":"2023-12-26"}]
