user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Caffè Doppio","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVB5svFP9hWEtkrrhxtEEgx2f8jA243OlIwYuenMYwiLD7aM2Ft=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We just came to Nicosia to see the border and we walked pass this place. We spotted the oven and thought that the food looked interesting.

We had some sort of pie and halloumi cheese bread. The food was good! And the price just brewed our mind as it’s so cheap! Imagine we were in Limassol and spending €50 a meal everyday then we came to this place and paid €4 for 2 people…

Later on we realised that this is Armenian good, very good experience and the place is constantly packed of queue.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM-ug7LIcQZ3bIfbqDBsczdDnOWa0xB9BcQloGw"],"When":"2024-5-16"},{"Name":"Khaled Moussa","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXILtryVLe-6HWlfJAAV1UX66N30EjD9AzEJDQ8X4EGTRL3Ns_k=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The best grilles we never had. The owner is so welcoming. He really spoiled us!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPW8nt5M__eS-TNbofQWofn4QBr-QZKbkA31_o"],"When":"2024-8-27"},{"Name":"Intan Sari","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUkUXOxo5bJv52z-BeC90sD-JvafrvBYeHUIJcWUdUiYpxNNu0whA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Delicious foods with affordable prices. Dishes with meat are served after 12.
Should really try the lamb there, very delicious.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNbtLXXqrkym3eWoTiUdPp_zFnKmVKTSur40mfo"],"When":"2024-4-11"},{"Name":"Allan Trei","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUZ9CeZR3ahbH4Av5bTGd1phWRtMpep2B_9zIletmOB1Q-z7OEm=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Soooo tasty food!!! Lamb souvlaki was the best, the meat was so tender and so good! Lahmachun and hachapuri were also good! Low cost and super tasty, just the best! :)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMGbxZrvjcD4bQL-vRkSugj3lW6pV9pPepVzXvx"],"When":"2024-3-26"},{"Name":"Konstantinos","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUA4fDbNgwzQmJZL27J9EaEUkIUixSAxTHip-kf3m3Bcssq66XB=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"One of my favourite places in Lefkosia. The prices are very reasonable, may be one of the cheapest places. The service is excellent, the personel is very friendly. Taste wise , everything is really very tasty. Souvlaki, lahmacun , pites all amazing. Atmosphere, well it's just some tables on the street , nothing to complain about.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPypTWF5uA5j28Eng_B8HVKowaR7JLqhhOFOImh"],"When":"2024-6-4"},{"Name":"Sergey (Cepega)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWAwnsvM6gi_woPaOew38yICnrOT3spz-xHVx5C5X_FISRa_X4U=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We found this place completely unexpectedly. We were just walking around the area, and we wanted to have a snack. I really liked the pies with potatoes. The place has very affordable prices, tables where you can sit down and eat were also free. You can order souvlaki (Armenian style), very juicy and delicious.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNP4W6FwpMxSeW1708NC7e_1WbVd2w4XOpSTUen"],"When":"2024-3-4"},{"Name":"Daniele Volpatto","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUFNHFeqPoXFmdDBzacV9ZXfq6ZlOzoVbDB_sU4qk6BnzTlC3kv=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Best choice for a quick lunch stop. The food is delicious and it's very cheap! We spent €2,50 each.
The staff is very nice and funny, especially Kosmas!
I recommend this place if you are looking for something to eat in Nicosia.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNKngmT89ApGXdc8IrHgzCueiZ8vC57fxBsEQHZ"],"When":"2024-4-12"},{"Name":"Doc Moc","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJuva_KzUQdMtV-JMfE_YWaEcywij9ftRZ8WU1cs8HYZhQyGw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Friendly staff and authentic food. The pork chop is phenomenally good!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMneEXvbl0miXdgm7ME82f8Y-_cB9pQKV5cdPVp"],"When":"2024-10-3"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Wulfert Zevenboom","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUEVkFMt_0uu9kZtQLfFkpcX8KNTw_GETJve12viULiDRB5rFMx=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Recently, we visited Piatsa Gourounaki Express in Nicosia and ordered the "Platter for Two - Meat." We ordered two platters for four people, and it was more than enough, with plenty left over to ask for a doggy bag. For just €50.00, we enjoyed a complete meal.

The platters were filled with a delightful variety of grilled meats, including two pork souvlaki skewers, two chicken souvlaki skewers, two chicken kebab skewers, one pork kebab skewer, and two pieces of chicken-bacon rolls. They were served with tzatziki, mustard sauce, Mama salad, and crispy fried potatoes. The dishes were flavorful and diverse, perfectly balanced with the sauces and side dishes.

From the outside, the restaurant appears to have a traditional restaurant ambiance, but inside, the concept is more akin to self-service or fast food. This might be surprising, but it does not detract from the quality of the food.

Piatsa Gourounaki Express is located on Leoforos Kostaki Pantelidi, near the central Eleftheria Square, making it a convenient spot for visitors to the city looking for a delicious, authentic Greek meal without too much fuss.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO_Z9c3RtynRugk6NIPznOF_zG0-Ao4pAX8ZzCB"],"When":"2024-8-8"},{"Name":"Vasilios Moschos","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJOzKsTKq1goOe0XYuWKBwkBMPyETZzX4E5LXTEDfWhFw0noA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It is a nice place, serving greek food, placed in the center of Nicosia opposite the Eleutherias Square.The  food was good, prepared in front of you with fresh ingredients.  They had offeted us also sweets for free. We had a giros with pork and one with chicken.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMNa05kTQ-pH2hhxeVh5tAKmA0yVVZX7nkO-IqF"],"When":"2024-6-23"},{"Name":"filippo reggimenti","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjURgaw7RUa8VV_dpAUZpRkyjZ_6jQ5BWSoGkdjhQlpUx9e7Hp78gg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great food and huge portions. The price also was more than fair for what we ate. Definitely recommended","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO0tGaHoIRW-UoNDCMXbz-wJlYoiVDU_9VprCPd"],"When":"2024-10-5"},{"Name":"cdakingtamudo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWscMergUDyXOWH9xxxnJPhMM0L2UukToDGNlouvzdjN_rwP9Bu=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very tasty kebabs, skewers and gyros. Dessert offer at the end is a bonus","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM8tsyvN0KpTSUzfX67MptemU-H9NeITfAdIVic"],"When":"2024-5-24"},{"Name":"Sergey (Cepega)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWAwnsvM6gi_woPaOew38yICnrOT3spz-xHVx5C5X_FISRa_X4U=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The first time I couldn't get into the restaurant, because it was Christmas and there were no seats in the place. I had to wait about an hour. Today I still got into the place, but there were queues at the casher anyway. And today is Thursday! I listened many reviews by the souvlaki from this place. They promised that they would be juicy. And indeed, they were juicy and delicious. I liked the tomato spicy sauce, which is somewhat similar to adjika. But the potatoes with feta and bacon sauce turned out to be cold and looked like "someone vomit" It tasted better than it looked :) but if it were hot, it would taste better. But, it has cooled down. I've tried pork and chicken. The chicken was from the breast. And it's a little dry for me. There was no lamb this day. The main restaurant of this chain has also been closed for renovation so far. Beer is here: Carlsberg, Alfa and Keo.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPhIZDH49L3BRZBDTIGvfbjv13Zq4rGqABFdkFh"],"When":"2024-2-29"},{"Name":"Tamas Nemeth","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXxF6yKEHs0r6ElROLZ37bK51Bee8hUbcZZPVImH99qYpqn0V7A8A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"If you want to have local food quickly you need to try this place. Souvlaki was very nice. You can enjoy the food inside or outside with a nice view.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMx6joCJX9_UeR9d38VZdJpHvlIEl70RX6vXrh_"],"When":"2024-3-21"},{"Name":"Rob","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIOi71JXjnktF04Z9qOK0T5BxpLlhpyLss7Goq5_5Nz9STglw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Upon visiting Nicosia for the day we stumbled upon this place. 🙌 Food was lovely, big portions for a reasonable price. I opted for the 300g Gyros In cyprus pita a large pita bread. It's large enough to share between two people for €9, I had to take some to go it was too big to finish in a sitting.

The lady inside serving was helpful and friendly. However, one waitress had a slightly bad attitude. Otherwise, I thoroughly enjoyed it.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMj_WIwAAlvfSvezULQcow9Em_gQrgfEe1hhPu_"],"When":"2024-3-30"},{"Name":"Alex Siamantas","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWXnBxBx1653oJp4-6b21ftmRV6NWIeZr8wq_XpJ3V0xrsX5msBpw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Delicious souvlaki and really decent prices. Ideal for a quick bite. I strongy suggest the chicken thigh portion!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPgta3bIeUQATjXAdXJDKQujezgIuDZSyDkxKC5"],"When":"2024-3-30"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"V Y","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI-2atVJbVqyKJ1TFPHGjJncimgXwkr1le2dW-hW7-8Ve7zk9Y=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"This place has some really good food, which arguably is what draws people to it. The omelette I had was fantastic, and I really appreciate the fact that you can customise it to have the ingredients that best suit your flavour preferences. The bread that comes with it is also delicious.

2 things sadly let this place down, the service and the atmosphere. The 2 ladies that were waitering at the time were both lovely. But completely distracted! You would ask for something multiple times (like the bill, water etc) because they’d stop to chat on the way to the kitchen and then completely forget. Something which if it happens once is okay, if it happens a couple of times gets irritating. Also, the ambiance of the place lets it down. All the doors and windows are open with no AC which made the place very hot. This is Cyprus after all, things are quite hot, especially when you’re next to a main road. Seeing as the prices are on the high end for what you order, I would expect more emphasis to fix the above issues.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNHq5ruJ7-ak-Eh036mIkUXadvt3aWNulo-tlyq"],"When":"2024-10-11"},{"Name":"Vladimir Novikov","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWx6Lbhk6BHG4cuRDIbY0PmfjTVf3sLt45XPe6m0UKbQxopZ4D-xw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Simple, tasty, seasonal homemade food. Salad leaves are extremely fresh and lush. They have unique gluten sugars free deserts. The service is welcome. It is real touch of local cuisine for lunch time in the heart of Nicosia.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOhLEcB_fF9VkzDrf2JGG2vrn-1amISYPsbBuDf"],"When":"2024-8-5"},{"Name":"Marina Papavasiliou","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK47_44_mZot3kY8iy_XcLyZBapgQbeFou7ZKuWRk3MTfzZJw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The food was okay , not something amazing to be honest. The pancake was delicious, fluffy and soft but the pulled pork sandwich wasn’t so good. The ingredients inside had weird taste. The service was excellent and the people were willing to help you. They had many options for brunch, maybe another time i will try something different. They have also fresh cheesecake and desserts. The coffee was decent","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOglkUuCsH1yjyNZmaeFfvX22Q-LkJ6m_HEZVNW"],"When":"2024-8-11"},{"Name":"Melissa Chedid","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVfc8joF1Dhvfqlb-O8GmmfbUq6xoiI8RdULl9HDo2WGFxunpza=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Simple and consistently delicious food, with an inclusive and seasonal menu that includes vegan and gluten free options (i.e. gluten free bread!). My waiter was really thoughtful and kind, and the ambiance was very bright and pleasant as well. There is open WiFi so during the week, it was easy to take out my laptop and work.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPmg24qh4P7Uu6iIpDVVNalSPxLje1g4pz3LF2I"],"When":"2024-3-27"},{"Name":"Paula Rosenberg","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUtbvBSfiuhsqJp8om3aDqokMPOp0meEdHikkTBalC3xL4McvIwPA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great food, very big and tasty dishes. Gluten free options and vegan options!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNaA9zfexBe6wwyQA5E0_gzdBKu12tWV6iY-YFM"],"When":"2024-7-28"},{"Name":"George L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWX0IhTtwWsH8aLxwl7blel3oxJfCndsqwb2ZMQB4btDzDK5HK4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The staff's attentiveness added a special touch to our experience. Not only did we find the menu to offer good value for money, but the fun interior decor also made our meal even more enjoyable. While the brunch options leaned towards the basic side, they were undeniably tasty. However, it would be even more exciting if they offered a wider variety of brunch choices.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMxvY5_oFfIphlL4tSVM2jXTMGNnBssILkAgPEf"],"When":"2023-2-11"},{"Name":"Diana Galatis Livera","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVfNvM2NLLawU5fRUFhsqYp30kXtSF9NgvViL-Oqgivr85KYysE=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Absolutely superb as always 👌
They never seem to disappoint.  Freshly made, always aiming to serve a nutritious meal to their customers, keeping their menu fresh so you keep on going.
Desserts are delicious, I can easily say they have one of the best cheese cakes I have tasted. We got a full cake take away 🍰🎂
Good portion size, average prices.
Small inside area so it tends to get loud and a couple tables outside too.

Definitely worth a try...or many 🤤","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMHbXfPXKg7XEsyup9iSc5N7mwicLl43ZObX3Wc"],"When":"2023-8-20"},{"Name":"Theodora Lazarides","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJRO4ZGev77W_ujqqDfDAl4PsOqFNSGIeSRe7LUCgZbzYJy1g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Food- everything was tasty and fresh

Service - quick service and very friendly staff

Atmosphere - nice and cosy, has air conditioning inside which is necessary for summer weather","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNYub0Rdc-HWAEawfG-gIpvqXdoX69uahq9Oqju"],"When":"2024-8-17"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Karim Mouawad","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK0i37VmiOx2fqcqCk1-UNvE5CKoV8o9SP1WpCkwYVwwrpbiQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I’ve been to this restaurant before and have ordered pick up from them several times. Their food is excellent and I just love their mixed grill! Great quality. Just loved it so much! Thank you so much!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOo3QzrSxLqiNU4r4HpjGbIFikqClvdiNc6eijT"],"When":"2024-9-19"},{"Name":"Maribella","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVgImdSuDYzabdieOPLGhsNvWNSRI4MT3jULuENBNTDJ7WDPxldpg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"One of the nicest restaurants I've been to.
Lovely decoration, the staff is very professional, polite and attentive.
Amazing customer service and delicious food.
The managers know how to build rapport and are very generous.
The meze is the best option to try a bit of everything and fresh mint tea to end the meal.
Highly recommend trying it out","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Thanasis Charalambous","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWhkwh6YFRu5OKFXQVe13VX02skqPDEv01ddsm2sqpOkPmc7J0J=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The food was good, I was not that impressed with the meat that came with the order. But the dips that this place has along with the bread were a think to return to! If you combine though the meat with the dips and the bread you get a very good meal!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Alon Roslyakov","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW8xP13cdLt1UtQE7dapy4FFnq-HFr39qHy1W4HoF6f6jdDSCEO=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Excellent food.
One of the best middle eastern places you can get in cyprus.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOmG6x8aBrZy9Ut_2Lm44k7rDtUQ_pDhsVGTlM4"],"When":"2024-9-15"},{"Name":"Hla M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW1fjwfWqWVpGFf88B7QLVrXi03aMcMC82Ei9BXtWeo-iw5cn7A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A great Lebanese restaurant.
Super tasty and fresh food With a super sweet dessert at the end 😁😋😋
Excellent service and good prices.  Definitely worth a visit if you are in the area.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPK1hV6EDVKV5xJ-KjXOmzjNnuPuExpOMTOWeEA"],"When":"2023-4-10"},{"Name":"Labros Solomos","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIVq_9EGF68s_zZ78aSAk7s-T15eNsfahkIM-Ws1IabqcNE3Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A very pleasant environment with a strong sense of Arabic culture. The food is amazing and high quality ingredients on an affordable price!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO87B2-0D6zd2_tK6u99AyYokVppGyzl0gAQoZI"],"When":"2023-12-3"},{"Name":"Jonathan Gan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWHYSmIZtqp4RNnfijEbV3Qg4dkmlrjgMeSpKNE3gLeOM008dde3A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A great Mediterranean restaurant. Fast, good and professional service. The dishes are generous with theirs quantity. The food is fresh and delicious.
The place is well decorated and giving you the feeling you're in a different place in the world.
Enjoy 🙂","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPl78gEPGQLhrGINqQLKci3t0RibrxhB_1o0mNa"],"When":"2022-5-23"},{"Name":"Ermis P","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUYWxQnfrVal4VWAz3Ibv0qHhZG8S3GvWux_JAqhFSYekp5OCkl=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Genuine Syrian restaurant!

The dining area is split into three sections which makes it a good choice for each season of the year. The interior design resembles the Arab architectural style which is comforting.

The staff is very attentive and assistive to the guest's needs and there are no delays.

The food is really good. You should try the menu for X people and it will more than enough for X+1! The taste is authentic and the quality pretty good. The Cypriot coffee that we ordered had a taste of cardamom which I personally found unpleasant.

Overall a great experience, recommended!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOPaHvZghRbB9BCGlnZ-Xi7zO9jwHO1FRdMXIFf"],"When":"2022-3-28"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"F Williams","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJB90WeOfLJTtgDNkBTl763V43RYDJxccw24w43s8tu6IuF8A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We came here because after searching for a good restaurant in the area, we noticed this place was highly recommended. Well, we were not disappointed! EVERYTHING was absolutely delicious. Unique flavors, tender meats, fresh ingredients, and soft warm bread. We were STUFFED! Highly, HIGHLY recommend this restaurant.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMjtaLyDGD_4J5sTwpooU7B8a5ZbxKWDKFWdXZg"],"When":"2024-9-28"},{"Name":"Ioana Stefania Dragusin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUzMd1qZRAcfEezmU5dq7qFaor0C7vNf4p8QrtJMeY_S1UZ7ec=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The food was absolutely outstanding. Each dish was a delightful blend of flavors, thoughtfully prepared and beautifully presented. From the starters to the desserts, the ingredients tasted fresh, and the attention to detail was evident in every bite. The seasoning was perfect—enough to enhance the natural flavors without overwhelming them.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPIiC8sM-e3xKCNWLFY0uH9mIOjp7Wh5XA-O6pq"],"When":"2024-9-27"},{"Name":"David Kennedy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjURxUorodjOmDxNDcbmIz9TXyszavgnsAbGlD8ySM3Jy-_DyygV=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Last minute decision to eat at this restaurant and was not disappointed. The food was absolutely fantastic and the staff were just as good. Would highly recommend.

Staff recommended the Shish Taouk and Kafta Mishwii, which were amazing. I selected the Ma'Aloubi as i'd never had a Palestinian dish, that was also great. The Fatoush salad is also extremely tasty, highly recommend.

I have allocated the price per person based on food alone as drinks are always optional and to the taste of the individual.

Will definitely be back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPPUL0cN1q_uoAyryAv-0ZuuK1bS1FoTdiChXXb"],"When":"2024-8-24"},{"Name":"Sandy Karagianni","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUzk-b1WagyCGPIPm_Sl4W8-vUQjVGUT2ukOsKw8xVVhu5v_0w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great Lebanese food restaurant in downtown Nicosia. Food was tasty and hygienically served (fresh flatbreads served individually wrapped). Try out their batata harra and halloumi fried pastry as well as their salads. Their meat is pretty good, but leaned on the dry side. Their mahalebi is also very tasty and good value for money.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPkfrRLB7wDGZ8QCWT9k1SK4gxKTp11pJyYXV4"],"When":"2024-5-1"},{"Name":"Maria Lindholt","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX7OUxuNJ8VHji0KSDG96L7YLI-gZjCWByqKE3354JriM6uLn3-jA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Fanous is the best restaurant in Nicosia, I can not recommend this place too much!

The vibes are on point, and the food is phenomenal. I always go for the vege mezze, but I love that you can also just hand pick your favourite dishes and costumise your meal exactly to your taste and appetite. The staff is always sweet and attentive, and the owner is a great and personable guy who often checks up on the restaurant and his customers. Also, by far the they serve the best lemonade in town, so minty, cool, and delicious! I also highly recommend the beetroot humous and the homemade falafels. I have brought family and friends both several times, and I have always had a great experience.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ana Maria","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIh-8r3GcMPGwSPzrzXdjVEgXaxYqP7OL6VXMAy8hrlCltZ5Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very tasty food, with lots of options.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOTW0zwZuiCV1w-oaMIL5KvSWegSVU1NeR5jdYN"],"When":"2024-9-26"},{"Name":"Simon OC","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL7Js815jU-2w_a-GyKRJvwt2MLqcwvjpWUk1biY-2qbTRgyg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"What a fantastic feast it was. Great variety of lebanese cuisine prepared with genuine passion. Cozy and dark interior immersed in the vapors of water pipes.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipORrmf8gt9s_t52IYZu-HQFVAwnGuix-CrUVmhc"],"When":"2024-7-20"},{"Name":"Lynn Yu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUmeH3hrZUTF9x-DUtMJhGxDzuWAh2G1jDjSk754hfcx7rgfvql=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great food and great service! Thanks for the hummus and pudding🥹We love Maya🐈‍⬛and Tiger🐈!!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM9iJaU03J-lb6i0HJKuRZgYDFj35cLBUn33LtN"],"When":"2024-7-11"}]

title: Rokoko Kitchen & Bar (Nicosia)
about: [{"id":"service_options","name":"Service options","options":[{"name":"Outdoor seating","enabled":true},{"name":"Delivery","enabled":true},{"name":"Takeaway","enabled":true},{"name":"Dine-in","enabled":true}]},{"id":"accessibility","name":"Accessibility","options":[{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible entrance","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible seating","enabled":true}]},{"id":"offerings","name":"Offerings","options":[{"name":"Alcohol","enabled":true},{"name":"Beer","enabled":true},{"name":"Cocktails","enabled":true},{"name":"Coffee","enabled":true},{"name":"Late-night food","enabled":true},{"name":"Small plates","enabled":true},{"name":"Spirits","enabled":true},{"name":"Vegan options","enabled":true},{"name":"Vegetarian options","enabled":true},{"name":"Wine","enabled":true}]},{"id":"dining_options","name":"Dining options","options":[{"name":"Lunch","enabled":true},{"name":"Dinner","enabled":true},{"name":"Dessert","enabled":true},{"name":"Seating","enabled":true}]},{"id":"amenities","name":"Amenities","options":[{"name":"Bar on site","enabled":true},{"name":"Toilets","enabled":true}]},{"id":"atmosphere","name":"Atmosphere","options":[{"name":"Casual","enabled":true},{"name":"Cosy","enabled":true}]},{"id":"crowd","name":"Crowd","options":[{"name":"Groups","enabled":true}]},{"id":"planning","name":"Planning","options":[{"name":"Reservations required","enabled":true},{"name":"Accepts reservations","enabled":true}]},{"id":"payments","name":"Payments","options":[{"name":"Credit cards","enabled":true},{"name":"Debit cards","enabled":true},{"name":"NFC mobile payments","enabled":true},{"name":"Credit cards","enabled":false}]},{"id":"children","name":"Children","options":[{"name":"Good for kids","enabled":true}]},{"id":"parking","name":"Parking","options":[{"name":"Free of charge street parking","enabled":true}]}]
user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Eleni Kyprianou","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKekvjCn-kRmdsPi_wUybv_jBUDUUkchSkzTlGKR-zgm7crmQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"A very good Italian restaurant located in the heart of Nicosia that I have visited a couple of times. The pizza is one of the best in Nicosia with thin and crispy dough.

The ravioli are simple but really tasty and flavorful.

Simple but yet really comforting and delicious are the primavera tagliatelle which is a great choice if you are vegetarian

The duck ragu is an interesting dish that you usually don’t find in other restaurants and
worths a try.

The prawn risotto and the truffle risotto are both delicious and cooked perfectly.

From the starters, the lobster ravioli are a great choice if you are a seafood fun.
The fried lasagna balls are also really good but my favorite is the Buttermilk Chicken which is excellent and one of the best I had.

I wasn’t a big fun of the truffle pasta and the cacio e pepe as they lacked flavor and tge weren’t memorable.

As for the desserts, if you are a Nutella fun definitely get the calzone with Nutella and mascarpone cheese but if you prefer something lighter get the pistachio tiramisu which is a personal favorite.

The staff is always willing to help and the service is really fast despite the fact that the restaurant is always full.

As for the prices I have to admit that they are very reasonable compared to the quality. Definitely coming back to try more dishes!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOdPrnThGFJGlna748ejNhNoti5fZ5gEKOdPwix"],"When":"2024-8-21"},{"Name":"George L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWX0IhTtwWsH8aLxwl7blel3oxJfCndsqwb2ZMQB4btDzDK5HK4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The experience was exceptional across the board. Not only did the menu offer great value for money with its high-quality dishes at reasonable prices, but the service was also attentive and quick, striking the perfect balance. The restaurant had a vibrant and welcoming atmosphere, adding to the overall enjoyment of the meal. Each dish showcased excellent quality and attention to detail, surpassing expectations in both taste and presentation.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNOswaDvSx3z2HTfxz678_cKlHOfwQ2kzWF7-BE"],"When":"2024-3-10"},{"Name":"a v","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKvZgekOuLXxVF9-hfpYX4eMFO-SxKBOQt59Swly86CNjVrsQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Cool place for a fun night out. The food was nice. The Nutella calzone was AMAZING","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNY-nfbGw_KMXSqttT4sMj6mDCospqFliDkOwhk"],"When":"2024-6-13"},{"Name":"Marianna Nicodemou (Ms. M)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVC15pLswVwcUZLrf0YVf06pUrHZCKgfiHJl-AcOBQ2TXRL9s8F=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"We visited the place on Saturday lunch time. The restaurant was full of people and the atmosphere was really nice. We all agreed that the food was ok (not impressed but not bad) and that their classic dessert (chocolate calzone) was definitely out of this world. 🤤

The service was also decent for such a busy place. The seating arrangement is a bit weird cause the area is small and packed with people so you are seating very close to the other tables.

Generally I would recommend ✌🏽","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPY7pP08uACH8EeBpkIfSmTeJjTdQhPvjvNMeJ9"],"When":"2023-10-15"},{"Name":"Yevheniia Khakhai","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX5gYOwoXiMjYRnGVNtG7qpBSiPNazOCEhhJ-KVh6JA4hC3vWslww=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"good afternoon, we visited your restaurant on 13/02, I ordered pasta with duck, when I received my food I realized that there was cinnamon inside, I am allergic to cinnamon, the menu does not indicate that there is cinnamon in the dish, this is a big mistake and I recommend that you pay attention to this, the waiters replaced my dish, and my second pasta was in a plate that was broken.
My husband's meal was good.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN2Kyw1p4hMlx0igTyrSgNq5gNuKY3hvTpfmzNT"],"When":"2024-2-22"},{"Name":"Maria Kezoudi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV6lx2LwraalTRsCbcOYZa2yWK_unYPcvdblwJMTrSN2RSHjiiqbQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Delicious dishes.We had the burrito salad, full of taste! Tagliatelle nero were amazing, loved it! Rokoko pizza was descent, was expecting to be more creative, different than normal...
All in all, I will visit it again! Recommended!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMKbMFmpIQ_KxUhdtcxuFKHv0shGB2rQJxEbhC5"],"When":"2023-10-5"},{"Name":"Nadia Khalil","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXBdcCUB-A2FVSTUdmmvlzSrvFfcghY2Ok5hV8ptdZYs5ohMf4U=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A very authentic italian place. The pizza was really good, thin crust. The pasta was nice as well. A good place to go for dinner with friends, family or a date. Highly recommend it, but its better to book especially on weekends. The prices are fine as well, ranges between 12 and 20 euros per person depending on what you order.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNbBV9lLwMe3JOjxnJsIOLxvBfQV2fixZ2ZvNpV"],"When":"2023-7-10"},{"Name":"Alex Siamantas","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWXnBxBx1653oJp4-6b21ftmRV6NWIeZr8wq_XpJ3V0xrsX5msBpw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Rokoko is a pretty good italian restaurant in Nicosia. The food is nice and the atmosphere is good as well. To be totally objective, however, the bar for Italian restaurants in Nicosia is really low. I believe they have the potential to serve better products, but they have no reason to do so until the competition grows. Just imagine asking to add chicken to your truffle linguine and the chef denying that because it destroys his "art." I mean, come on...it's very classic, and everyone does that. I need to see some improvement tongive my 5th star.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOIngp3fYeBrRnm5zG56cgpkkbtdYoChcVRbQWL"],"When":"2023-7-29"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Rania","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKJLamwQslMIyYdmlKK2nouL8GsXJOYp8R6hoM-7THrdlPJKH0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The atmosphere is really nice and gives off very luxurious vibes. The food was very delicious. The highlights from our experience were the pork chops, the sweet potato fries, and the regular potato fries. The only issue was the beef strip loin, which wasn't as cooked as we ordered it. They also serve bread until the food is prepared, which is really soft and tasty. Overall it's a really nice restaurant with an excellent atmosphere and very delicious food.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPlq61znfIq3lrT72WO6kGZQd1EwmSDyhPv6mlA"],"When":"2024-4-15"},{"Name":"Serdar","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXBQnJLuGPJn09BAS8eWPM3dz5XblJgPR2Lrvi-w2IKZAvb1LWX=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Highly recommended place. We ordered Greek salad, Tempura roll and sea bass. Salad was big enough and sea bass was fresh. Price maybe higher for comparison other places but quality there.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNwJcF_hLIhkBmnpfm36SUwxr6gicWX8saJYFOi"],"When":"2024-7-6"},{"Name":"Zeinab Hamzeh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVDTctKHZsyiHIWY0CSpHjVkVTXQxHKp5mHzFGUPS5VUrrpM0GU=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I highly recommend this place!
The staff are friendly and professional, and the atmosphere is really nice. The food is amazing, both in taste and presentation.
The salmon and burrata salad are a must tries!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNQZzicPhYCgcIMnmEBflMlrerZ7KwpmR1HVhPs"],"When":"2024-9-14"},{"Name":"AZ","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKJFugD3UzdX2e9l0LTCnQQ_wxCkppLoRDXrg_MELa9TKg2hQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very good restaurant!
Friendly and professional service, thank you!
Nice atmosphere, you can seat inside and outside - plenty of space.
Try octopus, recommended. Greek salad - outstanding! One of the best I ever had.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOHvn4ZKqhceM8sbfGWoT25iSVyBLdLvM3K7F8E"],"When":"2024-4-14"},{"Name":"Katrin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK8owhcbWx4XxGCAvHEawYo0dQMfwGTU-ssGy6cohE_vtuQpQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"We were left completely unsatisfied with the food.
First of all, I want to say that this place is super fashionable, stylish, fancy and beautiful. The staff is super polite but they don’t smile at all…
Restaurant offers free starters (olives, bread, olive oil, nuts and chili butter) and they renew it as long as you don’t say that you’re ready for the main dish.
I took Ichigo mocktail and it was waaaay too sweet. Pulled lamb pasta was too oily and bitter, couldn’t finish it. My friend ordered sushi and was left completely unsatisfied, fish wasn’t fresh and they were kinda tasteless.
Overall this place isn’t about food, it’s about the vibe.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMlsHXVjS7hes5m2YmaHL1lfm4WX8WVyYTLntpg"],"When":"2024-6-2"},{"Name":"Maria Tapia","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJqbvQj95rFhBNyNgK_RjE240flaUN_HTRDd_zgh3W6EqjBIg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"First time at Henry’s and really liked it. The space is very inviting so perfect for date night or just meeting with friends. I ordered two different cocktails and must report that they were very good( well balanced). The food and service were good too. The veal was excellent and the burger was good but they were a little too generous with the dressing and the fries were not my favorite. I prefer crispy skinny fries. I am planning to return to try other other dishes.

Brunch update

Egg Benedicts are very good. I also ordered the red velvet pancakes they were ok, the consistency was more like dessert. I was looking for traditional fluffy pancakes but the server didn’t seem to understand my question about the 3 choices offered. Maybe the vanilla option is more like what I was looking for… I appreciate the creativity but fluffy traditional pancakes are the best.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNJeE3euoOJP7jrSpKka72IJGTYQTA4KfwzTg9F"],"When":"2024-1-27"},{"Name":"George L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWX0IhTtwWsH8aLxwl7blel3oxJfCndsqwb2ZMQB4btDzDK5HK4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Although there wasn’t something special about the food (it was very tasty, just nothing unique about it) the service, elegant interior design, and general vibe of the restaurant made this an excellent choice.

December 2023 review (dinner):

The staff were kind and attentive, enhancing our visit with their warm hospitality. We found the menu to offer good value for money, although we were disappointed when they had run out of a dish we were eager to try. The interior decor is beautiful, creating a charming atmosphere for diners. Despite the hiccup with the menu, the food we did have was delicious, and the cocktails were both interesting and well-crafted. Service was quick and efficient, adding to the overall positive experience.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOkZV24pHHZeIJsPTHG6pjMjXkSjGJqHygwS9dK"],"When":"2023-4-30"},{"Name":"V Y","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI-2atVJbVqyKJ1TFPHGjJncimgXwkr1le2dW-hW7-8Ve7zk9Y=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Nice open space, with great atmosphere.
Sushi rolls could be improved, there wasn’t anything wrong with them, but nothing special about them either. I would not say they are value for money. Otherwise, all good, food tasted nice (but not mind blowing), service was good. I’d recommend this place to friends, but I didn’t like it enough to make a return visit myself.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPAJiZVto9fmV-U8H5KJlSnDjw-QUpZZFPWIb8i"],"When":"2023-12-27"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Pavlos Hadjipavlis","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWGuDqkehuRK5C-xmAQCV3MxodRnLy0qMhxrAygHxiGucG8jcGbCw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"First time here and will definitely be coming back soon. We ordered five dishes and, almost all of them, were exceptionally delicious and well presented. More specifically, the Tuna Tartare was one of the best I've ever tasted. Plus, we were served by a wonderful, polite and cheerful Greek waiter who contributed to our positive experience. The prices are on the high side but don't forget that this restaurant is situated in the heart of the capital. The interiors have a nice decoration, the music very tasteful and well selected. Only negative: horrible and uncomfortable individual chairs. Also, a hair found on a plate. Nonetheless, recommend.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPiymvj2IutbsGf_9yVio3EF0EETQkZ-eJ1BCk5"],"When":"2024-10-1"},{"Name":"Katy Huang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK0j5zes1SClheLyLf6DPvLJ_ibwG-1YWjjnKhvds1IbcijMA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Fresh ingredients, flavorful dishes, lovely atmosphere. Overall a great dinner experience. The scallops were very palatable- would return just to have these again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOyTq-n43boMU5olGUj_Opd_s88lcxeEH3B0dJT"],"When":"2024-7-9"},{"Name":"Constantinos Solomonides","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVHSp-Gh4FDjznAWXsmGMYF5Py4XPmU9HUds_8iL5KgWl6jJD5jhw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Top quality restaurant combining latin america and asian fusion cuisine. We took 5 dishes and a dessert and they were perfect for two people sharing. Try the beef tartare, crab pau bans and fois gras as well as the passion fruit
cheesecake dessert! The staff was very friendly and helpful as well!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNZmzvZhmoNtvsXOJPkgF-JwSZOoPYTX5DT2OFq"],"When":"2024-8-20"},{"Name":"Aleksander M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI9DqvQQd6Y8G7N465SN-dcQ7h4vByhHxlsB3MfFMR_onFKWg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"One of the most exciting culinary experiences in Cyprus!
Tocayo presents its visitors with a true culinary adventure of South-American and Asian fusion cuisine! Located in the beautiful city area, the restaurant has a dark, but cozy ambiance that sets you up for the evening ahead.

Food.
Very refreshing menu, you are guaranteed to experience some new delicious flavour combinations and textures! I would recommend to order many different dishes and share them on the table.

Service.
The staff is very friendly and can assist you with your choices, as well as quickly inform you of possible allergens.

Overall, an incredible, unforgettable experience! IMO must-visit of Cyprus and definitely Nicosia! Highly recommend!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN_kA52Lav4muzZYMseZX8zzpEgMA6hsW0bYNgI"],"When":"2024-6-8"},{"Name":"Stephen Pollard","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVFGlxGOICJ7K80VhGqpvj3nDbECvjGMtLZpJER65nFp2LyU-i-sA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I cannot say good enough things about this place. I live in Cyprus and this was without reservation the best meal I have had in a long time. Highly highly recommended","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM8cZLaq2TDkPWjifNJRsNRr-OCIFUKwCI6Gh7-"],"When":"2024-7-6"},{"Name":"Alex Siamantas","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWXnBxBx1653oJp4-6b21ftmRV6NWIeZr8wq_XpJ3V0xrsX5msBpw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had a lovely dinner at Tocayo right in the heart of Nicosia. The food? Absolutely delicious and it looks just as good as it tastes - like something straight out of an Instagram story. The vibe is super chill and elegant, and despite being downtown, it's surprisingly quiet. A great little escape from the city noise. Oh, and the cocktails, they're fantastic. Definitely coming back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMhZQhuZw6Xl2zRSLUkJgazM-ZVM91_5P5FjfJB"],"When":"2024-2-24"},{"Name":"Christos Kaoullas","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocITUkOmX1K2FcTUsD7nwGhYSy3z0plcGr486vwj9Hs2ailV9Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"If you're craving a culinary adventure that tantalizes your taste buds and transports you to new flavor heights, look no further than Tocayo. Nestled in the heart of Nicosia, this hidden gem seamlessly marries the vibrant flavors of Latin and Asian cuisine, resulting in a dining experience unlike any other.

From the moment you step through the door, you're greeted with a warm and inviting ambiance that sets the stage for an unforgettable meal. The attentive staff, led by knowledgeable servers, ensure that every aspect of your dining experience is impeccable.

Prepare to embark on a journey of culinary fusion that will leave you speechless. Each dish is a masterful blend of Latin and Asian influences, expertly crafted to create a symphony of flavors that dance on your palate.

To complement your meal, the bar offers an impressive selection of cocktails and fine Wines selection.

In conclusion, Tocayo is a culinary gem that delivers an unparalleled Latin Asian Fusion experience. With its inventive dishes, impeccable service, and inviting atmosphere, it's a must-visit for food enthusiasts looking to embark on a flavor-filled journey.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNWo3z4-HPYweundzvOWCMvCfLy257pGpEw8CKQ"],"When":"2024-2-10"},{"Name":"Efi Siapiti","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKbF_ZZdtvt-HTmNVEKj-8pff0UO8q-UDCNy0Q7YsOEZIJJug=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It is as good as people say, the food is beyond. Above and beyond. Exceeded expectations. Best octopus i ever ate, each and every dish over-delivered. You pay for what you get of course, but it is fair.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPpXKc602xdh40ZQXjc98gWybQBokJTXPvEjo9S"],"When":"2024-4-11"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Karim Mouawad","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK0i37VmiOx2fqcqCk1-UNvE5CKoV8o9SP1WpCkwYVwwrpbiQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Definitely the best fish food in town. Atmosphere, service and food were just perfect. The salads, tuna ceviche, potatoes, calamari, octopus, were all delish. Highly recommended.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOXNbIq6loAtGKOxRyNjMv8acTG40y0ZTQrkGH2"],"When":"2024-9-12"},{"Name":"Faisal Khan Barki","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWjL-YeshoQukPQD29zEe8bAj8Ytt8B5brlEDzQ0AQoJ2tNzPYF=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Guys I recently had the pleasure of dining at Pyxida Fish Tavern with a group of 10 friends, and I must say it was an exceptional experience from start to finish. The food was simply outstanding, with every dish bursting with fresh flavors and perfectly cooked seafood.
The service was impeccable—attentive, friendly, and always with a smile. The staff went out of their way to ensure we had everything we needed and made us feel truly welcome. Our entire group appreciated their excellent service and hospitality.
The management clearly takes pride in maintaining high standards, as the restaurant was spotless and beautifully maintained. It’s evident that great care goes into every aspect of this establishment, from the cleanliness to the overall ambiance.
I highly recommend Pyxida Fish Tavern for anyone looking to enjoy a fantastic meal in a warm and inviting atmosphere.
Five stars all the way!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPr55HSgGbHaJw0frwMLHd_-H4taTzyNBtvXOmP"],"When":"2024-7-22"},{"Name":"Audrey Lowery","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLM24rkev4fWzY6Z38e21Zfm2ngvL5XKhmKzekXqhS9Ns4BUKHt=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Smart eaterie in Nicosia. Ambience very nice, fresh fish on display at entrance. Meze was very fresh and high quality but somewhat unimaginative. I was hoping for some unusual dishes among the usual. What came was nice, but no surprises here.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNSUaOxhZLPs6G-4eyTeOV7B0_zXI32KJJJjXhF"],"When":"2024-1-5"},{"Name":"Ismael Alcano, Jr.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV5MhUwM03Rm0jkQGiOWLo-KgVNGCd4lPknUq7Q_u_Am42Bkc4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It was awesome place, just what I need the fresh Oysters, unlocked mission to eat oysters in Cyprus, Nicosia. Food was great sea foods is good. I recommend this place for the seafoods this is the palace in Nicosia. Thank you management.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNMJxw3cxxqo4aC-7pqunX-zXxkeu01qru1Gtkl"],"When":"2024-6-22"},{"Name":"Komissar Elizaveta","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV6aVhYhKmyveVF1KYD1zRCij4NcAZzUdPB6RgOllqAYI3pNAsf=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Perfect place for sea food lovers everything is fresh and perfectly cooked.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPlQlqElKIZ6QzBDSHJ_yxVfOGWI8wMeICr6duX"],"When":"2024-7-23"},{"Name":"Paul Turner","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWi-BUHnfE6tyX4icrbS6qJcAlVUZjCatMsbzerx10yhdKjkyg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Very nice wine. Tarama was fine  The whitebait was bitter (a server later told that this depends on the season - why was this not said before we ordered?) and the Calamari was okay - but lacked that fresh taste. Service was unnecessarily formal - a few more smiles would have been good","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ivan Clark","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXAWbBsGQy1TkFP8qClVpkPbC50ypnuD_C9j2CS5PbkHALmgVBe=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Top-notch Fish Restaurant. Fresh doesn't do justice to the whole Red-Snapper we had. Grilled and filleted at the table, with great chips and salad. Highly recommended 👌 😋","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Tropical Sol","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUl-bHkn9MD_Dvzda0NtJnQPnNKzxREWQ55AmcYnnnBKX_LwHBvQA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Highly recommend!
We were on our honeymoon in Cyprus and ate here when we visited Nicosia.
This restaurant is a lovely place. The waiters are very attentive  and meals are marvelous.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Danka Korugić","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUF0jOotPMdMUO_hm_-F2ziB9A1pfLEkzca5lJ5niyesuEIn84aVA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The food was very tasty. We ordered Platter B for two and couldn’t finish everything, so we took the leftovers with us. This platter is more than enough for two people.

And we got dessert for free.

The garden in the back is really lovely.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN-VZRx7TTX5MfJ5HXNF1L5LyAvqHhIxaQk6XCT"],"When":"2024-10-7"},{"Name":"Adi Varga","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJtYlp567E6kf4FeuPF0lbrpyE9Jlio8IvvJuqIgExfs9p1GA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Elena was the best! The staff is fast and responsive.
We chose this place as most other restaurants close at around 3 pm and reopen at 7 pm and it was the best choice. We've had chicken and lamb skewers and Cypriots know how to make them well.
A very good experience I'd recommend, especially in the garden terrace inside as it will provide some necessary cooldown from the heat.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMoVSsoMDuNp1Hw8lXmxqDToESx8jt-CnaOviEX"],"When":"2024-8-22"},{"Name":"razvan pintea","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIPfzzetR54IZywGlyvKeRRBFDb5k7d2TJmkGLtZCqSNOGFIg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very nice staff. Don t sit at the tables in front of the restaurant. Go on the garden instead. They have AC that works so good. The prices are fair and the food is tasty. The platter for 2 is actually for 3 (as u can see in the picture, lots of protein, high variety of meats). The also have vegetarian menu and the dessert is on the house (they served panacota).","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOluP1zJs_9DvNHXYPo1IDG8tOGV8J9dkw9z1IL"],"When":"2024-9-8"},{"Name":"Dean Blake","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXnzhTbqhs1N8C1csLeRpMjhTUt-MTZPXSd91alAE4qT4FeFrE=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This was my favourite experience in Cyprus so far.

The food was great quality and very good value.

Everyone was so friendly and the service impeccable.

The garden was like a hidden gem in the streets of   Nicosia.

The live singer was excellent and made our evening.

Will certainly recommend this place to friends","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP2SM3z5wXWE32tvSBbDMBVmLCdxKyxO6z3x3L8"],"When":"2024-9-11"},{"Name":"Felix Gan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjULdV6RfoXko3B_E11vZCNJrIwq2vCaT1x6lGXIDL65qIGCdtXB=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It’s a very spacious Greek restaurant in the capital and has ample of spaces in there. I loved the little garden behind that is very cosy and transported you to someone’s else backyard during summer enjoying some delicious meal. Would recommend others for this.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMZXYy61v2nbmNdY1ObhVGm-ABtZK-P65a681_s"],"When":"2024-9-7"},{"Name":"Tina Ka.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKEN3KVEcCqW_jqCdT-399DX5t4AQutOD8ypk6w2Ai9YZAC2g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I absolutely loved my vegetarian lunch here. The veggie skewer and pita bread was delicious and the french fries were perfectly fried. Price was more than fair - 7.60€ including a drink! I highly recomnend","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPJ8tWdSmLBIarYWAMPxbdDRvT4yKUq_EzC8q3V"],"When":"2024-9-27"},{"Name":"Lucija Lopac","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVnMewOszV_ZzhnFwGjx3LeGHMe4kPUh441yhlTMzDDhLr2N5My=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The best place in Nicosia to try the local food. Even though we had 39 degrees outside, I managed to eat Mousaka, because it was extremely delicious. Service was extremely kind, and also we had a nice guest joining us for dinner. Would definitely recommend if you are staying in Nicosia. ❤️","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP7t2UR1DhYEnNFXr6TWWZVyOHpfd24pFhqWt2u"],"When":"2024-7-28"},{"Name":"cdakingtamudo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWscMergUDyXOWH9xxxnJPhMM0L2UukToDGNlouvzdjN_rwP9Bu=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very good greek restaurant.  Beautiful garden inside. Order mezzes for 22€ pp and enjoy cold and hot mezzes and six different meals. Dessert at the end","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPIVaSSQph1Ph9Re2nVG-TFkHhDOAEejmz4Vneq"],"When":"2024-7-8"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Adrian Razvan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLTcHPJOWtQZIcUqV2FbhmcFd-tO3XMSAWdzxhTN588w0mYiA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I recently visited this place and, unfortunately, the service was lacking. The waitstaff were not very friendly or experienced, which impacted the overall dining experience.

As for the food, I had Meze, and while I can’t complain about the quality, I’ve had much better elsewhere. There are definitely places that offer a far superior version of this dish.

All in all, it was an average experience.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOcxnxZnHu4hp0RQ4LsnH8ydwCn1_z_b2Xdvox3"],"When":"2024-9-17"},{"Name":"Anna","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIyh8V78N-UBMSMvk1G77iVfMrFO-d30XP33DG5BGEK-5Uf7g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This was our second time in this restaurant and we were impressed both times. The staff is extremely friendly, attentive and courteous. The food tastes fantastic. We ordered the fish and a variety of vegetarian platters. The food was prepared with a lot of love. The taverna is totally authentic and you sit in a lovely atmosphere. Big praise and keep it up! Definitely worth a visit.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNtxkYwjXFkrgxdVstQTQB6fJvewv38Mu2zbmvm"],"When":"2024-7-30"},{"Name":"Erica Seawright","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX-4Rsf7ljzoQxqGLc7Tr1k3qwkjkAg8XMTUkAPjRBNwRgHrAxl=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had the best dinner here tonight. They were incredibly busy and still managed to make my night special, as a party of one. The white house wine was one of my all time favorites too. After speaking with my waitress, I learned this is an entirely family affair. Such a great experience and I highly recommend if you are looking for a local experience where you will feel at home....even when you are very far from home! Wonderful food, wine and hospitality! Hope to be back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO3RbofdzRkbRrsNxfaqGLZkwc9nh-j8A3AkaFe"],"When":"2024-9-18"},{"Name":"Noa Noa","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJGJFPcEx-igTORaN_4XMPvwNlUg-e7iP2h5vws84AcbQn0NA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Highly recommend going here for dinner while in Aiya Napa! For starters, the food was amazing. You can’t go wrong with a classic Cypriot meze (come hungry because it’s lots of food!). The staff was so accommodating to food restrictions at our table (one of our guests couldn’t eat pork so the kitchen made sure all his pork dishes were replaced with something equally as delicious). We also tried the moussaka which was amazing! Beyond the food, the atmosphere and service really make this place what it is. The restaurant is so beautifully decorated while keeping the beauty of the original old home. The waiters are so friendly and make you feel right at home. You are never rushed to leave and encouraged to stay, eat, drink and enjoy your time.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMhgooXW0x_Ha2p5kMo0kOte4s2gj2J3xsjdPW7"],"When":"2024-9-12"},{"Name":"Anton","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKD3EuZpQBTbtemW4CZKd_LaHBKwzjmFbwyGwN0amMHqG1QUHA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Staff very kind and service minded, place is very cozy and has a great relaxed atmosphere. However the food was decent, average at best.

We ordered Meze for two, but to our surprise it didn't make us full. The portions are very small so don't go there hungry as we did. Usually the portions around Ayia Napa is a lot but this place is opposite. We also didn't receive any lamb chops. The "meat" meze was mediocre at best and expensive. So it is not affordable to the amount of food you get.

The good thing here was that the bread was warm and the wine was great. Would not recommend the food, however the place decor is nice.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP_FvFRTT16dOt5OTbxNTMO4GiKNoK82-o0PSyn"],"When":"2024-4-18"},{"Name":"Andreea Chivoiu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJvFW_FzbVo31b6nbl7wXQQ-IXFDnATQ64mvDj0ucMc-YoWXQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We had a wonderful experience at this restaurant, where the focus is on serving good, honest, traditional food. Each dish felt like it was made with care, using fresh ingredients and staying true to classic recipes. It’s the kind of comfort food that leaves you satisfied and feeling like you’ve just enjoyed a home-cooked meal.

What makes this place even more special is the rich history behind its doors. You can feel the legacy and stories that have shaped the restaurant over the years, adding a unique charm to the dining experience. The decor and ambiance reflect its past, creating a warm, welcoming atmosphere that instantly puts you at ease.

The service was also excellent—attentive, friendly, and never rushed. The staff and Andreas made us feel right at home, adding to the overall inviting vibe of the place. Whether you’re a local or just passing through, this restaurant is a great spot to enjoy authentic food in a setting that celebrates both tradition and hospitality. Highly recommended!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"levy1002","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLKKZ-j7SnfCz2g-V7sx18cKeJXE9NYDtD6dbV5Rvzyo9X5WA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We chose the place according the mark. It is located a little bit outside of the city center, what gives it quite calmer atmosphere (at quite longer time we were the only ones customers). The interior is being made as a real tavern and waiting on your starter/dish, you may read the family history of the place. We ordered house wine (you may choose between 0,5 or 1l), tzatziki & dolmades. They were served in tomato sauce - quite tasty! We received some extras on house! Later on, Kleftiko appeared (very smooth and delicious) and musaka - delicate aubergine with minced meat. The dessert were local baklavas - very sweet honey/hazelnuts. Our goodbye was shot of local alcohol on house! The service was very serving and recommending, giving this family atmosphere. The only little minus of the location is being near to very busy and loud street. The food is homemade tasty and the atmosphere is unique. Definitely recommend this place!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNyqJsb0k1AX_QdnvhcZL9WqsJkb308VYvO9R0B"],"When":"2024-5-23"},{"Name":"Alexander Weinrauch","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVM1maim9qGjjzjaVjFQeOnDOGRqqI414KD8oa_glh6-HuRSj-s=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very cozy atmosphere with great food. We had the vegetarian meze which was a wonderful experience. Service was also exceptional.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM1EEo5dQlUi0coIfLAtWCjDgUh2nzfFIzApDVf"],"When":"2024-8-1"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Maria Debucean","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU8r2E_H5YGd9kk45BVRdy5yK-hgCiDpGPRTGIrf_7ki55k1l8S=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Exceptionally good food and amazing prices. Usually you get to eat a full dinner with 10-13 euros/person (drinks and dessert included). Definitely go there if you go to Ayia Napa. Its location is exactly near Nissi Beach and close to the bus stations.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOdCFqkoXt2nprW7pmghcyOeHxhj8N3gGlz3XFs"],"When":"2024-6-11"},{"Name":"dr fauzia","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXcQogglI3dhpfU1z5iob-kdpnjL-Z5eIGE5wyM940MuGv0zIT9=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Lebanese restaurant, serving halal kosher food , the parking is very hard to find , the music so loud , smoking every where , the food not that yummy , the only thing I like is keba, there kabab is not that yummy,, the serving is good , employees there are kind and welcoming I don’t like the atmosphere of the restaurant it has loud music , no separate place for smoker and non smoker , the prices are bit high","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPA8XiFA6RdNJoeh6gDFpMYAPOC1jj5Fgyf_DTf"],"When":"2024-9-19"},{"Name":"Thomas Loebert","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWdtDdDyVIIYE3vHyDn_HePDR5bf12R_ZTvIdfJ1gGPr8KnQwwv=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"...the best Lebanese food we have ever eaten! Plus discreet, friendly service and a pleasant atmosphere... and: a great selection of vegetarin and vegan food... 10/10","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPcngXB2K4GNdncoVn62Hzv3lujBCLxD_hMO3kg"],"When":"2024-9-30"},{"Name":"Yiangos Yiangoulli","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUg1yryCln7OZZ69zdQEBvoml53jMH9MI5bi24yovIn2zo-NyI=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very welcome staff,  excellent food and lovely atmosphere.  They explained every detail about food.  I recommend meze.  I was expecting more portions in grill meze but I guess thats adequate quantities for most of the people.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMORfAahWB5OKdktIohi2zgOAVUlThyd7UILf2F"],"When":"2024-8-21"},{"Name":"Robert Lamb","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUFrz7MVZk-y4w5gW-7b4EV2YcpOLNcWvgcbAHLgw_0IG9rzo8=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Simply awesome authentic food, and fantastic service from all the staff and owner. If you love Lebanese food you will love this place.
All the meats were cooked perfectly and the Kibbeh and Falafel were to die for. As well as the Baklava and Filo apple pies which were also on point.
Thanks for looking after us so well. X","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNGC8KUnYM-nCnwsFpAaFqvXmWhIZGr1EoiNaiI"],"When":"2023-8-31"},{"Name":"Demetris Papakyriacou","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWEbu4hPUPCnZUdZ22R_446Qbpu0jV_aAb0SGVkCtGEe9SrIfgc=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"An excellent place to enjoy your food which is more than perfect and at a very reasonable price. Service is excellent and the atmosphere is vibrant and adding to that, the oriental dance show to the scene makes you travel to different cultures from the mainstream theme of Ayia Napa. I would highly recomend this place to anyone looking to have a complete cultural experience.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOmd_TZWLnjJ5YMvdvoZjYBAHn4vBSR_Vbbd5Ni"],"When":"2023-10-27"},{"Name":"Moe Karim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW_1D0wt2SVe8tGhBns5PVnzPHvAj02qb9Aa7Nhq0LW53Ic9Xt0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Walking distance from nissi beach. Very reasonable prices. Very friendly staff. Fast service.

The food:
Falafel was great and very price worthy.

Hummus with pine nuts was amazing. Best dish on the menu.

The kofta skewer was very tasty. Nice parsily flavour to it.

Shish taouk was nice. Very succulent and nice flavour. Not dry at all.

The lamb pieces on a skewer, very nice and succulent. Melt in your mouth feel. Not chewy at all.

Nakanek was good. A bit pricy.

The spinach dumplings were very good. Hot and fresh.

The arayes with zaatar not to be recommended at all.
The hummus with the minced meat was hummus with fatty and chewy pieces of meat. Do not recommend that dish at all.

Over all a great place. Recommend it strongly.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMNlbjsF9SHVbGLtu_p16k5cPyu2-ibHRvVmwEP"],"When":"2021-8-25"},{"Name":"Rachel Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWfunSXxYJqqpbGv3VXBQvED4ZUAtMytib3Gp4m-Y3URAW_3XMx=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The best meal we had in Cyprus was here. Everything was delicious and seasoned well. We ordered a whole bunch of dishes to share between us (group of 8, split into 4 for sharing).

The dips were amazing with the pitta, salad was refreshing. Service was great, the staff were friendly and helpful when we were asking about portions.

We sat outside so we could enjoy the nice weather.

Definitely recommend coming here!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOicwbGv6oc9vVUm-MiK6y84G8NwnoY11tfBzhD"],"When":"2023-5-21"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Margit Palomäki","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX5Vy_GIahjOl7xjBQhPayN3LpGBC8YKyQxiBIESkVcQTcAoPQ3yA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Highly recommend! Our waiter was super sympathetic and the service was incredible. The food was delicious as well, I recommend the stuffed mushrooms. They were crispy with honey on top and feta cheese inside and the soup was really good. Generous portions and pretty decorations inside :)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPwJ7-rarWdva8FUSJ7m6BEEpIeXh5yp0BrgHQP"],"When":"2024-7-4"},{"Name":"Ibit Dalv","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUpEzVzzqiQG616-kUjo1v-GeV7HdoNzl7PvHQsz83sSaKcUQ_m=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The high rating is well deserved. The place is wonderfully decorated and feels authentic. The staff was very quick and friendly and last but not least, the food is very tasty - portions are big, prices affordable. We were also treated with some pieces of fruit to end our meal.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMPRLCaDWXfKCaN_exKHmpmYT7NqIJx0LHlQ54F"],"When":"2024-9-5"},{"Name":"Jakub Studziński","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUQJqUl1bpOH60u_r7dp1F0W9OUmwUNTdULXIEI2VoyAXXSyrk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is our second visit to this restaurant, in particular, I recommend fish meze, for such a price so many dishes is a very favorable offer, despite such a large number of dishes there is not a single weaker dish, each dish is a real work of art, each prepared to perfection, the most of the composition I liked Kalmar and fish paste, an absolute delight, the restaurant is decorated in the beautiful style of such a Greek taverna. As for the service, a total new dimension, the restaurant is very lively, the waiters ask about each dish if everything tastes good, they are very eager to talk, describe each dish, feel the extraordinary home hour. Entering there we felt more like welcome friends than guests of the restaurant, the highest level. Even if one is not very hungry, it is worth coming at least for an appetizer to feel the unique atmosphere of the place. The restaurant is practically always full, which proves something.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPtRXf00E66nrrlpBRQHke8tX5PJZ95ppb4kyvj"],"When":"2024-9-1"},{"Name":"Sonia Alexa","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLeE-iCo6fuw49nY2VXeW-6ivcwNAsVVcyp1DskTJWj29PQkw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Such an amazing place! Food portions are huge, not expensive at all, and most importantly, VERY TASTY and ABSOLUTELY FRESH! The atmosphere is also great, with traditional Greek music. And lastly, staff is so friendly!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPzGXydxfgkMczw5jveZ7lQFDibkjEWUpLJN59I"],"When":"2024-8-13"},{"Name":"Andrea","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXx3JKtkVDHzqjA-o11dFLcptahIWAxJTYsMPHCPm29hJQTFFLX=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Lovely restaurant. Good options for traditional food and local wines.
The service was also amazing.
We ordered the sea food mezze. It was very tasty but huge quantity. Make sure you go there very hungry.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNbrrvL5gZzG8c2l1X0oU21eQbrrwz1ZxceVvfp"],"When":"2024-7-27"},{"Name":"Jasmin Hussain","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUEcaQinQzzh0FX9D_e6fv_8UYYBIm1sciaAFuxHxAVJwTj66g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We chose the fresh Seafood platter for two people. It was a lot of food and every course was delicious. The had a nice selection of wine. Customer Service was great.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN8Pa3FcIsFQ90HxeZZ_HLjx-5B0lCxy3xYfXvB"],"When":"2024-8-14"},{"Name":"Anna Zhuchkova","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLYf4EpUf-P24374cIbkWEa4uktrm6RIhSIqm3bsom2SVf5vQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Have you even seen the best place in the world? Have you even tested the best food in the world? Have you even met the best people in the world?

Welcome in En Yevo to get everything here!
I cannot describe how wonderful the place. Food is excellent, the service is the best!

Thank you the team for amazing evenings with your taverna.

Everyone who is reading, pls book the table to avoid long long queue to get dinner.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP1QstRvofxN7v922ftjaUT_9x9eyq8vzYXRE37"],"When":"2024-6-4"},{"Name":"K Laura","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWB_I9ZAHzzJYNY9Euh2-05-zgOvT3Vwjqbb6iM4H_jQyhQmvM=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I've eaten at this taverna twice with my family. The food is delicious, we can especially recommend the fish menu. The staff were very, very helpful. It was my sister's birthday, they made a cake with a candle for her and she also got a card from the restaurant. Can only recommend!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipON8ED-Zmf7Db92RNTcNEyAg6XWmT0gKGZvGcp0"],"When":"2024-7-28"}]
