user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Andreea Petrariu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVk4GU6X9ycWZBLy3QCTh_FHxOkHd0PSA3PlpMgdOQ8bsMaI6GV=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The food is incredibly tasty, and I highly recommend you visit this place. The flavors are rich, and the dishes are prepared with great care. Whether you're looking for traditional cuisine or something new, you'll be pleasantly surprised. It's definitely a spot worth trying if you appreciate good food.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPrJxEp1f7Jf1TD-e44hV5f5nyrttqjbBDjrTKv"],"When":"2024-9-26"},{"Name":"Soph C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLOLoSufjUO6QXkxUbWLDsY-II20JXR2IgRj-NQDDRfMnZgsQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We had a lovely meal here after seeing the reviews online and we were not disappointed, we had the doner pita Greek style and the flavours were amazing, just the right portion and very good price! We also had the honey baked feta which was delicious. The very nice waiter apologised about the wait as they were busier than expected but honestly it wasn’t a long time at all and we were enjoying the atmosphere, if any customers were complaining they should relax, they’re on holiday! Overall lovely meal and service would recommend.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN8gru4NQan1WtPP7vXCahav1qIxAJGMiGhDlFz"],"When":"2024-9-30"},{"Name":"Ana Kalmakhelidze","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJZ6oO8dsbilEXFLHCPaatY53m5d62qhA4XLw0ZYQb36zHzrqc=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I had a terrible experience about this place, i ate chicken kebab or something like this and there was a hair in it, but I didn't say anything because i was with my daughter and parents, there were eating something other dish and I didn't want to make them feel bad about eating.
I'm talking about this chicken roll which is in the second picture. The first one was not bad at all😬","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO_gbY8PEmcJhdB0p6G12EjB7z5cMV_eWkL9Kg"],"When":"2024-10-8"},{"Name":"Nicholas Nicholls","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU4lCaTCnN6wFY2FA0c72ZaBg3ZOJ5pKng9TCtYFsWZsRWeXyWQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had an amazing time here. Food was amazingly cheap for the amount and quality. Service was excellent and friendly. Had the share platter for two which was more suitable for 3 so be warned 😜. Was thoroughly enjoyable","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPjlKOT6-z4cmQFU7bCvF3C9BF_c0ZYPrVZ05q1"],"When":"2024-10-1"},{"Name":"Thomas Loebert","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWdtDdDyVIIYE3vHyDn_HePDR5bf12R_ZTvIdfJ1gGPr8KnQwwv=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Two things in advance that we didn't expect in Ayia Napa: the really beautifully designed area around the harbor and this restaurant!
After many visits over the years to all parts of Cyprus, we can say: nowhere have we experienced more authentic and tasty Cypriot cuisine. An 11/10 are the grilled olives, the zucchini balls and the hummus. But everything else on the appealing menu is freshly prepared and simply tastes great.
Consistently authentic: They serve no espresso! Instead there is a cypress coffee.
The ambience instantly makes you feel like you are in a cozy tavern. The service is throughly friendly, attentive and welcoming. All in all, a very pleasant experience. So: off to Sesoula Kalamaki...","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN1QlU4aiZD3znrIMfvLjSsSc4zW3I16qlqvtIl"],"When":"2024-10-4"},{"Name":"Chloe F","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKDYsxYdYC2om3NM4Kj31bGyIF1tIZJw7-DQ5zLICu8hX4GLCVg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great food, friendly staff, quick service and excellent prices. Is very cheap compared to other places and lot tastier! We ate here twice during out holiday and will deffinalty revisit","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP4yViUeOrJn8MVqtFHiv4Q-4PPMZ1tLGbOHv6c"],"When":"2024-10-8"},{"Name":"Aleksandra Kopacz","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIrriTu-6ruF9oYN2uLSUV4pO9D_GNBox_pkffc04X1fX6fOA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place is amazing - we ate an enormous portion of souvlaki and they were incredible. The meal was delicious, the interior looks really nice and there's a great atmosphere there. I totally recommend everyone to go there:)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMY0b77ax8DITAt0yWg6Zf338l4io84r7y8iu0P"],"When":"2024-9-19"},{"Name":"Anton Zakrajšek","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXmHVSVC49-jXXymSWwbNlORyqshSl6a-6sgiQfxdr6hfOGGro=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Food was tasty, we got little desert on the house. Our waiter english didnt seem the best, we ordered lemonade and they bring us Lime Sprite? Ambiance is decent, suited for a place to grab casual fast meal.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOqu-INky236ls4EKaEBD09CZ18DDvfgGdcDdTU"],"When":"2024-7-15"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"maisie crawford","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJGglwyt4oKx3BKmL9FpVL13aXXTvqAHr7KrFL-1lXGJ0tnog=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Cannot express how happy I am with last nights meal. Everything was cooked to perfection. Looked amazing. Beautiful views. Compliments to the chef, you’re absolutely smashing it!
Absolute Faultless.
If you’re in Cyprus and want a fine dining experience, this is it!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPqlF7rHTxKIZPd4raGCMVdqMWcC18j9EFFExxE"],"When":"2024-9-9"},{"Name":"Oleg Sklyanchuk","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVrlOqbpfazRI5xh6UHUr_fW8cnNbKlTiWUBgNbxYuqnt-kCqqE=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Excellent service, amazing atmosphere and view from the terrace. The food presentation was great, but for some reason I found the taste just okay, nothing to write home about. I would say it is worth a visit though!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN64uBBxoxtp1jugOiMVVS3xpR0S_kDQcMKLRYr"],"When":"2024-9-28"},{"Name":"Mikkel Jensen (Overseas Manager at TUI)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWAat2YpcPzjYk-d7eo5PceQDUjFqQM37qbAzkNMZonTq8smBf1=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We recently dined at The Deck and had an incredible experience. The food was nothing short of spectacular, with each dish crafted with meticulous attention to detail. The view from the restaurant added an extra touch of magic to our evening, creating a perfect setting. The service was outstanding, with staff attentive and friendly throughout our visit. However, we were a bit disappointed that despite mentioning our engagement during the booking, there was no acknowledgment or congratulation, which was surprising for a place of such quality. Despite this, we look forward to returning and enjoying another wonderful meal as Mr. & Mr. ❤️","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOAUI6Zya19XAEeu12MiY8js9lkW5oy-0SRfkVi"],"When":"2024-7-7"},{"Name":"Carana","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVmNZmW7Da2rzwNU4zk4GIEwpPW2XLcDHIri2ZKUPyFPEMYxu4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very attentive and friendly service of the whole staff. The ambiance is really nice with live music and overlooking the pool area.
The food was good to very good overall we would definitely come back. Personally I would recommend the mushroom black angus with the well matching Shiraz. 😊","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOIEH0jO_TFcb26cpT2cQc2vkEwRdcL6vJAkYM"],"When":"2024-8-30"},{"Name":"Adrian Marginean","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJvHNAj8fFwLdWESR3f9e4trYzCs5RRZkufadb5ep-tCW7RHw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"the most beautiful restaurant in Ayia Napa, superb atmosphere, fantastic view, good food and exceptional service! Vasilii the best waiter!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMRPXPsQaZncH6HyG7UJ9H_uTsvTTpQA2-PydrB"],"When":"2024-9-30"},{"Name":"Михаил Димитров","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK8hLiFZmD9_i447iJ3VceseoQLzKp9SH65tfqf29gadkLw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing experience. The atmosphere of the place is definitely 5 star. The staff is very attentive, while the food is amazing. Make sure to make a reservation in advance.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPebiJQdjqHqHV_lVDAROQYia3iZBmxwp9UdnI"],"When":"2024-6-17"},{"Name":"Benjamin Francis","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXsybo2NbQRT0K2Alh1R3mneUi2dFEjytMp0QQ3cXk2a_tUpbtA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Food is very good, the pasta selection and prawn risotto was fabulous, my pork steak was a bit rough, and the starters we had, sea bass tartar was very unique and deliciously refreshing. Scallops also incredible.
I'd likely go back, for two mains and two starters and a bottle of red was €140.

Very high class and elegant restaurant Vilnius my waiter was rather excellent.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMt3RU4gyfV7xiOUtaWIbuVf-dXfMOvc45TOngg"],"When":"2023-10-2"},{"Name":"Hafan Eljmazi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK5N4voJT34UUlTAiEbxv_03FVohqbm8MtaGmmtHV90VWgFUg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very good food, the service was very friendly and very courteous. Appropriate atmosphere with good background music and a nice ambience. Clear recommendation if you want to eat well. Many thanks to Vasilis and Atanas for the service tonight.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Klara Sophocleous","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJblFwbetGpyBb0t707cyangyOtQaeAOuUXlcQpLyVfcO78vA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing restaurant, high quality food, very friendly and helpful service. Last month we were there 5 times and always loved it!
The cocktails are always great. Best view of Ayia Napa and the BEST RESTAURANT in Cyprus.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMOf8U1qlS_Z6u1mmlji9bRMEuAEwncj_wbSjUe"],"When":"2024-9-1"},{"Name":"Keri Kadri","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJFicaN0ut7U_QTExDs1yvuTvJr_COma-_6bNSxCtTJOrpyjg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Where do I begin? The food at this restaurant was truly sensational. We asked for recommendations, and each one exceeded our expectations. The staff were incredibly helpful, polite, and cheerful, making our dining experience even more enjoyable.

It was our first day, and we were quite tired. We arrived at the restaurant in T-shirts, shorts, and flip-flops, feeling a bit out of place given the beautiful, five-star ambiance. However, the staff welcomed us warmly and made us feel completely comfortable despite our casual attire.

The quality of the food was outstanding, and the prices were very reasonable. We highly recommend this restaurant and will definitely be visiting again. The head waiter was brilliant we didn’t get his name unfortunately but he was an amazing character and very hospitable.

Overall, we were very happy with our experience and look forward to returning.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipONJYsge-hrZzJ9IBj18uCzK2z_r1t63CQInfOW"],"When":"2024-8-18"},{"Name":"Harry Sot","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ6uK_cPuwegjaRDmqvRq1Rs_wLiVNNExE2JiGWr_0KgiyBY42f=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing  food with a great view and atmosphere. Would defiently come again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNiKHj2mCFKKTY7g_KWbOHtgBMg0BZY5uWuyGw0"],"When":"2024-9-12"},{"Name":"Viktor Trajkovski","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUCBZ3fFXYlxE37zHQo9azTBuVxxIAdKi5i9cA2IbgSwoZKPIZB=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing restourant with perfect view
The tomahawk was delicious and its enough for 2 people.
But staff must be better for place like this!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNwBh2R9dAZ1eHp9mYksifgl7yv9m0lpFXZBm5R"],"When":"2024-9-13"},{"Name":"Sabriin A","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLnz26AhR0CKlOQLWfQgfcKOi_4Ip7zoHOm8ISZ4MJZvzWLSHs=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Food was great! Service was absolutely lovely, you need to try their pistachio and raspberry dessert.. TO DIE FOR.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMk8aMrVPeCknHAqQDG-GlzwR7lMA710Sd__OU0"],"When":"2024-9-3"},{"Name":"Christina “Chriskar” Kar","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI2j_V7ZVYB1xxIv2mGVVV6cA7dtceifkg7QcvJx0TYh0_42A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The food was great! Atmosphere and environment really nice! So was the music! All the staff was very gentle and nice, except the girl in the entrance, who is the reason of my 4 stars rating instead of 5 stars. We were guests of the hotel and we decided to try the rooftop restaurant. Asked at the reception before and no reference was made about dress code or reservation needed. When we arrived, we were asked if we have a reservation, giving us the impression its fully booked. She then found a table for us but then she looked at our shoes and said she is not sure we can go in. Since we are in casual vacation and didnt really think of it, we were wearing sandals. The girl asked the manager who happily and gently told us there is no problem and led us to our table. The restaurant by the time we left was half full. But what really bothered us was when my 4 years old daughter went to look at the view at the glass barrier, the same girl complained that she is leaving fingerprints. Our daughter had just touched the glass with her clean hands. I found her whole attitude not matching the very nice and relaxing atmosphere of the restaurant. While everyone else was super nice, she made us stressed and took us a while to relax and enjoy it.
P.s. half of the people in the restaurant were wearing flip flops and sandals, which is the most expected and understandable thing to see in a steakhouse of a big seaside all inclusive style family resort, where people go to relax with their family and not to dress up formally.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Kelly L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUD4h3edafmtrOaHJ70vs4WzED_sZvz9Eb35fiLqE-h8z7pB6WDdQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great fine dining experience with lovely staff and the food was delicious and not forgetting the cocktails!

Salmon starter, was well seasoned with a citrus kick to it. Best smoked salmon we've had.

Fillet steak with peppercorn sauce, the steak was cooked perfectly how I added for it to be done along with the veg and sauce.

Tried a few cocktails and our favourite was the French martini.

Would 100% recommend 😊","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPzO2HFosK_0jEZVw8ff6bAfhMMIYjJBxGoJxGg"],"When":"2022-10-8"},{"Name":"Antonio Baldassarro","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVB85h5RKx_XJL1dkq7AjB2EXLhICcZjoXypKa6YfSCa6nrbwgZ4g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Situated on the 6th floor of the Adams Beach Hotel, Glasshouse offers the best food experience one can possible have in Cyprus. You are immediately surrounded by complete luxury when you enter the restaurant, and then the hostess and especially the general manager Clio and his staff are superb and everything is first class from there onward.
When it comes to food, everything is beautifully prepared and presented, our group of 7 people had an array of starters from mussels, rugula with goat cheese ball, foie gras, ravioli, you name it.... totally an awesome experience.
Then for main, highly recommend the Chateaubriand  steak. It melts in your mouth.
To complement your meal a large selections of local wines that are totally worth a try.
In my opinion, the desert menu could have a larger selection, perhaps including some local delicacies.
This is definitely the place to take that special someone for food and an overall experience to remember for a long time.our last visit at Glasshouse was on 29 August 2024. The restaurant has undergone a complete makeover. There is an outside area with breathtaking views of Nissi Beach and Agia Napa. The food menu has also been updated. I highly recommend the rack of lamb, simply cooked to perfection. The food and the atmosphere was once again complemented by Clio, the manager of the restaurant. Definitely worth a visit if you are in the area, you will not be disappointed.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPD9H5sA-jp2Rcmqny4Ixpy2f2AY8gp7NsA402O"],"When":"2024-8-30"}]

[{"Name":"Maria Christou","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXw1PgdVVKR9W1i3--cFVI4xfrWdps9jEdjuqmy2l2RZkwdmIyptQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"If you are a sushi lover, this place is a must visit. The sushi was fresh and beautifully presented on a boat. Everything we asked for was brought promptly.
The restaurant is perfectly located in the heart of Ayia Napa.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMpUdrNx5Ptr0c2OhY0vRDyFJ7QhQm3CrCsvnHE"],"When":"2024-10-7"},{"Name":"Kim Clala","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJnutzpoLKHoZIAwSgxRZ3RTfZasgYvbWeKDH3SrYKXj1JNYw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"If you're Asian, I recommend you to come here.
This place is really seasoned well.
What a satisfying meal!

If I had been sick in Cyprus, I would have come here and ordered soybean paste soup and rice.

I'm going to come here again later in the evening!

Asahi beer is also here!! It tasted so good!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPpAIFWTS29lascnjo3XYePz0ZtDG2RFnS6_Xvy"],"When":"2024-9-19"},{"Name":"Linda Jabbes","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW45aVycgoJHzNNRmMinHkfNSIl1REWleiqBeWZ_Esr5NOCllvXjw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The best asian restaurant in Ayia Napa! The food is extraordinary and has a lot of variety in the Sushi menu. If you don't take the Karai Ebi as a starter you are definitely missing out on something!! We were in Ayia Napa for 1 week and ate 3 times there since it was so delicious. Highly recommend!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPo_7iXxGUIhA_5KRcWaYOJ9gFXqkQDmCi9kemp"],"When":"2024-8-20"},{"Name":"Stefan Eilmsteiner (meilstone)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUUSuKMVOfUIU1B5Z1o0yG06v1xNXQjTiYuHWL67Sc-PGX2pqw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great tasting Sushi/Nigiri/Sashimi. We also liked the Fuji Beef a lot. Desserts were awesome as well, especially the Japanese Cheesecake! Service was quick and friendly.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOUFFOgRp94K0kAUgx0V7BnAn0d9-v4eQMh1wMi"],"When":"2024-7-28"},{"Name":"Andrew Orphanides","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV6Ro_3t3tjgjYTaPCOQnbLIpwDX30_rmiStX9QLgf7GA5MZfjDMA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This restaurant does one of the best ribeye steaks I've had. That includes England, includes anywhere. It needs to advertise that more. The service is impeccable, the sushi is absolutely incredible, the sashimi is amazing, the service, and the value.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNF5iflIOF2QoZXOdcqamQe_BIo1CFrDYk7cAYa"],"When":"2024-9-2"},{"Name":"Valentina Pekčec","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWui8RE7x1Bd5foczk3YnQJivoeaSdaAPrlvfG-fXEwJd5qmDRR=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very delicious food, big portions, we chocked in food 😂🩷loved it so much!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNhObh7_8cQ3q2Xta0J1_9B6Iw_3of0vXslqzTP"],"When":"2024-9-2"},{"Name":"Stephanie Bickers","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVLT0i5fbZfz09MSmpit33R0yx0a8mfovq1pN_3iUPvobzOW4KdLg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The service was very good and the sushi was excellent, we said what we wanted and they said they bring it in an order that made sense. We had 12pc sushi/sashimi, shared a main with edname and had a fab dessert of ginger brulee and Japanese cheesecake which was worth it.Its right on the road so a couple of tables in is best.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNfYEiQUkdNaxTZnFm6yGTpKKR5G8byJgjUdeZ-"],"When":"2024-4-15"},{"Name":"Andrea Christophorou","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKwbKBG7NZsLxlpp4SkRshdskp28H7OH2ybBhVXPXTAJpoUHQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Lovely place in the hard od Ayia Napa. Good service and nice food. I had the dragon sushi, vegetarian sushi, katsu chciken, egg fried rise and for dessert the ginger creme brule.
P.s Good cocktails as well.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPbtyY9gEr4_I0un1XTHO19Ph1vBsFXCaixaghl"],"When":"2024-4-1"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Caleb Tan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWGulTpvariBXtXgmQyN0QW2idI9ZauvS9VVC9fpyYi7-o8zjgo=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We return mainly for the seafood platter, which is meticulously prepared. Each item on the platter reflects the chef's attention to detail and hard work. The shrimp is well deveined and unpeeled, preserving its moisture and freshness. The mussels are tender and juicy, even without sauce. The sea bream, perfectly grilled, never disappoints. The squid and octopus are well-grilled, with the smoky taste lingering until the last bite. The service is equally commendable. We always feel warmly welcomed and never rushed, even after we've finished our meal.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO1NaJ_foAVvK7ZuRJHef_OzJXWQ4hVoLmQ6-Sk"],"When":"2024-6-6"},{"Name":"Matthew","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW9WAuvQbTirV982cHYV5aqjO0xl0ZI7oGM3SJ-t7HD3veLFlXN_A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Came here for our last meal of a seven-night holiday that had been dominated by amazing food - and really wished we hadn't. Worst meal by a country mile, struggled to eat the majority of it. Wine wasn't nice either. Spent over €300 and came away hungry and disappointed.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOqLOKz_n0eBCrXkd1qZl-8OM4SwdkTQW0FQg9C"],"When":"2024-5-4"},{"Name":"Carolin Karner","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXZybaPD4fjQxyCl3VWFN6Zd0l_KvAjGgUsNLBVmVauppLcAgQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The food was plentiful and excellent; we had the seafood platter and strawberry mojitos which were of superb quality.

Spyros, our waiter, was exceptional and ensured we had everything we needed. He even provided us with blankets when it got a bit chilly in the evening. Overall, the service was outstanding and the food was delicious. Thank you very much for the warm hospitality!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOa6yez9SkxfvUMwrx9X_BOkWrrjt4R6rI90zcm"],"When":"2024-6-3"},{"Name":"Epic Toni","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVwttuoN-Bht7aZQNj83_aT1WDJTfDX2ST6mcX1BIXPfm-oXi9t=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very delicious in here. Ate an octopus and my wife something with beef. It was absolutely tasty. Never tasted such an delicious octopus or beef since a long long time. I can really recommend it.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPXJjxgM061MllOfzvgI1Gi90odwJ0l7jJ2a-ti"],"When":"2024-7-19"},{"Name":"zeljka vukajlovic","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVs1kpPe66m4cOZ8pQABmBQbe7Eo0Ly9GDX8LziTjIzLxcbNDRQ0g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Head of service is the best I have ever seen, very kind. The food is perfect and delicious. We came 4 times and each time both the kitchen and the service were up to par. The highest recommendation in the whole Aiya Napa.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPwFu0SRS7zXcX5zOuVf9FgLAUaBxiRg1yEA34e"],"When":"2024-9-19"},{"Name":"Patricia H","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXcy-A8bcTy27BfP0ijKmTP9Arx5B6EblVLufcDDqGXY7pb_lme=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This experience was AMAZING from start to finish (Spyros, if you're reading this, you should know who I am because I kept saying everything was amazing!) We were greeted very nicely, Spyros picked up on all the "yalla's" that my mom and I were saying because we're Lebanese and want to try a traditional Cypriot meal. We had two other waiters serve us as well and there were both lovely. Spyros offered us a fresh squid appetizer which wasn't on the menu, it was heavenly. He went above & beyond to make our experience truly exceptional, he was so sociable and warm and simply a people person who knows how to make you feel seen and one-of-a-kind.

We ordered the mix seafood platter which came with perfectly seasoned fries, a salad, two dips and pita bread. The seafood platter was so generous, every single thing tasted divine. The calami pieces were HUGE. The octopus perfectly grilled. The shrimp huge and juicy. Mussels didn't have that odd fishy smell. It was delicious. We also ordered the house white wine which paired perfectly with the seafood. Spyros then offered us TWO MORE complimentary glasses. He then insisted to show us the dessert offerings, so he brought the plates over to us and we chose the baklava / cheesecake hybrid with a vanilla ice cream scoop. HEAVENLY.

We reminded him that it was Mother's Day that day and I brought my mom to Cyprus to celebrate. So the waiters came over and sang us Happy Birthday/Mother's Day which was adorable. This entire experience made us feel so alive and was a perfect example of the Cypriot culture, warmth and generosity.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO4QpK5dxzfHGY0C17dFFntfX6WkcDQ8QmOBlHK"],"When":"2024-5-17"},{"Name":"Francis Alba","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWUQ0dbPXTvgTRQuKjXbEoMDBpD9-wMo1kiy0YnCaCav1Y-GaWW=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Definitely delivered. My friend and I Bolt-ed it to Aiya Napa from Limassol just to go here and did not disappoint. Ask for Renata, she will definitely keep you on your toes","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMS3B5FvZZ-0HACTHmJXqjMroGAvqd-h8jftOI"],"When":"2024-6-20"},{"Name":"J","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIu6dd-Hh7YhOG9oElWpqXQ9UbHnS1C1ZTo2dVW5aW2Nqin=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Fantastic dining experience! We loved the authentic seafood platter (no fried seafood, just quality grill), such delicious variety! Spiros was a lovely staff who attended our table! Gave us complimentary homemade desserts to end the meal. We went away rolling back to our accom. Highly recommend to anyone who visits Ayia Napa. Such a local gem! （＾ν＾）","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNtwPrtMFNg06BC2Hp4q_XbUxVBNv4MIkWXxE0"],"When":"2024-4-21"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Matthew Wilson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX4wdpenQyInUwxzMnB9dotnqxi78apyH0tLUWZe5LcuUzN4z8=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Wow!  Fabulous food and really nice service.
I had a village salad as a main and it was huge and really good value for money.  My girlfriend falafels and said they were the best she had ever had, and it was the best meal we had had whilst in Ayia Napa.  We ate early on as we were flying back home that evening but we had also seen how good the atmosphere was earlier in the week whilst going back to our hotel…..  Nice cocktails and baklava too!  Well worth a meal.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPDaI6owfC_R30y5kB2ru2pSfzr8UjfGDnXm3xt"],"When":"2024-7-1"},{"Name":"Simone Chappell","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKdcWE3xbTa6PEU8LH_oXAagQkm0aM4QSRG8xvyO8F6RYDn3g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Recently had a holiday in Ayia napa and found this wonderful family run taverna. We spent quite a few evening here as the friendly atmosphere, great entertainment, service, facilities and food were fantastic. The owner and his family were very welcoming offering a great menu and wines. I will definitely be visiting on my return to Cyprus and I would highly recommend this Taverna for a fun night out.
Thanks for all the fun and laughter.
Simone and Mark","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMPnjB3e4ED9ARD1FEDBDRKvIdXo_UJJeQWXi-_"],"When":"2024-8-11"},{"Name":"Alex Bear","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV4l1AMpOBgua3QBDMZT5QH5FDx2W2-VqraElZdRg5uYe1utmux=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Nice restaurant with delucious food and good service. The most amazing thing is the atmosphere and charm, which are enforced by the live music and entertainment. We liked it!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMyPhoEZDN0UjPRapLuQeR7dD7OxYyoWKAT4dfe"],"When":"2024-9-30"},{"Name":"Jonil Novela","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUi9HIF8BdGYgj2qESM55Ak-ZcO4qWhq13dZ6PJfSowbMjmVoV3=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I don’t normally rate a restaurant but this time I will do because they deserved it! This is the best restaurant I ever tried in Cyprus for serving the most authentic Cypriot food. The portion for each meals are enormous! Price is average and you are definitely getting more what you paid for because you can enjoy your food while watching the traditional cypriot dance! Performers and staffs are very engaging.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNseRY8C6TVGfUf1E0-faqYrd3KYA4xnXAcyDLt"],"When":"2024-9-18"},{"Name":"Adrian Razvan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLTcHPJOWtQZIcUqV2FbhmcFd-tO3XMSAWdzxhTN588w0mYiA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had an amazing meal at this place! The lamb chops were perfectly cooked, tender, and full of flavor. The Village Salad was fresh and vibrant, complementing the meal wonderfully. I also loved the Tzatziki with Pita Bread, a perfect combination of creamy and crunchy.

Great atmosphere and friendly service. Highly recommend!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPTbeSKy5e7M0YEVC5jeUQVb_uURICqKWd9fFoG"],"When":"2024-9-15"},{"Name":"Emma White","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIaZZepATRJtLPJg2o_tm8LDAzQKTFo9p6RWou5JsSxNFv22g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"We came here on Wednesday and had a lovely meal. Tonight we reserved a table for 7:15pm, unfortunately it took 1.5hrs for the food to arrive and when it did it was cold. The staff gave us a drink on the house, however this was not enough as they didn’t acknowledge their mistake. We ended up leaving hungry and went elsewhere for food. Such a shame as the food looked lovely, I’m disappointed of the outcome and the service.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPRkfBkbtcABUckvO6XdwJlsBgkJSbcFjJ1mgqA"],"When":"2024-10-1"},{"Name":"Uros Pavlovic","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV5Ejya7R_8eq4K2A9teB2BqGz83OxkpdPMrkxPqGysDZt8a8z5=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Atmosphere is good and service is also nice. I recommend this to all the tourists, they will get the good feel of Cyprus culture and music :)
I dont appreciate the painted white tiles on the wall, they were going for rustic greek look.. This way it just looks stupid, they really could stick some real tiles on there…
Food is honestly sub standard and portions were not that big, I had to go to a different place later to eat again. The food was a bit bland and not seasoned that well. Disappointed in Musaka, Lamb Kleftiko was decent, but there was like 2 spoons of meat.
It is a good place if you want to try these things out for the first time and get an idea of what it is.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP4LmL3qHzNz7ItT---1tBiMBBgE4rymv3rcl1m"],"When":"2024-9-30"},{"Name":"Kerstin Jansen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJGvUFUOqdPy9bnk1r9ANRmH06dXWxZZuFatSVwlkjfDNisqQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We went there because of the good reviews and were not disappointed. The service staff was very friendly and warm. The menu was authentically Greek/Cypriot, and all the dishes were excellent. We highly recommend this tavern.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPijOY6JYe2a26CFQ5AvoOYbO0sbMFBx3Us55RQ"],"When":"2024-7-8"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Lucas Sands","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVcMLC5iONaUBp2TB07elciqZnho-g89yeuJx4P8nk-HjlwHtxj=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"The pork chop was 90% fat . The double Angus burger was below average, I'd prefer a  big tasty from McDonald's. The pizza special was  actually good & tasty.  As a place and a restaurant it is beautiful but I would never eat here again.

Maybe  just a pizza for my kid and a drink just to let my girl play on the playground  and rest for a while","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO0Izb86Ob1LXxbeaLcIGSVgSXoy0wjP2l0iE6K"],"When":"2024-8-20"},{"Name":"Zu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXnaGt5y8oNGy9lhIivjSt3DqMyIYtgRkuTOVqe39SKSikJfOnD=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"grilled octopus and baked potato is really tasty and my favourite, large portions, salad also large and really good. ketchup and mayoy for free. 1l Carafe of wine 15€,lots of choices of drinks. there are very smiley and nice waiters, nice place for dinner or lunch. I recommend the restaurant part of this venue ( there is also pub with food right next to the fine restaurant) I visited this place few years ago and still happy to come againz","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP3UbX9fPlUT5nZghu4yYNuIR8kmYz48W4yOA1E"],"When":"2024-8-18"},{"Name":"Martin Karlik","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI_HTIuVcZeMKNKTy1sH0K0SDJ7sGcHcGZ299Lkxn5oIBgLyQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Well, we visited this restaurant 5times during our vacation. We had: Spageti fruti di mare, Kfeltiko, Stifado, Grilled sea bass, Grilled octopus, Grilled kalamari, Spageti bolonese, Kebab, Dolmas, Tzatziki. Everything was very good and tasty. Also good and swift service. I can only recommend this restaurant.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOq0lPeA6d2yzq0nMMIXrofNVGI8Ay9HwyCJXYg"],"When":"2024-7-18"},{"Name":"Pew","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW9aQJg7tvw6SxVPo5H6CShUUzVme90YcALgx36W-xjb8XzmjhSww=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I have visited this restaurant with my girlfriend and everything was amazing. The food was so delicious, we ordered pepperoni pizza and spaghetti which both were so tasty and delicious. The food was ready in 15 minutes with fast service and the employees were so kind and welcoming. They also have a big screen which they turn it on at night time.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPn8c_OUEoCkmfQBkZTKAIpqekD2MFu9FidcYHs"],"When":"2024-8-14"},{"Name":"Gabriela D","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIfR3v8QVxOJJyp6nwGWfmqSZ4sQWdzLmR6xPbz43WtmZqWRzY=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We will never forget this night! Thanks to all the staff and especially to the amazing manager here at Gardens Restaurant! They were all very very hospitable and very welcoming. The food was great, I highly recommend The Grilled Mozarella Chicken.

Also the dessert is worth!!

10000/10🤩🤩🤩🤩🤩","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMWBEI_34WXsdFyLwW4tgaEyg0oXNaXKP9ev4KF"],"When":"2024-8-7"},{"Name":"Sarah Bueno","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXaJ0ZmvDAHslDIlVqzhrTkwfgxrKnstcLlmhitfbbvb32oEic=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Came here for lunch when i arrived in Cyprus and on my last day. Location is perfect as its close to nissi beach , also shops and supermarkets…
The staff are so nice and attentive . Food is at a great price, cocktails are around 5-7€ .

I tried the pork soulvaki and the pasta and both were delicious! Defo recommend","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPENLHxeJqA2g_12gNklN2xMj1junDwPe9CHnAy"],"When":"2024-7-23"},{"Name":"Hih 1hi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL80yo3iOGbIlRmYcCyBlboi1fGLs-gPUIOBCXS5lClC3q1gw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very nice waitresses, delicious food and fair prices compared to the restaurants near by. It was so good I ate there more than just ones.🥹","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNjP90Upd3lU2rXZujrpl93yZX6J0MXb51D471E"],"When":"2024-8-18"},{"Name":"Martina Trajkovic","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWEAsFcwOlGRo797v1EfQWuTosSRncC1InlMOjUleIez7IWGH0=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recently spent a week in Cyprus, and Gardens quickly became my go-to spot for both dining and unwinding. The ambiance is perfect—subtle decor, pleasant music at just the right volume, and a welcoming atmosphere that makes you feel instantly at ease.
Our group of five sampled a wide variety of dishes throughout the week, and I can confidently say that every single one was amazing. From the starters to the main courses, each plate was prepared with great attention to detail and bursting with flavor. While it’s hard to pick a standout dish, that’s only because everything we tried was exceptional.
What truly sets Gardens apart, though, is the service. The staff was incredibly pleasant and accommodating, and by the end of our stay, they felt more like friends than servers. They even surprised us with complimentary drinks, a gesture that made our experience all the more special.
The crowd at Gardens typically consists of groups of friends and families, making it a lively yet relaxed place to enjoy a meal or drinks. Whether you’re looking for a spot to dine with loved ones or just want a casual place to hang out, Gardens has it all.
I would highly recommend Gardens to anyone visiting Cyprus. I’ll definitely be returning on my next trip!","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Koula Kashiouri","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLb4CnUUJmevrXoSGFE4zq3EHYvlGT6iA_JZiSsEAPqA_49rg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A truly fantastic experience for my family. We were a group of 10 people . We have been served really fast especially the kids who wanted food the sooner . Owners are always there to greet and welcome you. They recommended us some dishes which they tasted amazing . We tried several pizzas and garlic bread , bruschetta for starters, after that we tasted several pastas ( seafood orzo, beef orzotto , ravioli pesto, carbonara and tagliatelle al fillets ) which we shared all together . I can easily give them a score 9.99/10 for all we have tried . At the end we tried the large Nutella calzone accompanied with 3 scoops of vanilla homemade gellato . Please please give it a try and you will not regret !!! WE WILL BE BACK FOR SURE 👌💕👍","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOR8qF0hr0oKz8lvW_uFBi4i5V_xzP9TezCtF9b"],"When":"2024-8-6"},{"Name":"AGUGUO CHRISTIAN","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLqWEoOw65hPu5Rft_6YQzwHfF5irtE18sVYEAD2c39S3nj0A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A truly Italian gem in the heart of ayia napa. Super stylish Italian style with the most friendly staff. Food is super wow and tasty and was served fast. We tried pizzas and were the most tasty we had during our trip. We will visit again and we will recommend it to all of our friends!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNWrNIKAvr8ar98oe7GbvxPtcWQSNevfFHAoYRt"],"When":"2024-6-19"},{"Name":"V T","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK7Qie_-0O9hnQmezye5qHjw_Ag9K_huMhjvbPxWBuXAR1X3g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Nice freshly made pizza, tasty pasta dishes, especially the salmon, which had a generous amount of salmon. Good friendly and prompt service.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMrp3TChmcM9gOWSwOFgIweL47sHd-Q1NklUkCo"],"When":"2024-8-21"},{"Name":"Gergely Mustos","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLMYEhjQcoXq0ICSI5hgyna6duQddqMRLPa7yRUqegDN9XZug=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Best BBQ pizza I ever had, but all of us enjoyed the food very much!
The place is nice and clean, very cosy and the waiters are kind and fun. This restaurant is a “must visit” place when you are around.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN_COK_zrGtk1rg4SfXCJXF3A2E3XyZ9fm5Qum5"],"When":"2024-9-16"},{"Name":"Mohtaz Alqasim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJfdXJItiyPFkUFgiAkAHCtuzRgbsEyNyVobjlN3wf-8rjoTg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We are Lebanese having a house in Ayia napa. We are visiting the area 4,5 per year. We had a recommendation for one longstaying friend for this restaurant and by the time we have visited became our favourite Italian restaurant. Owners very friendly staff amazing and above all food super WOW . Thanks bella Italy cy for becoming part of our life . We advise you to try their bruschetta , salmon tartare, garlic pizza. From pastas our favorite is seafood orzo, tagliatelle beef, ravioli gorgonzola. From pizzas all are amazing fluffy Neapolitan dough with attention to detail . Love you all guys see you soon ... 💕 😘","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNYNLRnHT92iPiLXh1-RRwUCQZ0gHmz54_k4bP_"],"When":"2024-4-11"},{"Name":"Natasa Boyadjian","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKrQ02lwKXHewKeyRP0xO20Di6eE2sKsHnBGs8QyH44lO8b_gNB=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Delicious neapolitan style pizza! Their dough was delicious and perfectly cooked in a wood fired oven! Their Capricciosa and Margerita pizzas, were so delicious, with good and fresh ingredients that they didn't need to add salt, pepper, spicy oil or any other condiment! We will visit again for sure! Good prices and service also!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN7yopBiUgGBX8vAlmFsBEalYAkJ5VaPKVdznyW"],"When":"2024-6-29"},{"Name":"Kantou Chord","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUIQelYumPScFzPR1S_mOFI797PnHB9ow0iyXsCb4313HzMlJE=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"As an Aperol Spritz enthusiast, I was delighted by their perfectly balanced Aperol Spritz – a refreshing blend of Aperol, Prosecco, and soda, garnished with a slice of orange. A must-try for any fan!

The food is outstanding, especially their homemade pasta and wood-fired Margherita pizza. Don’t miss the tiramisu for dessert – it’s the perfect sweet ending to a great meal.

Highly recommend for anyone looking for an authentic taste of Italy!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMAIzJFWwR34SpVqNXY8SoqAlKBqQT_Lv6FCnRI"],"When":"2024-6-14"},{"Name":"Viaxero Travelingbar","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU8FhSueFE8TI3OKyAyiRcsVY3CzgCjRj-4Fbjo9DJXBuH7vFIX=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I consider this cost and welcoming Italian one of best Italian  restaurants in Cyprus . Dishes follows Neapolitan cuisine  tradition, everything is very fresh and incredibly tasty. Price referred to this kind of quality is very reasonable. Wine and cocktail selection is good and digestif/spirit even better. Staff is extremely friendly. Recommended for all Italian lovers and need a casual place to relax and eat authentic Neapolitan cuisine","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO48CWEjjeeRuzuqvAoOC-Bh7i7Slva15Uuy1gl"],"When":"2023-5-15"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Barbara Bowen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIgQJtQasXtuEIeDmObRrHVzVFI9Frut0RW4gklOl7XDsnzgA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A great traditional Cypriot tavern.  The staff are very welcoming and friendly.  Went in for a Keo one afternoon and the tavern had such a great atmosphere returned as a group of 4 the following evening for a meal. There is a great choice on the menu, definitely something for everyone, and also a good choice of drinks.  Highly recommend.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNXIciSm-Rh_Tloqd4ICPhfv7rCGosa8ZcTVmr2"],"When":"2024-4-22"},{"Name":"Daniel Neamtiu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWkN1FPlaayhzo29aQ2To-_nBVK8SWzMd7DGHMGDY3LtGBEgQ0v=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Delicious food and big portions. Nice atmosphere and great service. Definitely a good place to dine in if you are in Ayia Napa.

Also, the prices are equitable for the quality and quantity of food received.

During dinner time, the place is pretty crowded so you may have to wait a bit until a table is freed.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMBTt1JzPJZxm-e2w5obDkkF3cEVrh_N8dh4EP7"],"When":"2024-5-16"},{"Name":"Τρύφωνας Καραμπέτσος","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUyRPnG8psxH5vcj0D0wAncmaJTGrMbIBV5-Mjj7zwMAHQ3g22Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A wonderful traditional place with great Cyprian food.
The staff helps us a lot with the food and it was extremely polite.
The food was lovely but the portions were small.
Prices were quite high.
The atmosphere amazing and for sure is a place that everyone should visit ones for a Cyprian food experience !!!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN8IdklFO6PW8WggCbp0zcCYE7ijDBExnqjQTMw"],"When":"2024-4-15"},{"Name":"Minh Mai","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWCXcb6U_rWxZjRDAF3eaeCqbIfpxekp6AVqk2ZgMfoBIMm2V7UqQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing atmosphere (even though we were sitting on noisy street). Nice interior decor of farm cottage. Stuff is very professional and super quick. Prices are affordable and quality of food was great! We love free pineapple drink for digestion.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN8KgLslJMQeK8pB0Bg2f4li_ebIp_OcCadz905"],"When":"2024-5-22"},{"Name":"Nita Khatri","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU1aOnGunmgWvrVwypokNAfYoDxGUQxCJ1GFbgSEtWuMKM2K_Ln8Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Absolutely delicious traditional dishes. Served with so much care.
The moussaka lived upto it's reputation. I enjoyed the food and the ambience so much that I visited twice. The staff recognised us and sat us at the same table second time round.
One must visit and experience the restaurant for themselves.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPExV8t44KPPp_8qOrRfQmMK3eppwmcyqGgv7AO"],"When":"2024-4-3"},{"Name":"Vicky Prince","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXBAxavw2RqgolnPh0aJYOZ8sYd4YH8OnGfqnll54K4DflwuQRlzA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Food is plentiful and good. Very accommodating staff and a great atmosphere. There was a short 10 mins wait but we all (11 of us) managed to be seated together with a re-gig of seats from other customers. Very happy ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ All round","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNi2q3kyuQwBmTbv-gAsADmZTruiBdkyt_FWjj_"],"When":"2024-5-19"},{"Name":"Danielle Higgins","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVZld8Bp_yJN6aE1EhEo5cWDYVMPTVNsRtOH6CvJsgsWl1Q7-H1=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"YUM. YUM. YUM. Didn’t take before photos because it just looked so delicious.

Walked past someone having the ribs on the way in & knew we had to try.
I had my mind set on mussels for dinner, we then saw on the menu that they’re frozen.. hesitated but still got them. no regrets. I ordered the STARTER, for the price and amount you got, I was not disappointed.

Picture of finished meals 🤤","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPHv9iiJ5huCFc1FLvll5KrXt0n5rJJb1oPIN_J"],"When":"2024-7-25"},{"Name":"Pavle Marković","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWN7mBr64IBDawmuohGS-tQgDU2dXnvVae9EeH9CrzErzOjlKjYoQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":""In front of the tavern, the staff is very pushy, practically pulling you inside, but that’s traditional for this region.
We ordered the seafood platter, which the waiter bragged was the best in all of Cyprus.
Most of the seafood was good, except for the shrimps, which were bitter and we didn’t like them.
Maybe we should have ordered lamb or some other meat, but they are not experts in fish as they claimed."","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOqMGE01VBwaacbtHv4gFDfWsvyxj56EzO7d1Lx"],"When":"2024-9-13"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Charlotte R","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWrqHw1NzSVpttO2i6J4sxEGHG9IVvzdo12xHWfcqymTGe_6gk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It was our first dinner in Ayia Napa and we had such a great time! The staff of the restaurant is incredible and made us laugh all night long. The food is delicious & the Italian wine we picked was also fabulous! If you want to try something not local for a night, don’t hesitate to go there! Definitely recommend the pizzas and tiramisu.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOhOKGq0BdB_QcMtkAfudlOAM5pSf15T9-LcLo"],"When":"2024-9-7"},{"Name":"Uros Pavlovic","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV5Ejya7R_8eq4K2A9teB2BqGz83OxkpdPMrkxPqGysDZt8a8z5=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing atmosphere and great stuff. They were very lovely and playfully. We are with a 2y old boy and the whole stuff was playing with him while passing by, not because they need to but because they like to. Which made him enjoy it more and ofc made us enjoy more :)
We got two pizzas, Buffala and Italia. They were both beautiful. I personally like Buffala better as I like light pizzas. Very enjoyable, I highly recommend this place.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPUPMOGgdXy-8wsTRdO5ngR96WXsgHi2QonoZQk"],"When":"2024-9-28"},{"Name":"Jen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUV21o9828JW8uifKOJwfbqwKKEM93WpEspmPxh_Z05LRw7lXbrhg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Absolutely stunning, the flavours of the food just explode in my mouth.
This was the first time I had visited Quadro, the staff are very friendly and welcoming.
I enjoyed it so much on my holiday with my partner that we went back for a second time.
I absolutely recommend everyone coming here for an amazing meal and service.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNI3goUQ283RZBdwtiWH4WKRDVfCVcnEHqHspCP"],"When":"2024-7-13"},{"Name":"Danielle xc","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJSowKlbr-XnTsDET9fet3JvMT15yCZklKUNfGgN_j4YUBhfw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great delicious food. Very busy, popular restaurant.
Vegan options available, if you ask for vegan cheese, this isn't displayed on the menu but host was very nice and said yes of course. Had the bruschetta and vegan pizza. Didn't charge me for veg toppings too. Bruschetta was one of the best I have had in a while. All the dishes look amazing.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMZ4ojzOdROk_f7sG1ewbMrrHwz0K_2KR-Lhigg"],"When":"2024-7-21"},{"Name":"Valeriya Tsvetnova","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLhaWwNYTihsliBdpRDseBVmYBiHJ4Pyhi33G7KUT_DJztjtQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I highly recommend booking in advance for better experience. We were very pleased by the service and the fact that we could see our pizzas being made in front of us! I especially recommend the pistachio pizza as it was delicious!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMIgzMqGeaR12uIH1VvVVnz4e1zgbBZ5f0AFqyX"],"When":"2024-8-31"},{"Name":"Mati Ostrovsky","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXqkjPKljDYvsy4UgjJnrViztmCDbBollGE5hsz1iya6g5agTzcYg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Came here with family to eat good Italian food and was not disappointed! The food is fresh, great and the pizzas are just like in northern Italy.

The service is impeccable. Every waiter plays his part to perfection with good tradition and manners.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPT7IcPpdPMyRDi6mJTPJmLZjzA-rkW_JK9mZ1t"],"When":"2024-6-14"},{"Name":"Pascal von Allmen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJuwdcRa50swudu4ENJtMi920cyNzqmxBQCqavNbbgAi1fkug=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Exzellent food, very nice staff. Only that it is located at a busy and loud road is a small minus. But we will be back soon as the food is so good and authentic. Desserts are amazingly good and homemade.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP8fCXKkZd6X96uk-KnPA7_oYxThd1GNveGqTJl"],"When":"2024-6-14"},{"Name":"Maja Michalak","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUqeJ1xaOUz6AJTACCt9hxYYGsxbSHwQMFFZt1eT7DbxktQh8U_=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very lovely restaurant, we would definitley come back if we are ever in Ayia Napa again.

The owners are great too, all staff were welcoming actually; they made the effort to speak to us and in general we’re all just amazing people.

FOOD - one of the best pastas I have had in Cyprus, it was delicious, just the right amount as we find that In a lot of restaurant in Cyprus you get so much food it’s hard to eat in the hot weather, but this was perfect filled us up just right, and we didn’t leave any!

Reasonable prices too!

100% recommend 😆","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPoHwnVV26AOT3Fa_YiPH_lqlcu6FAYjRFr8IU2"],"When":"2024-6-19"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Cristina Bagnean","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXxae5zxTvnzM2KgPW33S5unk7YjR4tKMyCDFZ2EjeHi5OJ3xf1=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We ate here on several occasions. The food was delighful - scallops or prawns with their lemon sauce are a must for appertisers, and the grilled calamari was fresh and beautifully coocked. They have very good beef cuts - steaks are well seasoned and perfectly grilled as requested. Even if it's not a bar, the cocktails were delicious and the staff is attentive, friendly and professional. We will surely come back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPNDv_e5tdrJ6bkHCG42SOy15bPDFuvyT7QJmCz"],"When":"2024-6-16"},{"Name":"Zaeera Official","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJnfFW4ZxGfKMW-IVKxJZHm0klcmCf1fiY8s7yDJgvXYCnseQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It was amazing 😍 I highly recomment this restaurant. The Steak and the Prawns where absolutely delicious. Best restaurant near Sandy Bay and Nissi Beach.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPT1Y5Vv8S8DPF8PzELwa7lrPGI0yssz7QaQfmK"],"When":"2024-9-10"},{"Name":"Angela Whiting","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJdUDVYpa64x22elk4wqjTXIjAgTNi0gxGdZ4T3X2BLbkV9wIw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Popped in late afternoon for our last meal being going home . The food was excellent, wished we’d gone before . Had the Sirlion Steak and Margarita pizza . The vegetables were lovely that came with the steak and the steak was cooked perfectly. Both delicious. Staff nice and friendly too . Thoroughly recommend.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPWpcsmRhZzZ_Na97W-GfkKMOqvMyjfAXqG5SVE"],"When":"2023-9-20"},{"Name":"Sasha Goldshtein","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVI-4uN8-KYAEfyM8WCFKKuC8cljNhVIJ2_CDWSHoqpL8Sv2uc=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Excellent food. We tried 4 different restaurants in Ayia Napa and ended up coming back to this one more than once. Every single dish was very good! And also meticulous, professional, and friendly service. The place is shining clean!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPCsMf7j6lKJyhxxdD8AK0OJlj18JDfRXMjLstH"],"When":"2023-10-4"},{"Name":"Oleg Vasilkov","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXZ2pPZX7_yXnxZLC1aWr_oKDSKiKQDLogqVFpQijQpVKUIyhw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I ordered a dish of lamb chops, the dish is really small, I expected for the price that the dish would be big. Caesar salad was a bit dry, almost no dressing. The hamburger was fine, and the salmon fish was good too. The halloumi on the grill and the wings were really tasty.
There is a playground for children.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMSoWyQ2ppU4gqwX8hsx1jOk1a7JhJonuEu7zg_"],"When":"2023-5-14"},{"Name":"pauline zarb","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocImeoqyQv4ufJg7q0LInk3zg53CthuIQbFhK4rLyLrz9k3smQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"If you are in this area you have to visit this restaurant very nice staff jiulia, Andrea's and george especially. Food is exceptional we came 3 days in a row fish and meat alike don't disappoint. Don't be put off by the fancy decor it is not that expensive we have been to other places on our holidays that food didn't taste good/wasn't cooked good and were more expensive. 5 star, this place deserves it believe me!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPc4ZUcULoOxGJApUZUsoSyLA9cPtalQ2UjVlvs"],"When":"2023-8-8"},{"Name":"Nana Vasiliadou","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVcUj_cnqfDkeo5CpDYth81dVgEQFWreee16Om_icdjc8fiDvc=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great atmosphere, good service, and delicious food.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNhtlpLE2f4uBSHHjc2951mys9vLboo8U_O2t8"],"When":"2024-8-25"},{"Name":"Valērijs Sičovs","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLBNnqzB7_zkuaSZd4jt7rlEaWw81h4KcP7TQ5Bu0X185QEWw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Very disappointed with our visit. As a restaurant culture ambassador never witnessed service like that. Ordered, soup, platter and kids menu for starter and pasta, pizza and meat platter as main.
Soup was great, platter was average - not a lot of dips comparing to the number of snacks, kids burger was ok. And then fun started as we finished starters even after very long time main dishes were not served. After 40 minutes of waiting after starters we left. As I mentioned to personal couple of times on the issue - they just told that other families finished their dinner only because they didn’t get starters. But having a pause between starters and main more than 40 minutes that is something I never witnessed in a very long time.

However kid zone is a nice idea for restaurant and still soup was great, just very sad that we didn’t received other main dishes although I think they would be great - but some staff training would be nice for a next season.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"simona london","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLf_vQzF2fsu_jXbC04ISNZ31MPFZBms1kx5qm3eXaVkwvrqQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We are a family of 5 and we had a great experience in this restaurant. Fair prices, friendly staff and very welcome atmosphere. Huge portions, exceptional greek salad, well seasoned and tasty food. We definitely recommend Hungry Horse to everyone. Thanks for the lovely meal ! All the best for all of you.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPH1Kx9_pKhyuTYYThANXnmZsC17hSKT677nzVC"],"When":"2024-9-2"},{"Name":"Christina Pavlou","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKgMFc9OwYCYYoT3zOPwOtIhoy0iv5l38KtJaZ8FKcNvt0iDQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Beautiful authentic Cypriot cuisine, just like my mother makes! Great portions! Hospitable staff! Thoroughly enjoyed our meal here tonight! 🫶🏽","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOEJZRscOOLMaBW2dXhhKmvSIo9SPzlvplrnewZ"],"When":"2024-9-4"},{"Name":"Orel Yosefa","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWE8HeGIY2C_CaGUp5PVhvjLLFtsYslzIVzVd3RQsCINyJII8S95w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We ( couple + 2) arrived at noon. Ordered the big meze (22euro p.p)
The food was great, lots of various dishes. The service was very good and patient with our kids. Very satisfied! Definitely recommend!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPZmxunePdPuB_p2Trve4AOUrDvsx91iupjpBi_"],"When":"2024-10-6"},{"Name":"V T","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK7Qie_-0O9hnQmezye5qHjw_Ag9K_huMhjvbPxWBuXAR1X3g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I have been a few times, amazing souvla, extensive menu with many traditional Cypriot options, great service, and reasonable prices. They also bring complimentary salad, toasted village bread, olives, and pickles.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNzqv4OiZtJDc9YazOiAtiriumYa6dh3mgWCUT1"],"When":"2024-9-7"},{"Name":"Catalin Brassoi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLYwECrYylqfRXoC_C_yDy3nb7NDZ-XxRZtD31ung0Gl-sMcQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I ate the octopus dish with fries and couscous, and it was really delicious!  By far, the best octopus dish I ever had.
Also, the staff was really friendly throughout the whole dinner. It was definitely a great experience. Thank you all!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN5wvBQno9Otc21S3n_X1d5bGvlwlm8xdO3vaWH"],"When":"2024-7-23"},{"Name":"Silvia Maria","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWgCtHl6RXVzO3n1VXAzDUcxecsQ9F1dqzc3ZXO7baD6UA9n2a2_A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Everything was exceptional. The food was great, and the atmosphere was just like home. We were made to feel very welcome. The portions were huge and totally worth the money.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPR-t8KQz52KWU5fSXxkvN8uo_AsgjZXPhYDAUl"],"When":"2024-7-23"},{"Name":"Marcela Fuksová","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW52jVNfgHCSxeAAwdX4lSozmTpX_aqXrvmfeU-Dlldza02tpL-2g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We had four different dishes, everything soooo tasty! Very nice service, we waited only a moment for our food, we got an appetizer and dessert after the meal. 5/5","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMq8S800b33W77dhihdHifg_1vsFR6-e2AxtLYz"],"When":"2024-5-15"},{"Name":"Youssef Karaki","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXJVWiAUqS92Irf5eY5ySleuIemNnsO-n-ZgYeVyd2RQDAB5YQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is a MUST , I would not think twice to choose this restaurant when in Ayia Napa.

Tasty meat and fish. My friends and I ordered several meat based plates and all of them were incredibly yummy.

Not sure this is a great place for Vegans , but Pescetarians will find good options.

The Value for Money was really good. Big portions , affordable price.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMOVrL3ztHFwYgzanKNFslEyKQe42P-sAaT4lpt"],"When":"2024-7-14"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Peter Georgiou","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKOtrEZ56BpR7ajBWALpnQg1nnwCK-D-OT6dW9KnWIv33uFRA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Beautiful setting with amazing views. The service was friendly and attentive. The drinks and food were quite amazing. The prawn linguine, whilst well presented, lacked in flavor. The seafood Orzo however was spectacular and full of flavor. The salads and potatoes were also amazing. Would highly recommend this place if you are looking for something a little different and more upmarket.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOecSczJQldvE6wOkR6jSdAE9tINFp6c4TtQ_Xx"],"When":"2024-10-2"},{"Name":"Joanna Michaelas","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKBwr4EfFv1GOK9vTDLc3wGGdfC_fg8LBm8wT2LqDya7GDjKg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I am so pleased I booked to come to this wonderful little restaurant by the sea. Very modern and perfect for a date night. The atmosphere and vibe could not be topped. Good choice of music and a wonderful deck area paired with gorgeous little lights make this place something truly special. The service was fantastic and we felt very well looked after. All the food we had was very good apart from the prawn spaghetti which lacked flavour. The prawn dumplings were 10/10. Had a little walk to the Edro III Shipwreck however you could not see it as it was not lit up.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM6DkFlSmaGt5zJrMvUvIF6Nzd3PAfchN0kI_kx"],"When":"2024-10-9"},{"Name":"Alexander Obenauff","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUmO7Np9PpGPH0AjiXKnLCZ5KUuSx-DN7Rg1HNaB1usF2hEpto=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Beautiful views and great food. Lots of different choices. Everything was fresh, tasteful and nicely cooked. Good selection of local and international wines. I would definitely go again. We were able to watch the sunset which was beautiful.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOP_pXHyOpgK5X18KD76c6cy5CJLKd6PmoEgIw"],"When":"2024-10-2"},{"Name":"Susan Williams","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJuCeP4-v5MXAehSkxsZCNksbhVyE0mukb_JpecuSjVMbgr3L6J=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Lovely restaurant on the coastline with a view of the shipwreck. The staff were perfect, so polite and friendly.

There's a huge car park with lots of trees which give shade.

A bit more expensive than other restaurants (€26 for pork belly, €22 for half chicken) but the presentation and food were high standard so well worth it.

Give it a go, it's a little oasis.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNPq6_mKunNWHeCaSX7DUEp8Nq_TugHHH9N66cP"],"When":"2024-7-10"},{"Name":"Asaf Merschon","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUWrTc1CmylNdryS2nA2i3I3rb6kvQljXlggLpijdnk19G1ECLggQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We sat down for a small bite, ordered 1 Margarita pizza and 1 Greek salad for 4 people + cold beverages. Ended up ordering another identical pizza. The service was good and the food was very tasty.
The views are amazing, you can see the shipwreck and the sea caves from the table.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMg09FZEtVngPv0BMWgew1AQa3SjHsZllYN7aaC"],"When":"2024-9-17"},{"Name":"Fabian V","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL3eKN3wRD9qSRBvR4Px82N-fhac4ydYoBK5q9snw0A4G9q2w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This restaurant is beautifully located right next to the famous ship wreck. You can see the sunset going down behind the wreck from the platform of the restaurant.

The service was impeccable, fast and friendly and the overall atmosphere relaxed and very accommodating.

The food was very good too. The Arrancini as a starter and the Haloumi were impressive. My cowboy steak was good but nothing special and my company’s chicken with rice was good but after the first bite not surprising anymore.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOXjJmn5Co5bXloqaXkk-TtOi6Pts68EK6hz3oj"],"When":"2024-8-18"},{"Name":"True Opinion","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXCOSyxPvkKMByDP4N3xlhRdRJFeeeVWFQgoUGmqkVlvlVCTgMSPQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Initial by the Sea is an absolute gem nestled along the coastline, and the best part? Parking is not only free but abundant! From the moment I stepped foot into this charming establishment, I was greeted with warmth and hospitality. The cozy ambiance, coupled with the breathtaking views of the sea, set the stage for an unforgettable experience. The attention to detail in every aspect, from the decor to the menu selection, is truly commendable. Each dish was a culinary delight, bursting with fresh flavors and expertly prepared with locally sourced ingredients. The staff went above and beyond to ensure that my visit was nothing short of perfect. Whether you're seeking a romantic dinner for two or a relaxing meal with family and friends, Initial by the Sea is the epitome of seaside dining excellence. I cannot recommend it highly enough!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNFnpPsGsA8P7XTLre74O0RoVN7f96l_ZdSGfbj"],"When":"2024-5-4"},{"Name":"Κωνσταντίνος Κούτας","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUqxUDA-Jjyu2lThL-8VKpxqMKq3YIGuq16w8QpTBmSk8RKlkQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Its a wonderful experience, the food is super delicious and the views are just amazing. I ordered the tuna salad and the tuna was so tasty and soft! Amazing. I am a local and i just keep coming back here cause i love it. If you are in Paphos you should pay a visit to Oniro!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNUH55qElIHF5yaFfzhHusvKXTzL1xK311vHL6f"],"When":"2024-8-10"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"M G","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJFQlbh6difydOXV6P6rui9kVST6tIx6pFp2SzV0vTilahiKRPC=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The best food in the whole holiday, starters are magical, mains are great. Beer is cold and fresh. Seated, party for six. All the food delivered in two minutes apart. Great atmosphere and service. I’d come ever day if I could. Many thanks.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMO6JRtXko4qwO8sZRBpQ5v1poOVcG4dedhaovo"],"When":"2024-9-11"},{"Name":"Diane","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVtfPwauXFAAngLh55849LvQr2105OhOLjZ6SYPKXHsTf6Ne795bg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"On our first visit I had a hot starter, goats cheese OMG it was one of the tastiest things I've ever had.
My partner had pizza and can't really go wrong with that.
On our second visit you both had seafood linguine that was disappointing to be honest definitely had much better.
We both celebrated birthdays there and they bought out delicious cake with candles and sang happy birthday It was a real treat.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Katie Fletcher","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWQf56PdJ8iL0Pj2P_5spsDjURZV8KWFhg0QFEgnmPZ8Eyt_N8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"We had a bit of a mixed experience compared to other reviews. Agree that service is quite slow however they did manage our expectations at the start things would take a while. I would suggest in those circumstances they should offer bread to the table if you'll be waiting a long time for food. The food itself didn't quite meet expectations based on other reviews we read, the pasta was fresh however the pizza definitely seemed like a store bought base (maybe they had run out as it was busy). Some of the pasta was slightly overdone but I tried the carbonara, prawn pasta, pasta with chicken/artichoke and like them all - the seafood pasta was a big hit! The place did have a nice vibe though!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Paul Fairman","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIKhRj7vju0zDvXRzBClliPYJ4uRGg_jJSQgDdrCi9dqiFzBw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very nice place, excellent food. Sensible pricing, one of the best restaurants on coral Bay strip","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Rafal Wasilewski","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV2xfAdyomSQRmCLR23hVJKBNlopnR0BVpJQM5RFpzXFGTitL54=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Best Italian food in Paphos. I had seafood linguini. That was the best pasta I ever had in my life. If you visit Coral Bay strip you should definitely visit this place. Good service as well. Very friendly staff. I will definitely come back next time. I highly recommend. Great dessert too.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Camilla Clarke","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUWXMxZjAPOS5sWj3SOXGgwVwBzCkp5pUpj0iO-vPQh7oYAin4=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Lovely restaurant on the main Coral Bay road, one of the best. Definitely satisfies a craving for hearty Italian food. We had the stuffed mushrooms and Camembert starters which were both very yummy. I had the Spaghetti Siciliana which was very very tasty, perfect amount of saltiness from the Anchovies. Decent portion size without being over-board. For dessert we shared the Tiramisu and Creme Brûlée - not the best puddings I’ve ever had but tasty and again, decent sized portions. Very friendly staff. The only reason I didn’t give it a 5/5 is because unfortunately we were seated under a tree which must have a bird or bat living in it because our menus and my head were pooped on, which was a shame and I understand this is somewhat out of the restaurants control but it did slightly taint our experience! Despite this, would definitely return.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO7Nmgd5fBFGah586u4FKj_Ql2vM8s5wpGbzoat"],"When":"2022-9-1"},{"Name":"Jacqueline Anna Crickitt","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVj76kWF6S9fIDondmMHCCR7ZA8dqoaNcgD7JWjX0zJKOHjFAo=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The most amazing atmosphere created by its welcoming personnel, tastefull menu and inspiring decoration. Whether visited in summer or winter this restaurant is always a place to come back to. Try as many plates as possible, none will dissapoint you. Be patient as everything is cooked fresh and the taste will surely compensate you. Don't miss out the desert. It will be the Grant Finale 🤩","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPujToJlx5Qh-FjL3DULhrWJgEXDDiX0OVD3MVS"],"When":"2022-5-7"},{"Name":"Steve Clark","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUi21WcEwKe-AiTFC0GFRfitajhXM-WHE5bJiaUFINX7xzZrnA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"First time here in a hit evening. GF options for one of us which was nice. Generous portions and favouring the main part, e.g. salmon and avocado spaghetti was 80% salmon and 20% spaghetti.

Very friendly and accommodating staff - made sure we had fans positioned for us.

Good choice of food and drink. We would come again!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMxrKCoTjxS1Cu2ZIgWxdMkrgZQVCSEcHX1vsj1"],"When":"2023-6-25"}]
