user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Asaf Merschon","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUWrTc1CmylNdryS2nA2i3I3rb6kvQljXlggLpijdnk19G1ECLggQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The food was mostly extraordinary except for the burger which was dry (the patty itself was too low on fat).
The portions were large and we didn't have room for dessert. We only got mains.
The staff was friendly and accommodating to specific dietary requests.
The atmosphere is pleasant and quiet. It's a romantic place to go to, though couples weren't necessarily the dominant group size when we were there.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPV5qA3W0RZNVn_bEpdejbh8iX8rawYTdsoCuTl"],"When":"2024-9-17"},{"Name":"Anna Hostelgeeks","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVDNsHw4tyg4NbuxHjJqyjKLoucR4LALtxW97xfpFyPNd-fxyA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing food and service. Their specialties are:
Mussels
Octopus
I do also love the salmon with mango sauce.
You can choose 1-2 side dish with the dish. Try their steamed vegetables, they are good.

The restaurant is nice, but what makes it good is the staff. Service is really good, they are fast and attentive and the chef cooks very good.
It is one of the best places to eat in Peyia area. Great for families, groups, couples…","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNSNh0-KiTMmmaZML00oQLF5fz6ws-BLYz6Q-PM"],"When":"2024-8-23"},{"Name":"beth hodgson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLcTh_bO0vRpEchGIkk3A1sAvvgJQxUCcPOX2wTBdL8kCFn4g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"First visit and certainly won’t be the last! Beautiful setting, with very friendly, polite and attentive staff. A great menu with plenty of choice. We opted for halloumi and bahn de nem rolls to start - would absolutely recommend the rolls - lots of flavour and huge prawns. We then opted for calamari, seafood pasta and cowboy steak for main - the portion sizes are huge and well worth the money. It’s also great you get to choose 2 sides which is included in the price, not at an additional cost. The vegetables were really tasty and the cowboy steak was cooked to perfection and well seasoned 👌 would definitely recommend. Food was followed by a lovely unexpected touch, with the chef coming around during the service to check in and make sure everything was okay with the food. A really nice gesture. Very reasonable €127 euros for 3 starters, 3 mains and 3 drinks. Thanks for a lovely evening!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNAqXVB3oU08JNqgrqFuN5QgckTiWcQy0VyurgX"],"When":"2024-10-8"},{"Name":"Sofia","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWJzhAwOEHcKTlSVORz7j_PL_0N9oUJm9zn91TqFE47cRojR2VfnQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The best food i have tried in my life!!! Mussles in a delicious sauce, which we ate with spoons and then the chef came up to us, laughing, saying that it was onion sauce - the best sauce I had eaten. Fresh ceviche and delicious bread pastes. perfect pasta, ravioli with crab is something extraordinary and the best desserts!!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM0k7zb0Pdq8V1YgWbpUXDonSY_kr6e1xa3rV_Y"],"When":"2024-10-6"},{"Name":"Tatsi Ana","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKo4myYgmm6ojYqM2gnsQvsfihuuMCWQhNx2zCrd8rTXw3Hxg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Lovely location, away from hustle and bustle. Food is good and all dishes are beautifully presented. Grilled octopus was nicely cooked and I liked the addition of pickled onion. However, for the price, I would expect a bit more flavor (a charcoal grill would probably help) and a bigger portion. Nevertheless, i would say this is second best I’ve tried so far during my two months in Cyprus.
I would certainly come back to try other dishes on the menu - great selection!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNGFgNo2QUIKd7viFIA2VUC6GIiYrJDSNuuefJD"],"When":"2024-5-18"},{"Name":"Alexander Obenauff","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUmO7Np9PpGPH0AjiXKnLCZ5KUuSx-DN7Rg1HNaB1usF2hEpto=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Delicious fresh food right by the sea. By far the best restaurant we have been too. Staff is also very friendly and attentive. Definitely coming again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMNxc3tgFm5ss3pOX1xDbp5M1QSA_StuY4SVgA"],"When":"2024-9-28"},{"Name":"Martin N.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXCSEoZzi4qggfaIrtCNP3QLRk30d4ebLaG4QZCx3aIWBfxn2oj=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We took the surf platter for two, the turf platter for two, crab tortellini - everything was amazing! Best food we had in Cyprus and we will definitely come back more than once during our vacation. I especially recommend the platters for two :)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOKKJBJG8Gn2_aUEv_qxv7mcbjdP6HBfAzlSlRw"],"When":"2024-9-24"},{"Name":"Denis Bucur","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUfhLgdJnDCOHnptbCWuTt8hod-3PIWRCZPITiYIoEhwqyo_Dz8=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The best food I tried in Cyprus. I always go there when I want to eat something amazing and tasty.

Good price , the quality of the ingredients the same, friendly staff and an amazing chef.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOKE15nYvXjz6ma-F9leiNgFe-WLD6ZSVXXuIwf"],"When":"2024-9-1"}]

[{"Name":"Renata Dexter","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ-f9NCh3jSS_MexgRU_w-MBvUxUNKYmfesGw7pw65U01g6WQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Seated quickly. Friendly staff. Reasonably priced. Food quality was good. Only downside was they made a mistake with the order and served one of the meals incorrectly. It was quickly rectified and the Suckling Pig (pictured) was worth the extra wait.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNfxQNbusAmJnyDyO3Jr8RSHDiyDYj10KasqwIK"],"When":"2024-9-1"},{"Name":"c _","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL09p7Wf8fYGQ_ZSHrLIuyuNrO578r3LLLN0xYM25spp3KakXQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Restaurant is always busy and I see why. The food is amazing. I had the lamb curry and out of the dishes we tried it was the best by far!! Good portion size. The Nutella crepe I had was also 5/5 for a dessert. Would definitely recommend!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMbViR16OrhD3qgXqJLtHW0r_bl21piLoty753q"],"When":"2024-7-30"},{"Name":"Colette Jade","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWjVDKLpwXdDTybIBEiwE_b4sdHKDycgDsqGV67kuspNXUCSCg_=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Beautiful restaurant, great atmosphere - cleanest and fanciest toilets I've probably ever seen!
Food was absolutely delicious 😋","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNUjRMhij9Wok1PyZNvjsZtAtOgmy7NS6rNus1b"],"When":"2024-9-12"},{"Name":"Jim Lunan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIpVaJQd-QwaqJIWZk2rm3JQjgKC88A-oK_c2FWymjRuGWglQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Found out eventually how to get in due to current roadworks glad we did .
We both decided on fillet steaks must say both were excellent cooked to perfection.
Then apple  pie and ice cream for dessert delicious.
Service was excellent staff all really friendly and attentive highly recommend 👍","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPCjIuAwRwAhCVlglYBUuOWDF1uXb41X9WvjIXp"],"When":"2024-4-12"},{"Name":"Alice Cook","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVdnRlQNlui5QpQZOGMa1VklOuyGBOzVeaLlYqQyarkrDUnGtk=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had a lovely cocktail and seafood pizza here last night! Was really good and reasonably priced
Attentive staff and quick service","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOOKsf7CiqBVaEysbvqwWhghU0O3InaG5gpbS-j"],"When":"2024-9-2"},{"Name":"SYNB LTD","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUMi-Eixe_H2HoQEs92exnUXXrvTbhnovyW8_MXoCCp1ocGHQQ7=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Taverna style restaurant. Fish and chips, the cod was not fresh! It was like what we get from Supermarkets in UK! Tasted ok though.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPFSKJlOFxci3bI8iRbDu9XOsgA-bZDB3wzjLiX"],"When":"2024-7-27"},{"Name":"Ștefan Cristian Ianoș","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUvLw1tyLpCJKWTt-AS9nFNPNd4XKLPCcHxhrZmqMfkW_6bsm_j=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We tried the mousakka and dolmades, both were very good. Also the staff was really friendly and careful with the customers. Really recommend this restaurant in case you are around the Coral Bay. Thank you!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMF3fdg2m_dN6YSi3rK6k537hAI1qmWTQ5bePtn"],"When":"2024-8-24"},{"Name":"Amelia Cioch","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX2PDf0A8xF8wsYCb1yp_UCxgFaPJhMUnFcxI-v9SkQO9qOQgjd=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"i ordered margarita when the local was empty and i waited really long, when finally my pizza came my jaw dropped.. pizza was dry, small and definitely FROZEN if i wasn’t starving i would not eat  that, what more as a sauce we got ketchup and mayonnaise…really big disappointment","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMee9xtudT1rcR_8Io0aqBTax3fcFCNYC47RJtv"],"When":"2024-7-8"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Mary","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXynUBbmxLZovr0OqAR8zKWjmHXWC_qOZjILXaCjGJTOBg6wjh6=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Wonderful experience from start to finish! A warm welcome,  friendly serving staff, great house wines, and incredibly delicious food. I had selected to visit as they serve pasticchio, and it did not disappoint!
Eating in the lovely garden, under the trees with a little music, was heavenly. Unforgettable. Thank you.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipONKrEbiDA3pr7ezGOWMr7DtgqGqxlluFXKpmfp"],"When":"2024-6-23"},{"Name":"Matthew Wilson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX4wdpenQyInUwxzMnB9dotnqxi78apyH0tLUWZe5LcuUzN4z8=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Lovely, authentic and down to earth restaurant. Really good food and serves a local cider which is comparable to kopparberg but actually better. Well worth going to.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPiBDAPc5DVYlfTkkZoJfSlWqW7Br4Mx2Ae3AyA"],"When":"2024-6-28"},{"Name":"Iya U","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXSxizXkBjZFOScTgGDM5TDF1aVGITxvD_RGtTBANf3yIMvITI8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Even though some people might say is touristic restaurant, but here was one of the best experiences in the city. Absolutely warm atmosphere, delicious food and high hospitality by stuff and owner who created unforgettable dinner atmosphere spiced up with friendly jokes.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOE_zX_6anun47CRbjUXW4XuAwBurDAvyeuSy_M"],"When":"2024-8-29"},{"Name":"Bogdan Botosanu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUQZKcgSDoTHY4A1WwNaad29KbAS9H8Ei_RIeTm8fMUaTYQbFmV=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We've been eating at Tony's a couple of days back, and it was a very nice and pleasant experience. We had grilled octopus, which was very soft like a doughnut texture (if I may say), and swordfish, which was very tender and had a pleasant ocean's odour.
The staff is friendly and communicative, and even Tony is greeting you and he's thankful for stopping by.
It's a must try location, considering it's one of the oldest tavernas in Ayia Napa, maybe the oldest (cca 1980).","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO3dGfT0wChumBS31uU9ymIq3VRwVG5D0b7MMMR"],"When":"2024-5-27"},{"Name":"Teona Stojkovic","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJIKBqIruxCujYJ5-3GvZnrDWKJ0i-dpkf4KeUUsnu11P6qhw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place was amazing,we were so shocked when Tony,the owner,was still working and even serving us the food. My mother had a rabbit dish and she loved it,kept on praising even as we got home. The food was ,without a doubt, delicious. The pasta was super flavourful and cooked to perfection. The atmosphere of the place was super relaxed and kind of romantic. With the dim light and beautiful trees around you could just feel the tension leave your bones. There were even a few kitties that were extremely adorable. Nobody was disturbed or disrespectful,the customer service was great and when i go back to cyprus im definitely visiting again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPYOrSLVTOiYOqErCZt-5O_FDmw-sGK8fjl8Q1G"],"When":"2024-9-12"},{"Name":"Ivan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVz_hwrVxywLX76JvVrdtcJaf8DyYba8-Js87EFaajFIksLET-QPg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great food and atmosphere. I sat down with my girlfriend and we had a lovely time and meal. The mousaka was great!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOfc3dh-zq36njQxQ5npxlcd_s3_dcrqh958shA"],"When":"2024-9-15"},{"Name":"William Dodde erven van Hout","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIhHPeHRiFTNp8U_XSmwZ1ChkEcsErmxgaWmrk8J6a430OFMg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great food, like wow good, fairly priced. very kind and warm staff.
Would highly recommend.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOi5h5jQNVEQnTE7DIaKhinRkFS2BoXG424SFvh"],"When":"2024-9-3"},{"Name":"Anton","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKD3EuZpQBTbtemW4CZKd_LaHBKwzjmFbwyGwN0amMHqG1QUHA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Restaurant is beautiful sitting outside, however it doesnt help the fact that the food is mediocre. We had Moussaka that was forgettable. It tasted unfortunately more like an Italian lasagne.

The Moussaka at Kota Greek Tavern is the best we had in Ayia Napa. We wanted to try at Tonys Taverna as well to compare and the difference was huge.

It took a while for the food to arrive, even if it was not that crowded. They didnt even know who had ordered what, so the waitress visited two other tables with the food before heading back to the kitchen and then finally came to us, which was a bit funny.

So if you want a beautiful scenery then go for it, but dont expect the Moussaka to be something to come back for. We also had the lamb chops, which were grilled too long so it became rather rubbery. Price vs food quality didnt match, but i assume they can be pricier because of the decor.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNMJ8GTDOA7J_ZwPSsijFaIGTHvWxK13oGplHTD"],"When":"2024-4-19"}]

title: Les Amis Restaurant

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"paul brown","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKiPP8t0RRTQFmOo3CjCVYznWFxdOTWJDxaWjbJeS2XyZZWtQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"What a wonderful restaurant,you get a great welcome which seems genuine not like some other restaurants,lots of seating but sitting out back in the secret garden as it's known is a real pleasure,the food is excellent its well priced and with the atmosphere being a relaxed happy environment makes for a all round highly recommended visit,they've also got Koi carp which my sister got to feed just another big tick for Les Amis.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOOazurasFdzWoB9cVXT9Qro6Teq6TjwApZgLbi"],"When":"2024-10-3"},{"Name":"Ieva Preise","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUENP7XQMADB4Zo1sZEEqNtz8mzKJZHrubtXtpKmtQ5HxAH2fDH=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Large menu, plenty of great dishes to choose from. Stuff very friendly and professional. Choose grilled chicken fillet …and it was the best I have ever tried, big, juicy and full of flavour. My partner choose Bbq spare ribs -excellent! For dessert I chose homemade cheesecake and it was just melting on my tongue - wonderful. I’m very happy we came here and at Coral bay for sure is the best restaurant. I recommend 10 out of 10. Very big thanks to Stavros!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPlEI39ppiUaHc3ZXjTiAeCcaFqaC3TITknNL_I"],"When":"2024-9-10"},{"Name":"Alexander Obenauff","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUmO7Np9PpGPH0AjiXKnLCZ5KUuSx-DN7Rg1HNaB1usF2hEpto=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Good Value for money and very attentive staff. The food was delicious. Its in coral bay town, but you can still see the sunset.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNb9GCfCvxIfsq1vP5TfBxlI8ptgIKBKQNo8sc"],"When":"2024-10-2"},{"Name":"Dragos Iordache","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVH0eh6KfH_dnzqdWNHxjcKD8iTnYkk9m08zj79Vqc_ShRqsg4d=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Are you looking to eat very delicious foods in a special oasis of heaven?

Our experience at Les Amis has started by being guided to the back side of the restaurant which is the oasis mentioned above. Beautiful trees, fountains, fish pond with at least 20 koi fish, ventilation for every table, garden and flowers (I'll attach pics as well so you can see with your own eyes).

1) Serving:
The 3 waiters that have served us did a fantastic job. 1st one guided us to the table and communicated with us, 2nd waiter took our order very professionally, understanding of our wishes and tastes and was very involved in our experience from start to end, 3rd waiter came with the food mostly as a helper for 2nd but from my perspective this means unity and helpfulness which I appreciate very much.

They all did a great job from start to end, if I could rate 10 stars out of 5, I would do it specially for the serving, but that's not all!

2) Drinks:
The order came very fast for 2 cocktails, but man I must admit I have drunk the best strawberry margaritas in here. They were appreciated and delicious.

3) Food:
Well, if the serving made me want to give 10 stars out of 5, the food gave me the energy and patience to write such a long feedback. The food was so wonderful, my tongue is still dancing tango from the aromas (and im 30mins on the road already).

Order Beef Stifado if you want your tongue to dance tango as well. The taste is very special, strong and delicious. I've ate this meal before, indeed, nothing special at first glance, until you take that first bite then you are transported into another universe full of taste and aromas.

4) CATS!!! The lovely black cat will let you pet and love her but you know the tax... (Cheese, meat, fish)

In conclusion, if you're looking for an amazing experience, food, drink and serving while you gaze around at beautiful decorations, flowers, fish pond etc, go to Les Amis you will be delighted.

P.S: don't worry about the prices, they are good (and worthy if thats the case)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN5Ep_LKKQi9Xk6G0e-HwtGqfCIzLHjd3PXWPlC"],"When":"2024-6-24"},{"Name":"Máté Habán","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLRePi-IEnrZKubMx-wzWzDCrcc7nZUINcukjwbNoRV-PAizw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The reviews led us to this restaurant, and we were not disappointed—so much so that we ended up having our last dinner of the trip here as well. The food was truly delicious, and we had some really good wine to go with it. The service was friendly, almost like a family atmosphere, and everyone was genuinely kind, clearly happy to have guests. I can only recommend it.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"latte_scout","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVk7AwfkD96fXjN2ND2Pn7zGugrIEEq1j2E4FvHR63kd7ZhAhNBMA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We had a beautiful dinner here and celebrated a birthday as well. The staff were so lovely and even decorated our table and gave a birthday card. It was such a special touch and we really appreciated the effort. The food was home-style and a good portion. I was happy to have the extra side of vegetables served with the stifado stew. Drinks were lovely and well served. The highlight is the great play area in the back garden. Our kids had a lovely time exploring and playing while we watched from our table. Safe and secure for them to play and there was even a little tree house that my son loved. Overall, a great experience.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNGQvd2MYx8oEaONdYLf1M5fICMJ8DhJawcgRCb"],"When":"2024-7-10"},{"Name":"Maha elkhalil","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWgP3i6UIpmpck-VTvlk2uQSNe72DC-ZtLTtVVMrf1wNgMc0CXB=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Been in Cyprus for almost a year and we just moved to coral bay. The food at Les Amis was delicious and beyond our expectations. The customer service was also great. They have a play area kids. We will definitely come back.

This an Edit! In the last two weeks we’ve been to Les Amis 3 times and the food is always great. Customer service is too notch.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Charlotte Higginson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIkmWsZF2QdbtiELdDiyYsB2TxwOTmVsKcmgubhqKw4MXfogQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"After reading great reviews online and having been here previously when it was just a sports bar 5 years ago, thought we'd give it a try. The reviews certainly didn't disappoint. The food was great. We had the meat meze which was well worth the money but a lot of food! The moussaka and beef stiffado were also lovely dishes. Staff were very efficient and friendly and the owner was very helpful and kind. We will definitely return when back in Coral Bay. Thank you for such a lovely, memorable night.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Xavier Russell","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXrM9b1SgiFijwrjJwJU5n9Px6PN7PJ0zx-fF266uKe3-FzTsR1=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Read good reviews of Corallo restaurant, so I decided to give it a try. We booked a table with a street view, and the service was prompt. I ordered the chicken with mozzarella and tomato topping, and my friend went for the Moussaka. We had the house
white wine, which was good.
My chicken was nicely cooked, and the mozzarella and tomato topping were tasty. My friend gave his Moussaka the thumbs up.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNMX_qMrQdHU9ZF61Odfk7Irzzb0JxMIXt7vWm_"],"When":"2024-9-4"},{"Name":"suzanne knight","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU9BSMJal17P8YBv0Y0m0rSk3yZKasBog3Qf0x5yg84tuu6Fas2=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had the most fantastic meal at Corallo this evening. My partner went old school with his starter, Prawn Cocktail. Before this, we were served  warm bread  rolls. I had lamb chops, and my partner had pork with pepper sauce. Came with mint sauce, chunky chips & vegetables. All very tasty.
My partner had Tiramaso for dessert.  We had bottle of rose cornetto which was recommended by our waitresses  Bella. Service was fantastic. Special mention to Bella, as restaurant was very busy. But service & food was great.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNPL3WEz8-R-mVhK3_IANxjh_qC1mOdmvZkj1fW"],"When":"2024-8-28"},{"Name":"Vee (EatWithVee)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXvqC_aR7q2XdR_MCx9delxQoQ2Ix8P7sMTG_Y2xfib9DDZ3I0=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Starters were better than the main, the rack of ribs and black pepper sauce were tasty! Follow Eat.with.Vee on Instagram for full review!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOuJo6RP7ZCyUeVuS5ilh5j8_dYldbyz4CLXDKQ"],"When":"2024-6-14"},{"Name":"Denise L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWzBy3nFWhmuUKxy066Z8cTqWZlP8Z8nt32puSYM4LJWl-xSKE8sw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We've been a couple of times now. Food is just fabulous. 1st time we went, we got the best table in the house - table of 5. Each time, we all had different main courses, and all of them were fabulous. Highly recommend the wine, too! All of the waiting staff are great, and Bella is just a star!
Edit - went again for our last night. More photos.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNApMz1YstXgRFvF5JEwTrD-881iVE7OVvB1Q5f"],"When":"2023-7-1"},{"Name":"Martin Rafferty","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUHJnZpLi-Ntc08P5fbMinqgnbUUvNb8-v-KaHUpWLrneuAixqM2w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The best chicken kebabs I have ever had. I lived in Cyprus when I was young too.  They wouldn't tell me what was in the seasoning! The home made chips were too good! Very friendly staff. If you are looking for somewhere to eat on the Coral Bay strip definitely come here.

Bella who looked after us was amazing and found the Filfar!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOQqjEUwhOVSNtIl5A-OeoXRvHH8zyHtvDW0rrR"],"When":"2024-6-11"},{"Name":"Sharon Collins","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL8fEnfdwbCF7IkMmN9N_x9JxuOy0hIjCq_EfX6CuYgGYAgvg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We had a lovely meal tonight . Food so delicious. Staff friendly. Wine very nice . If you come to Coral bay I would really recommend this restaurant . My sister had mussels and the Salmon , I had stuffed vine leaves and the best Lamb shank .","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP2K3U-vMvhMEqt1egHP9uctn-rsaZoDAIL6saJ"],"When":"2023-9-23"},{"Name":"T Chan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWeZaea0mgrOokJ1g-uz7u-0tJhexi39EA-QSXSZHXBoAelqoPZ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"On the main Coral Bay strip. The caramari and octopus starters were fairly small for the price but tasty. The grilled fishes, seam bream, sea bass and sword fish are excellent, in particular the sea bream. Plenty of large chips and vegetables served alongside. vegetable stroganoff is a good vegetarian option.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMNxI8MR0o9KIz8nUoQyW_DPXViaQr-ojyS0n5P"],"When":"2023-8-8"},{"Name":"Renata Dexter","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ-f9NCh3jSS_MexgRU_w-MBvUxUNKYmfesGw7pw65U01g6WQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Meals were tasty. Disappointed by the Pork Hoffman. It was not as anticipated from past experience. It was more of a cheap meat dish as opposed to an authentic escalope (it was like rolled pieces of ham in breadcrumbs). The pork chop in red wine sauce was divine! Vegetables (Broccoli & Carrots) were very tasty and slightly sweet. Chips were amazing, as were the bread rolls served after we ordered. Attentive staff until it got busier. Then we had to ask for things (eg, the bill; went to the bar to pay due to the wait at the table). Value for money. Would return again, but choose an alternative dish to the Hoffman.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"megan noble","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXP-FsQWecw5-WVqJkHXMBdqbHvdJEZKNY06bXbh3bu2FzA50c=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We came here on the last day of our holiday - big mistake because it meant we could only enjoy it once! Service and atmosphere were outstanding. The staff were so friendly, welcoming and attentive. We had three courses, all of which were absolutely delicious. I only take one star off because I wished I got a couple more pieces of halloumi with my main 🤭 but I absolutely cannot fault the quality of the food and even the portions were good. Thank you for making the last night of our holiday so lovely 🙏🏻💖","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMhxyyZhvZUjUSn3qbhfcfMRZf0PwBfH8eg7P1p"],"When":"2024-7-8"},{"Name":"Petra Majchrová","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXYUM0CHsc_hB2Rpa7DFLyZaBkEV3Djge5tV9svxVAvYkk1Txpf=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Excellent food and wonderful attitude of the waiters. it is a pet friendly restaurant. I witnessed how waitresses helped settle people with visual impairments. Feel the pleasant atmosphere there. When I come  to Cyprus again, it is my obligatory stop.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM9hVcRiV07qqJT9tnA5owMLhW5VdBb-vI-jI_B"],"When":"2024-8-3"},{"Name":"Liza Kh.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLMg0r9pdKY6F1sAPVm13gNrw6oU1fQD-otoEH9GNua8Nev8w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Unfortunately I had food poisoning in this restaurant 3 days ago and it's completely ruined my holiday.
We came as family of 4, 2 kids and 2 adults. I've read beautiful reviews on here before choosing this restaurant. Everything was good, service
and prices but in 3-4 hours after food (I have ordered Calamari dish as i have asked waitresses personal opinion which dish she like he best and she recommended this Calamari in comparison to Prawns) I started feeling very sick and bloated and after few more hours I was extremely sick and not well. I thought what I eat before in the morning but all of us eat the same and I was feeling fine after breakfast. We came around 4 pm to this place and I was the only one who had calamari. Kids and hubby had chicken souvlaki.
I like sea food and always order it while abroad but I never ever had so much sickness before... it must of been calamari as I didn't eat much potato, just salad.
It's very very sad that the rest of the holiday I've spent in bed eating nothing..
Please be careful and ask before ordering, however I can't believe that chef cooked expired or not fresh calamari for me... you definitely don't want to feel like me when eating out...","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNR-VWrOCTojbtawuDT0bGQzPfoCFbN387Ny7bL"],"When":"2024-5-26"},{"Name":"Cipa","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIXfjhIDZSzYdJAxcIu8U0YeqTFRaLROGCG3aZFrdS-gXMZaQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recently had the pleasure of dining at this incredible restaurant, and I can’t stop raving about it! The food was absolutely phenomenal – every dish was bursting with flavor and cooked to perfection. From the appetizers to the desserts, each bite was a delightful experience for my taste buds.

But what truly made the evening special was the exceptional service. The waiter, who is also the owner, was incredibly kind and attentive. She went above and beyond to ensure we had a wonderful dining experience. Her warm and friendly demeanor made us feel right at home. It’s clear that she genuinely cares about her customers and takes pride in her restaurant.

If you’re looking for a place with amazing food and outstanding service, this is it. I can’t recommend it highly enough! 🌟","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Elen Pdl","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLVV8XRtveoWvyj1DNXKw1MJ_w2ks9aIPq11fSLIai6n6YLaQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The Greek salad was very tasty and fresh. The pork chop was great😊 Friendly warm environment with beautiful flowers all around🏵️  Don't miss the chance if you are close by 😉","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMsxXLN2ZTZncx4UapoAbtMOqTNbLHQJVs0FFsM"],"When":"2024-6-12"},{"Name":"Janet Jones","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXBR6g3fNRHwVzl-lbM-YjuiOfP9AGrn_hIc_Ruki0w0Y4YsVXGTw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The food here is amazing, great size portions. Great selection and lovely staff.
Give it a try, you will not be disappointed.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Efi Xanthou","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVxSoLwJyV6Pw5aWaX2UuHhwejKv7gILlTxYYhRZPEl8Q3byX5dfg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A lovely family-owned restaurant in Peyia (Ayios Georgios area). Food is very good quality, authentic Greek cuisine. Has a lovely breeze in the evening. Highly recomended!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPtrov5r2UhzXMnDLWB20hETg9TGVIaC7Bf9AhR"],"When":"2024-6-15"},{"Name":"Giorgos Pappas","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWLNSK4daihgeakmd-km90VZ67xdppLmiZjcq3L-PDCsD3Uba3aAg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Tasteful comfort food and openharted people! Fast service. Cozy environment and pleasant view🌻 Definitely 5 stars!!🙌👌😁","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP-ZgFd4cEFuYDrcUW8AdYEBJ7mvv9o6TXAW1AG"],"When":"2024-6-12"}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Lynne","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVDGYGRMTLeKIGR0aSnO81gw8EhsP7EqVLFFQAwlS1pPghNDbhv=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Visited The Coral Bay Restaurant at the weekend in the evening with a friend. Nice atmosphere and choice of food on the menu was good. Food was lovely and the service exceptional.  Stavros who was highly attentive looked after us for he evening. He was both friendly and professional and anticipated our needs throughout our visit. Even when we asked if we could have our left over fished boxed up so we could give to the local strays,  he was accommodating.. Was also lovely to hear that all the local strays are fed by the restaurants on this strip. All staff were polite and friendly  acknowledging us throughout.  A thoroughly enjoyable and chilled evening.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMWG-aTboqLwXeCmga8N2n0jEXnUmsABsBhOfN1"],"When":"2024-7-4"},{"Name":"c _","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL09p7Wf8fYGQ_ZSHrLIuyuNrO578r3LLLN0xYM25spp3KakXQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The salmon I had was very tasty, just wish there was more sauce. No major complaints, but for such a hyped restaurant I was expecting the atmosphere to be a bit better. The sushi was nice but again I was expecting better for how hyped it is. I’d recommend prioritising some other restaurants on the strip before this one but it’s still very good nevertheless! Also there are cats that walk around you while you eat, for some that’s brilliant for some it’s not.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOgTVF7iwloMah6Wntb2gc7cNcuwdhHJK0-OGG7"],"When":"2024-7-30"},{"Name":"Dusk Till Dawn","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJMNKd8Q-tWNDIRotIQ7COaygxTh4nIVgWO5kiGWuFZBFsh=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Every time we’ve been the food has been consistently excellent. Alma has been our server for the past few trips and even during our holiday last year. She’s brilliant and attentive always making sure the tables are clear and the drinks are topped up.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO50f_UJQEEJfh7DGsuLaM7Gm9V6QLaUhTNnz0"],"When":"2024-8-12"},{"Name":"Daria Volkova","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKQmL48pUt-I2TpnkjWMjGi-tq7C8XD6iqxGqX8BAyzAnpAAQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I want to extend a huge thank you to our waitress Alma for the outstanding service and care! From the moment we arrived, she created a welcoming atmosphere, helped us choose the best dishes, and was attentive to all our requests. The food was absolutely delicious—every dish exceeded our expectations. Thank you for a wonderful service and making our experience so enjoyable! We will definitely be back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMDSHHZ7-VUwu9f4vCbC8fgJny3IIzhOamQXSH2"],"When":"2024-8-15"},{"Name":"Kris Evanics","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV5LvE885EDY48q3me2RWv8vp7b9KOsFgHKTGu1nMDxQqM360N2tg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We had a really nice sharing plate with chips and salad and sauces. It was the most delicious fishes  we’ve ever tasted. Our waiter Hasib was excellent, listened to our queries and he was extremely nice and helpful. He’s a true credit to this restaurant. 5 star experience and we’ll be back again for sure.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMI0J4o5yaOCZCNFNOzcSBVb_OUvFKT0ykaOwNO"],"When":"2024-4-27"},{"Name":"latte_scout","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVk7AwfkD96fXjN2ND2Pn7zGugrIEEq1j2E4FvHR63kd7ZhAhNBMA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Was so happy that the food is exactly like it is in South Africa. Even the rice and sides taste the same! I had the prawn and hake combo and absolutely loved it. Highly recommend the hake! Portions are nice and big and everything was fresh and tasty. Had a wonderful experience.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPeDFqnGiFqyqNJ90NfDfh63Azjm8pJXwWbNDeZ"],"When":"2024-7-6"},{"Name":"Anna Szabó","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUeYotOzXsdY0gE13lNROunL_Drz9kEAqpe6T58ENWtuJ78G6C4kw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We went for a dinner with my friends, our waiter George was really friendly and helpful with us. The food was amazing, the prices are not that expensive. We ll come back for sure. Thank you for your service all!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPIH7L91U8omRnKCDT1Y542fwwYEBq6rVQdCeZo"],"When":"2024-7-23"},{"Name":"Achim Schmieder","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIUG6zuofHDLm25dmyYpLpv0twnutLtGMS1c5sOPl5ZW8XQPA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We really liked the food, Calamari 3 ways was amazing, best Calamari I've had in years. Also the salmon was very tasty. All side dishes sauces are fresh and of high quality. Prices are fair and the service attentive \u0026 quick. Only the location is not our thing. Way too much light, it didn't feel very comfortable with alle the white lighting. This could be improved, however it could also be a matter of personal taste. Overall highly recommended.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNXg_q94xwiqOu8PFehhi9jcQaJYn6B4bHXTbFl"],"When":"2024-4-22"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Martin Rafferty","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUHJnZpLi-Ntc08P5fbMinqgnbUUvNb8-v-KaHUpWLrneuAixqM2w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing food. You can tell the pasta is freshly made. Really good portions, I struggled to eat it all. Maybe the best pasta I have had. Tried the local Cyprus Rose that was really nice too. Staff were very friendly with exceptional service. Highly recommend 👌","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipON60zde5axwfY9nkOoLJMdXrZq8s-1s1G-uSWU"],"When":"2024-6-9"},{"Name":"Sam Appleby","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKUNpaNk-v35ZHyBMOATpZSL0aYiVRF91jEsVSyB_LS2FCCBQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing waiters big built guy was the best. Food 5*** kids loved it. Steak about 3 inch thick was cooked throughly, well done, still soft and amazing. Will be back before the holiday ends.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPfYei5dSLySW1nUdn-t3OOH4gBB44iwbdsNpf2"],"When":"2024-6-11"},{"Name":"Bhavish Natha","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVP_omOM3kQRr4C3_pI2HCjrI4rUSZoWbdT0J9Wi8z6RQ7bbkXC=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Really enjoyed this. Food was top notch. Even the kids food was of a high standard (can always tell the quality of an Italian restaurant by their spaghetti pomodoro).
Recommend the burrata and tortellini ai funghi (10/10).
The 2 cocktails we had were excellent (the OLIVE APEROL SPRITZ was superb) and service was good.
Apologies to the restaurant for my 3 year old who was sick.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNkO2evgtEJqhsYQmdW_7PYJ6FS9LuTj9PztfWg"],"When":"2024-6-2"},{"Name":"Ash Eat World","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWri80LFqShM9Wvgh63qaI9OxVLT4xBBe1Ogkz8ObB-Tnx7tv2W=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Living here in Cyprus I get family visitors and my daughter just loves this place. So, we visited again and once again did not disappoint. The food was on point, prepared and served well, nicely presented. Even when the restaurant was at capacity, service levels hardly dipped with someone always around to assist. So, visitors to Coral Bay, definitely one for a visit either family or as couple. For me personally, they serve one of my favourite wines, a Stellenbosch Pinotage so, I’m on a winner from the start. Thanks to all for a lovely evening of dining.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO2sfVIm2B0cINpacWyOSRG7G5Q9_82jJ-OX_wq"],"When":"2024-8-11"},{"Name":"Joe McLaughlin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXyRitOg4Di_stpS4_6QwFMw41lUXHJftNJojFkX-OTxzdD0G56Qg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Really nice Italian restaurant in coral bay, food was great and the air conditioning was awesome too. Would certainly return. Oh, and the lemon meringue pie was excellent for dessert.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMrqZQjd1IqWoo4ui4EkEB6D5aKbIWNJf-GJOJy"],"When":"2024-6-17"},{"Name":"Shelley Rowland","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIHSa6WrRn2TGfSj8hahVNqCJzi2GK0y2dV7-r9B1SxwJjK_Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"OUTSTANDING
literally the nicest meal we’ve had here and the only one we will be returning to for a 2nd visit
If you are a vegetarian or pescatarian like myself you will not struggle here
Highly recommend the gambonini prawns with garlic and mushroom sauce with chilli for starter.  I could have eaten that as a main dish lol
My husband had the fillet steak with peppercorn sauce which came with fries and vegetables and loved it
Mushroom tagelletti was incredible
Beautiful setting with super wonderful attentive staff
YOU WILL NOT BE DISAPPOINTED","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNRmIgBDvfeoc-HNPW0DCgpWWtQuWzVZf9HXW1c"],"When":"2024-9-8"},{"Name":"Emily Hrab","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW3jI8T0pvyJoo40kEl7pEV85ez7jBxASRN13Zklphas6MBFp_IdA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"One of the best meals I’ve ever had. Highly recommend the ravioli with prawns and scallops. The service is great, staff are always on hand for anything you need. The restaurant is modern, clean and airy. Everything we have eaten here has been top quality, very flavourful and good portion sizes. A must if you’re staying in Coral Bay.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"T Chan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWeZaea0mgrOokJ1g-uz7u-0tJhexi39EA-QSXSZHXBoAelqoPZ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Given the tourist location on the Coral Bay strip I didn't have much expectations. Needless to say I was presently surprised. The staff was welcoming and provided honest recommendations. The restaurant had a modern yet homely feel.  The Bolognese has so much flavour and depth but in general the standards of dishes are excellent.  Great value and no more expensive than other restaurants.

We returned for our last dinner in Paphos. It is very rare that we visit the same restaurant twice on holiday and again, brilliant service and the pizzas are the best we had. The lasagna was fantastic.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN1QigZ_xcrRPc2W0UW5KnlRtbF5NkfzgC9zGvJ"],"When":"2023-8-10"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Yavo Tha Mage","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXVZgoO6dfGZ0bp-bAKkaRjhXNN-e-SB4xBtp4zkigOitE9Z4Vn=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Absolutely amazing atmosphere and one of the best service i have ever experienced. The staff were very kind and welcoming with excellent communication, helping with choices, recommendations and the optimal way for us to enjoy our stay here. Cocktails were top notch, clearly they use the best ingredients. Food was very mouth watering and flavourfull. They had perfect balance of taste.
The desert was very nice aswell. I highly recommend to come here!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNYFb8IIB4b-OapYlUhUfn_f5DWE3u8nqh4twMn"],"When":"2024-3-17"},{"Name":"Amelia Cioch","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX2PDf0A8xF8wsYCb1yp_UCxgFaPJhMUnFcxI-v9SkQO9qOQgjd=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"if i can i would give then 10 stars, food is delicious!! everything is fresh and also smells amazing🩷🩷💖💖 service is really kind ale polite and theirs cocktails look like on the picture in menu😁😁 i recommend this place so much","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPxv5VgoOoYqORsIy3E1n3ESWPRjRj82qmuVhex"],"When":"2024-7-10"},{"Name":"Paulo Pereira","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUWGuGDeow1jIkIDz0GHC7sVm8medOsaWASah58-u111m3tpbx8vw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Fantastic atmosphere and the best grilled pork chop I’ve ever had. Fresh sea bass was amazing. The Panacotta was also divine. Highly recommend this restaurant.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO2qa67uGzsiMdIUspiKuC83rWIwKDqfV2en242"],"When":"2024-9-20"},{"Name":"Steven Reg Reynolds","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVLuyekmb5iEqinxCpVRE9xXjVX5KzZ7-m9qdzySzamH16oGw48pQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Fantastic cocktails, food great quality, generous portions and reasonable prices.
Staff were excellent, Monica and the team were great,  we were really looked after and would definitely return again. Was sorry to say goodbye on our last night in Cyprus.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"L J","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKrlK9qEnfMeNU2vFv0o_mn5M0lNjCn0KVayDWHttZQ7uLwyQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Perfect dining experience – highly recommended!
If you’re a foodie, you’ll love the food and place! Each dish on the menu was amazing, and each bite was a delight, have to mention that the portions are very big. The menu offered a variety of dishes, and we can’t wait to come back again!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jamesey lefebure","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVrVdXhkIf2Tn9QzdvPEY6pp30r10CjO9JyEJ5iLe5Ld2PS0QsT=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Gorgeous restaurant and amazing amazing food. Brilliant price for the portion sizes as well (HUGE!).

Gorgeous atmosphere and the night we went they had a live singer who really added to the whole atmosphere of the night. Server's are very attentive and friendly as well.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNIlN5TkLOd-XR21ZB_r4onT8G1ExLw91BNHo6V"],"When":"2023-9-5"},{"Name":"Emma Gallagher","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJSAxkzP459Gxy-tGV1JrNQrLt-IOVmlvyQMLx4i-dlEiMuFw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We have been to this restaurant three times over our two week holiday and cannot fault it. We are two families with adults and children and it suits all. The food is amazing, the restaurant is clean and modern with a relaxed atmosphere and staff are incredibly friendly, polite and cannot do enough for you. Would highly recommend. Thank you Phil’s Bar & Grill for the hospitality.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOA2TbvbH2jsP8sIwSgFFUCGy_fdXsnT2mPhizK"],"When":"2023-7-28"},{"Name":"Ģertrūde Elinga-Eliasa","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWtnTrvcXcI5QRMi85cqjh7w6FNaLUNtuIvfplWDWFRGnneswY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"All was amazing and cheap! The atmosphere was really nice, the waiter was kind and the food was really tasty. I ordered a spaghetti bolognaise for 6€!!!! (The kids menu) And the portains were pretty big :) you also get a cookie with your coffee. Thank you for this great experience I definitely recommend:)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOJx2j9Oxx8OgrJiMYymR9GTLMxigNgc2FpSvxP"],"When":"2024-1-6"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Patrik Inczédi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI-A5lT8BViNPXxe36ISvP5p9koLLlsTeQMU8SasYuX4xDSiA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Based on the very good reviews, we decided to visit this restaurant, but a series of disappointments began as soon as we arrived.

We came as a couple and after being seated, we noticed a different approach towards groups of three or more compared to couples. Faster service, better communication.

Another issue was that the menu listed all drinks except non-alcoholic ones, and there were no side dishes mentioned either.

So much time passed between our drinks being brought and our food order being taken that we could have ordered another drink. (We even considered moving to another restaurant.)

In the end, we gave it a chance and ordered food and another drink.

When the drinks arrived, our previous glass was left on the table (although this is a minor detail, it emphasized the following issues for us).

After a long wait, we received our food, but we didn't know what surprises awaited us...

My girlfriend: the meat was under-seasoned (not even salted) + the fries were bland and very greasy (the fries at the bottom were soggy from the oil).

Me: the chicken with Parmesan turned out to be eggplant with a few grams of chicken and the side dish? A potato that wasn’t even seasoned (we would have expected at least butter to soften it/salt) but maybe we were expecting too much...

+ we were attended to by three waitstaff
(1. Probably the owner/manager - only took food orders and helped serve the food
2. Took drink orders and served food
3. The bartender - cleaned tables, prepared drinks, handled payments - basically did everything and didn’t stop)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMXv7ZjlUVYXQVhiZdKKl4IgH-FtR2LyC5x9vOm"],"When":"2024-8-1"},{"Name":"Ash Eat World","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWri80LFqShM9Wvgh63qaI9OxVLT4xBBe1Ogkz8ObB-Tnx7tv2W=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Have to give Anesi 5 stars! When you go to a restaurant for the first time and come out feeling completely satisfied how can you not. From the warm welcome to both food and wine discussions at the table with George our host, to the beautifully prepared, presented and served delicious food. Starters including Green Lipped mussels in “Anesi” special garlic sauce, mains of baked salmon in “Anesi” special Dill sauce and a perfectly cooked “rare” fillet steak. Finished with a homemade Blackcurrant cheesecake tasting like it had just been made. Another point of mention for intended visitors, both food and wine menus give amazing value for money. Well done George and Helen👌I will be back soon","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNKHaykZCBH2GwuWL3A8QToHm_Fq-g-FMZUvc17"],"When":"2024-7-16"},{"Name":"Maja Krajnčič","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKbczQV7vJjjcmUSPqPk3vTj63mwT9JtNlEZsg-UbcAT7zUmbA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We had a really nice dinner here with my friends. The staff is amazing. Everybody was really pleased with their food.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOn4FFzhFKVo8wA2BlGd-qMwdvFbvotuwzsPr_C"],"When":"2024-7-8"},{"Name":"Joy Wilding","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKFilnLoXGnu780UEs_GG6G1DWRIj4kF40FQJWIS85en4TsyA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"From start to finish amazing. Such friendly service especially George the owner nothing to much trouble. Me and my husband both had steak absolutely cooked to perfection forget miller and carter.homemade apple pie and cheesecake unbelievable can't wait to come back. Thank you for a great night 😁","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Guy Amoroso","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJv_i1VBnvSgd9hgZhx6D9h1JlTLHXeEHIyGHI6AAgvtIXevw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My wife and I turned up at Anesi near to closing time after a long journey from UK.  The kitchen had closed but the owner, George was so accommodating and was able to offer a delicious meal with wine etc.
All of the family run business staff were attentive and engaging, adding to the whole experience and evening!
We so enjoyed the food that we returned the following day with our daughter and partner.
That evening was also amazing, so for our last night we were a party of seven!
Again everything hit the spot and we even managed to fit in a lunch before heading to the airport.
Four visits in a week says it all.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Fobby","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKzGcHq55PwqCR6ckTH2kG2vKn5hRjLM6KtoryYYNwMVC6kOQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Fantastic meal. Atmosphere was a little more modern and formal than your traditional taverner, this made it feel like you were out for a special meal. Food was excellent and staff were very friendly and welcoming. Good wine list. Price was very reasonable and no more than the other local tavern’s. We will be returning during our stay in Cyprus. ☀️","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOhJoJliu9-jGXLQ9RjWaB-T3YzF8HsaPH1RTfb"],"When":"2023-5-11"},{"Name":"Andrew Michael","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX6ArzVy_GfO-5PZ3OpflIgraXpBpiqOZHWrnwAYBhcOdhSfYYy=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Anesi Tavern is an absolute gem! From the moment I stepped foot inside, I was greeted with genuine warmth and exceptional hospitality. The food was simply outstanding, with every dish prepared to perfection. The grilled halloumi was a culinary delight, and the souvlaki was incredibly flavorful. The cozy and inviting atmosphere added to the overall charm, making it a perfect spot for a memorable dining experience. Anesi Tavern has definitely earned its five-star reputation, and I highly recommend it to anyone looking for superb food and impeccable service.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMaI9IfCfqF4IhaTwMSgF3rwuAqBrjTXLTXwR_5"],"When":"2023-6-8"},{"Name":"Callum Johnston","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLa8hlAE9RpUja1N5qGxgX3LWHhyCo_aPnIROcgXda5kXCCcw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing food at a very good price. The service was top tier, very friendly and kind staff. Nothing but good things to say","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Tom Dobler","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVMV9Rnmradpl7k17PIT09jy9gIq0xY8XW5HLwC9OT3s6lnrs__Ng=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"🍽️ Samisen Japanese Teppanyaki Restaurant is a hidden gem in Cyprus! The chicken breast with garlic was cooked to perfection, bursting with flavor. The teppanyaki show was absolutely extraordinary, making the dining experience truly unforgettable. 🔥 The skilled chefs put on a mesmerizing performance, turning dinner into an interactive spectacle. The attentive staff ensured every need was met, adding to the overall enjoyment. The restaurant's ambience struck the perfect balance between elegant and welcoming. While the prices might be on the higher side, the quality of food and entertainment make it well worth it. If you're looking for a unique dining experience in Cyprus, Samisen is an absolute must-visit. It's not just a meal; it's a culinary journey that will leave you with lasting memories.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP2L62PtB3c8Q4g-I55GVU07e1vdOlWTzkQ-iRr"],"When":"2024-9-24"},{"Name":"Danielle Stephens","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJMSO71TaDhTWt9HZmFSfESfo0WsORbaO-JNV8CFhOTFCKyTQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had the most amazing time tonight, What an experience! Would highly recommend this restaurant, put it on your to do list whilst in Coral Bay/Paphos x You must if spaces available book to sit at the show table, we had so much fun , the skills on the chef were outstanding , food was stunning, the best service from all staff. We will always remember this night, thankyou all at Samisen.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNsfCyIc-d6RHTN7MqpbMcB6wNegbwDZvgVeMUa"],"When":"2024-8-19"},{"Name":"Stuart Haslam","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVdOP3olzpGbnTzdK-wB6rwiasELgyFooPOY0t6lPMXimnuXNds=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We went early as we had a child with us, and we were the first customers of the evening. This didn't detract from the entertainment the chef gave us. Excellent evening with a brilliant teppanyaki chef. Highly recommend.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMx-JbGLQ_Xx8Oy7QuqpUBJJR1Ai5_KnQcZjASk"],"When":"2024-5-28"},{"Name":"Joe McLaughlin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXyRitOg4Di_stpS4_6QwFMw41lUXHJftNJojFkX-OTxzdD0G56Qg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Fantastic experience here. It's not just the food but the experience and skills of the chefs.\nYou should definitely put this on your to do list if in coral bay and I'd recommend booking in advance.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO1cxIG7mSjNyAY8lals1Hr___T9eaxme5fUqVw"],"When":"2024-6-17"},{"Name":"Luke Pra","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLCUwCwuvjipUlTGfwA6g2ahxwW-mEWt0J96hkM88ykf8ZY7lY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great variety of Japanese cuisine. Can be a little loud depending on where you are sitting , because there are a few show cooks entertaining guests. Had the show as well and it’s great especially with kids. Recommend.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMBkzEBHc6GZwbt4DTdOBsxyLRQAXG_IwXEzhVX"],"When":"2024-8-11"},{"Name":"Michael Shenkman","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUlYw8OuIFwP8HyW_c25uc4cuGw52fwuRLM3Oki3sFIqQdsQGPg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great show, tasty food. We had fun!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPFyoiSbM_Dp8DcbgqmJkevfKCFFNerI9IiS5d0"],"When":"2024-9-8"},{"Name":"Neil P","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXB9pgtW3_-vcZNmJBTWEFHEvjA0s9q3_1EfOjozf5EFojpDB_g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Very entertaining chef. Loves to involve his guests. Food is very good, but could do with a 5 minute breather in between first 2 courses. We went for fixed menu number 4. Recommend.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPCEhgaDurT3pIJYabklbEIgyewqDrfikemOTaI"],"When":"2023-4-25"},{"Name":"Nicos Konnaris","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVD7p9FNIWnVS-i8hXKQjuxhdWR871Z8-b5Bt-6kT7fZfP5-1U=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Excellent Restaurant. Fresh food perfectly cooked, fast \u0026 very professional service, great show \u0026 very friendly owners. The wine prices are very reasonable \u0026 the tempura icecream was perfect. Had beef \u0026 chicken, dumblings for starter. Highly recommended \u0026 will visit again soon.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNj538uTV9dfAwAtneWR9G6L5rASNql0uFaKx4a"],"When":"2023-8-31"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Angelina Campisi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLNlUKSTUHbMGWftRi5hH72rifskksf62rkPrDex-bhes2IyQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I first met Phidias two years ago. What a pleasure it was to return to his Taverna this year. The food and drink is always good and the staff couldn't be more friendly or accommodating, plus Phidias is always happy and sociable, if a little cheeky. I would always recommend this place, even with a couple of dodgy reviews on Google. It was great to be able to introduce a couple of friends to Phidias Tavern, too!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPtlYMnN25vggPEq56VDKNA43mwdU4CjAmNgs_I"],"When":"2024-10-2"},{"Name":"Artiom Ka","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJsG6fe6cxdjePOpYpuRLulNrxvwJAIit-S-P7ktZZ3bj-ANQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Big portions, very nice home made chips, service os a bit limps, a bit owercooked main food. Tables and tabecloth need to be renewed","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNIojXPdEtvWKNXAUTle85szbR0TlXnbo3v0aw8"],"When":"2024-5-5"},{"Name":"Dominic Walters","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLUEyLgo30SQPGlg6faCICbJCW_vaSZv1GDq_pFYAEgpvL3Lg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Traditional taverna with a warm welcome, great hospitality, great service and food to die for. The best moussaka and kleftiko on the island.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN2zoxbNGl1bcO49vztXks85Z--bMXwVqQQd6xC"],"When":"2024-10-2"},{"Name":"Sonia Thomas","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKRp6z-fqUSGxb__lbEOeZG2ey2vZKvImcC4uKIzKQyQKtVpA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The food was absolutely amazing. We went three times during our stay and sampled the lamb lefts, meatballs, mousakka and lamb chops. The vegetable soup was so authentic and fresh plus the garlic mushrooms. The home made chips are the best on the island. Choose these over the jacket potatoes. Everything we sampled was divine.
The owner was so entertaining, friendly and welcoming. Our tip, go for the sea view tables :-)
Would recommend and return without a doubt! Been there 40 years and uses a traditional chargrill.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP8z2jXvexaZorj5XuYnFfMByAmX7rDmJH_bAKb"],"When":"2023-10-23"},{"Name":"M S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXQ0fUAOPNPhSj98FDyX-m93QHTMbwqnj8K-gfZoSAa9JnseA6H=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We ordered fish meze and it was delicious. The portion is doable if both of you are good eater. The house wine was ok but the liquor was extremely delicious. The waiter was really nice and checked on us quiet often. The tavern looks traditional inside. View on the mountains. However, the food was a little bit pricey.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM61rLxHE3S42TnQ6mBdkqMt3pPwHT5E1GCyUdt"],"When":"2023-5-25"},{"Name":"Rose4","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVakBI-l8YfHhNp16zjw2JecOAAmLXFjKQLKKdoXcTRUgfgghug=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Phidias Tavern: had lunch here Saturday 6/04/24 where we were greeted by a warm welcome & introduced to other family members of the owner. Chose Dolmadas with a tasty Greek salad & an ice cold Leon beer. Reasonably placed, tasty food & warm welcome.  (Only small note is I would've preferred food to be hotter, otherwise really enjoyed it).","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Rebekah Searle","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKguW-KWclGErAeiB-m-qFlvX-lcLVpvaIMowVrhA82ImAu6w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Really authentic Cypriot tavern! Hosts very friendly and accommodating. Little wait for food but restaurant busy with large groups and only 2 servers, complimentary olives and bread made up for this. Check bill before paying as we had items added we didn't have but this was sorted at payment with no question. Food was lovely, tasty and fresh.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Sharon Collins","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL8fEnfdwbCF7IkMmN9N_x9JxuOy0hIjCq_EfX6CuYgGYAgvg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"The food was Ok had Sword Fish and my Sister had Sea Bass . Came with a small portion of Chips . Our waiter ( which I think was co owner) was pleasant, however the other owner sat at a table very close to us and had a very load video call to a friend for the whole of our main course , we could hardly hear ourselves speak . It ruined the whole experience. He then shouted from his table to see if “You girls ok “ .
When asked how our meal was from the very busy co owner , I explained we were not happy and why and said we would never be back . He understood why .
I would give this 1* only and would not recommend, go to Coral Bay strip instead","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPEcQh16cTjilp0PeB050AF82PR2-Ldt9KQuF2s"],"When":"2023-9-23"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Kyriaki Ioannou","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWhncsyIYyZJzJ76gxnX86K39O2ONt-1n1DSA2pL9kNy9FIWgRn=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It is worth it, we loved it. 💯
We dined there twice. To start with they bring you some fresh small bread with some dip like garlic, pesto, vinegarette creme. We enjoyed it so much.
We tried their goat cheese salad which was so fresh, their chicken breast which was so juicy, their steak which was cooked properly, -we asked for a medium rare- and ravioli with spinach and ricotta 💯. Check out the photos.
*The only thing we didn’t like at all was the seabass ceviche,  it tasted like boiled :(.

Other than that everything was really tasty, fresh and the staff was so welcoming and kind. You should try!!!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO9N3dUnjnvqze8iMlk8TXv4QyevS587iiXJ4jU"],"When":"2024-8-15"},{"Name":"Tomáš Precechtel","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLVDiTliUYhQhxPjODFQpIXbiPud9psd5CKIDwjqhvNLOujRQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We had a really fantastic starter and steak for dinner, but Lava cake was just amazing. Thank you very much 😊","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNHC7VCbHCaR4Rkqqx2mqK0t8jd3EQbbXBSEO0A"],"When":"2024-7-10"},{"Name":"Christos Photiou","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIN7B8cU2u093uFQGTgeoEjGUY8VHRF3soujvTJq8UEUVTwgw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"My recent visit left me thoroughly impressed. This traditional steakhouse offers a wide variety of steaks along with some other choices.

The starters were generous in quantity, setting a high bar for the meal to follow. The mains did not disappoint either, though the portions were not as large as the starters.

The pricing was a bit steeper than anticipated, but the overall experience provided good value for money. The service was excellent, adding to the pleasant dining experience. A complimentary dessert from the house at the end of the meal was a delightful touch and tasted excellent.

While the quality of the food was top-notch, I expected a more high-class atmosphere given the price point. Nonetheless, the overall experience was superb, and I am certain to visit again.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Iullia Zholob","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIrnPDnQab-DGpKf-44Z9wSoRQCVqJ4EXfvddRW7Pk860Xx6A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The most delicious restaurant. You won't find a better seafood salad! Everything is at the highest level.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOH-Cx7vzw9f3sfalidrlHle_ncsYeEtNi-VSS1"],"When":"2024-4-26"},{"Name":"Frankie Hand","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVTPvduwubsJ35dpiBwC8kDyS19zqwP5UYj-61A5e5XUxWBa25b=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Service was great. Food was amazing! Seen a few reviews saying it’s expensive, however, I think it’s about average for a decent steakhouse. (We had 3 starters too LOL) Will definitely come back when we return to Cyprus!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNi2OWQHt77LY10K3dYX_lFgJ6gUINQH01N3ds-"],"When":"2023-10-14"},{"Name":"Kerstin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKzc5Hev3Y3TQOWwKTDHHv1KdbGuvT1ex8kYufyoc2Rof9jlA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Awesome place. Very very good food! High class.
Plus they got air condition inside.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOe9TvqB_HY1yvK4IL_EhRt6Nf3XBiHVdWQdGHz"],"When":"2024-6-5"},{"Name":"jesset","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLOUFdNxdFH2QPHfa28-HzG7kSwImZijTB7ha97JJRpm62Phw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Over the last two weeks we had family over and dined at Andria's twice and I must say that the food and service was excellent. We have tried the duck, rib eye steak, pork ribs, lamb chops and the chateau briand and every dish was well presented, cooked perfect and very tasty. All the staff were very friendly and made us all very welcome. I would highly recommend this restaurant to locals and holiday makers and we will be back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNDsFuLPR4kqS-_TQpMgaFMM_x_a2NiRyFj55gq"],"When":"2023-8-6"},{"Name":"Chucri Nemnoum","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW6vn3iijXEs4PgQLm0KVH0eHgLc_ZHE98K8wIe75FyiWBF7mEUmA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It’s a must visit place !! The staff are very friendly and welcoming !!

The food is delicious !! Very well plated and presented !! The steak is very well cooked !! The appetizers are wow especially the Foie Gras and the Proschuto !!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNIuW3C4MKrvZu6w8Ai0LoHKVXOAMXi4Ej7-MT6"],"When":"2023-9-17"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Sława M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLoVBi75-BIThUtiSsk3cRsLgCuzu5EwA9VhnU5y3CgrIaywA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I ordered Meat Meze and homemade wine. Salad, olives, peppers, 3 dips including tzatziki and humus, toasted bread, groats, huge fries, grilled halumi cheese and bacon, specialty cooked beef with onion, beef meatballs, chicken skewers and pork skewers. All in one dish for 2 people but it's a huge dish for 4 people. Delicious and aromatic wine. Fresh food, the best in the area with very nice service. I recommend.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNMUP6u52MV_vKQh2iP4nA2THUvIK1RNWhGFBa-"],"When":"2024-8-9"},{"Name":"Adrianna Juncewicz","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXpeBJgLkuC2ecMwXF6uEp5y6VOjVLqvCPEKVf2cupjsZpbOcR_=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We like that place very much! Kind host, who gave us more than we ordered, AWESOME food! We were there twice and everything was hyper-delicious! And now, greetings from Poland!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOrUfj5q9NOqF0OjodHPNWWgKEmCYz7389UxfL6"],"When":"2024-8-15"},{"Name":"Derek Wadsworth","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKtLHS0Epe8C0GeRdfJIUl0a6UPlNPBcFj5pArTmNL_D_GJ94jr=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We found this little gem, which is tucked away off the main strip a week into our 2 week stay. The service is amazing, and the food and ambience more in keeping with what you'd expect from a local taverna.

Great relaxed, unrushed vibe.

The food is definitely a notch above everything on the main strip. Freshly cooked and delicious. Nice portion sizes, lovely huge chips.

We were served an extra bowl of salad with feta at no charge. Best tasting meal we have experienced so far.

The house red is delicious and smooth unlike some of the vinegar we've been served elsewhere and the wife's pina colada was the best she has had so far.

We will definitely visit again during our stay.

Thank you to the amazing staff for a proper  Cypriot experience. This takes you back to how things used to be 20+ years ago before it all got a bit commercialised.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPgVSldDehDAng8TLswv6iV2bXGIbMIksGiUCYJ"],"When":"2024-9-13"},{"Name":"Greg Jones","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKs_rOg6DXuLGSNMCt1OdwucHQPdAS9Pp-M7HdBTcdozHz9lw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great fresh food. Pre order fish caught to order. Good value . Cocktails potent.
Off the strip which was good. Highly recommend","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPJmXIhys7sHIlMLJFtF6nhrBeAjKl9XXUaaCri"],"When":"2024-6-28"},{"Name":"Elie Heneiné","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV3kpuEPK5H22H47v2gLFBa0hdIjtpxZjV4NDXDQzmSUWNh0WrY=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It was a great experience. The service was friendly and the staff took care of us immediately.
The food was amazing. The sea bass and garlic prawns were fresh. We also got a mixed grill platter and some sheftalias which were to die for. We cleaned our plates.
We went for an early dinner, but with the fans we didn't feel much of the heat we'd been feeling outdoors everywhere else.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Grisel Abate","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUlU5h8YNg6JNiwzL7PRiZvIhbu3nP7FIHjI8jzw3Tpt1OGE3K2zg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Food is great and the environment is very relaxing. Generous portions and good hospitality","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP6zkgZvJxn2uwEpSusyltp3QyVk3wrIxal5foe"],"When":"2024-5-11"},{"Name":"william koenig (Quiet)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUoSGyjvET5Vj_1B6qreocGJRqcaCDsOWKbYH_ADpt47nPpRTjI=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We ate here twice during our visit and everyone was satisfied both times. Most everything is fresh so they may not have everything on the menu everyday... But what they have is very tasty. Service is quick and direct. Portions are a good size... And the starters are almost a meal in themselves. Ah, the bar area is normally pretty full and has a good vibe. So far... It's the most local restaurant we've found... And that sets it apart from the strip and is worth a visit.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Silvia S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLo_1fasuW4OOf4bFDrKYd05LZt2r7LznU-7nmWvOkld_qaTM5w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great food and very nice owner. Very generous portion size","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN5IKV0Aamai6-KBnxaKQoqSvFinkkiFRn8M-dB"],"When":"2024-6-22"}]
