user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Denise L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWzBy3nFWhmuUKxy066Z8cTqWZlP8Z8nt32puSYM4LJWl-xSKE8sw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We've been here a couple of times too with a table of 5. First night, 2 of us shared the seafood meze. All of these pics were for 2 to share! Seafood was just amazing. Highly recommend. Great service too.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNfjpxgooTx94zbRXDJ-uf-xsoeDPJsv5GOMQma"],"When":"2023-7-1"},{"Name":"Ian Campbell","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWc6xOnz6eP4R4pX2SGVM0Sl7SidTRxU_j-lSue0bEtHFRb0AE4yQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The first time we have been here since the refurbishment and its all very nice. The service was friendly and the food good, they seem to have whatever kitchen troubles they were having under control. The starters turned up quickly, there was a short wait for mains, but perfectly acceptable. Its well worth giving it a try.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Beth Foster","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJfC-BZQ1uI9xdyregMEzaYISKZhrhTwLpETj221FrOI-pIWw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We enjoyed a nice meal here on the last night of our holiday. The food, once it arrived, was lovely and tasty. There was small mishap with a missing salad that we chased a couple of times as it didn’t arrive with the other starters like we’d ordered it to but when it did arrive it was tasty and ended up acting as a side dish to us all.

The team were friendly and welcoming. I think maybe they were having a few issues with speed of food but this didn’t impact experience as we were enjoying time to chat.

The Kleftiko was a showstopper in my eyes but everyone at the table enjoyed their food which is good sign 🙂","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Katie Sammons","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWKPxl0addA8C-Lp5rDuPJuQ11_cUP2YlGUsQKVBKW7mu1_fG0J_A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Fantastic meal out with the family. Great food, great service. Haven't been here since before the refurb. Looks so much better and the food, service and atmosphere was great. Family run business. Highly recommend.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Aj Thompson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUG7kqFebRbWOqE_Yz_FWLH5Jbt2hUpCUZajQgWiXI9dN7In-_N=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We just had a great meal at Lekanto. My boy won best dish with the smoked ribs that were amazing! We finished things off and I believe that my pancake with ice cream and Tia Maria won the day! Super friendly staff and great service. If you're in Coral Bay then it's a must visit sort of place!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNDCSHY8ARQfSpgZ2yxP3cYKcBdKuU1yv0Clx98"],"When":"2022-3-18"},{"Name":"paul brown","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKiPP8t0RRTQFmOo3CjCVYznWFxdOTWJDxaWjbJeS2XyZZWtQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"After it's reworking it looks amazing and so much more inviting,the staff were so friendly nothing was a chore,the food was extremely tasty and great presentation,would definitely recommend and return again.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"J (Alex)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ4TXLTdndxextz0FQ_ySPliy4BmNmYiDZ_to_vfF_vtZ7edw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Waiting 45 minutes for a round of drinks and 90 minutes for food. Turns out order was never put through the till. Lots of people standing around the till, but only 1 person serving drinks. Absolute shambles. Under new management I think. Avoid!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"John Munday","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU1sIcEK1NBfcfuPTi0hL4QQB6WSs9XG95qbqAL4-yV3NHll7Cq=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Fairly decent meals. Portions quite large. Trouble is most of the food, as is the norm these days, is reheated so only just ok. Staff very friendly. Meals are fairly expensive actually. Beware of hidden costs eg bowl with two scoops of ice cream €6. Cappuccino coffee (€4.25) is priced about average but the coffee was dreadful so please avoid at all costs. Seemed to be made from sachets - extremely weak - not good.☹️","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM7X9x9jCm3eYIezDMgfjFYGwAp-WvEce0Qd9FC"],"When":"2022-8-22"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Laila Lacey","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUZUNkr5N6RJLxJdqtdkMPzbm4TQafoA7PG7gKcTK3IoB7YkMaz=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"This was our second visit to the restaurant. We were lucky to be seated outside due to a cancellation and I personally think there is more buzz and atmosphere outside than inside. We chose to visit on a Saturday and maybe it was a bit of a downfall as it was very busy and at times we felt the service was chaotic and we felt a little  bit to be forgotten about. Nevertheless, overall the starters, mains and desserts were outstanding and the presentation was a candy to the eyes. I just wished a bit more explanation what I had on a plate. There was a burst of flavours and colours with my scallops but I ended up guessing some of the flavours.  My husband opted for the ribeyed steak and he found it being a bit like braised version than standard seared one. It was tasty but maybe not what he expected. One of the kids chose pizza and the cheese was too strong for being a kids menu item. However, overall the dining experience was lovely - the food and presentation combined . The wine was delicious, the port was lovely and a complimentary  strawberry limoncello was a cherry on a top. We are certainly visiting again,  coming with two small kids you still always feel very welcome which often is not the case in some other places. Lovely dining experience and thoroughly recommended.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOJI-rpeyJFs8WSkaNMMzfIfgTjIBUhJu-ilEvx"],"When":"2023-7-9"},{"Name":"Sonia Patricia","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX_6WBKDz2-v9JnHc0NapIq7NYSvYKTNGTaizWgSYk1r6XBRG1Q9w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We been today at Sidayes for dinner with family and a great friend and we had a great time. Food was delicious, service was incredible. Anna is an amazing person. Thanks again for the delicious food and great service! Keep up the good work😊😊😊!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP4S8TwhuUs2ZhtCnF6NMqHhxUlJ4DjtgPv4gei"],"When":"2023-7-27"},{"Name":"Stefanos Nicolaou","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJtkP9UMNYAbMylkmVp4C2O3ypYyAK6AuH6NEH9hs2FlUpA7w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I have visited Sidayes for a weekend dinner after a visit in Peyia. The food is exquisite with lots of choices, the service is excellent and there is a great selection of wines both local and international. We have tried the ceviche, the crispy squid, the lobster pasta and the fillet steak. All recommended and must try! Will definitely visit again","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPAkgWN2WeaWu190gb_gAVZnzcYVbEayyjM3cS4"],"When":"2023-6-23"},{"Name":"Tim C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIYzKWMAsvNFG1ysqw6ueRg45ML8VUohY1PXa0PHZuk7upi_w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Delicious food in a charming restaurant.  The restaurant owners were really helpful and friendly offering advice on food and wine.  Service was excellent.  Amazing looking and tasting dishes with a huge selection of wine to choose from.  I felt, although slightly higher than nearby restaurants, that prices were good considering the quality of everything on offer.  I would highly recommend a visit!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPQO2IOHzdH-gey4ZyUEvIZ-BNWVfloPfG-JhLh"],"When":"2022-9-5"},{"Name":"Andreas K","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLiN383gXYwyoAUaGECMfnMprK0fhvlQ1G4_PtkYhxw71XcRso=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing restaurant, good service, very friendly and professional staff.
Outstanding food with big selection of wine, reasonable prices.
Probably the best French restaurant in Paphos!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPpD6Kl2gh0S5Dcja_-0AECpHod2_jwkSkMQHok"],"When":"2022-12-4"},{"Name":"Jennifer Watt","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVqBQVuILg9dR1iqLJ1crEVOUfJ1T87GHGWuOZoAk3zpaCoGvXt=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Fantastic welcome on arrival.  Amazing food and great advice from the owners on both food and wine. Every last morsel was delicious and the whole experience memorable for all the right reasons! Loved it!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP8-lhfNOt9erpUtjb2-yaRH_Hzi_Y8S6V4-2L5"],"When":"2022-4-22"},{"Name":"Najwan Abu Shawareb","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVrL6G6N4C2192cDoOpeBsmY9XA9-zyhjdPZJleu9TFeqISwiGmfA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This restaurant is by far the best dining experience we had in Paphos! An absolute must visit!  Everything was flawless, from appetizers to desserts, and the owners made us feel at home. Highly recommended!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Andrew CHURCHFIELD","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU1CmtEWlTjy80aQiChgZdVM_2l4eKIxza7OBRE_P44Yi9ZkwBq=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Went here for a special meal and was made really welcome. Place not busy, due to major roadworks closing the through road, should be finished end of April 24, but don't hold your breathe.
Food is very good, just not enough vegetables. Also, they know about wines.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Martin “Skwatinnevil” Sanders","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXshX4pe4w2gZSmC9X-AxiZM2HBpDzKBNODeOCpDbDu4rpSurdD=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"What can i say? My wife and i have never had a bad or negative experience here. The food is excellent, and the service is very good! Great location. Highly recommend lunch/ice cold beer or a light salad/icecold beer or cocktails when you have been sunbathing all day! 😀","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM9DCjvFKhLKqqt4kQ7y8NBNMSwPsjwvAj5RzPA"],"When":"2024-6-12"},{"Name":"S4IL S4IL","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLyhLrF40k6Rq7QbGX-a7sG1Du5kQGsTRpT361QjaDniFvuag=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We had the Full English breakfast \u0026 juices \u0026 received complimentary fruit \u0026 cake. Lovely place, right by the sea \u0026 a nice terrace. Staff very helpful \u0026 attentive","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPQ_fKqvkNiI63ydOfqmG-dsISOcO5dq66oC-LZ"],"When":"2024-9-14"},{"Name":"Philipp Stegmann","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWt27g2nPkkLinJCuUknWUCmZeVav3z5BAK8ufxNrcdC3YVytc=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"The ambiance of the place is really charming, and the view is absolutely stunning. However, my experience was overshadowed by the service. Unfortunately, the staff – particularly the girl at the bar who served me – was extremely rude. Her attitude was dismissive and unwelcoming, and her responses to my questions were laced with unnecessary attitude.\n\nWhat started as a good day turned into a frustrating experience that really left a bad impression. It’s a shame because the setting has so much potential, but the service needs serious improvement.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPZi9fePoF7NNCA0FhFlxdNBksn9qN_MB5XYvg2"],"When":"2024-9-15"},{"Name":"Kim Fredric Lindholm","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWnIEyr86Tt-_bk4Aev6Qg1eT1Se4l4pOH-94F0V7hU1ZY8mtk=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Fantastic experience, superb location and lovely  staff! Food is amazing and the view right by the beach is very unique!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPwrESe47nEsIff55ueGxva0dGIz87Y76kf8wTI"],"When":"2024-5-21"},{"Name":"Krzysztof Buchacz","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWEsML88h27Lnw9nTKEKpdcqcatIb6X00RPbjsZV9RwFOpZQCM8=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great views, nice atmosphere, helpful \u0026 nice staff. We've been offered a bonus dessert. Moussaka was also very tasty. Quite cheap for what it has to offer, would recommend!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOUou3SpxdHHftGoy9QGwtbr_FvPPf-Ah7kuwPL"],"When":"2024-7-14"},{"Name":"Selma E","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVf7eK7JdFOjowxp_KDv8K7hcdVe_B9KxYTffzvaY7Nn_Vpjjhm=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"One of the best service experiences I ever had, everyone was very friendly and professional and we got Couscous, Fruits and Cake on the house. The food was extremely delicious and fresh.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOqlK5DGiiBInHVVuVo15L3-sDM2T86MQcRj2vb"],"When":"2024-6-5"},{"Name":"Rose4","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVakBI-l8YfHhNp16zjw2JecOAAmLXFjKQLKKdoXcTRUgfgghug=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Visited Arapis Coral Bay Restaurant Monday 8/04/24 for lunch after a swim on Coral Bay Beach. Had tuna baguette with salad \u0026 family members had Octopus, which all thoroughly enjoyed. Good food, value \u0026 service. Restaurant has outside seating on large balcony as well as indoor seating. Plenty of free parking in front of restaurant.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOo4vNIlnBbshmvWtxchydceFQWtgXwTkYFc8oi"],"When":"2024-8-23"},{"Name":"Je Mircea","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLuCfMcITfxeSYLHuJwrKcqdaRJDgyLH6CseN0cPCbCEWKrYA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Best serving so far ,very good food and a lot of it. right next to the beach,eat and enjoy the view","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOe1xNgJp3Qt_waet0cHZkQ9FYwzi4u1I_oO8m5"],"When":"2024-5-7"}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Elaine Sulllivan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUO0WYXbAeexvEzaes54RqrPhVXCxAAnyeH2Xi736c92Fo0VXC6=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We arrived close by and saw the negative reviews but still had to eat and we were tired. We didn't expect much but the service was great and our meals were very good. The atmosphere is very quiet and almost a bit weird. Drinks and food were fab and that was all we needed. So thanks for a great meal and great service.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Steph Douglas","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKR3pe8buAEIJREJ-P-naxX_97l8u3KqGvn346g9P5JJmZYBg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Food was delicious - we ordered goats cheese salad and pork kebabs. However service was initially lacking, we just took a seat and asked for menus. I also find it gross that places don’t have designated smoking areas outside so we had to deal with a large table next to us chain smoking throughout our meal.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMQDrPZJD0_xT3oHOASGo6o4LJnznflumk6GiEo"],"When":"2023-9-26"},{"Name":"Donna W","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVCQEZDwINSmaaVhZD8pcot7TpUn49oOGL5Nq1fCQgwvz3U1I8UmA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"The food was lovely - portion size ok, tasted nice \u0026 good quality. We had a burger, pasta dish \u0026 kebab and would happily order any of them again. Paid €70 for 3 main meals and 5 alcoholic drinks. Reasonably priced for 'hotel' food.\n\nThe staff were friendly and polite. However the service is extremely disorganised - we had to repeatedly ask for menus, ask to order and keep getting up to order drinks / get the bill. We got our food before our drinks even though they were ordered at the same time. Seemingly there just weren't enough productive staff to cope with the customers that were in.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Geo Poet","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW1cIysqN7POA8o6uRf0oY6vLXTwVXcp5rgKja1TGueA35GMSnY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We have been in a road trip and suddenly found ourselves in Trodoos while it was unexpectedly snowing... It was spectacular and decided to spend our time in this resort and restaurant and it is absolutely worth it. The prices are reasonable, friendly staff, clean rooms it deserves 4 stars. The rooms were warm with hot water. The food is yummy we loved the fresh river trout fish with German non-alcoholic beer. Will definitely come back again 😍😋","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOElTl27ssRxhziYNnQiV9AyDDCoNWqQSIXv11J"],"When":"2023-4-29"},{"Name":"AP LX","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVrtdLESkK1tOf17G5mo1p4yB9DRp4Y7RabTiou74nNFv05vyA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Horrible staff, service and food. servants can talk like you one of them best friend with inappropriate words and rude jokes. almost all food is pre-cooked frozen thing bought in nearby shop with a price of self cooked.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Elena Stavrou","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLXn0PNA7rhX0Ze-bbGzV7ptToX4sd-ww1X5WTZnY_LhjMlbw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Cosy with fireplace and comfy sofas. Very nice coffee served with a tasty crunchy biscuit! Needs some upscale on the decoration and will be on top!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMrheF1ILYmz-qvMKBNmayj66sXQLiCa6UnzyKd"],"When":"2024-1-10"},{"Name":"Ondřej Kucci","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU-PmoH2Lx815bman6qYkhNwlPFnLRsFeLZAxzSHqVqBHkUF3P1=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The food was decent and came in huge portions (Cypriot breakfast on the photo), the staff (cheers Leonidas!) were super nice and friendly. Within the restaurant there is a lot of options where to sit - outside when it's sunny, by the windows with a lovely view or by the fireplace if feeling chilly.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMHphdRBJOtRpkiuACFg3GjzyncuZENeo3sQ8iB"],"When":"2023-4-1"},{"Name":"Alexandru Negru","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXzahMV1lr0XVGbTHERU_eWvhhYsLxPucjB_K7Jk9vsM6NKHfeY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Good and welcomed morning coffee place in montaneus Cyprus! Opened for coffee at 7 in the Morning.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Siyana Angelova","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJUOnQLQVhzp1rvKDJKiR_NQvOIpD084Lau1DPPxYW3IElAdQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The best moussaka variation of my life. Amazing and authentic atmosphere. I'm really sad that my stay at Omodos was short and I didn't have a chance to try other things on the menu. If I ever come back again, I would definitely do it again and I highly recommend it","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP57m001dwbqYU2DZ9Q_J5WceqsP081z2n24SKq"],"When":"2024-10-7"},{"Name":"Nikki Lomax","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUdsskmPQYjCdd5iaXU0EcKIf-aC3PUvg_ZdLz2g8YNkon_BWs=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"One word… outstanding. Great venue, amazing place.  Reduced meze and grill menu at lunch time but the best food we’ve had in Cyprus. Service was warm, welcoming and helpful as well as very efficient. 18 separate dishes I think I counted  in the meze of small dishes… everyone struggles so take your time is my advice. If a family of 4 order for 2, plenty food. We didn’t  and were not able to eat it all but we’re able to take the rest away, brilliant! .  Don’t eat before coming here, seriously and pace yourself but enjoy! ☺️ Can’t recommend this place enough. Thank you!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOx0i8tv4ZqxH6AJW19qxcY_cbcdQLasgOYW3BI"],"When":"2024-8-3"},{"Name":"Aimee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLInuj1hSiY6gDKyowKm_mS5raOjp_pQybZAIvk1CGldRoPuHs=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Food and wine absolutely delicious we got the mixed grill and everything was so tasty. I got a medium sweet white wine which was also amazing. Paired with the amazing service we went back for our second night in omodos too! Highly recommend the chicken lemonada also.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNOYEDOb4e2G4TAMgD67rtAlJx1FzSC0siBc3QV"],"When":"2024-9-1"},{"Name":"Naim A","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW8L7XhmjJ5fKnbxMGocU0sEyphiIqFj0MTz_SpFZtJudtm6YiV=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great restaurant. Well worth the hype.
Service is ok, the Greek lady is nice and professional however the other employees could be asked to be more attentive and smiley.
We came on a weekday so we had to order the menu, they were two choices, the mixed grill or the set  Mezze. We took the mezze for 2.
Everything was delicious, starting from the dips to the amazing dessert! ( orange cake).
Very generous and feeds more than 2 people easily.  The price is very correct as well.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMjnJwNm-DGRO714KoXACcWeHx_dfBVRXu7bnwW"],"When":"2024-8-13"},{"Name":"Michelle","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocICkAsBfIRGQ0Ntr6jKz3Reaz0aEsovjtGUzNTlixtvebP18VI=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The restaurant has this cozy traditional style which is very welcoming. We met Katerina who suggested  the best options, she was fully professional and made our day! The food was super delicious. The sweets made of anari and topped with a strawberry were great.  We will definitely visit again the restaurant and recommend it to others.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN-Ltg2MclYEPvly2HoPviU0zNrf4GAX11BUlfw"],"When":"2024-6-1"},{"Name":"Lapo Chirici","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX21UOcxiW0dCTuuIL2_qK84VN3NX8Ybgtxk6U2a607DS6oF-c2OA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"If you stumble in Omodos, you cannot miss a lunch or dinner in this wonderful and super typical tavern. Food 10/10, service 10/10, atmosphere 10/10. We arrived a bit late but the staff welcomed us in the best way. We ordered a selection of bread and dips (all delicious) as starters, a lemon-marinated roasted chicken, and a slow-cooked lamb. Everything was delicious. At the end of the lunch, the restaurant owner introduced himself telling the story of the place and how they renovated in the years. Congrats to the cuisine and all the staff.
For the records: thanks also for the taste of dessert and fresh fruit, both gently offered by the house.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMZ56M04XYvbvfV5RkzGPRof1YDo2ndv2U0eckz"],"When":"2023-8-18"},{"Name":"S Y","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX74rWzvttRbSyuDMvHO48odBWon-sdDsbV3MiP9gBgsJ8JGfCgLA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"A few dishes unavailable that day, free pita bread with tahini which taste good, also free fruit banana orange slices at the end. Big portion sizes","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMtYMlHHbjQIOgLlO0j2p3ip8Om2Eq_yKbI0_Qm"],"When":"2024-4-7"},{"Name":"Alex Siamantas","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWXnBxBx1653oJp4-6b21ftmRV6NWIeZr8wq_XpJ3V0xrsX5msBpw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is one of my favorite restaurants in cyprus. They serve cypriot meze but with a "gourmet" elevated twist. At the end of each visit, i can't wait to come back! The service is very good and the location in omodos village adds to the traditional feeling of the place.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPSWbP9-_eX8XZNiNJEGdTb29flLHFlzgbJNpY5"],"When":"2024-1-1"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Lambros T","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXSda1NwHLznqVWHi8iC_-_cPV61_1EUlRV2B_UkXBL5yhNPdBVcg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Fantastic brunch amidst the forest. If you are visiting Troodos or hiking early in the morning I would strongly recommend you to visit it. Menu upgraded since we last visited in August.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMGM-QUAmcTrDF_YCINhimEMcsZkz6KqgwZHDqb"],"When":"2024-3-31"},{"Name":"Theodora Lazarides","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJRO4ZGev77W_ujqqDfDAl4PsOqFNSGIeSRe7LUCgZbzYJy1g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Food -
16EUR for a very average-tasting Chicken Souvla, the portion was good though.
12 EUR for a chicken burger, it was double but was not mentioned in the menu. The bun was crumblig and falling apart, good tasting but not reflecting the price tag

Service - The staff takes too long to notice that you are waiting for them to order anything. Except for that, everyone was kind and friendly.

Atmosphere - Nothing really special, you just see the camping from the outside, our view was the camping toilets and some tents and lots of trees. No air cooling system at all and only outside seating is available.

Conclusion: The food is nice but not worth the price tag (20 EUR per person). The restaurant is convenient for people staying at the camp that wants an easily accessible food option.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMN0X9-Y0KoPiLl3bX2X9PCHpJRgBD9lLykjk0U"],"When":"2023-8-16"},{"Name":"Alex Kramer","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJXB8mpHZ_6Z37hKt3_6m7i4n5ki9zJw-ks_NFev4hjgb5gkA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Visied at the end of February 24.
Had an Angus burger and the Halumi cheese pizza.
The burger was mediocre, but the pizza was excellent.
The restaurant is located in the woods, creating a great smell and atmosphere.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPMrs6oG1wPDmd9-tpluHb7FqPEtqe7mUcvevlu"],"When":"2024-3-1"},{"Name":"Alex Chikolovec","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWPy4APJEQPfYV6dLxEVs4u-9bI24o-TfwnM9R9gTRp-fDM_SRgQw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Very rude staff , especially girl who speaks russian. I understand everything about the tables being occupied, the staff just needs to be polite and treat customers with respect, nothing more.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Artem S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUaaDJRr50HDncThwzqFcwqWkVdnum-xguC2sc8J8TE6astDu_q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Nice and quiet place, beautiful atmosphere!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMqQDOxergg0hz_4Ox5xKnA5-05rUvq86kGkDB_"],"When":"2024-5-26"},{"Name":"Aristi IASONOS","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLbl5YIPStbicSfQ92rUM4GtYlT82uoNYXlzfBN3ozWJSa3-g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Incredible food and service for the price. We ordered a margarita pizza, a greek salad and pork chops. Everything was incredible and there was a very cozy atmosphere with the glowing centerpieces and under the pine trees. The staff was very friendly and I was genuinely impressed by the value for money. Wonderful food at a good cost for the quality and portion size. I will definitely visit again.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Pambos Kartoudes","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWccQ4ik1sWP8Mg6XlFTHS4MniROJmIopBuQbFuJ15qXPqBvIc=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very nice atmosphere and excellent service. The food was great as well.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Aspa Philippou","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKN-0BpPiDsEXM6t7o_72zf-asLuuPa9WG756L8fJOSPXF0-Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We are excited that we found this hidden gem in Troodos. 1st good experience in a Troodos restaurant, finally!!!! We are so happy we found it but also sad that we did not know about it earlier.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNpe2XBGS8EMeLNPUpRxwq4DQM53Lm1YGj_99Nd"],"When":"2023-8-19"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Potato Chucks","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWaYXQlD4_14Yo_lRXOdLFuJ7pYpaNRCYH7Ouc-Zww94fpzLdQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Quick stop here after a long drive from Paphos to the highest point of mount olympos. Service was quick, food options average. Ordered ham sandwich, burger also ordered but chips need to be ordered separately. Ham sandwich lovely, but very dry. Just meat and bread, no sauce. Ham tasted nice. Good views of mountains. Overall, the restaurant is a bit outdated, with average food. Could do with some love on both areas.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN8_h7GjWKEkBH80UCFX07fujEfaK09wLMIB9x_"],"When":"2024-9-18"},{"Name":"Andrius Tama","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKdiM8H7NrwgJDxmxYaC-j3bKYrWVd-_Bk0eVcCGTos_C4XSw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"small portions and not delicious, it seems that everything is salty and topped up, only the view from the window is beautiful.the knife does not cut.I don't recommend it","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOl3I5gYxzyOW4f84vCIwR7RqvUh3B7aDcdQYhX"],"When":"2024-5-23"},{"Name":"Fabrice Belz","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI-K-cGf_2exa7EcDjyWchhMAs5ld2RNP5KEFeJThYyHXUzGw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Ordered lamb chops for 18€ complete deep fried. When asked about the quality, the answer is this is normal.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOjlBis2SS4E2n8NjT3WufSEzcKbEe0baSmYUqk"],"When":"2024-9-9"},{"Name":"Mónus Dóri","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUePbgfcMp2Wkm2iyw_NWw-e0MZqoTcEfp5HaVLfElA0P9GOTxc=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"After a long walk, we wanted to have an ice cream here. The server boy didn’t even know what flavours they sold, and during the sale he spoke loudly with his friends in another language which was a bit rude thing, I think… And also, he didn’t pay attention to the purity, cause he didn’t wash the ice cream picker after using it and he took our funnels without any napkins.
Only the server woman was kind with whom I could pay","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Christopher Z","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUjXK5tbI_ZRTVlKqEK9BznHxUMFKV5V1dDiNEsISsWIYzVMcbL=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Certain foods are good. Would eat grilled chicken or pork chops. Those are good, but not the rest.

Over-priced, low quality service, needs lots of work.

Good thing is that opposite the street there is a lovely scenery as per my phone","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMg-7E_3dcS5yc2V9YA8Irg58-MrEqyZApV4ifg"],"When":"2023-2-12"},{"Name":"Nicos Malekos","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWyAlXfGvRZbI1614zheDrShQGAUPruq9nw3lYUapGNBwvs9ow18w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Not great, not bad food for lunch.

Mousakas was pretty good, but the rest was not great and the humus was not fresh.

Everything else was of passable quality. It's ok to have lunch here, but there are better places for an awesome lunch in the nearby villages.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN89QlbZ5uP-jJImAD5iIAjRqZJAOuZFTLjwmpI"],"When":"2021-9-25"},{"Name":"Zuzana Urbankova","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXQW7g2MGcG-Ty7EZ1MhpUREBTnQBy1xFWtf-4Lld9X9MeRCjiY=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Pizza (14€) was very small and did not taste good. Don’t recommend this place. I should have read reviews before I entered. Bad experience.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Софья Рубенчик","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXi4mKTIS0szXOWcbwSROiPDBoUFD0QpECZ2RASvQSPfHGRWj5b=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Coffee was good, but we took stefado and it was not nice, also grilled cheese was really dry.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOdjr4fZ_rVS8puOYw7n5S_yOiFihpoJqP0935P"],"When":"2024-2-23"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Panayiotis JT","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUhIe_Kqk4M_NtyxgA8aqoITAvixaITKdfycQ8kLg7AxqVNNs6i=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Where to begin.. Had a short 2 night stay up the mountains in Platres and stumbled upon this restaurant for lunch, it was about 3.15 pm and as soon as we arrived the waiter quickly told us that he was closing at 4pm, fair enough we thought a quick bite and leave and when we went to sit down he told us that, that specific table is reserved...wait a minute are you closing or your still waiting for customers to come..make up your mind.
Apart from all that as we were hungry I let is slide, so we ordered a portion of Koubebia or dolmades as the Greeks call them, which were no good as they hardly had any meat in them, but mainly rice and tomato sauce.
I had the pork shank as the Kleftiko had run out and to my disappointment it came dry especially the outside so I ate just the middle near the bone. The chips were fried and re-fried and presented to us.
Won't be visting here again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN_SYh-jwmVK8SUqd3VXALAka6nxNzW1wgkSt12"],"When":"2024-10-5"},{"Name":"Hannah Klein","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ5G-TpApGV-WghPvEhmDUhXkzNJJhsOsT2Y59Av-OKsVn3Bg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The best food we have had in Cyprus! This place is not to be missed. Great for a meal after doing a hike in the area and then you can cool off at the waterfall down the road. This is a wonderfully decorated place with amazing service and absolutely delicious food.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNDm6EWMCugj0aHUOENFHjKe8q6ATZTXhQQ11-d"],"When":"2024-6-13"},{"Name":"Eliza Savvidou","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIkH3Ca9IVsW-rwG4LW7qGmr39SEmkk9SyfWPsWiPXCF6RHRw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The food fresh and very tasty. Tasted how traditional Cypriot food should taste. All the right flavours. Limited menu on the day we went but still something for everyone. Family friendly too, they have highchairs.

The environment and atmosphere was good too, Greek music in the background matching the decor of the restaurant. The staff and owner were nice to us, very friendly easy to talk to. Overall great experience, will be returning to try more of their food.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Kin W","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJYumqdDlxscW_tz5Eim7xkbrMiM1zkmcuboJTaD6TH-3Tg9Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"WOW just WOW. This was is an amazing, family-run traditional Cypriot tavern serving a small selective menu.

They were very accommodating to offer a veggie version for me and it was delicious (courgette and veg fried balls).

I tried the local white wine and it was very delicious. Very large glass too!

All the food was fresh and it tasted home made.

The son of the owner was very friendly and we had a short chat about the village etc.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN9OtVCNsjAxajeNKeVjiv4VRlaxMDX69_obujz"],"When":"2023-12-28"},{"Name":"Kalmer Kaljuste","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW5gJNHaNuZO5pzosN5GgmY6oVLi1Lti1qHp-BUusHLH9WL3zSu=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The Village Tavern is a small family restaurant that will bring you the traditional tastes of Cyprus to the table. They offer various foods that are prepared early in the day and heated up when you order them, nevertheless the flavour stays rich once you eat your meal. As it is in Cyprus, the portions are rather big, so better be hungry! Also kudos for offering millet as a side dish for my wine cooked pork, as I was really getting tired of seeing only french fries on the menu as a side dish. I also need to mention that the service was top notch and polite. I strongly suggest this restaurant as it's a breath of fresh air and keeps its roots in traditional cooking.

Note: please do not be put off for not seeing many vegetarian options, as they just might not be on the menu.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMRq9GWS3PpqnQartvBshYi6nQ1nBj2Ncbw9ZWc"],"When":"2024-4-4"},{"Name":"Damien Seaman","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUrz047TUHUvXfr1tT0HlyyjN6cljNwheC_aEH6eKJAUhLNPCbM=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My favourite restaurant in Pano Platres. Nice views, great family-run service. Popular with locals. Great grilled meats and traditional Cypriot dishes. The grilled Sheftalia rustic pork sausages in particular are the best I've ever eaten. Best for lunch but also good for dinner. Love the music they play too!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM4Qjl3d8uLRFW7gGFVZ6Q9ryLbJLp235WcO4tZ"],"When":"2024-5-19"},{"Name":"Maja Čičko","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVN6ohYasTZGn7ZtUGdtkuW9iEyYdhIR0qe-FAeksBEc6Y8qQQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A wonderful small traditional restaurant full of various antiques that can be viewed in the interior. We all agreed that our waiter was the best so far in Cyprus. He talked to us and directed us to nearby sights. As for the food itself, the appetizers were excellent (hallomi cheese and tzatziki sauce). I tried Afelia for the first time and unfortunately it did not delight me. Those flavors don't suit me personally. Even though I ate it, I wouldn't order it again. The moussaka was ok, and the kids had fried chicken and fries and it was great. The prices are more than affordable","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPaya2KdiMFGZjDurkGVId2Mae4PdZn2o-NCVM"],"When":"2024-5-23"},{"Name":"Katia Melas","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL9cwj1K3I6GTcCiD2pKiKx7YP3T5zikYZZ-F59ggYEtc4-mw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We absolutely loved the place and hospitality. Very kind stuff, delicious food. Traditional","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNs4MofAZHFblNHcBQwFqsP-Y6AcMtvtvd9xQTB"],"When":"2024-7-29"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Natasa Boyadjian","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKrQ02lwKXHewKeyRP0xO20Di6eE2sKsHnBGs8QyH44lO8b_gNB=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"A nice place, under the forest trees, to enjoy a fresh grilled trout for 18.50. Served with fries or boiled potatoes... Nice village salad also.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNAz5BSYO-TjwXiLO1C5QauEYycRB1xZDzQuJ7w"],"When":"2024-8-1"},{"Name":"Gazza Meg","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIU-VJRNgn_sknQ13Xzxb6tEROJzAxTjLC2iMbpt8ae1umT1Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Went with my family for the first time it's an old place in the forest next to a river they r welcoming and the food was actually really good. I had the lamb souvla which was delicious. Generous amount of fries with it. The eggplant and tzatziki dip were also very good so I believe they were made by the chef and not out of a tub. Recommended","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNGDk1DsWPuxQ4sa-XKEwY7saRGEy7PRwyqYzfe"],"When":"2024-9-8"},{"Name":"George","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWvfRZqTc2WlhL5ERSoYV7hL7wP4WvwXWndoe7Yc71XQ2vJwaVnGg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The trouts are fresh and taste pretty good, the atmosphere is lacking, and the plastic chairs are uncomfortable. Waiters are polite and helpful.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNB1wOVgGd_n2aKZYEgiDQF-vKWXN7mVCk1sbKW"],"When":"2024-7-30"},{"Name":"‫הדס פאל (הנחיית הורים לגיל הרך)‬‎","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVMxlvRliABJwyYmH7Lnf85pU5jPP89MpPElZFJIDFHatpiF2KsSA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"wonderful restaurant the fish we ate was the trout, which house recommended. grilled halumi also very good.
in a bit of a shortage desert wise..
but the atmosphere and the lovely settings and the great food surely compensate.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNzPLMqTlZFAGWemPZOUHJlcaOfNxD-rjlIRSQB"],"When":"2024-6-28"},{"Name":"Myria G.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKVhKMyceXLljny8LSlr3G2wxQPVgqYuLwApkHEG6UCMYqZfg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very nice experience! We also appreciated the waitress' suggestion to get one main dish for both my husband and I, and then decide if we need a second one, as I wasn't very hungry. Didn't need a second one too, the proportion was good enough.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Marios H","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUa74-l7V0sJ1QrYwlcall6cUOcbj3Jc6oTFTtChd-SE1sMSvGs=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Very nice place, especially during the summer heat! Food is pretty good, a bit pricey and service can be slow. Greek salad was pretty average with not so great feta and olives. I'd highly recommend the fresh trout and legumes (Fasolia).","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"George L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWX0IhTtwWsH8aLxwl7blel3oxJfCndsqwb2ZMQB4btDzDK5HK4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I recently dined at Psilo Dentro restaurant and found it to be in an idyllic location, nestled close to the serene Caledonia waterfall. The calming atmosphere added to the dining experience. The service was relatively efficient, considering the crowd. The fish was skillfully cooked and delicious, though the presence of bones was a minor inconvenience. However, the restaurant's biggest drawback was its evident state of disrepair. The outdated premises, which haven't seen updates since its opening years ago, were a noticeable downside. A score of three out of five seems fair, with potential for improvement through much-needed upkeep and modernization.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOyVwQJipJnjON2tjLPKxC0UT6HnQJr347zrsem"],"When":"2023-8-22"},{"Name":"Carol Rose","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKgqpn1as-4ncUjbcOzDSrSob6yfd0Jj7ZY177541zS_TTDKw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"A delightful setting for a very good meal. The restaurant is famous for its fresh trout and it lived up to its reputation.
The staff greeted us nicely as we approached and seated us quickly in a comfortable outside setting with shading trees and a view of the cascading brook in front of the cliff with birds singing and cheeky jays waiting for crumbs.
The menu has a good range of traditional Cypriot cuisine as well as more snack type items. There is a wide range of starters including such as chicken wings, village salads etc. The mains was very comprehensive featuring the trout but also other more traditional dishes. The dessert came as a complementary addition free of charge chosen from items such as creme caramel, fruit  jelly and semolina cake.
The drinks were brought very promptly but the trout dishes took longer than expected. But excellent and well worth the wait.
There is a large range of both soft and alcoholic drinks available as well as traditional Cyprus coffee.
There is a very large range of meal possibilities but the pricing is still very competitive.
The staff were attentive but rather busy and as the tables filled drawn to other needs.
It is a very busy restaurant catering mostly to tourists but there were quite a few Cypriots dining too.
Small children were accommodated with good humour.
The parking is excellent in a dedicated large area.
The access is via steps from the car park but before that there is a long ramp carefully graduated for wheelchair users.
The toilet facilities were modern and spotless.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"ser reen wong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX-iZUEj9Jehf3GCwF1-uGMyCMXHDS8PKg0BhYph1th4Qxjcoow=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"This tavern in Troodos Mountain is a charming spot, especially in the morning when it's less crowded. We opted for the English and Cyprus breakfast and found the portions to be on the smaller side, the flavours were okay.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNit3ffnAQEIL6t9mtSKlxvZj1QCOXkJUIS6vI7"],"When":"2024-4-27"},{"Name":"Konstantin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX62P4x_QGqjbmMLaJW8SuUaSVf5cjPUzJk5JRhe81GzpOIOWlE=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Sadly, this place was a letdown. After experiencing many fantastic taverns with warm, dedicated staff, this place delivers a chilly attitude, with over an hour wait time without any prior notice. Despite having the same prices as beach taverns, portions are disappointingly halved. The view is its only saving grace.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNtc4qc2Y-8HrPdmmelEuL3B1wDFTvp8zEZDmlc"],"When":"2023-7-10"},{"Name":"Arkadiusz Bujalski","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVs4uHcr93i4JqTDuFPj3ZL817x8_srMp8FMuHJeCthBiLzml1T=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Staff could be a bit more friendly. Me and my friend had a Halloumi Burger and despite there were not many ingredients, it was really delicious. Just the price for so simple burger was more than average. I would add some sliced pickled cucumbers to it insyead of fresh one and it would be perfect.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNhdbp62bszuER528ENhRKgibEzkSX_-rsIh2Oh"],"When":"2022-7-31"},{"Name":"Shaz","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLqRdkI3dTv6Skof6xop7SbgrOGPjSSIx44ZVAEjrH_Wx4kog=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Recently visited this cafe, I have visited a couple of times over the previous few years,  however each time I’ve come the food quality has deteriorated and this was by far the worst. I ordered the cod fish and chips and to say I was disappointed is an understatement. Most of the chips were raw, and I could count there was no more than 12 on the plate, the fish was more batter than fish and extremely greasy, it was literally leaking oil onto the plate, not worth the €11.50 they’re charging per plate. The service is also terrible and unwelcoming. I would advise to avoid visiting if possible, I certainly won’t be going again.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Tadas Žukauskas","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXUKTwDq6GBigLrWhOObUF-ujn6Lbkmvus0SU4LbTChTjqoinj6Mw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Cosy place in the heart of Troodos mountains. The view is simply breathtaking. Very good coffee, which is so important after long hikes. Friendly staff. Carrot cake was delicious.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOgeY89LJJhtxDroR7pUmi9PIGu1qlad5wFDObN"],"When":"2024-2-25"},{"Name":"Aggelos Vrionides","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX1ZIm7Dh9FOAJUiQvLmgEYya8FB2qJYb28sEimMRQkawfU5q_I=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Despite the fact that this place is pretty popular. The prices are extreme and the portions are small. We had mix souvlakia for 16 euro and they were cold and chewy.  The place is dirty and unwelcoming.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNF5-rWbPIlmRWpSRDj7exTo3TENPwkygmyv64O"],"When":"2023-11-26"},{"Name":"Viera Fkš","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXp2fPmQ_wd71nXz1J_HfxNIaVkibwfKllE9RKwJx2aYKHhcyMe=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"We ordered 2x souvlaki pork kebab(2x7,5€), i have never eaten anything more disgusting. Meat was dry and without any taste, service horrible, vegetables poor, the only good thing was the pita which made approx 70% from all meal...no cap","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOWhqG2HjQ7JfNDApKY56v9FiWIaDpvfSfQhqu1"],"When":"2023-7-25"},{"Name":"Gina","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIxCXbho_tc3KYyP-1O3OEewnGqV3Ufk-1Fiv0o7eVfYgM3K9zj=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"It’s a no from me.

I came here with my family and it took about 15 minutes to order our drinks. Another 10 minutes later and our food order hadn’t been taken so my husband had to go to the till to order it himself. The customer service is not great.

The tables were dirty, and when the food arrived we were brought dirty cutlery. My son spilled wine as the waiter set it on our table and the waiter didn’t come back with any tissues for us to clean it. Ended up getting tissues from another table myself.

Now the food was very bland. No seasoning whatsoever on any of our dishes. My food could have done with some sauce as well. I was served half a cup of hot chocolate and my coke glass was cracked. I only got one high chair for one of my 1 year old twins but that wasn’t a major issue.

The table next to us left quite a while ago and their dirty dishes were on there for about 30 minutes.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNWopLmwGxBAcF3_29XeBiSF6x2qGiyikJUbWfI"],"When":"2020-1-1"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Kalmer Kaljuste","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW5gJNHaNuZO5pzosN5GgmY6oVLi1Lti1qHp-BUusHLH9WL3zSu=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"After seeing many good reviews we thought that this place would knock us off our feet. The salad, bread and fries were absolutely spot on. For my main dish I ordered sausages which were kind of musky and overcooked, but I believe it's exactly how it's meant to be, just not for my taste - this does not affect my rating. Unfortunately the fish was not cooked properly, part of it was still raw and after tasting it we just couldn't eat any longer.

They did ask us if everything was okay, but we had a bite of the fish after that question. We didn't want to go and ask them to heat it up properly this time, instead we paid and left. You can play a cat and mouse game who's guilty here, but honestly no one should serve an uncooked meal.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOlfGDhBR71mjNuhhtFVBXwCQsOnxLcKBXSRcNt"],"When":"2024-4-3"},{"Name":"Eirini Nikolaou","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXD7n-3BV4ShVDKZw3wp6L5wHtP6cw4RlEtEnf2MMA2txyHObw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very tasty traditional food! We ate the pork souvlakia and sheftalia in pitta and lamb. Both delicious. Ideal for quick trips in the mountains. Best to reserve before as it can get quite busy.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPvxQ-Vczw5yVMUa0q5p2GhZGpEQdS_5Rc7lHZt"],"When":"2024-8-27"},{"Name":"Dean Percy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLjyB490bo6bG2kkBv2x670S2bFNicGsrP6mv8HWWpBe-C-ZXo=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Delicious, we had the kebab and village salad. The kids loved their burgers and fries! Great ambience to match the food, large portions and very reasonably priced. Would highly recommend","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPGQLZ6LTEckZrAAmenTeF-ipgzPFgmwxP2M2Vn"],"When":"2024-5-17"},{"Name":"Claira Cain","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXVTrOEj-pu7Ln1H9BnVwuMbCB1bJYOFisNoJsKmL08WWwg-AtgVw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Fantastic find in the town of Kakopetria. Cosy restaurant serving traditional taverna food at reasonable prices. The trout was exceptional!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP4c5t4C5WssRKIzd1vtXpRUs03BR3gQBfbtlt9"],"When":"2024-4-23"},{"Name":"Steven","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKQiIVt7CLg3ASvADuyDhM-Ccz8tejgPs1s0QehFKl8ZlFnJA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Delicious and authentic food at a great value; €18 per person for Meze. While they offer fewer dishes compared to some places, the price is justified. Service could be improved—they forgot our Xaloumi and we had to remind them about the included dessert. It also seemed like they wanted us to leave quickly. The space is quite compact, but on the plus side, they provide complimentary water.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOyB-nfaqgtvmt3PWtxh5D-5N0TQA-It7qtKj-5"],"When":"2023-8-17"},{"Name":"Gadi Aloni","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXPqQ5BEdcpCeouiC90v0S4pP6fLTzyIFwtzLUHEkDp59sRDBvL=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A very big WOW . amazing food , very good prices , quick service We travel around the world a lot and we never had such an amazing experience  . We stayed in Kakopeyria for 4 days and came  here every night . Tried almost all dishes and each of them was a big WOW.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMbPGOAiWz9OelWidmweb22DQCP29YcPjfiamob"],"When":"2023-10-21"},{"Name":"Petros R.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJAlkTebhuwvv9hBDS7V-3urk5VkeS5nfQWXZkKigdyvvmXJ9s=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"ok food, value for money - their meze is at €18.

Halloumi, mushroom and pastourmas were excellent.

Staff needs to be a friendly - they didn’t seem to be happy about serving us! We ordered a beer with our food and it came half way through our meal.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNa63TV6nSIPW_D4G5tBeu29RWSVmEUQ1dUaoHL"],"When":"2024-2-4"},{"Name":"Артём Розанов","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLxitFEGdo-TEWiztQ_G3uC6tR-VFu6zPacOJLFtLqPkUHnbw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Delicious place, I liked everything! Awesome grilled trout fish. Soft and fresh.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMSKj8iAB0Rl6QlisQ4nCR08wXkSotXZGsZ9SIR"],"When":"2024-7-13"}]

[{"Name":"Oksana Vishnevskaia","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW7L9L0RsJjetB-OqJogipUECypC1J0j3eNYnRNVXeSswhGqj0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Everything was delicious, and the portions were ample; we even had to take some food home. It's very pleasant to sit on the distant veranda, away from the cars. The only disappointing thing is the inconvenient opening hours.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNEImUsjREoujPUv3c896ZL5Rn7m40FBl9BY7Nc"],"When":"2024-7-24"},{"Name":"Andriana K.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVBnVJe4zuk6IsF2rGVQ3Tpv2orTW22Iu7hHRHSvizTnsK1tGqJ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We came for a night in Platres and we booked this restaurant which is very close in distance, based on the reviews. The atmosphere is wonderful, one of the most big and beautifully decorated restaurants I've been to in Cyprus. There's a very beautiful view of the forest. This restaurant is big enough to hold events, weddings etc. Definitely a great restaurant to visit anytime of the year. The service was fast and excellent. We didn't even wait much time for our food. I ordered a pork chop, as you see in the photo it's truly magnificent! Even the potatoes were homemade. My husband ordered chicken which was truly amazing as well. Thank you very much for this beautiful experience! I recommend this place 100000000000%! ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNMv3DdGI8EkU5Xg6nq7gHmKNL0ol9T30OxpaF1"],"When":"2023-9-9"},{"Name":"Apo. Alambritis","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJg0pqo4lMPgYWDw9Q_LVkL8Tjbzl9zr_-PMypZhXVtoOS37g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very good food,reasonable prices but could be lower,good atmosphere and amazing service.

TOTALLY RECOMMEND!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMhO8PAlTXRC8SYvIRiA65PSvoBGq61otvjZANx"],"When":"2024-8-3"},{"Name":"Liu Ko","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVS0qutbTQaGCCK_dZbWb_gta0cbQ8fHrvA86DNpCaAZZuWrAxd=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is the place where I want to return again and again ❤️ We took the meze and it was an endless feast! Everything was delicious and the employees were so nice 💕 This place is worth a visit! In my opinion, our lunch was cheap, because in the states they would have charged at least $200 for it.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPab037es7Pd-sdHpS0RspvCikGrXnY6iyX4aiM"],"When":"2023-12-13"},{"Name":"valentin stoyanov","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUOJMensplWsgbxPJirJTyDue95--rmSo5h3-aUTU9ARQtYrO0=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Food it was wonderful amazing but the staff it’s from Bangladesh and Africa they don’t know how to survey they don’t brig as no water for welcome no salt no olive oil no vinegar I’m not racist but you need guys European staff","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN2od_Kl-RCi2UDJKYBkMG4iEoso-bweG7Ba4uk"],"When":"2024-4-26"},{"Name":"M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVj1cDhmSNgBedUBavG27a0_rwjrGZejX5F5zjyAb2_iuZSIts=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"pros:
Delicious food, great location within the woods

cons:
I am vegan and ordered grilled veggies. They were great but were cooked in the same place as meat and had a light meat taste.
The second time we visited the restaurant, we were told we can't sit inside because there's an event (wedding). Completely understand but it was unpleasant to have to sit and eat next to smokers
We ordered mushrooms both times and the first time they were absolutely perfect, the second time they were pale and undercooked","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO-AF5EckQ2Q4UcQ3t7VPUGbHQRNeXBLVJwkV0"],"When":"2023-7-1"},{"Name":"Danae Christodoulou","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVvIIvT9tEGx95t03Y8dCpVv2Fz0pkguMyOU3nYZvPMtV-t-8_q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very tasty Cypriot food, big portions and great value for money! We loved everything we tried! The staff was very welcoming, seemed like a family run restaurant. Highly recommended","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Andreas Syrimis","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWxSk_U78B8V1YUMfMhS5iZe-Wlm6fbGcHldwfSGUk1dToT3hbfww=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Traditional food, generous portions, reasonable prices, nice location.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMu0_qFg30sTP0HwNbFDMW7ddgykwAYSx4JtKW2"],"When":"2024-9-15"}]

[{"Name":"Marika Harris","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVZCDhpFbK9GK7ow3SsNaUGPDUNfqyIXLXXJL522IMP1c6J0J4keQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Cosy taverna in the mountains. The portion sizes are very generous. The food was tasty especially the village salad. The staff didn't clarify which drinks they had available and which did not. Dishes appeared randomly and I had to request them again for accompanying dishes because the staff didn't seem to bother to bring all the orders. Overall it was a good evening with fresh and yummy food.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Eva Ieridou","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjViWcYARL1c7MLzaXSiUKJ-fgr7J7Iwsig3TSFvLyhbJUzL5umo=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Absolutely delicious!
Huge portions, good prices, very friendly staff, and nice environment 👌🏽","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPI6ctsmAEAvoqGkOr8hMwqLp_kgTZkBLliWZmB"],"When":"2024-5-9"},{"Name":"Jānis Pēkšēns","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJkzKldaztCiZfJbaBSGlSExBw-wn0RmoQjN2H2qBrFrxHyhA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very famous place for locals. Excelent food, perfect service, good price for value. On picture see meze for two persons. Acyually completely enough for four, but the rest You can take away in stuff offered boxes. Very convenient, fully recommend this place for perfect Cyprus dinner!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNRFxTFoJ9P1sQ_UOH_yJQ08pUChZATXbG5t-MA"],"When":"2024-3-18"},{"Name":"Theo Michael","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU1jVX3xW_yhjS-ZgF9GUALbfcnkLGgziopwQ-ber0wo5Pzh9i4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Good Greek-Cypriot food that brings back many childhood memories. Service was fast and efficient. Traditional dishes to choose from.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"KC Mitch","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXkshOnyT8DwjyiaQNpQemj48As_KvIze9eZm3TVpNL0SfCkZ2m=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing local food with a beautiful relaxing atmosphere. Ordered the meze and there was so much food we had to take a box home. Friendly staff and clean environment. Suck a great place to visit and highly recommended. Thank you.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNQXp7KeXofwwiv1Oya7kskoGx2f3hjJC-WJ9zb"],"When":"2022-9-24"},{"Name":"Andreas Ttofi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjURoE0yEeJRa1uE4vgAIQD9ymSTO8TqC36qpr-hnApZP3N046vE=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"A good example of what a Cyprus tavern should look like. Food was good, there was live music and the pricing was on point. If you ever find yourself hungry near Mandria you should definitely visit.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN9I54XjVTWpJg4LezOwRUks3MCOKHggRUAAv8I"],"When":"2023-3-14"},{"Name":"Kotsios","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW-AfBtTnPh79nB73qHgAlMUodTXKoQaq1uNIxtDOUzEIRfiI4t=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very polite and friendly staff. Cute place with a beautiful view. Homemade food and cozy atmosphere. Dessert is on the house. Will definitely visit again!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN295i9MZCr0k-UjjGqsyKwrHtVhQhEdR8hq9a_"],"When":"2023-4-22"},{"Name":"Harry Maniac","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL_mNgaRafejqSvNuFv3wRghTm1eNM4t7gzETAU6Sm4KYwI3w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Great stuff attitude. Food quality and quantity are good, similar to those someone can cook at home.

Pricing is ok also.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Haris Psallidopoulos","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKK9048BWGxUV1XFmMGSh0C2lqHaBkkE4lUKO9DZUXKkF5tCQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Alright, first off, let's clear something up: if you head to the mountains and opt for fish, you're a dingus and shouldn't gripe about the fish being overpriced and subpar. The only smart choice here is trout since it's a freshwater fish and plentiful in the mountains.

Moving on to the meal, we kicked things off with a small village salad and some eggplant dip as appetizers. For our mains, we went with moussaka and a pork chop (almost 700 grams).

My wife isn't usually a fan of moussaka, but something inspired her to order it this time, and wow, did she enjoy it. As for the pork chop, it was cooked perfectly and super juicy too. The standout of our meal was definitely the “fries”; they weren’t greasy at all, though they could use a touch of salt and oregano.

The staff were incredibly friendly, welcoming, and always wore a smile.

All in all, it was a fantastic dining experience, but please, for heaven’s sake, don't be a ding dong and order fish when you’re that far from the ocean.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOy4pgQIqMl4_pLvaSbiappOE4VNs6zXyVOQJ1L"],"When":"2024-3-9"},{"Name":"Vladimir Sadovski","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLnY4tSGbRO1BY7tfqU3mWloFhmRsd6uXs7AzaIwLmITWYDCCm4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Notable view to the mountains. Tasty meals. All capable cooked with right sauses. Recommend for visiting if you are in Agros Village. Plenty of parking also!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPQUwoweSma5tAKZa9kkYWU-pzo4X5ePr0vjPd0"],"When":"2024-7-21"},{"Name":"Monica Suliman","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWkl4jXF_RKVKTxUo2dfcBq67ZSsYq3_cUiD39SdUzoucsdL31R=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We had an early dinner, all the dishes were simply delicious!!!!!
Everything was fresh, and the lamb exquisitely marinated.
The house wine was also very good!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipONbJqZw7hk0RbUiNVg42cnqAE-Wr-bdlvT1uSE"],"When":"2024-6-24"},{"Name":"Michael L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKiNjJomSehP-enj01odWlk8xTSrOnEx2BWJo-ReTKh9uTzRw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"My wife and I visited the restaurant. We had the lamb oven (kotsi) and moussaka. The Lamb was very juicy and very tasty. The wine was also full body and delicious. The chips that came on the side were very crispy and fresh. We are definitely going back again! We were offered free greek coffee and deserts at the end of our meal, which it was a very nice gesture.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPy39giC1p711QKE0twzIxbbRFZV9-5fTHO_5Iv"],"When":"2024-4-6"},{"Name":"Lana Kostina","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLjz4GrCyd-VrfJEJx1nVJjJqDGafjk4zOV7L8IJ3PlDpfMXA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"beautiful and quiet place, so good after long hike. We ordered lamb and trout, both was very tasty and delicious","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPoySypDzxCbJsbL2dt3OfHly3dyAn-bXmgpd4i"],"When":"2024-4-11"},{"Name":"Mr Reviewer","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU3OtC9-gdWUsiLUZpWUi3ybR-u4BGHmnFcyu7m7Hz3aW63OKik=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We went there for dinner and chosen meat meze.  Food had a small variety of dips (just 3 spoons of tahini and 2 of tzatziki). Greek salad was really good, but the tomatoes... disgusting. Pork ribs were so good and juicy, the sausage and the mushroom were really good, in contrast with the grilled haloumi cheese that came a bit hard to us. Sheftalia was the worst one I've ever had. I thought it was left outside for 10 days. Disgusting with all its meaning. Souvlakia were juicy as I was expecting them to be. We also got fries and bread. Pleasant staff, smiling all the time.
